desc.notice:
◈ Task
Defeat 188 Gold-silver Yachas and 201 Diamond Yachas

◈ Reward
EXP 3,540,336 / Skill Points 756


◈ Format
Repeatable (x4)

◈ NPC
Outpost Commander Dao Zhi Fong

◈ Monster
Gold-silver Yacha, Diamond Yacha

◈ Scenario
This terrible chaos brought on by the Earth Ghosts taking over the Stone Cave has ended up awakening Yachas. Having taken over the lower levels of the Donwhang Stone Cave, their wicked energy is increasing at an incredible speed. At this rate, their wicked energy will end up covering the entire West China region. That must be stopped at all cost. Please, slay those Yachas.

◈ Mission
Collect 1 Anubis Heart.

◈ Reward
EXP 75300714 / Skill Points 4100 / Gold 15356

◈ Type
1 Time Only

◈ NPC
Egypt Governor Senmute / Egypt Governor Senmute

◈ Monster
Anubis

◈ Scenario
Now I want you to get Anubis's heart. Please bring this Seal Crystal and defeat Abubis in the Shrine to get his heart.

◈ Task
Collect 90 Broken Fragments of Gold

◈ Reward
EXP 843,245 /
General's Tokens 10

◈ Format
Repeatable (x4)

◈ NPC
Outpost Guard Ji He Long

◈ Monster
Gold-silver Yacha

◈ Scenario
Have you heard the news that Yachas have been awakened in the Donwhang Stone Cave? Among these Yachas, the Gold-Silver Yachas are known for their love for gold. They wield clubs made of gold. If such clubs really do exist, I would mind being struck down by one of those. Ha ha! I am just kidding. No matter how much I like gold, nothing is worth having my head bashed in. Still, I would like to lay my eyes on Yacha's gold, even if it's just a fragment. Will you help?

◈ Mission
Hunt 10 Slave watchers

◈ Reward
Experience 2573000/ 5 Strong Resurrection Scrolls

◈ Form
Available Once

◈ NPC
Slave Jabur / Slave Shifle

◈ Monster
Slave watchers

◈ Scenario
The Roc clan's slave drivers found out about our escape plan. The only way to keep alive now is to destroy the evidence and deny the fact.
The escape plan may have been a failure, but we still thank you deeply for your concern.
Please return to Jabur and tell him that our plan has failed.
The Roc clan's slave watchers will want to chase you down and interrogate you about the plan. Running from them won't stop them, but defeat 10 of them and you should be able to cover your traces.On your way to Jabur to tell him that our plan has failed, please defeat 10 Slave Watchers.

◈ Task
Collect 67 Bows of the Huns

◈ Reward
EXP 104960 /
Soldier's Tokens 5

◈ Format
One-time quest

◈ NPC
Outpost Guard Dexter

◈ Monster
Hun Shooter

◈ Scenario
Hun Shooters are savages but they are sharpshooters. However, this is not a good news. Our comrades were killed by their arrows. I was also almost dead. If we do not control them, more comrades will be in danger. Please help me.

◈ Task
Defeat The Earth

◈ Reward
EXP 1,197,791,957 / Skill Points 7,321 /
Gold 444,500

◈ Format
One-time quest

◈ NPC
Lost Soldier Will

◈ Monsters
The Earth

◈ Scenario
According to the letter sent by the soldiers who moved out to the Hall of Worship Intermediate, The Earth, one of the statues of the gods in this Temple has awoken. The Earth was once a gentle gatekeeper of the Temple… It is unfortunate, but we will have to destroy him.

◈ Objective
Collect 500 units of White Porcelain

◈ Reward
150,800 Job EXP / item (10% bonus when quota filled) -50% in Safe Mode

◈ Format
Unlimited Repeatable

◈ NPC
Trader Alice / Select 1 of all traders

◈ Monster
Monsters Lv 111-120

◈ Scenario
You need to work ceaselessly to increase your Job level. If you are ready, bring me 500 units of White Porcelain. You should be able to find White Porcelain as you hunt monsters at level 111-120. If you run out of time and don't find enough White Porcelain, don't worry. Even if you don't have all 500 units, I will pay you for what you have. But don't forget that you have to bring all 500 units to gain greater Job EXP.

◈ Task
Defeat 133 Blue-Face Spiders and 287 White-Face Spiders

◈ Reward
EXP 1869346 / Skill Points 679


◈ Format
Repeatable (x3)

◈ NPC
Outpost Commander Hu Ru Lang

◈ Monster
Blue-Face Spider, White-Face Spider

◈ Scenario
On this frigid land, there live spider monsters called Blue-Face Spiders and White-Face Spiders. They are ordinary spider monsters but they became threatening creatures as they learned to survive the harsh cold. If we just leave them be, something terrible may happen. We must destroy Blue-Face Spiders and White-Face Spiders now.

◈ Mission
Collect 30 Transparent Blue Scales and 50 Tough Black Leathers.

◈ Reward
EXP 10510528 / Skill Points 1500 / Gold 4856

◈ Type
1 Time Only

◈ NPC
Grocery Trader Kapra / Grocery Trader Kapra

◈ Monster
Ure'uth / Blood Hyena

◈ Scenario
It's not that I'm worried about making the suit, but I have no materials. If you really want it, then go bring me 30 Transparent Blue Scales and 50 Tough Black Leathers. You can find the scales from Ure'uth and the leather from Blood Hyenas. Since they both inhabit the Valley of the Kings, you won't have a hard time finding them.

◈ Task
Speak with Outpost Commander Tsai Bao

◈ Reward
Skill Points 2


◈ Format
One-time quest

◈ NPC
Outpost Commander Wang Pai / Outpost Commander Tsai Bao

◈ Monster
None

◈ Scenario
I have been watching you all this time. Your talent should not be wasted hunting puny demons. That sort of grunt work is for dumb brutes like us. Ha ha! I have spoken to Commander Tsai Bao of Jangan Outpost 2 out west. Go and speak with him. He will give you tasks that suit you better. You will do great things someday.

desc1.notice: Speak with Outpost Commander Tsai Bao

desc.notice:
◈ Task
Deliver Earth Magician's Crystal Balls

◈ Reward
EXP 10,917 /
Soldier's Tokens 4

◈ Format
One-time quest

◈ NPC
Outpost Guard Ru Li Mao / Buddhist Priest Fa

◈ Monster
None

◈ Scenario
The crystal balls that were retrieved from Earth Magicians are exuding spine-chilling energy. How frightening... I don't think we should keep these here, but show them to Buddhist Priest Fa. Please take these Earth Magician's Crystal Balls to him.

◈ Mission
Collect 100 Accessory Materials.

◈ Reward
EXP 11485137 / Skill Points 1800 / Gold 4987

◈ Type
1 Time Only

◈ NPC
Trader Union President Naunakt / Trader Union President Naunakt

◈ Monster
Evil Bug

◈ Scenario
My husband's relationship with his daughter seems to have worsened in the last few years. Deep inside, they love each other, but they just don't know how to express it. I think it's time for me to intervene. I want to make a necklace that will remind them of their good memories so they'll reconnect. Please bring me 100 materials from Evil Bugs in the Storm and Cloud Desert.

◈ Mission
Collect 60 Tomb Snake Servant Scale

◈ Reward
Experience 4266700 / GOLD 107000 / Skill Exp 20000

◈ Form
Available 3 times

◈ NPC
Hwangno the Village Chief of Jangan

◈ Monster
Tomb Snake Servant

◈ Scenario
I guess I am getting old now. My whole body aches at every small move, you know. Not that you couldn't tell by looking at my face ravaged by wrinkles, though. Hahaha...
Hey, friend. Won't you take a moment and indulge a wish of this old man? On rainy days, the back pain becomes unbearable. I hear that the scales of a monster called the Tomb Snake Servant in the Qin-Shi Tomb contain heat energy. I'd like to make a warming belt with those scales.
Bring me 60 Scales of Tomb Snake Servant. They say you can find Tomb Snake Servants on the 2nd level of the Qin-Shi Tomb.

◈ Task
Speak with Lost Investigator Elda

◈ Reward
EXP 2,734,354 / Skill Points 5,488 /
Gold 100,000

◈ Format
One-time quest

◈ NPC
Lost Investigator Natal / Lost Investigator Elda

◈ Monsters
None

◈ Scenario
The investigators and I came in here to study the phenomena at the Temple. Then, all of a sudden, the statues on either side of us came alive and began attacking us. Our team has been scattered since then. Will you find them?

◈ Task
Deliver Crab Shells

◈ Reward
EXP 12,172 /
Soldier's Tokens 4

◈ Format
One-time quest

◈ NPC
Outpost Guard Anet / Adventurer Demetri

◈ Monster
None

◈ Scenario
I have far too much on my plate. I had too much to do to begin with, and, now, they want me on delivery duties on top of that? If you have some time to spare, could you help me?

QNO_N_EU_050.quest_name: Do you know the taste of crab?

◈ Scenario
Evil Order Warriors boast incredible strength. It is said that no one can handle them in one-on-one combat. But, no matter how great of warriors they may be, they won't be able to fight without their weapons. What do you say? Won't you seize their weapons for us?

◈ How to Teleport

◈ Scenario
Listen, my friend. You know that Toguis have appeared from a place called the Forgotten World, don't you? Now, these nasty things bit my arm. I blew their heads off with my hammer here, but I'm still not satisfied. I will have to pull out all their teeth out to get my revenge!

EXP 9188110 / Skill Points 1050 / Gold 49875

Repeatable

Prove to me that you're capable of becoming a true Deity by hunting 1000 Aknishes.

GOLD 239000

1

Scout Force Soldier Hadiun

◈ Scenario
I can't put up with the hyenas wandering around the canyon anymore. We need to wipe them out no matter how long it takes. Would you help me?

◈Mission
Kill the Captain of army or survive 10 minutes of that fight.

◈ Reward
None

◈ Form
Available once

◈ NPC
General Sonhyeon

◈ Monster
Captain of army / Commander of army.

◈ Scenario
By the mandate of Imperial Majesty, the imperial army is seeking people with the power to fight against transcendental beings that threaten this world
Would you be willing to take the test hold by imperial army? We are going to tell the way to be stronger to thoes who pass the test.
I think you should be able to pass the test easily.
Okay, I will explain what kind of test you would take.
When you enter the test center, you will fight with the captain of army. You should kill him under 10 minutes or survive from the fight during the 10 minutes.
You can choose what you want to do according to your ability. Before you enter the test center, remember that if you die, the test will be finished.
If you are ready to take the test, come and talk to me.

desc1.notice: Kill Military Captain or Survive for 10 Mins

Gold 419,060

◈ Scenario
Demons from hell must be slain, every single one of them. They think of human beings as their food, nothing more. As long as they exist in this world, human beings cannot live in peace. Slay Vampire Hounds and Vampire Guards.

I would tell you where the white viper lives as I promised, but could you do me one more favor?
Seeing how you kept your promise to me, I find you trustworthy enough to entrust you with this task, rather than someone else.
Please deliver the tear you got for me and this letter to a lady named WalYoung.

desc1.notice: Deliver the Tears of the Tomb Snake Soul to WalYoung

desc.notice:
◈ Task
Defeat 200 Shakrams

◈ Reward
EXP 2846151 / Skill Points 392


◈ Format
Repeatable (x3)

◈ NPC
Outpost Commander Ru Long Hu

◈ Monster
Shakram

◈ Scenario
Recently, numerous demons have appeared in the Mysterious Death Desert and begun attacking people. Could it be that dormant demons have been awakened all together? Or could it be that something is drawing demons to this land? Whatever the case may be, we must first focus on solving the present issue at hand. Lend us a hand and defeat the demons in the desert, will you?

◈ Mission
Eliminate 800 Ure'uth.

◈ Reward
EXP 8408422 / Skill Points 750 / Gold 38850

◈ Type
Repeatable

◈ NPC
Egyptian Soldier Kamori / Egyptian Soldier Kamori

◈ Monster
Ure'uth

◈ Scenario
Do you wish to become a Deity? I can help you with that. Please go hunt 800 Ure'uth.

◈ Mission
Capture Merchant associate thief

◈ Reward
Experience 2823000 / 1 Hwajung repair hammer

◈ Form
Available Once

◈ NPC
Jangan Merchant Associate Hwajung

◈ Monster
Merchant associate thief

◈ Scenario
If what Miaoryeong said was true, the thief must have gone to the Qin-Shi Tomb. We must go to the Tomb, find the thief and retrieve the ledger.
But we also need to know if he sold the information in the ledger, so we had better capture him alive. Will you help us capture him?
Go to the 1st level of the Qin-Shi Tomb as Miaoryeong informed us and capture the thief. There is a rope that some merchants left behind at the guild. You can use this strong rope to capture him.
Once the thief is captured, he will bitterly resist and the rope won't be able to sustain itself. Bring him to us as soon as you capture him before he can break away..
Oh, and if you use up all the ropes, come back to me and I'll give you a few extra. Now, go. You must retrieve the ledger before the merchants suffer any loss.

◈ Task
Defeat 30 Griffins, 50 Griffin Guardians, and 50 Griffin Conquerors

◈ Reward
EXP 159,022,620 / Skill Points 5,226 /
Gold 343,980

◈ Format
One-time quest

◈ NPC
Lost Investigator Elda

◈ Monsters
Griffin, Griffin Guardian, Griffin Conqueror

◈ Scenario
What… happened to this Temple? I only came in here to do some investigation… Please, take care of the griffins over there so I can leave this place.

◈ Mission
Collect 150 White Feathers and 200 Black Feathers

◈ Reward
Experience 9330000

◈ Form
Available 3 times

◈ NPC
Towner Anashya

◈ Monster
Wing Tribe

◈ Scenario
Everyone has left…
In a town that is as good as ruin, the only thing I can do is make clothes with fabric.
But recently I can’t make clothes because I can’t find any fabric.
I used to order in fabric from Hotan before, but now they refuse to send fabric here because it has become too dangerous…
If I really wanted to, I could make fabric here from the feathers of the monster birds called Wing Tribes, but they are far too dangerous for me to take on.
Will you help?
Please bring me 150 White Feathers and 200 Black Feathers from the Wing Tribes.

◈ Objective
Collect 500 units of Brooches

◈ Reward
8,320 Job EXP / item (10% bonus when quota filled) -50% in Safe Mode

◈ Format
Unlimited Repeatable

◈ NPC
Trader Sabonue

◈ Monster
Monsters Lv 90-99

◈ Scenario
You need to work ceaselessly to increase your Job level. If you are ready, bring me 500 units of Brooches. You should be able to find Brooches as you hunt monsters at level 90-99. If you run out of time and don't find enough Brooches, don't worry. Even if you don't have all 500 units, I will pay you for what you have. But don't forget that you have to bring all 500 units to gain greater Job EXP.

◈ Task
Defeat 200 Battle Lions and 200 Roaring Battle Lions

◈ Reward
EXP 1,544,256 / Skill Points 578 /
Gold 24,696

◈ Format
Unlimited Repeats

◈ NPC
Lost Investigator Rachel

◈ Monsters
Battle Lion, Roaring Battle Lion

◈ Scenario
It's been a long time. How have you been? Your help last time resolved all my fears. I can continue my investigation faithfully. I am going to finish the investigation successfully and become a hero. Now, there are still lots of Battle Lions and Roaring Battle Lions, slowing down my research. Would you help me again?

◈ Mission
Collect 10 Movoi's Grass

◈ Reward
Inventory 10 Slot Expansion

◈ Form
Available once

◈ Executable level
Level 5 and above

◈ NPC
Constantinople Grocery Trader Bajel

◈ Monster
Movoi

◈ Scenario
Grocery Trader Bajel of Constantinople will expand your inventory if you bring 10 Movoi's Grass.

◈ Task
Defeat 50 Metamorphosis Zealots and 50 Metamorphosis Infectors

◈ Reward
EXP 287,345,132 / Skill Points 5,226 /
Gold 422,740

◈ Format
One-time quest

◈ NPC
Baal Worshipper Barun

◈ Monsters
Metamorphosis Zealot, Metamorphosis Infector

◈ Scenario
We, the Baal worshippers, only wanted the revival of Baal worship. In all honesty, we had no ulterior motive. We didn't think that things would become the way they are now. We should have never listened to Babilion… We thought he would fulfill our dream, but we were simply used for his ambition. Fellow believers were used in his experiments, and the experiments failed. Those who were used in his experiments were no longer humans - they became rabid beasts. Will you slay them and put them to rest?

◈ Mission
Hunt 500 Black Eagles

◈ Reward
Experience 7516000

◈ Form
Available 3 Times

◈ NPC
Towner Salrihan

◈ Monster
Black Eagles

◈ Scenario
The Black Eagles once again attacked the sheep in overnight...
Black Eagles are much more intelligent and powerful than normal birds, so I can’t do anything about them with my own strength.
But I can’t afford to lose any more sheep. If the few sheeps I have left are attacked by Black Eagles, I won't be able to feed myself.
So I have come to a decision. I'm going to hunt Black Eagles and protect my sheep.
But I'm not that strong – Won’t you hunt them down on my behalf?
Please hunt 500 Black Eagles for me. I will be sure to reward you.

◈ Task
Eliminate 40 Togui Sorcerers

◈ Rewards
EXP 91,000 / Skill EXP 2,000

◈ Format
Repeatable quest (Restricted to once per day)

◈ NPC
Storage-Keeper Auisan

◈ Monsters
Togui Sorcerer (The Phantom of the Crimson Blood level 51~60)

◈ How to Teleport
You can teleport to the Forgotten World by using a Dimension Hole.
You can obtain Dimension Holes from the monster that appears from the Dimension Pillars.

◈ Scenario
Have you ever seen the face of a Togui Sorcerer? I've never seen a monster so hideous. It gives me the chills just to think about it. Whew… Lately, I have been plagued by that face and can't even sleep at night. Please, won't you go and slay Togui Sorcerers? I want to be able to sleep peacefully, at least.

◈ Objective
Deliver Specialty Goods Level 40 (Europe)

◈ Reward
1,096,800 Job EXP (-50% in Safe Mode)

◈ Format
One-time Quest

◈ NPC
Trader Samanda / Trader Anna

None

◈ Scenario
We have an order for specialty goods to be delivered. You need to deliver specialty goods to Trader Anna in Constantinople. Specialty goods delivery assignments are worth more Job EXP than trade goods collection assignments. It would do you well to undertake some of these.

Deliver Mysterious Orders

◈ Reward
Skill Points 2


◈ Format
One-time quest

◈ NPC
Outpost Commander Albert / Sunset Witch

◈ Monster
None

◈ Scenario
The orders we have collected from the Logos Baroi are written in strange scripts, but the Sunset Witch may be able to decipher them. Will you deliver this order to the Sunset Witch at the Witch's Lighthouse?

◈ Task
Deliver Mole's Red Fur

◈ Reward
EXP 3,051,292 /
General's Tokens 5

◈ Format
One-time quest

◈ NPC
Outpost Guard Ru Li Mao / Grocery Trader Yeosun

◈ Monster
None

◈ Scenario
The red fur we retrieved from Moles are stiff and useless. And yet, Grocery Trader Yeosun in Donwhang is showing interest in the goods. If you don't mind, would you deliver her these Mole's Red Fur?

◈ Mission
Collect 10 Pharaoh's Treasures.

◈ Reward
EXP 12550119 / Skill Points 2100 / Gold 5118

◈ Type
1 Time Only

◈ NPC
Specialty Trader Hujaan / Specialty Trader Hujaan

◈ Monster
Devil Worm

◈ Scenario
Damn it! How can this be happening? Listen, I went through a lot of trouble to dig up… Um, no, to obtain Pharaoh's Treasures. Then a bunch of monsters robbed me before I even had a chance to sell them! Rot in hell, you monsters! ...Huh? You still here? You're supposed to go and retrieve my treasures. Get the Devil Worms that robbed me here in the Storm and Cloud Desert. Oh, and make sure to bring back all 10 of my treasures, got that?

◈ Mission
Collect Calabash Bottle with Blood

◈ Reward
Experience 6000100 / Skill Exp 50000 / 3 Greater Resurrection Scroll

◈ Form
Available Once

◈ NPC
JinJin the General Store Employee of Jangan

◈ Monster
Snake General Ki, Snake General Jung, Snake General Yul, and Snake General Hew

◈ Scenario
I was hoping you'd drop by.
The accessories business is going well since we acquired the Tomb Snake food, Bi Young. But I've been having nightmares since then where Tomb Snakes would show up in my dreams. To stop these nightmares, I asked many people for their advice and went to see Miaoryeong the Witch Dancer to resolve this situation. She says this is all because of the bitter sentiment of the Tomb Snakes.
We used Tomb Snake's venom to mine Bi Young and it seems that the bitter sentiment of the Tomb Snakes spread into the stones along with their venom. She says that I am having nightmares because I couldn't overcome the vengeful sentiment of the Tomb Snakes within so many Bi Young stones. In order to stop the nightmares, I need to hunt down Snake General ki, Snake General Jung, Snake General Yul, and Snake General Hew, and drink their blood. Could you possibly help me get their blood?
Snake General Ki, Jung, Yul, and Hew are known to be attracted to entities with power greater than their own. So I received from Miaoryeong what's called the explosive stone which should be able to summon Snake General Ki. Using this stone will greatly increases the intensity of the energy of the user and emanates it. I'm told that Snake General Ki would sense the Chi and show up. If you defeat Snake General Ki, Snake General Jung will show up sensing the powerful Chi emanated at the time of Qi's death. Defeating Jung summons Yul, and defeating Yul summons Hew. So you should be able to collect all the blood if you defeat them one by one. Snake General Ki is often sighted in the central cavern of the 3rd floor of the Qin-Shi Tomb. Use the explosive stone there and collect the blood for me.

1) Can only be performed in a party with Exp. Auto Share/Item Auto Share
2) Teleport available to players who are currently playing the Vengeful Heart of the Tomb Snakes quest and those who have completed it.
3) Only the party leader may use the explosive stone
4) Even after the player’s death, defeating Snake General Ki, Jung, Yul, and Hew completes quest objectives
5) Cannot teleport Once trade transportation has been summoned.
Collect 1 Dirty Lamp (%d)

◈ Mission
Collect 50 Tomb Archer's Bow

◈ Reward
Experience 7932400

◈ Form
Available Once

◈ NPC
Jangan Adventurer Flora

◈ Monster
Tomb Archer's

◈ Scenario
Since I opened the adventurers guild in Jangan, I took in many adventurers. Among them are those who recently returned from the Qin-Shi Tomb. All of them returned safely. Perhaps you should go talk to them about Juyeong's friend.
But they are on the road again on a different business? It will be a while before they come back. If you are not particularly busy while you wait for their return, would you do me a favor?
My favor is nothing too difficult. We have an adventurer among us who researches ancient weaponry. He's in need of Tomb Archer's Bows. I told them that I would go collect them myself, but I have a sudden rush of new adventurers that I have to deal with and can’t leave at the moment.
Would you go and collect 50 Tomb Archer's Bows for me?

◈ Task
Defeat Baal

◈ Reward
EXP 1,197,791,957 / Skill Points 7,321 /
Gold 459,500

◈ Format
One-time quest

◈ NPC
Baal Worshipper Cieta

◈ Monsters
Baal

◈ Scenario
You are a resourceful one to have made it here. Over that way, you will see Baal assimilated to Babilion. I have faith in you to slay him. Please destroy Baal before he becomes even more powerful.

◈ Task
Obtain 20 Togui Skin

◈ Rewards
EXP 273,000 / Skill EXP 6,000

◈ Format
Repeatable quest (Restricted to once per day)

◈ NPC
Protector Trader Gonishya

◈ Monsters
Togui (The Phantom of the Crimson Blood level 51~60)

◈ How to Teleport
You can teleport to the Forgotten World by using a Dimension Hole.
You can obtain Dimension Holes from the monster that appears from the Dimension Pillars.

◈ Scenario
I'm in trouble - the orders are backed up so much! I'm desperately short on leather. It's almost as if leather has gone extinct. I'm almost willing to use Togui Skin.

◈ Task
Deliver Maeutu Crab meat

◈ Reward
Experience 61557546 / Skill Exp 2157 /
GOLD 49600

◈ Form
Available Once

◈ NPC
Royal Investigator Mahlipatun / Secret Agent Pulassun

◈ Monster
None

◈ Scenario
Please give the crabmeat you have brought to Pulassun. He is a great cook, even though he might not look like one. If you bring him the meat, he will create a delicious meal. I am already salivating from the thought. Slurp...

◈ Task
Speak with Outpost Commander Hao Hung

◈ Reward
Skill Points 49


◈ Format
One-time quest

◈ NPC
Outpost Commander Mu Ri Lun / Outpost Commander Hao Hung

◈ Monster
None

◈ Scenario
The energy you are exuding... This is no ordinary person's energy. You must go out into the bigger world and do greater things. My gut tells me that you will be accomplishing things much more important than slaying monsters here. Go beyond Tarim and head to the Oasis Kingdom. Speak with Hao Hung of Hotan Outpost 1 and he will tell you what you need to do.

desc1.notice: Speak with Outpost Commander Hao Hung

QNO_N_KT_021.quest_name: Looking for a kingdom of oasis

desc.notice:
◈ Mission
Eliminate 80 Dark Scouts.

◈ Reward
EXP 9907180 / Skill Points 1300 / Gold 3815

◈ Type
1 Time Only

◈ NPC
Librarian Ahha / Librarian Ahha

◈ Monster
Dark Scout

◈ Scenario
I'm sorry for causing Ms. Khamererne trouble, but I had a good reason: I lost my ledger while running from an army of Dark Scouts that invaded our city a while ago. Those damned monsters! I really want to pay them back for what they've done. Hmm, you seem like a fairly strong warrior. How'd you like to help me get rid of 80 Dark Scouts?

◈ Task
Deliver Demon Horse Manes

◈ Reward
EXP 14,781 /
Soldier's Tokens 4

◈ Format
One-time quest

◈ NPC
Outpost Guard Shao Mu Dai / Stable-Keeper Makgo

◈ Monster
None

◈ Scenario
It looks like Stable Keeper Makgo in Donwhang is interested in the Demon Horse Manes. It is useless to us - they only take up space in our storage room. It will be good to give them to someone who needs them. If you have a business that takes you to Donwhang, would you deliver them for us?

◈ Task
Obtain 2 Honghaea's Hearts

◈ Rewards
EXP 327,300 / Skill EXP 40,000 / Select 1 9th grade Seal of Star weapon

◈ Format
One-time quest

◈ NPC
Hunter Associate Ahmok

◈ Monsters
Honghaea (The Burning Abyss level 71~80)

◈ How to Teleport
You can teleport to the Forgotten World by using a Dimension Hole.
You can obtain Dimension Holes from the monster that appears from the Dimension Pillars.

◈ Scenario
According to Mamoje's report, Red Jewels are devices to control the dragons called Flame Salamanders. It says that Honghaea of the Flame Mountain is planning to attack Hotan with these Salamanders. Hmm… This is grave news. If we don't stop Honghaea soon, the entire Hotan Kingdom will be set ablaze. To prevent it, we have no other choice but to fell Honghaea himself! Will you help us once again?

◈ Task
Deliver Water Ghost Claws

◈ Reward
EXP 588 /
Monk's Tokens 4

◈ Format
One-time quest

◈ NPC
Outpost Guard Iz / Herbalist Yangyun

◈ Monster
None

◈ Scenario
Herbalist Yangyun in Jangan has asked me if I could share some of the Water Ghost Claws you retrieved before. What could he possibly want to use these disgusting claws for? I will give you these Water Ghost Claws. If you ever go to Jangan, would you deliver them to Herbalist Yangyun for me? You can keep the payment for the claws.

◈ Task
Obtain 60 Mask Fragments

◈ Rewards
EXP 27,600 / Skill EXP 30,000

◈ Format
One-time quest

◈ NPC
Merchant Associate Asaman

◈ Monsters
Togui (The Phantom of the Crimson Blood level 35~50)

◈ How to Teleport
You can teleport to the Forgotten World by using a Dimension Hole.
You can obtain Dimension Holes from the monster that appears from the Dimension Pillars.

◈ Scenario
There's no doubt about it. This is a part of the masks worn by the Toguis. If it seems doubtful, try hunting some Toguis in the Forgotten World. Nine times out of ten, they will drop a fragment similar to this, I'll bet. Find as many fragments as will convince you.

◈ Mission
Deliver the Lithography piece to Haraho

◈ Reward
Experience 2883000

◈ Form
Available Once

◈ NPC
Jangan Hunter Associate Gwakwi
/Donwhang Hunter Associate Haraho

◈ Monster
None

◈ Scenario
With the brisk activities of hunters, we have found a Lithography piece from the belongings of a thief that the Hunter Associate caught.
There were writings on it that were hard to read. Upon closer examination, I found out that it was a phrase of a certain martial move. I had some martial training myself, but what is written on the piece seems to transcend what I know.
I would like to ask a close friend whom I trained with in Bicheonmun for a translation. Please deliver this Lithography piece to my close friend, Haraho of the Hunter Associate in Donwhang.

desc1.notice: Deliver the Stone Tablet Fragment to Haraho

desc.notice:
◈ Mission
Collect 250 Marks of the Warrior (Hunter).

◈ Reward
EXP 5412921 / Skill Points 800 / Gold 14700 / AP 300

◈ Type
Repeatable

◈ NPC
Job Union Representative Mansuana / Job Union Representative Mansuana

◈ Monster
All Monsters in the Shrine

◈ Scenario
I'll award Region Points to the first union that brings me 300 Marks of the Warrior before the others. Enjoy the hunt!

Unlimited Repeatable

Monsters Lv 1-9

◈ Scenario
You need to work ceaselessly to increase your Job level. If you are ready, bring me 20 units of Ginseng. You should be able to find Ginseng as you hunt monsters at level 9 and under. If you run out of time and don't find enough Ginseng, don't worry. Even if you don't have all 20 units, I will pay you for what you have. But don't forget that you have to bring all 20 units to gain greater Job EXP.
Collect 1 Dirty Lamp (%d)

Collect 93 Closier's Axes

◈ Reward
EXP 84,375 /
Soldier's Tokens 5

◈ Format
One-time quest

◈ NPC
Outpost Guard Ramina

◈ Monster
Closier

◈ Scenario
Have you seen Closiers? They are demons summoned by the Evil Order. They sure are ugly, but what's worse is the massive axes they swing around like a toy. I can't even approach them because of fear. I could do something about those demons if only they did not have their axes. Would you help me?

◈ Task
Obtain 50 Fragments of the Vindictive Spirit of a Commander

◈ Rewards
EXP 270,700 / SP 500

◈ Format
One-time quest

◈ NPC
Doctor Renenutet

◈ Monsters
Ghost Commander (The Sea of Resentment level 101~110)

◈ How to Teleport
You can teleport to the Forgotten World by using a Dimension Hole.

◈ Scenario
This is the last part of the investigation. The last item we need is the Fragments of the Vindictive Spirit of a Commander.

desc1.notice: Collect 50 Fragments of the Vindictive Spirit of a Commander (%d)

QNO_FW_RS1_005.quest_name: Collecting Fragments of the Vindictive Spirit (3)

desc.notice:
◈ Task
Eliminate 20 Ghost Wrecks

◈ Rewards
EXP 515,000 / Skill EXP 1,000

◈ Format
Repeatable quest (Restricted to once per day)

◈ NPC
Hunter Associate Ahmok

◈ Monsters
Ghost Wreck (The Green Abyss level 91~100)

◈ How to Teleport
You can teleport to the Forgotten World by using a Dimension Hole.
You can obtain Dimension Holes from the monster that appears from the Dimension Pillars.

◈ Scenario
At the Shipwreck in the Forgotten World, there seem to be mutant evil spirits born as multiple evil spirits "clumped" together. The military considers them significant threats. We have a request at the Hunter Union to investigate the military strength of the evil spirits... Would you be interested?

◈ Task
Deliver Evergrass of Qarum Batun

◈ Reward
EXP 113834369 / Skill Points 3113 /
GOLD 48500

◈ Format
One-time quest

◈ NPC
Secret Agent Sirun / Potion Trader Abubark

◈ Monster
None

◈ Scenario
Now that we have collected Evergrasses of Qarum Batun, we should bring them to Baghdad. However, I can't leave this place because of my mission. I'm sorry, but, would you deliver these Evergrasses to Baghdad on my behalf?

◈ Task
Defeat Jupiter

◈ Reward
EXP 1,197,791,957 / Skill Points 7,321 /
Gold 448,500

◈ Format
One-time quest

◈ NPC
Lost Soldier Geese

◈ Monsters
Jupiter

◈ Scenario
Some is awaking and manipulating the statues at the Temple of Jupiter. Destroy Jupiter so he can rest in peace. Once you defeat him, come and report to me.

◈ Task
Eliminate 30 Togui Warriors

◈ Rewards
EXP 68,300 / Skill EXP 1,500

◈ Format
Repeatable quest (Restricted to once per day)

◈ NPC
Soldier Baoman

◈ Monsters
Togui Warrior (The Phantom of the Crimson Blood level 51~60)

◈ How to Teleport
You can teleport to the Forgotten World by using a Dimension Hole.
You can obtain Dimension Holes from the monster that appears from the Dimension Pillars.

◈ Scenario
When the door to the Forgotten World was opened and monsters came pouring out, my friends and I had a battle against Togui Warriors. We suffered serious defeat and had to run to survive. We were able to shake off their pursuit barely when the reinforcement forces arrived just in time. But I still feel the humiliation and the anger from that incident. I want to somehow seize the opportunity to get my revenge and vindicate myself, but I am a castle guard and can't just abandon my post. Won't you destroy Togui Warriors on my behalf?

◈ Task
Defeat 500 Wild Temple Lions

◈ Reward
EXP 238,205,337 / Skill Points 7,321 /
Gold 441,000

◈ Format
One-time quest

◈ NPC
Lost Investigator Avrill

◈ Monsters
Wild Temple Lion

◈ Scenario
Thanks to your effort in dispatching the Temple Baby Lions and Temple Lions before, we were able to conduct our investigation in greater safety. But, since their death, the surviving lions turned ferocious and are threatening us more. Please eliminate them.

◈ Task
Deliver Devil Mask's Essence

◈ Reward
EXP 1,235,898 /
General's Tokens 5

◈ Format
One-time quest

◈ NPC
Outpost Guard Ru Li Mao / Herbalist Bori

◈ Monster
None

◈ Scenario
The Devil Mask's Essence we acquired by slaying Devil Mask Nachals are tainted with such potent, wicked energy that they were good for nothing. We were worried about how we were going to dispose of them, but, then, Herbalist Bori of Donwhang placed an order for them. I'm a little concerned, but perhaps he has figured out a way to put them to use somehow. Would you be willing to deliver them for us?

◈ Task
Defeat 61 Bandit bowmen and 68 Bandits

◈ Reward
EXP 37,705 / Skill Points 49


◈ Format
One-time quest

◈ NPC
Outpost Commander Tan Wei

◈ Monster
Bandit bowman, Bandit

◈ Scenario
According to the report from Outpost 2, Bandits are using strange talismans to turn trees into monsters. Wreaking havoc upon this beautiful nature is an unforgivable thing. We could wait for reinforcements, but why put off the inevitable? What do you think?

◈ Mission
Eliminate 100 Sopdus and 100 Blood Khepri s.

◈ Reward
EXP 3247753 / Skill Points 750 / Gold 9800 / AP 200

◈ Type
Repeatable

◈ NPC
Job Union Representative Mansuana / Job Union Representative Mansuana

◈ Monster
Sopdu / Blood Khepri

◈ Scenario
I'll help any union to consolidate their dominance of the Shrine, but only if they complete my mission: eliminate 100 Sopdus and 100 Blood Khepris.

Collect 500 units of Wooden Dolls

11,040 Job EXP / item (10% bonus when quota filled) -50% in Safe Mode

Unlimited Repeatable

Monsters Lv 100-109

You need to work ceaselessly to increase your Job level. If you are ready, bring me 500 units of Wooden Dolls. You should be able to find Wooden Dolls as you hunt monsters at level 100-109. If you run out of time and don't find enough Wooden Dolls, don't worry. Even if you don't have all 500 units, I will pay you for what you have. But don't forget that you have to bring all 500 units to gain greater Job EXP.

Collect 50 Camel Skins.

◈ Reward
EXP 10204396 / Skill Points 1400 / Gold 4812

1 Time Only

◈ NPC
Grocery Trader Kapra / Grocery Trader Kapra

Camel Spider

◈ Scenario
I have so many deliveries to make, but I'm running out of boxes. Could you help me to gather some box materials? It won't be difficult; just bring me 50 Camel Skins from Camel Spiders in the Valley of the Kings. Won't you please help me out here?

◈ Objective
Deliver Smuggled Goods Level 70

◈ Reward
18,351,800 Job EXP (-50% in Safe Mode)

◈ Format
One-time Quest

◈ NPC
Smuggler Isutade / Smuggler Raul

◈ Monster
None

◈ Scenario
We have an order for smuggled goods to be delivered. You need to deliver Smuggled goods to Smuggler Raul in Constantinople. Smuggled goods delivery assignments are worth more Job EXP than trade goods collection assignments. It would do you well to undertake some of these.

Deliver Wadi Uneg's Essence

◈ Reward
EXP 52597595 / Skill Points 1123 /
GOLD 47400

◈ Format
One-time quest

◈ NPC
Expeditionary Force Soldier Muhibun / Spice Trader Malak

◈ Monster
None

◈ Scenario
Wadi Uneg's Essence can be used for various purposes. You can eat it as it is, use it as a potion ingredient, or even use it for spice. Now, Spice Trader Malak would like us to deliver Wadi Uneg's Essence. If you happen to be on your way to Baghdad, would you deliver Wadi Uneg's Essence to Malak along the way?

◈ Mission
Speak to Potion Trader Thiara.

◈ Reward
EXP 5742568 / Skill Points 1300 / Gold 2493

◈ Type
1 Time Only

◈ NPC
Weapon Trader Hemaka / Potion Trader Thiara

◈ Monster
N/A

◈ Scenario
She may be my daughter, but I can't let her steal things from her clients. I don't want to do this, but she needs to be taught a lesson. I'm going to collect signatures from her victims and bring her to court. Please get Potion Trader Thiara's signature for me.

◈ Task
Speak with Outpost Commander Ethan

◈ Reward
Skill Points 49


◈ Format
One-time quest

◈ NPC
Outpost Commander Gavin / Outpost Commander Ethan

◈ Monster
None

◈ Scenario
Although violent Huns settled down , the important problem was not solved. Who gave the power to the savage tribe to control monsters? In this point, we can only think that Hun is nothing but a puppet. We might find a hint in Hotan over the east. Why don't you go there?

◈ Objective
Deliver Smuggled Goods Level 105

◈ Reward
491,113,500 Job EXP (-50% in Safe Mode)

◈ Format
One-time Quest

◈ NPC
Smuggler Isutade / Smuggler Chungho

None

◈ Scenario
We have an order for smuggled goods to be delivered. You need to deliver Smuggled goods to Smuggler Chungho in Donwhang. Smuggled goods delivery assignments are worth more Job EXP than trade goods collection assignments. It would do you well to undertake some of these.

◈ Mission
Collect 100 Ghost's Eyes

◈ Reward
Experience 15475300 / Skill Exp 90000

◈ Form
Available Once

◈ NPC
Soboi the blacksmith of Hotan

◈ Monster
Demon Eye/ Devil Eye

◈ Scenario
A few days ago I made bet against a friend but I lost to him.
I was angry with myself because I had lost to him so I made another bet.
I heard from an adventurer that hunting big eyed monsters found Taklamakan sometimes earns you their eyes. I think I can win the bet if I can use the monster's eyes to make something.
How about getting me 100 eyes of the monsters?

◈ Task
Collect 40 Stolen Deeds

◈ Reward
EXP 82912465 / Skill Points 1611 /
GOLD 185848

◈ Format
2

◈ NPC
Farmer Wife Hadijya

◈ Monster
Crazy Marauders

◈ Scenario
A while ago, Crazy Marauders attacked the farm. They began plundering whatever they could find. They even stole some important documents for this farm. If we don't have the deeds, we may lose the farm. Please, help me.

◈ Task
Collect 70 Wolan's Essence

◈ Reward
EXP 33123483 / Skill Points 872 /
GOLD 3395

◈ Format
Repeatable (unlimited)

◈ NPC
Village Old Man Kerim

◈ Monster
Wolan

◈ Scenario
In return for showing you the future of Baghdad, there is something I would like you to do for me. It is nothing difficult. Just collect the things I need for me.

◈ Task
Eliminate 30 Flame Ghosts

◈ Rewards
EXP 575,000 / Skill EXP 1,500

◈ Format
Repeatable quest (Restricted to once per day)

◈ NPC
Soldier Wulan

◈ Monsters
Flame Ghost (The Burning Abyss level 71~80)

◈ How to Teleport
You can teleport to the Forgotten World by using a Dimension Hole.
You can obtain Dimension Holes from the monster that appears from the Dimension Pillars.

◈ Scenario
Flame Ghosts. Evolved form of Flame Evils. I want to defeat them. But must protect Kingdom. You slay Flame Ghosts for me.

◈ Task
Collect 64 Maddening Reagents

◈ Reward
EXP 37,705 / Skill Points 50


◈ Format
One-time quest

◈ NPC
Outpost Commander Dick

◈ Monster
Aduna Ladon, Simos Ladon

◈ Scenario
I don't know how much you know about this place, but let me tell you one thing: this place is hell. It's a place where monsters rain down from the sky. There must be a cause behind these crazy phenomena. Investigate this cause for us.

◈ Task
Defeat 30 Immortal Protection, 40 Immortal Guards, and 40 Immortal Surveillants

◈ Reward
EXP 170,695,535 / Skill Points 5,226 /
Gold 376,740

◈ Format
One-time quest

◈ NPC
Lost Investigator Almanu

◈ Monsters
Immortal Protection, Immortal Guard, Immortal Surveillant

◈ Scenario
There is no end to them. Just how many statues are in there? Would you help me and destroy these statues? Destroy Immortal Protection, Immortal Guards, and Immortal Surveillants.

◈ Task
Deliver Weasel Blood

◈ Reward
EXP 193 /
Monk's Tokens 4

◈ Format
One-time quest

◈ NPC
Outpost Guard Iz / Blacksmith Chulsan

◈ Monster
None

◈ Scenario
There is something that needs to be delivered to Blacksmith Chulsan in Jangan. I hear it's Weasel Blood. Wei Yen says it's very precious so great care must be taken. I don't understand what makes it so precious. I must guard this outpost. If you happen to be on your way to Jangan, would you deliver this to Chulsan? He said that he would pay for the trouble, but you can have it.

◈ Task
Defeat 200 Baal's Followers and 200 Baal's Guides

◈ Reward
EXP 1,842,400 / Skill Points 578 /
Gold 31,885

◈ Format
Unlimited Repeats

◈ NPC
Lost Soldier Fernando

◈ Monsters
Baal's Follower, Baal's Guide

◈ Scenario
There are still many who haven't come to their senses. They are still muttering random things or suddenly attack. Would you help me bring the Baal's Followers and the Baal's Guides to their senses again?

◈ Mission
Collect the Token of Demon Shaitan

◈ Reward
Experience 2573000

◈ Form
Available Once

◈ NPC
Slave Shifle

◈ Monster
Demon Shaitan

◈ Scenario
Are you sure you want to meet Demon Shaitan?
You have to have a lot of Rainbow Plants on you to meet him.
He is now loyal to Roc so he may attack you. You better not let your guard down. Be prepared.
If you are ready to face Demon Shaitan, speak with me again and tell me you want to meet with him.
And, if you get to meet him, you will need to show proof to Isan, so make sure you get a token from Demon Shaitan.
1) Must be in a party with Exp. Auto Share / Item Auto Share enabled
2) Teleport allowed with players who are performing, or have completed, the Rahid 6 quest
3) Mobile conversation with Slave Shifle enabled for party leader only
4) Even if you are dead, quest goal can be achieved when Demon Shaitan is defeated
5) Teleport unavailable if transport methods are summoned

◈ Task
Collect 100 Temple Guard Gauntlets

◈ Reward
EXP 158,885,480 / Skill Points 5,226 /
Gold 352,800

◈ Format
One-time quest

◈ NPC
Lost Soldier Brandon

◈ Monsters
Temple Guard

◈ Scenario
Now, gauntlets should complete the picture. The gauntlets worn by Temple Guards are said to be able to block any weapon. Bring me some of those gauntlets from Temple Guards.
Collect 30 Crude Essence of Life (%d)

◈ Task
Collect 100 Serpent Fluid

◈ Reward
EXP 431,359,607 / Skill Points 7,321 /
Gold 459,500

◈ Format
One-time quest

◈ NPC
Lost Investigator Avrill

◈ Monsters
Hell Serpent

◈ Scenario
We didn't have sufficient Serpent Fluid when you retrieved it last time, and it's delaying our work. Would you obtain the Serpent Fluid once again from the Hell Serpents in the Forest of Sorrow?

◈ Mission
Eliminate 10 Nephthyses in the High Pharaoh's Tomb.

◈ Reward
EXP 3765035 / Skill Points 1250 / Gold 15356

◈ Type
Repeatable

◈ NPC
Egyptian Soldier Turian / Egyptian Soldier Turian

◈ Monster
Nephthys (Tomb High)

◈ Scenario
Alright, let's start the Deity training. Now it's time for you to hunt 10 Nephthyses in the High Pharaoh's Tomb.

◈ Mission
Collect Piece of Spirit

◈ Reward
None

◈ Form
Available once

◈ NPC
Sunset Witch

◈ Monster
Lost Spirit

◈ Scenario
Now we have all the ingredients gathered, we are ready to smmon a soul.
Do you want to summon one?
To obtain fragments from the summoned soul, you have to be in the Berserk mode.
When the powers of the souls collide, you can damage the soul and get the fragment at that time.
Do not forget this.
Take this Orb of Spirit because it will help you see the spirit.
Collect 25 Crude Essence of Strength (%d)

◈ Task
Speak with the Goods Supplier in Europe, Samarkand, or Hotan.

◈ Reward
3rd Grade Seal Weapon (Select One)


◈ Format
One-time quest

◈ NPC
Goods Supplier in Europe, Samarkand, or Hotan

◈ Scenario
Congratulations! You have reached level 16!
You must be getting used to slaying monsters. I have prepared gifts for you to be able to slay monsters with greater ease.
Please come see me in town.

◈ Task
Hunt 300 Luhoons of Fire, 300 Devils of Fire

◈ Reward
Experience 184806947 / Skill Exp 6998 /
GOLD 300000

◈ Form
Available 5 times

◈ NPC
Secret Agent Dilun

◈ Monster
Luhoon of Fire, Devil of Fire

◈ Scenario
That large tree of fire was not that huge in the past. When a strange force started going through the Devil's Garden, the tree started getting bigger. Also, with the fire force, the fire spirits started gathering. The fire spirits are the cause of the desertification of the Arabia Coast. Please defeat them.

◈ Task
Eliminate 30 Togui Soldiers

◈ Rewards
EXP 25,000 / Skill EXP 1,500

◈ Format
Repeatable quest (Restricted to once per day)

◈ NPC
Specialty Trader Sanmok

◈ Monsters
Togui Soldier (The Phantom of the Crimson Blood level 61~70)

◈ How to Teleport
You can teleport to the Forgotten World by using a Dimension Hole.
You can obtain Dimension Holes from the monster that appears from the Dimension Pillars.

◈ Scenario
Since the door to the Forgotten World opened, Toguis are wreaking havoc everywhere and I can't do trading with peace of mind. With the rumors of an invasion by a large Togui Soldier army, no one can go around to sell goods with peace of mind, whether the rumors are true or not. So, I ask of you - will you lend me a hand?

◈ Task
Collect 68 Evil Order's Arrows

◈ Reward
EXP 52,184 /
Soldier's Tokens 5

◈ Format
One-time quest

◈ NPC
Outpost Guard Juana

◈ Monster
Evil Order Archer

◈ Scenario
Evil Order Archers may be savages, but their bowmanship is excellent. I myself have feared for my life on multiple occasions because of the arrows they fired. If we let them go on with their rampage, many people will be hurt. Will you help eliminate Evil Order Archers?

◈ Task
Attempt to add a friend

◈ Reward
10 Monk's tokens

◈ Format
One-time quest

◈ NPC
Potion Merchants from each town

◈ Scenario
Congratulations on reaching level 10.
Be informed about adding friends, complete the task and be rewarded.
Add friends to manage your in-game friends with convenience and ease.
You can view your friends' on/offline status or send them a whisper.
Add a friend yourself and visit Potion Merchants from each town.
To add a friend, open the Community window by pressing 'U' and select the 'Friends' tab.
Then, press the 'Add Friends' button to the right and enter the character name of your friend in the appropriate field.

◈ Task
Speak with Lost Investigator Kristen

◈ Reward
EXP 2,734,354 / Skill Points 5,488 /
Gold 100,000

◈ Format
One-time quest

◈ NPC
Lost Investigator Elda / Lost Investigator Kristen

◈ Monsters
None

◈ Scenario
Ahhh! Oh… You're not a monster. Did you say Natal sent you? I'm glad to hear that Natal is safe. Umm… Could you do ME a favor, too? Please find Kristen, my colleague and friend. She must be in this Temple somewhere. I have no doubt that she is safe, waiting for rescue somewhere in the Temple. Please, do this for me.

◈ Task
Collect 50 Ordinary Essence of Strength

◈ Reward
Skill Points 608 (Reward grows as your level increases)


◈ Format
Unlimited repeats

◈ NPC
All Daily Quest Managers

◈ Monster
Monster level 71~80

◈ Scenario
They say research on monsters being conducted on all continents has started to show results. Now, they began working on stronger monsters. This is making us much busier. Our superiors are asking for so many things. Recently, they urgently asked us to get them Ordinary Essence of Strength. It is not easy to find. Can you get us 50 Ordinary Essence of Strength? I know it will be difficult, but I will give you an appropriate reward in return.

◈ Mission
Collect 3 Essence of Sylph

◈ Reward
1 Alchemy Stone of Abstraction (10th grade)

◈ Form
Unlimited attempts

◈ NPC
Hotan Nephrite Refinery Chief Pajab

◈ Monster
Sylph

◈ Scenario
Hey, isn't it the Essence of Sylph?
Haha.. I was right!
Do you want to give me the Essence of Sylph? Oh, You don't need to look like you are so surprised. kk..
The various energies within the nephrite cause so many problems when you are refining them.
The essence from Sylph which contains the power of wind can remove the impure energies surrounding the nephrite. If you give me the Essence of Sylph, I will pay you. kkk
A single Essence of Sylph will not be enough to remove the impuruties properly, so you will have to bring me 3 of them. kk

◈ Mission
Collect 50 Hyena Fangs.

Today's Baghdad? This place is really peaceful. The king has fully recovered and the wailing that once covered the kingdom has ceased. However, that does not settle everything. The fact of the matter is, people died and somebody will have to take the blame for their death. Some claim that such an attitude is a rebellious one, but I say such a claim is rather far-fetched. On the contrary, if there is anyone who is rebellious and disloyal, it is the one who puts his daughter on the throne of the queen to wrap the king around his finger.
If you have the time, why don't you meet with Minister Mahmud? He sure is having a fantastic time thanks to his daughter.

But don't forget that you have to bring all 100 units to gain greater Job EXP.

The Crown of the Sun not only works as a medium that teleports one to another dimension which stores the powers of Baal, but it can also distort light to create multiple dimensions in one space. If Babilion is seeking to gain Baal's powers, we must hurry. I doubt we will have sufficient time to investigate the rest of the dimensions. Please, take this to the Lost Investigator, Avrill.

◈ Mission
Deliver Miaoryeong's charm to Gwakwi.

◈ Reward
None

◈ Form
Available once

◈ NPC
Exorcist Miaoryeong / Hunter Associate Gwakwi

◈ Monster
None

◈ Scenario
There is a place called the Niya Remains where the blazing sun scorches everything.
The souls of soldiers who died there have turned into monsters and wander the place. The most powerful of these are the Niya General. You can get the spirit from him. To get the spirit, you will need a Trap to wrap the Spirit. Bring my charm to Gwakwi of the Hunters Guild and ask him for the trap. He once asked me for the trap to eliminate a monster with a very nasty evil energy. I taught him how to make a trap then, so he should be able to make you one if you just deliver this charm.
Once you have the trap, bring it to the Niya Remains, place it on the ground, and lure the soldiers in. Their souls will be caught in the trap and you should be able to get their spirit.
One thing, though, is that the harbors might have eaten away the spirits so you might end up with Flutter Spirits.
But it has to be an Normal Spirit. I will use Flutter Spirits to make charms, so I will pay you a fair price if you bring them to me.
Now you got the charms, go give it to Hunter Associate Gwakwi and recieve the Trap for Spirit.

Deep in the cemetery located to the southeast of Jangan, there is a fork in the path where it splits into three. There is an old tombstone that fell over under the tree towards the west. Some says that they saw the Old Tombstone Ghost there. Use your bell there.
Please, always be careful not to be tainted by demonic energy.

◈ Reward

◈ Form
Available Once

◈ NPC

◈ Monster
Tomb Snake Master

◈ Scenario
I have examined the blood WalYoung gave. it was the blood of a thousand-year-old white viper.
In the decades of my career as a herbalist, I never even dreamed of actually beholding the blood of a thousand-year-old white viper.
If what WalYoung said is true, the blood will cure the child.
I hear vipers appear in the Qin-Shi Tomb. They say the Tomb Snake Master is the most powerful of them all. I think it might be a thousand-year-old viper.
If we can examine the blood of the Tomb Snake Master, we might be able to save the child…
Here, take this Powder of Dreams and Visions. Sometimes I need to get medicinal ingredients from fierce monsters. In times like these, I use this powder to subdue the monster temporarily and get the ingredient. You should be able to capture Tomb Snake Master with this powder.
The effect of the Powder of Dreams and Visions lasts 60 minutes, so bring Tomb Snake Master to me as soon as you capture him.
If you end up spending all of the powder so you cannot capture the monster anymore, come to me and I will give you some more.

◈ Mission
Collect Relic of Sun God

◈ Reward
None

◈ Form
Available once.

◈ NPC
Sunset Witch

◈ Monster
Ishade / Hashade

◈ Scenario
Now that you have the Branch of Life, we need the Relic of Sun God which will help us to build the fire as it collects the heat of the sun.
This was used in the ritual to appease the Sun God but, as people began to forsake the god, it disappeared as well.
There is a place where the worshippers of the Sun God had their last ceremony. It's far away from here in the land of Minor Asia, near the Gate of Cleopatra.
You should be able to find the Relic of Sun God there.
If you are willing to do this, I will tell you how to find it.
The Relic of Sun God has the kind of power that attracts light. So if you give you out the light, you sould be able to find it.
Therefore, you need the tool that gives out the light, why don't you use the Resplendent Crystal? You should be able to find them from monsters called Ishade and Hashade that live on icy roads.
You can only use Resplendent Crystals once, so get about 20 of them before you go to find the Relic of Sun God.
May the blessings of the Light be with you…

Please tell Officer Maneto that I'll visit him soon to talk about this!

◈ Reward

/10 Spirit Fragments [Berserker gage 100%]

◈ Monster

◈ Scenario
Well done collecting the Guardian Crystals.
Now, just one more set of items and I should be able to craft the item that will save lives.
It is said that Wing Tribe Guardian Champions carry a special spirit inside of them.
Normally, the spirit dissipates upon their death. But I've heard that, if someone who carries the Guardian Crystals kills the Champions, their spirit is divided into many parts to be absorbed into the crystals.
The crystals that carry those spirits are said to carry mysterious powers. We should be able to defeat the Roc clan easily with such powers.
So I ask another favor of you.
I'll give you 100 of the Guardian Crystals that you collected. Please bring them back to me once you have turned them into Spirit Crystals.
Oh! Hunting Wing Tribe Guardian Champions won't transform the crystals if your inventory is full. Always make sure you have enough free space! Good luck.
[Spirit Crystals can only be retrieved in a party with Exp. Auto Share / Item Auto Share enabled]

I want to go outside. I want to breathe in the clean air. But look at that giant tail! If I come too close, I will be crushed and suffocated by that tail. Please destroy those scary serpents so I can get out. You will help me, won't you?

◈ Task
Defeat 580 Elite Thief Archers and 580 Elite Thief Warriors

◈ Reward
EXP 468347116 / Skill Points 12807 /
GOLD 562600

◈ Format
1

◈ NPC
Secret Agent Ayareotun

◈ Monster
Elite Thief Archer, Elite Thief Warrior

◈ Scenario
My comrade Sirun is situated close to the den of thieves. I want to create a diversion while he gathers information. I think you can help me.

◈ Mission
Speak to Guild Manager Elia.

◈ Reward
EXP 5575309 / Skill Points 1200 / Gold 2471

◈ Type
1 Time Only

◈ NPC
Librarian Ahha / Guild Manager Elia

◈ Monster
N/A

◈ Scenario
This is strange… Guild Manager Elia always returns books on time. I wonder if something happened. Would you please ask Ms. Elia to return an overdue book?

◈ Mission
Collect 1 Secret Order.

◈ Reward
EXP 12184582 / Skill Points 2000 / Gold 5075

◈ Type
1 Time Only

◈ NPC
Thief Union President Tausert / Thief Union President Tausert

◈ Monster
Akeru

◈ Scenario
This isn't good, not good at all! I feel ashamed to tell you this, but one of our members, a total fool, was robbed by some desert monsters and lost a written directive that was directly from the Thief Union headquarters. How can he be a thief if he doesn't know that we thieves move without drawing attention?! Listen, I've already heard of your good reputation. Sorry, but would you retrieve that directive for us? You'll find it from Akerus in the Storm and Cloud Desert.

◈ Task
Speak with Hunter Associate Ahmok

◈ Rewards
EXP 1,100 / Skill EXP 500

◈ Format
One-time quest

◈ NPC
General Sonhyeon / Hunter Associate Ahmok

◈ Monsters
None

◈ Scenario
Necromancers and the Cult have joined forces and opened the passageway to the Forgotten World. This has greatly increases the numbers of the monsters, and the situation is critical. Many strange things are happening throughout the world. It seems that the Hotan Kingdom is no exception - Ahmok has requested help from us. I, however, cannot leave my post due to the investigations of the Cult. Will you visit Ahmok instead?

◈ Task
Collect 11 Stone Ghost Fragments

◈ Reward
EXP 1,868 /
Monk's Tokens 5

◈ Format
One-time quest

◈ NPC
Outpost Guard Wei Yen

◈ Monster
Broken Stone Ghost, Stone Ghost

◈ Scenario
I hear that the guardian statues at the Tome of Emperor Qin have turned into demons, and that they are threatening people. *sigh* What irony that the great lion statues once erected to protect the Emperor's rest is now disturbing it. What a cruel world, don't you think? Anyway, the commander is breathing down on our necks to have them destroyed, but I am not sure if we are strong enough to handle those powerful monsters. Will you help us?

◈ Task
Collect 290 Sand Snake Scale

◈ Reward
EXP 234173558 / Skill Points 6404 /
GOLD 281300

◈ Format
1

◈ NPC
Secret Agent Sirun

◈ Monster
Desert Sand Snake

◈ Scenario
If you are going to go and slay Desert Sand Snakes, would you do me a favor? Because of the indiscriminate plunder, the Merchant Association has suffered great loss. I hear that Desert Sand Snake Scale in the Phantom Desert is sold at a good price. If it's okay with you, please collect the scale.

◈ Mission
1 Scout voucher / 1 Commander voucher/ Bring Slave's Lithography

◈ Reward
None

◈ Form
Unlimited attempts
(After completing Preparation of material 2, may attempt from Test of Village Chief)

◈ NPC
Village Chief Bukra / Slave Jabur

◈ Monster
Paeders scout / Black-eagle commander

◈ Scenario
We are now under the reign of Rok but can't live forever like this.
Many people who went to the top of the Rok mountain submitted to the power of Rok but our people never gave up our hope that a more powerful man will appear and defeat Rok and save us from misery. This is the only motive for us to live in this degrading land.
Could you exert your power for us and save the oppressed people?
We have prepared for this war for years and the only source we need now is a strong man to actually go and defeat Rok.
Although you may be indifferent in this war, you might still be tempted to go because there are a lot of treasures hidden on top of the Rok mountain
but if you have no power to defeat Rok, I would have to call off my request. What we need is a fighter who can kill Rok not someone who will be his dinner.
If you pass the trial which i offer you, I will consider you as a proper fighter and show you the way to Rok. It will not be a difficult challenge so do not worry.
If you defeat the guards of Rok mountain called Paeders scout and Black-eagle commender, I will consider that you will be capable of killing the Rok.
It has been said that these monsters are now near the Brain Peak so bring the Scouts voucher and the Commanders voucher. Also bring the Slave's Lithography from Slave Jabur. You can find him near the Heart Peak.

◈ Mission
Collect 20 Karra teeth within 120 minutes of starting the quest

◈ Reward
Experience 3325000 / Skill Exp 12500

◈ Form
Available 3 times
Only after completing the first quest can you begin with the next.

◈ NPC
Hotan Jewel Lapidary Mamoje

◈ Monster
Dark Karra/ Death Karra

◈ Scenario
A while ago I was drinking with my friend and it was nice at the start. but as we started to get slightly drunk, we started arguing about who is the top craftsman and the discussion heated up into a bet. We agreed that the man who can make a better tool within a month is the best craftsman.
Hmph. Funny guy. How dare he try to compare his worthless skills with mine? Anyhow, to win the bet I'm going to need some special materials..
I was referred to you by Gonisya, he says that you're outstanding. Will you use your abilities for me?
I am told that the teeth of monsters called Karra, found in Taklamakan, are good materials for making quality equipment. Can you get me those teeth? Please bring me 20 Karra teeth within 4 days.

◈ Task
Deliver Hyungno Ghost Soldier's Bones

◈ Reward
EXP 10,596 /
Soldier's Tokens 4

◈ Format
One-time quest

◈ NPC
Outpost Guard Shao Mu Dai / Buddhist Priest Hyeon

◈ Monster
None

◈ Scenario
Buddhist Priest Hyeon is asking for the Hyungno Ghost Soldier's Bones that we are storing since we defeated the Hyungno Ghost Soldiers. He says that he will purify the bones and comfort the souls of the departed, so that they will never be reborn as demons. Would you deliver the bones to him?
Collect 1 Dirty Lamp (%d)

◈ Task
Eliminate 200 monters of the Green Abyss

◈ Rewards
EXP 5,150,000 / Skill EXP 10,000

◈ Format
Repeatable quest (Restricted to once per day)

◈ NPC
Soldier Duyun

◈ Monsters
Monsters in the Green Abyss level 91~100 dungeon (Except Envy and Treasure Box)

◈ How to Teleport
You can teleport to the Forgotten World by using a Dimension Hole.
You can obtain Dimension Holes from the monster that appears from the Dimension Pillars.

◈ Scenario
This is terrible. With the door to the Forgotten World open, the evil spirits dormant within began pouring out into this world. It is the Law of Nature for the dead to return to the nether world. If we leave them, we don't know what may happen. Could you help those souls reach Nirvana?

◈ Mission
Eliminate 800 Akers.

◈ Reward
EXP 8660675 / Skill Points 850 / Gold 39200

◈ Type
Repeatable

◈ NPC
Egyptian Soldier Kamori / Egyptian Soldier Kamori

◈ Monster
Aker

◈ Scenario
Do you wish to become a Deity? I can help you with that. Please go hunt 800 Akers.

◈ Reward
EXP 8920495 / Skill Points 950 / Gold 49437

◈ Type
Repeatable

◈ NPC
Palace Guard Mushari / Palace Guard Mushari

◈ Monster
Sand Bug

◈ Scenario
Prove to me that you're capable of becoming a true Deity by hunting 1000 Sand Bugs.

◈ Task
Obtain 35 Jewels of Vindictive Spirits

◈ Rewards
EXP 901,000 / Skill EXP 1,750

◈ Format
Repeatable quest (Restricted to once per day)

◈ NPC
Jewel Lapidary Mamoje

◈ Monsters

You can teleport to the Forgotten World by using a Dimension Hole.

◈ Scenario
They say that Ghost Marauders of the Forgotten World collect the vindictive spirit from humans and turn them into jewels to carry around. According to the rumors, the jewels have such beautiful luster. As a man in the gem cutting trade, I would really like to lay my eyes on them. If this is not too shameless of me to ask, would you mind collecting those jewels for me?

◈ Task
Defeat 48 Young Tigers and 55 Tigers

◈ Reward
EXP 26,181 / Skill Points 33


◈ Format
One-time quest

◈ NPC
Outpost Commander Tsai Bao

◈ Monster
Young Tiger, Tiger

◈ Scenario
The tigers that live in this forest are very vicious. They have a habit of tearing apart whatever walks by in front of them. Traders are seeing the worst of it. If you would slay the tigers, it will help them greatly.

QNO_N_CH_023.quest_name: Tigers leave their skins when they die.

None

If you want battles that are more intense and rougher, how about going deeper into Karakoram? You will find there my comrades at Hotan Outpost 3 who fight Karakoram's demons on the frontline. Your skills are too good for a place like this. Speak with Commander Mu Qi Yong of Hotan Outpost 3. He will assign you more important tasks.

1 Time Only

◈ Monster
N/A

Oh my, I've been so busy that I completely forgot to get my stuff back from the storage. I feel bad for troubling Khamererne... Please bring this sack of gold coins to her to pay the additional storage service fee. Tell her that I'll try not to forget next time, and I don't want her to be angry with me. You know, she's quite scary when she's angry.

7th Grade Seal Shield

One-time quest

Goods Supplier in China, Donwhang, or Hotan.

One-time Quest

◈ NPC

◈ Monster
None

◈ Scenario
We have an order for specialty goods to be delivered. You need to deliver specialty goods to Trader Samanda in Samarkand. Specialty goods delivery assignments are worth more Job EXP than trade goods collection assignments. It would do you well to undertake some of these.

◈ Mission
Collect 60 Royal Soldiers Spear

◈ Reward
Experience 2726000 / GOLD 80,000

◈ Form
Available 5 times

◈ NPC
Jangan Blacksmith Chulsan

◈ Monster
Royal Soldier

◈ Scenario
I heard from Mrs Jang that a replica of the armor the golems wore in the Qin-Shi Tomb was made in great condition. This new armor shows outstanding performance and seems very much popular among customers.
Seeing such a success, I too, would like to craft a new weapon based on the golem's weapon.
I've been seeing a rise in spear sales so I would like to make more spears. This time, I want to craft a new kind of spear based on the weapon the golem uses.
I've been asking my customers who have come from the Qin-shi Tomb if they have seen Golems use spears, and they said golems called Royal Soldiers use spears. Please go and hunt Royal Soldiers and bring me 60 spears.
They say you can find Royal Soldiers on the 2nd level of the Qin-Shi Tomb.

◈ Task
Collect Gote's Pouch

◈ Reward
EXP 170,986,515 / Skill Points 5,226 /
Gold 358,800

◈ Format
One-time quest

◈ NPC
Lost Soldier Gote

◈ Monsters
Immortal Guard, Immortal Surveillant

◈ Scenario
Huh…? Where did it go? Excuse me, but have you seen a red pouch here somewhere? No? Oh, dear. Where could it be…? Hmm… I wonder… Umm… If it's not too much trouble to ask of you, would you help me find my pouch? I think I dropped it when I was being chased by an Immortal Guard or an Immortal Surveillant.

◈ Task
Defeat 30 Cursed Zealots, 30 Fury Zealots, and 30 Hound Zealots

◈ Reward
EXP 188,524,185 / Skill Points 5,226 /
Gold 415,840

◈ Format
One-time quest

◈ NPC
Baal Worshipper Million

◈ Monsters
Cursed Zealot, Fury Zealot, Hound Zealot

◈ Scenario
We have trouble afoot. The Baal Zealots here are losing their reason and becoming more and more violent. If this continues, they will eventually become unrecognizable as people. Would you go purify them before that happens?
Collect 1 Dirty Lamp (%d)

◈ Mission
Speak with WalYoung

◈ Reward
Experience 4016100

◈ Form
Available Once

◈ NPC
Yangyun the herbalist of Jangan / WalYoung

◈ Monster
None

◈ Scenario
Where on earth did Sochil got such potent poison? I thought I would never see this poison again…
I am sorry for Sochil, but unfortunately, I do not have an antidote for this poison.
I have seen someone who was poisoned with this before. Even then, I could do nothing but watch because I could not cure it. But, for some reason, she is still alive untill today.
A lady called WalYoung..
Right! You should go see her.
You might even be able to find some clues for the antidote.

◈ Task
Collect Zielkiaxe's Leash

◈ Reward
EXP 1,197,791,957 / Skill Points 7,321 /
Gold 459,500

◈ Format
One-time quest

◈ NPC
Baal Deputy Leader Diva

◈ Monsters
Zielkiaxe

◈ Scenario
You are on your way to see Babilion? I will certainly aid you in any way that I can. I have much against him. He shouted for the revival of Baal worship, deceiving his followers. He then used them for experiments. When they became useless to him, he locked them up so they couldn't escape. Those who became mutants were abandoned in the Mirror Dimension. If you wish to find out how to get to Babilion..., one of the followers in prison must know. Bring me Zielkiaxe's Leash, and I will open up the cells and speak with the followers. Will you bring me Zielkiaxe's Leash?

◈ Objective
Collect 100 units of Perma-Ice (Europe)

◈ Reward
1,200 Job EXP / item (10% bonus when quota filled) -50% in Safe Mode

◈ Format
Unlimited Repeatable

◈ NPC
Trader Samanda

◈ Monster
Monsters Lv 30-39

◈ Scenario
You need to work ceaselessly to increase your Job level. If you are ready, bring me 100 units of Perma-Ice. You should be able to find Perma-Ice as you hunt monsters at level 30-39. If you run out of time and don't find enough Perma-Ice, don't worry. Even if you don't have all 100 units, I will pay you for what you have. But don't forget that you have to bring all 100 units to gain greater Job EXP.

Speak with the Goods Supplier in China, Donwhang, or Hotan.

Goods Supplier in China, Donwhang, or Hotan.

To celebrate your arrival in the world of Silk Road, I have prepared a shield that will suit you.

EXP 4809311 / Skill Points 700 / Gold 2362

◈ Type
1 Time Only

◈ NPC
Finance Officer Maneto / GroceryTrader Melit

◈ Monster
N/A

◈ Scenario
The tax report period is over, but some people still haven't paid their taxes yet. Please deliver this Tax Due Notice to Grocery Trader Melit, and tell her to pay her taxes soon.

◈ Task

◈ Reward
6th Grade Seal Accessory Set


◈ Format
One-time quest

◈ NPC
Goods Supplier in Europe, Samarkand, or Hotan

◈ Scenario
Congratulations! Your advancement is splendid! I will have accessories ready for you that are just as splendid. Please come see me in town.

◈ Mission
Collect 1 Guild Funds Chest.

◈ Reward
EXP 12550119 / Skill Points 2100 / Gold 5118

◈ Type
1 Time Only

◈ NPC
Guild Manager Sennefer / Guild Manager Sennefer

◈ Monster
Devil Worm

◈ Scenario
We're in big trouble. Headquarters has sent a chest of guild management funds to each branch, and our deliveryman went missing on the way to Alexandria. I'm afraid he might have been abducted or killed by monsters on the way. We also won't be able to smoothly manage the guilds without those funds. I'm guessing that Devil Worms attacked our deliveryman, and then moved to the Storm and Cloud Desert. Would you retrieve our guild management funds from those monsters? I'll repay you for your help.

◈ Task
Defeat 450 Ironclaws of Protection

◈ Reward
EXP 1,662,075 / Skill Points 578 /
Gold 28,252

◈ Format
Unlimited Repeats

◈ NPC
Lost Soldier Rice

◈ Monsters
Ironclaw of Protection

◈ Scenario
I have thought this over many times. Those Ironclaws of Protection - the ones you tell me are griffins - can never be griffins theoretically. So… could you possibly slay them and verify it again?

◈ Task
Collect 21 Monster Hearts

◈ Reward
EXP 4,792 /
Monk's Tokens 5

◈ Format
One-time quest

◈ NPC
Outpost Volunteer Lily

◈ Monster
Dow Genema, Kiklopes

◈ Scenario
Dow Genemas and Kiklopeses are frightening monsters. I hear that the Barbaroi are planning on attacking this outpost with them. This is terrible news. If we don't stop them, I'm going to die even before I become a full-fledged guard. Please, help.

◈ Mission
Collect 100 Jet-Black Powder of Darkness

◈Reward
Experience 3,135,000 / GOLD 98,000

◈ Form
Available 3 times

◈ NPC
Exorcist Miaoryeong

◈ Monster
Stone Ghost

◈ Scenario
The energy of the earth is corrupt and the flow of the atmosphere is unusual. Nature's harmony is disrupted and people naturally suffer from unknown diseases.
I can't possibly handle the number of partients who would come to me for help. I would have no problem curing then if only I had the powder for spell casting.
Hey, friend. Won't you lend me a helping hand?
Get me some Jet-Black Powder of Darkness from Stone Ghosts deep down into the Qin-Shi Tomb. Get me 100 Jet-Blacek Powders of Darkness.

◈ Task
Obtain 10 Fragments of Flame Giant

◈ Rewards
EXP 540,000 / Skill EXP 1,000

◈ Format
Repeatable quest (Restricted to once per day)

◈ NPC
Protector Trader Gonishya

◈ Monsters
Flame Giant (The Burning Abyss level 71~80)

◈ How to Teleport
You can teleport to the Forgotten World by using a Dimension Hole.
You can obtain Dimension Holes from the monster that appears from the Dimension Pillars.

◈ Scenario
I hear that the Flame Giants on the Flame Mountain put out fire from their body. Normally, heat that intense would melt down the body… How could they withstand such intense heat? Could there be a secret in their body? This mystery would be solved if someone were to get me Fragments of Flame Giants...

◈ Task
Defeat 111 Dark Wolves and 123 Evil Wolves

◈ Reward
EXP 163,696 / Skill Points 265


◈ Format
One-time quest

◈ NPC
Outpost Commander Galia

◈ Monster
Dark Wolf, Evil Wolf

◈ Scenario
This area is riddled with monsters unleashed by the Evil Order. I'm talking about Dark Wolves and Evil Wolves. Like their masters, they attack humans with no fear. Their masters obviously have not trained them properly, so what else can we do but help them with real training? Are you ready?

◈ Task

◈ Reward
EXP 34546860 / Skill Points 671 /
GOLD 47050

◈ Format
One-time quest

◈ NPC
Farm Owner Mujariun / Expeditionary Force Commander Pakrun

◈ Monster
None

◈ Scenario
If you go southwest from this farm, you will see the soldiers dispatched from Baghdad along the way to the desert. It seems that they are investigating something around there but they are having some trouble because of demons. If you want to know what is happening, why don't you meet with the Expeditionary Force Commander.

desc1.notice: Speak with Expeditionary Force Commander Pakrun
