desc.notice:
◈ Task
Collect 120 Immortal Beak's Tongues

◈ Reward
EXP 170,113,575 / Skill Points 5,226 /
Gold 412,620

◈ Format
One-time quest

◈ NPC
Lost Soldier Brandon

◈ Monsters
Immortal Beak

◈ Scenario
Lately, griffins have been causing trouble. It looks like a leader has emerged who is now leading the rabble. The leader is one ugly son of a griffin by the name of the Immortal Beak. Slay that bird for me, would you?

◈ Task
Collect 120 Skin Tissue of Zealots

◈ Reward
EXP 287,027,172 / Skill Points 5,226 /
Gold 441,120

◈ Format
One-time quest

◈ NPC
Lost Investigator Avrill

◈ Monsters
Baal Zealot Modify

◈ Scenario
We have received a saddening report recently that there are humans mixed in among the monsters in the Forest of Sorrow. They were human beings once, but, they have been transformed by some power and lost their self-consciousness, degrading to monsters who only move by instinct. In order to find out what happened to them, we need their skin tissue. Would you slay some Baal Zealots and bring me their Skin Tissue?

◈ Mission
Collect 120 White Dream Powder

◈ Reward
Experience 4145000 /10 Abnormal state recovery potion (large)

◈ Form
Available 3 times

◈ NPC
Exorcist Miaoryeong

◈ Monster
Tomb Spirit

◈ Scenario
Thanks to your help in getting those powders, I was able to help many. Speaking of which, I have another favor to ask of you.
I'm running out of the White Dream Powder which I've been using to cast spells all along.
You can get White Dream Powders by hunting Tomb Spirits which live deep down inside the Qin-Shi Tomb. Please return to me once you have collected 120 White Dream Powders.

◈ Mission
Collect 50 Ure'uth Samples, 50 Mehen Samples, and 50 Aker Samples.

◈ Reward
EXP 64955062 / Skill Points 3600 / Gold 7350

◈ Type
1 Time Only

◈ NPC
Doctor Renenutet / Doctor Renenutet

◈ Monster
Ure'uth / Mehen / Aker

◈ Scenario
I don't believe this. This can't be happening! …Oh, it's nothing. Actually, it's too early to tell. I know I put you through a lot of trouble, but I need more samples to be absolutely sure. Please bring me 50 Ure'uth Samples, 50 Mehen Samples, and 50 Aker Samples.

QNO_SD_MA_014.quest_name: The Truth of the Strange Rumor (3)

desc.notice:
◈ Mission
Talk to Miaoryeong

◈ Reward
None

◈ Form
Available once

◈ NPC
General Sonhueon and Miaoryeong the Exorcist

◈ Monster
None

◈ Scenario
Long ago, the imperial army went on an expedition to eradicate a group that would perform cruel experiments on human being
The imperial army, shocked at the brutal scene, decimated every last of them. Not long after the army gathered the group's experiment data and products, the army discovered something surprising. the pills that were collected had tremendous ability to boost the powers of Berserkers!
Although the imperial army initially planned on disclosing the existence of these pills to the world, we decided to keep it a secret because we were worried that they would fall into the wrong hands.
Now that such great danger is upon our world, however, we are selecting those who are not controlled by private greed to tell about these pills.
The imperial army only knows the formula. Bring us the rest of the ingredients and we will make them for you.
The ingredient needed for the pills is Piece of Spirits.
Since it is impossible for an ordinary human to come in contact with a soul, you should go to Miaoryeong, who has extraordinary abilities, and ask her for help.

◈ Mission
Collect 50 Dark Red Venom.

◈ Reward
EXP 11829691 / Skill Points 1900 / Gold 5031

◈ Type
1 Time Only

◈ NPC
Potion Trader Titi / Potion Trader Titi

◈ Monster
Sand Sting

◈ Scenario
I've developed a new medicine whose effects need to be evaluated. I want to see if it works against powerful poison like Sand Sting's poisonous saliva. If you don't mind, would you bring me poison from Sand Stings at the Red Leg area in the Storm and Cloud Desert? 50 will be enough.

◈ Mission
Eliminate 100 Keisas Berserkers.

◈ Reward
EXP 1082584 / Skill Points 700 / Gold 4900 / AP 100

◈ Type
Repeatable

◈ NPC
Trader/Hunter Union Representative Kapado / Trader/Hunter Union Representative Kapado

◈ Monster
Keisas Berserker

◈ Scenario
We've got to eliminate as many monsters as possible to consolidate our dominance of the Shrine. Your mission is to defeat 100 Keisas Berserkers. Please do your best to get more kills than the Thief Union so that we can keep the Shrine under our control.

QNO_SD_GU_004.quest_name: Hunting in the Middle of the Temple Dispute 1 (Trader)

desc.notice:
◈ Mission
Hunt 500 Tomb Bowman

◈ Reward
Experience 8002400 / GOLD 240000 / Skill Exp 50000

◈ Form
Available Once

◈ NPC
Jangan Gisaeng Juyeong

◈ Monster
Tomb Bowman

◈ Scenario
It will take a long time before I come to accept the death of my best friend and her fiance. I can almost hear her calling out my name even now… (quietly sobs)
I will find no peace to see my best friend gone like this. I'd like to hunt down those Tomb Bowman monsters who took the lives of my friend and her fiancee. Would you help me?
Please hunt 500 Tomb Bowman's.

◈ Task
Speak with the Goods Supplier in Europe, Samarkand, or Hotan.

◈ Reward
8th Grade Seal Shield


◈ Format
One-time quest

◈ NPC
Goods Supplier in Europe, Samarkand, or Hotan

◈ Scenario
You have reached level 64! Now you are more than capable of surviving in this world without my assistance. I feel as though my child has all grown up and is ready to move on. I will give you this shield as one last gift. Please come see me in town. I will be waiting for you there.

◈ Task
Talk to Event So-Ok

◈ Reward
Instant Return Scroll x3

◈ Format
Can be performed once every Friday, Saturday and Sunday

◈ NPC
Potion Merchant

◈ Scenario
The golden weekend for beginners! The 11:00 Happy Hour is here.
Visit Event So-Ok to receive your gift.

QEV_ALL_BASIC3_11.quest_name: The Golden Weekend for Beginners (11 o'clock)

desc.notice:
◈ Mission
Deliver the Prescription Ingredients.

◈ Reward
EXP 5255264 / Skill Points 1000 / Gold 2428

◈ Type
1 Time Only

◈ NPC
Potion Trader Titi / Doctor Renenutet

◈ Monster
N/A

◈ Scenario
Thanks for waiting. Please deliver these ingredients to Doctor Renenutet.

◈ Mission
Eliminate 800 Mehens.

◈ Reward
EXP 8660675 / Skill Points 850 / Gold 39200

◈ Type
Repeatable

◈ NPC
Egyptian Soldier Kamori / Egyptian Soldier Kamori

◈ Monster
Mehen

◈ Scenario
Do you wish to become a Deity? I can help you with that. Please go hunt 800 Mehens.

◈ Task
Defeat 151 Soil Ghost Bugs and 325 Strong Earth Ghosts

◈ Reward
EXP 3,437,006 / Skill Points 715


◈ Format
Repeatable (x4)

◈ NPC
Outpost Commander Dao Zhi Fong

◈ Monster
Soil Ghost Bug, Strong Earth Ghost

◈ Scenario
We assumed that things were in our favor in our battle against the Earth Ghosts, but it seems that we were wrong. In their desperation, they overtook the Donwhang Stone Cave and awoke something terrible. If they manage to awaken Devil Ghosts and Devil Masks, I can't even imagine what manner of terror will be unleashed upon West China. Will you save us from the threat of these terrible demons?

◈ Task
Defeat 20 Immortal Griffins, 50 Immortal Griffin Guardians, and 50 Immortal Griffin Conquerors

◈ Reward
EXP 256,327,344 / Skill Points 7,321 /
Gold 448,500

◈ Format
One-time quest

◈ NPC
Lost Soldier Rion

◈ Monsters
Immortal Griffin, Immortal Griffin Guardian, Immortal Griffin Conqueror

◈ Scenario
Now, we have our final test. You're amazing. I didn't think you would make it to the final test. Now, I have no other choice but to admit that you're indeed skilled. This final test is something the ancient Greeks had to go through. It is said that ancient Greeks had to take down griffins with bare hands in an enclosed cave, in order to be acknowledged as a warrior. You won't have to fight them in an 'enclosed' cave, so I suppose this is an easier test. Ha ha ha!

◈ Task
Defeat 247 Small Bunwangs and 268 Bunwangs

◈ Reward
EXP 1156526 / Skill Points 830


◈ Format
Repeatable (x2)

◈ NPC
Outpost Commander Hao Hung

◈ Monster
Small Bunwang, Bunwang

◈ Scenario
On the Grassland Road to the north of this outpost, monkey demons called Small Bunwangs and Bunwangs roam about in groups. No thanks to them, no one can use such a fine road, including merchants. But this land belongs to us humans. We can't let some demons take it away from us. You will lend us your strength, won't you?

◈ Task
Eliminate 2 Togui Captains

◈ Rewards
EXP 42,000 / Skill EXP 2,500

◈ Format
Repeatable quest (Restricted to once per day)

◈ NPC
Soldier Leihan

◈ Monsters
Togui Captain (The Phantom of the Crimson Blood level 61~70)

◈ How to Teleport
You can teleport to the Forgotten World by using a Dimension Hole.
You can obtain Dimension Holes from the monster that appears from the Dimension Pillars.

◈ Scenario
They say that, among the Toguis of the Forgotten World, there is an Elder who leads them. Once he is dead, Toguis will fracture and the one who killed him will gain great wealth and fame. But the Togui Captains who protect the Togui Elder by his side is no small hindrance. Once they are gone, I might have the opportunity to bring down the Togui Elder. It's really too bad.

◈ Task
Defeat 50 Metamorphosis Demons and 50 Metamorphosis Summoners

◈ Reward
EXP 287,027,172 / Skill Points 5,226 /
Gold 441,120

◈ Format
One-time quest

◈ NPC
Baal Worshipper Cieta

◈ Monsters
Metamorphosis Demon, Metamorphosis Summoner

◈ Scenario
My friends who came here with me blindly trusted Babilion and agreed to his experiments, hoping that they would attain the power of the Baal cult. I was on board with the idea, so I didn't stop them. But, now, they have become monsters, let alone attain the power of the cult. They are neither human beings nor demons from hell. I want to see them set free. Please slay them. I beg of you.

◈ Task
Defeat 250 Hell Bloods and 250 Blood Watches

◈ Reward
EXP 28,085,047 / Skill Points 838 /
Gold 46,650

◈ Format
Unlimited Repeats

◈ NPC
Lost Soldier Brandon

◈ Monsters
Hell Bloods, Blood Watches

◈ Scenario
Have you, by any chance, heard of Hell Bloods and Blood Watches, fearsome monsters that enjoy human blood? These fearsome monsters are increasing in number. Won't you enter the Forest of Sorrow and take care of them?

◈ Mission
Collect 100 High Monitor Ostracons.

◈ Reward
EXP 12550119 / Skill Points 2100 / Gold 5118

◈ Type
1 Time Only

◈ NPC
Doctor Renenutet / Doctor Renenutet

◈ Monster
Tel Basta / Bastet / Bast

◈ Scenario
This time, please bring me 100 High Monitor Ostracons from the High Pharaoh's Tomb. You can get them by hunting Tel Bastas, Bastets, and Basts.

◈ Mission
Deliver the news to Gisaeng Juyeong regarding her friend

◈ Reward
Experience 2583800

◈ Form
Available Once

◈ NPC
Jangan Adventurer Flora / Gisaeng Juyeon

◈ Monster
None

◈ Scenario
While you were gone collecting the bows, the adventurers who had gone to the Qin-Shi Tomb with Juyeong's friend returned. An urgent business came up so they had to leave on a long journey again and asked me to tell you the news about Juyeong's friend.
They said that not long before in the Qin-Shi Tomb, they ran into her fiance and his colleagues.
He was shocked to see his fiancee there. Blaming himself for dragging his fiance to such a dangerous place, he decided to return to Jangan with her immediately.
Not long after they left, the adventurers heard a scream in the direction of Juyeongs friend and her fiance so they ran back to their direction and found the two under ambush by the Tomb Bowman. The man was desperately trying to protect his fiancee and, in that process, both of them met their death.
We are truely sad to send such a tragic message but it would be right to inform Juyeong of her loss. Could you tell this story to Juyeong?
Please comfort her so that she would not have to suffer from too much pain from losing her true friend.

desc1.notice: Deliver the news to Entertainer Juyeong  regarding her friend

desc.notice:

3,048,200,100 Job EXP (-50% in Safe Mode)

◈ Reward
EXP 5412921 / Skill Points 1100 / Gold 2450

◈ Type
1 Time Only

◈ NPC
General Sonhyeon / Egypt Governor Senmute

◈ Monster
N/A

◈ Scenario
We can now employ the power of Berserk by using the pills that are made with Spirit Fragments. Would you believe me if I tell you that we can intensify the power of Berserk? Yes, it's true. The secret is hidden in a Pharaoh's tomb that was recently discovered in Alexandria, Egypt. Intensifying the power of Berserk will definitely strengthen our military power. I want you to visit Egypt Governor Senmute immediately to gather more information.

◈ Task
Defeat 152 Black Robber Followers and 136 Black Robber Archers

◈ Reward
EXP 395698 / Skill Points 395


◈ Format
One-time quest

◈ NPC
Outpost Commander Mu Ri Lun

◈ Monster
Black Robber Follower, Black Robber Archer

◈ Scenario
I agree with you when you say that there must be some wicked power behind these monsters' activities. The only ones in the Tarim Basin capable of such a feat are the Black Robbers. It is proof enough that their den is safe when the rest of the land is riddled with monsters. So, our course of action? Of course, we need to annihilate them all before they summon more monsters.

◈ Task
Collect 180 Sheep Masks of Adonis

◈ Reward
EXP 82912465 / Skill Points 1611 /
GOLD 185848

◈ Format
2

◈ NPC
Farm Owner Mujariun

◈ Monster
Adonis Hamal

◈ Scenario
Recently, more and more wolves have been attacking our sheep. To make matters worse, there are even wolves wearing the mask of a sheep. The situation is dire. Please, slay Adonis Hamals wandering around here.

◈ Task
Collect 50 Crude Essence of Spirit

◈ Reward
Skill Points 310 (Reward grows as your level increases)


◈ Format
Unlimited repeats

◈ NPC
All Daily Quest Managers

◈ Monster
Monster level 61~70

◈ Scenario
Hello. Did you know that research is recently being conducted on monsters? If so, news travels fast. It is continuing consistently thanks to the help of many people. The news is that recently research is being conducted on the mind power of monsters. Although ordinary people like us have no idea what they are researching. In any case, we received an order to collect Crude Essence of Spirit for the research. What do you think? Can you collect 50 Crude Essence of Spirit? Don't worry about the reward. We have support from the royal palace, so we can give you a sufficient reward.

◈ Task
Speak with the Goods Supplier in China, Donwhang, or Hotan.

◈ Reward
5th Grade Seal Shield


◈ Format
One-time quest

◈ NPC
Goods Supplier in China, Donwhang, or Hotan.

◈ Scenario
You have reached level 32! A treasure chest surfaced from deep within the ocean. I found an incredible shield in it. At the first glance, I knew it would go very well with you. I will give it to you as a gift so, please, come see me in town.

◈ Task

Gold 100,000

Would you deliver this report to General Ratchel in Constantinople?

Gold 412,620

◈ Format
One-time quest

◈ NPC

◈ Monsters
Temple Warrior

◈ Scenario
Hello, friend. I appreciate your assistance. What you need to do for us is to supplement our arms. In order to protect our base from their attacks, we must supplement our weapons. First, slay Temple Warriors and bring their helms.

◈ Mission
Speak to General Ratchel.

◈ Reward
EXP 5412921 / Skill Points 1100 / Gold 2450

◈ Type
1 Time Only

◈ NPC
Doctor Renenutet / General Ratchel

◈ Monster
N/A

◈ Scenario
Thank you for waiting. This document contains all the secrets of Berserk discovered from the Pharaoh's Tomb. Please deliver this document to General Ratchel in Constantinople. He'll be pleased to read it.

◈ Task
Collect 360 Wadi Uneg's Essence

◈ Reward
EXP 135250958 / Skill Points 2887 /
GOLD 232260

◈ Format
2

◈ NPC
Expeditionary Force Soldier Alamatun

Wadi Uneg's Essence

◈ Scenario
I hear that you can get the essence of Violent Wadi Unegs when you slay them around the lake. The essence of demons can be very useful. If you happen to be hunting Violent Wadi Unegs, would you mind collecting their essence for me?

◈ Objective
Deliver Specialty Goods Level 20 (Europe)

◈ Reward
70,500 Job EXP (-50% in Safe Mode)

One-time Quest

◈ NPC
Trader Anna / Trader Samanda

None

◈ Scenario
We have an order for specialty goods to be delivered. You need to deliver specialty goods to Trader Samanda in Samarkand. Specialty goods delivery assignments are worth more Job EXP than trade goods collection assignments. It would do you well to undertake some of these.

◈ Format
Unlimited Repeatable

◈ NPC
Smuggler Barus

◈ Monster
Monsters Lv 50-59

◈ Scenario
You need to work ceaselessly to increase your Job level. If you are ready, bring me 200 units of Full Dresses. You should be able to find Full Dresses as you hunt monsters at level 50-59. If you run out of time and don't find enough Full Dresses, don't worry. Even if you don't have all 200 units, I will pay you for what you have. But don't forget that you have to bring all 200 units to gain greater Job EXP.

◈ Reward
171,520,000 Job EXP (-50% in Safe Mode)

◈ Format
One-time Quest

◈ NPC
Smuggler Isutade / Smuggler Barus

None

We have an order for smuggled goods to be delivered. You need to deliver Smuggled goods to Smuggler Barus in Samarkand. Smuggled goods delivery assignments are worth more Job EXP than trade goods collection assignments. It would do you well to undertake some of these.

◈ Task
Defeat 380 Violent Biyatuns, 380 Desert Sand Snakes and 380 Unidentified Qarum Batuns

◈ Reward
EXP 468347116 / Skill Points 12807 /
GOLD 562600

◈ Format
1

◈ NPC
Secret Agent Sirun

◈ Monster
Violent Biyatun, Desert Sand Snake, Unidentified Qarum Batun

◈ Scenario
It is clear that the hideout of thief boss, Kalia, is beyond the huge stone gate. However, there are too many demons protecting the boss' hideout around there. If you feel confident, please help me.

◈ Task
Defeat 186 Hyeongcheon guards and 68 Hyeongcheons

◈ Reward
EXP 234,250 / Skill Points 294


◈ Format
One-time quest

◈ NPC
Outpost Commander Dao Zhi Fong

◈ Monster
Hyeongcheon guard, Hyeongcheon

◈ Scenario
Earth Ghosts are being pushed back after a losing streak, but they are no easy foes to deal with. They are mobilizing yet again, this time by raising Hyeongcheons and their bodyguards from the dead. To eradicate Earth Ghosts, we must first annihilate Hyeongcheon Guards and Hyeongcheons.

◈ Mission
Deliver Sochil's Calabash Bottle to Yangyun the herbalist

◈ Reward
Experience 4016100

◈ Form
Available Once

◈ NPC
Sochil the Beggar of Jangan / Yangyun the herbalist of Jangan

◈ Monster
None

◈ Scenario
A little while ago, my friend brought a few strange looking calabash bottles from a burned-down cave.
We thought they were all empty but one of them contained some kind of liquid with blue glow. After the trip to the cave, my friend said he was thirsty and tried to drink the liquid. I thought it is not normal water, so I tried to stop him..
But he drank the liquid before I could stop him and he has been unconscious since.
There is still a little bit of the liquid left in the bottle. I want to show this bottle to Yangyun the herbalist and find an antidote.
I would bring this bottle to him myself, but I can't leave here because of my friend.
Please bring this bottle to Yangyun the herbalist for me.

desc1.notice: Deliver Sochil’s Calabash Bottle to Yangyun the Healer

desc.notice:
◈ Task
Speak with Outpost Commander Tan Wei

◈ Reward
Skill Points 5


◈ Format
One-time quest

◈ NPC
Outpost Commander Tsai Bao / Outpost Commander Tan Wei

◈ Monster
None

◈ Scenario
Deeper into the forest and you will find Jangan Outpost 3. Their commander, Tan Wei, has asked for reinforcements. But, as you can see, we have our hands full just dealing with monsters around our own outpost. Why don't you volunteer for it? It may bring you new challenges.

desc1.notice: Speak with Outpost Commander Tan Wei

desc.notice:
◈ Mission
Speak to Egypt Governor Senmute.

◈ Reward
EXP 11485137 / Skill Points 1800 / Gold 2493

◈ Type
1 Time Only

◈ NPC
Doctor Renenutet / Egypt Governor Senmute

◈ Monster
N/A

◈ Scenario
I was afraid of this… I've confirmed that Mentuhotep has resurrected the god of the Shrine, the evil Seth. Seth is the one commanding the desert monsters to attack us humans. I don't even want to imagine what might be happening in the Shrine right now. This is urgent. Please report this to Governor Senmute immediately.

◈ Task
Defeat 3 Small-eyed Ghosts and 4 Big-eyed Ghosts

◈ Reward
EXP 367 / Skill Points 3


◈ Format
One-time quest

◈ NPC
Outpost Commander Wang Pai

◈ Monster
Small-eyed Ghost, Big-eyed Ghost

◈ Scenario
There are many Mangyangs on the road to Jangan. Still, demons called Small-Eyed Ghosts and Big-Eyed Ghosts are even greater of a problem. Pick up your arms and pop them up for me, would ya? Ha ha ha!

◈ Task
Deliver Hungry Wolf's Claws

◈ Reward
EXP 96913 /
Soldier's Tokens 4

◈ Format
One-time quest

◈ NPC
Outpost Volunteer Roxy / Specialty Trader Toson

◈ Monster
None

◈ Scenario
An order came in for the Hungry Wolf's Claws stored in the outpost. It is a delivery task that needs to be delivered to Samarkand, why don't you get this done for us?

◈ Task
Collect 100 Shakram's Teeth

◈ Reward
EXP 1423076 /
General's Tokens 10

◈ Format
Repeatable (x3)

◈ NPC
Outpost Guard Rabbath

◈ Monster
Shakram

◈ Scenario
I am confident that it will shock you to know just how many people were bitten to death by those Shakrams and their terrible teeth. We can't just watch it continue. They take human life with their teeth, we will rip out their teeth.

QNO_N_KT_069.quest_name: An Eye for an Eye, a Tooth for a Tooth

desc.notice:
◈ Task
Defeat 152 Black Yeowas and 136 Red Yeowas

◈ Reward
EXP 395698 / Skill Points 395


◈ Format
One-time quest

◈ NPC
Outpost Commander Mu Ri Lun

◈ Monster
Black Yeowa, Red Yeowa

◈ Scenario
The Tarim Basin is a place fraught with trouble. The region is riddled with demons and, to make things worse, the Black Robbers are in the area. If we don't take care of them immediately, this land will turn into a frightening hell. I am curious to see if you will be the one that will turn the tide here. Slay Black Yeowas and Red Yeowas near this outpost.

◈ Task
Collect 190 Beads of Cold Energy

◈ Reward
EXP 808294 /
General's Tokens 10

◈ Format
Repeatable (x3)

◈ NPC
Outpost Guard Chahamma

◈ Monster
Ishade, Hashade

◈ Scenario
Hup! Hup! Whew... The weather is far too cold! This is all because of the ice demons living nearby. Just get rid of Ishades and Hashades, and I'm sure it will be ten times warmer than this. Will you help me before I freeze to death?

◈ Task
Defeat 200 Ironclaws of Revenge and 200 Ironclaws of Warning

◈ Reward
EXP 1,641,920 / Skill Points 578 /
Gold 28,252

◈ Format
Unlimited Repeats

◈ NPC
Lost Soldier Rice

◈ Monsters
Ironclaw of Revenge, Ironclaw of Warning

◈ Scenario
Thank you for your assistance last time. A friend of mine stopped by here a while ago. He tells me Ironclaws of Revenge and Ironclaws of Warning are griffins! Could you believe that?! How could such barbaric beasts be griffins, the noble beasts who would bestow upon the young men and women of ancient Greece the mark of bravery. I must assure you - it's not that I can't verify this information because I'm afraid of them or anything. But, my archaeological expertise tells me they are no griffins. Would you mind slaying them and verify it?
Collect 1 Dirty Lamp (%d)

◈ Objective
Deliver Specialty Goods Level 70

◈ Reward
18,351,800 Job EXP (-50% in Safe Mode)

◈ Format
One-time Quest

◈ NPC
Trader Sabonue / Trader Anna

◈ Monster
None

◈ Scenario
We have an order for specialty goods to be delivered. You need to deliver specialty goods to Trader Anna in Constantinople. Specialty goods delivery assignments are worth more Job EXP than trade goods collection assignments. It would do you well to undertake some of these.

◈ Mission
Hunt 300 Tomb Snake Mistress

◈ Reward
Experience 3966700 / GOLD 82000 / Skill Exp 15000

◈ Form
Available 3 times

◈ NPC
Gisaeng Juju of Jangan

◈ Monster
Water Pepper Tomb Snake

◈ Scenario
Uh! I am so annoyed! What do they mean I'm uglier than the demon?!
Hey, listen to me, will ya? Lots of travelers who have been to the Qin-Shi Tomb are visiting this entertainer house. According to them, there is a demon living deep inside the Qin-Shi Tomb called the Tomb Snake Mistress whose beauty is, they said, simply splendid. So I told them that the beauty of a demon couldn't be any greater than that of humans. Guess what they said! They said that demon would be more beautiful than I am!
Hey!, look. Am I really that ugly?! Uglier than that demon?! Uhhh! that makes me really mad!
You seem like a pretty strong. Could you do me a favor? Go hunt down that Tomb Snake Mistress! That demon really violated my pride, so take her down! That should give me a peace of mind.
I'll pay you if you bring me 300 Tomb Snake Mistress. Now hurry up and go!

◈ Task
Defeat 387 Red-eye Ghosts, Defeat 419 Dark-Eye Ghosts

◈ Reward
EXP 1608933 / Skill Points 1123


◈ Format
One-time quest

◈ NPC
Outpost Commander Mu Ri Lun

◈ Monster
Red-Eye Ghost, Dark-Eye Ghost

◈ Scenario
Red-Eye Ghost, Dark-Eye Ghost are frightening, one-eyed parasites upon the rocky walls in the desert. Because of its hideousness, all of our soldiers are afraid of them, not to mention the passers-by. How pathetic. Still, a fear that is deep-rooted in someone's heart cannot be dispelled simply by yelling at them. We need your help. Slay Red-Eye Ghosts and Dark-Eye Ghosts for us.

QNO_N_KT_020.quest_name: Fear for Red-eye and Dark-eye ghosts

desc.notice:
◈ Task
Eliminate 500 Toguis

◈ Rewards
EXP 50,800 / Skill EXP 40,000

◈ Format
One-time quest

◈ NPC
Hunter Associate Ahmok

◈ Monsters
Togui (The Phantom of the Crimson Blood level 61~70)

◈ How to Teleport
You can teleport to the Forgotten World by using a Dimension Hole.
You can obtain Dimension Holes from the monster that appears from the Dimension Pillars.

◈ Scenario
Thanks to you, we were able to liberate the souls of those who were kidnapped by the Toguis. But I'm receiving reports that Toguis are on the move again to collect human souls. I would appreciate it if you could defeat the Toguis to prevent the same tragedy from repeating... Will you do it?

◈ Task
Deliver Old Gold Coins

◈ Reward
EXP 1,245 /
Monk's Tokens 4

◈ Format
One-time quest

◈ NPC
Outpost Guard Marcel / Association Boss Kapros

◈ Monster
None

◈ Scenario
Lily the volunteer must have pestered you. The gold coins of the Barbaroi are to be sent out to the Association Boss Kapros, but we are so short of manpower that we are relying on volunteers like Lily. The shipment is being delayed because of that. If you don't mind, would you give us a hand?

QNO_N_EU_027.quest_name: The person who knows real value

desc.notice:
◈ Task
Deliver Devil Ghost Fragments

◈ Reward
EXP 1,124,326 /
General's Tokens 5

◈ Format
One-time quest

◈ NPC
Outpost Guard Ru Li Mao / Hunter Associate Haraho

◈ Monster
None

◈ Scenario
The awakening of the sealed Nachals in the Donwhang Stone Cave was a disquieting incident. The Hunter Association was on full alert not to mention our own troops. But, then, you came along and did away with Devil Ghost Nachals just like that. The Hunter Association would like to reward you for your efforts. Take these Devil Ghost Fragments to them, and they will reward you.

◈ Task
Defeat 490 Violent Wadi Unegs

◈ Reward
EXP 135250958 / Skill Points 2887 /
GOLD 232260

◈ Format
2

◈ NPC
Expeditionary Force Commander Pakrun

◈ Monster
Violent Wadi Uneg

◈ Scenario
The Violent Wadi Unegs around the lake are another major obstacle to our mission. Demons have always existed in this region, but I have not seen anything so violent as them. I don't know what is happening to the world. Anyway, we must thoroughly eradicate anything that hinders our mission. Would you lend us your strength to defeat Violent Wadi Unegs?

QNO_AR_021.quest_name: Put violent lake monster to sleep

desc.notice:
◈ Objective
Deliver Smuggled Goods Level 55 (China)

◈ Reward
4,112,700 Job EXP (-50% in Safe Mode)

◈ Format
One-time Quest

◈ NPC
Smuggler Chungho / Smuggler Chao

◈ Monster
None

◈ Scenario
We have an order for smuggled goods to be delivered. You need to deliver Smuggled goods to Smuggler Chao in Jangan. Smuggled goods delivery assignments are worth more Job EXP than trade goods collection assignments. It would do you well to undertake some of these.

◈ Task
Complete the Burning Abyss collection

◈ Rewards
Select 1 9th grade Seal of Sun weapon

◈ Format
One-time quest

◈ NPC
Hunter Associate Ahmok

◈ Monsters
Flame Cow King, Treasure Box Monsters

◈ How to Teleport
You can teleport to the Forgotten World by using a Dimension Hole.
You can obtain Dimension Holes from the monster that appears from the Dimension Pillars.

◈ Scenario
Talismans of great power are being found on the Flame Mountain of the Forgotten World. Many warriors, including those of us at the Hunter Union, are out on an adventure to find them. Would you be up for the challenge, too? A great reward awaits those who complete the Burning Abyss collection.

◈ Task
Eliminate 35 Seirens

◈ Rewards
EXP 901,000 / Skill EXP 1,750

◈ Format
Repeatable quest (Restricted to once per day)

◈ NPC
Specialty Trader Sanmok

◈ Monsters
Seiren (The Green Abyss level 91~100)

◈ How to Teleport
You can teleport to the Forgotten World by using a Dimension Hole.
You can obtain Dimension Holes from the monster that appears from the Dimension Pillars.

◈ Scenario
I hear that monsters called Seirens live in the Forgotten World. They are reputed to have such beautiful faces. I think I might fall for their beauty that I'm afraid to go face them. If you happen to be on your way to deal with those monsters, would you come back later and tell me about them?

◈ Mission
Collect 100 High Dead Ostracons.

◈ Reward
EXP 12550119 / Skill Points 2100 / Gold 5118

◈ Type
1 Time Only

◈ NPC
Doctor Renenutet / Doctor Renenutet

◈ Monster
Rage Mummy / Hubris Mummy

◈ Scenario
This time, please bring me 100 High Dead Ostracons from the High Pharaoh's Tomb. You can get them by hunting Rage Mummies and Hubris Mummies.

◈ Mission
Eliminate 20 Traders and Hunters at Level 105 in the Shrine.

◈ Reward
EXP 1082584 / Skill Points 700 / Gold 4900 / AP 500

◈ Type
Repeatable

◈ NPC
Thief Union Representative Mohaira / Thief Union Representative Mohaira

◈ Monster
Trader and Hunter Union Members at Level 105 and Higher

◈ Scenario
The Trader Union thinks they've bought this Shrine, and the Hunter Union is like a whipped dog that follows them everywhere. God, I hate them both! Hey, go eliminate 20 of their members at Level 105 and higher in the Shrine. Let's show them what we've got!

desc1.notice: Executing 20 Hunters at Level 105 and Higher (%d)

desc.notice:
◈ Mission
Eliminate 100 Devil Worms.

◈ Reward
EXP 12550119 / Skill Points 2100 / Gold 5118

◈ Type
1 Time Only

◈ NPC
Librarian Ahha / Librarian Ahha

◈ Monster
Devil Worm

◈ Scenario
I started working as a librarian because I've always wanted to write an epic story of a hero. I'd love to publish a novel about your heroic deeds. Would you allow me the honor? I'd love to hear your story of fighting Devil Worms in the Storm and Cloud Desert. Hmm, I think it'd make a really exciting story if you fought 100 Devil Worms and won!

◈ Mission
Collect 50 Decayed Chunk of Fleshes.

◈ Reward
EXP 18676935 / Skill Points 2100 / Gold 4681

◈ Type
1 Time Only

◈ NPC
Egypt Governor Senmute / Egypt Governor Senmute

◈ Monster
Uneg

◈ Scenario
I'm looking for someone who I can trust. I need help obtaining the decomposed flesh of Unegs in Delta. May I ask you to bring me 50 Decayed Chunk of Fleshes? You don't need to know why I need them. Let's just say… They're for a ritual.

◈ Task
Deliver Sungsung's Red Manes

◈ Reward
EXP 88906 /
Soldier's Tokens 4

◈ Format
One-time quest

◈ NPC
Outpost Volunteer Masha / Protector Trader Aryoan

◈ Monster
None

◈ Scenario
We have a delivery request. It is a quest to deliver Sungsung's Red Manes to Protector Trader Aryoan in Samarkand. If you happen to be on your way, will you deliver them for us?

QNO_N_CA_029.quest_name: If you are a fashion leader, use red mane

desc.notice:
◈ Task
Deliver Giant's Eyeballs

◈ Reward
EXP 4,364 /
Monk's Tokens 4

◈ Format
One-time quest

◈ NPC
Outpost Guard Marcel / Hunter Associate Adria

◈ Monster
None

◈ Scenario
The Hunter Association is asking for the Giant's Eyeballs that we are storing in our warehouse. I've heard that the Hunter Association has been having trouble because of giants recently, but what could they want those eyeballs for? Some kind of anger management, perhaps? Anyway, most of our personnel at the outpost are busy with other duties. Would you be willing to carry out this delivery task on our behalf?

◈ Task
Collect 180 Red Scorpion's Venom Sacks

◈ Reward
EXP 336720 /
Soldier's Tokens 5

◈ Format
One-time quest

◈ NPC
Outpost Guard Asoho

◈ Monster
Red Scorpion

◈ Scenario
Slay demons, slay demons! Hmph. The commander yelled at me again. We are mere grunts. We are no masters in martial arts. How are we supposed to fight those frightening demons? This time, he's yelling at us to have us slay Red Scorpions. I'm sorry to ask you this, but... Could you give us a hand?

◈ Task
Speak with Outpost Commander Amanda

◈ Reward
Skill Points 2


◈ Format
One-time quest

◈ NPC
Outpost Commander Albert / Outpost Commander Amanda

◈ Monster
None

◈ Scenario
The sudden increase in the number of demons in Eastern Europe is not something we can sweep under the rug. We need to investigate it more thoroughly. If that's the case, the best course of action would be to investigate the demons, don't you think? Head to Outpost 2 in the forest to the west.

◈ Mission
Collect 50 Desert Bug Sap.

◈ Reward
EXP 9907180 / Skill Points 1300 / Gold 4768

◈ Type
1 Time Only

◈ NPC
Potion Trader Thiara / Potion Trader Thiara

◈ Monster
Desert Bug

◈ Scenario
Come on, did you really believe that? No, there's no love potion. Well, alright, I made it up in hopes of attracting more business. Now I realize that most people nowadays rely on medication for every problem and that's not good. Well, a customer is a customer and I've got to satisfy him. Hmm… A Love Potion, eh? I guess I'll need the secretions of Desert Bugs. Bring me 50 Secretions from Desert Bugs in the Valley of the Kings, will you?

◈ Task
Obtain 30 Ghost King Nipper's Shells

◈ Rewards
EXP 901,000 / Skill EXP 1,500

◈ Format
Repeatable quest (Restricted to once per day)

◈ NPC
Protector Trader Gonishya

◈ Monsters
Ghost King Nipper (The Green Abyss level 91~100)

◈ How to Teleport
You can teleport to the Forgotten World by using a Dimension Hole.
You can obtain Dimension Holes from the monster that appears from the Dimension Pillars.

◈ Scenario
The world is so panic-stricken that it's not easy to find ingredients. Even so, I can't simply abandon my trade. So, I thought of something. I think I will try and craft armor out of the hard shells of monsters. We'll need something better than ordinary shells, something durable like that of Ghost King Nippers. What do you think? Do you think it's a good idea?

◈ Mission
Collect 3 Roc's Blue Feathers

◈ Reward
1 Alchemy Stone of Iron Wall (10th grade)

◈ Form
Unlimited attempts

◈ NPC
Hotan Armor Merchant Gonisha

◈ Monster
Roc the Monster Bird

◈ Scenario
Excuse me, can I take a look at the feather that you are holding right now?
I have never seen a geather with such mysterious powers before.... It is not Roc's feather is it?
What? it is? I never thought I would see something so rare...
Will you give this to me? I really want to make sturdy armor with this feather.
But I will nicely pay for it so you don't need to worry.
There is rarely no chance to handle this kind of valuavle feather so I beg you to do it for me.
A single Blue Feather won't be enough to make sturdy armor. I need to have at least 3 to make the armor.
If you bring me 3 Roc's Blue Feathers, I will pay you the reward as I promised.

◈ Mission
Deliver the Hard Weapons Chest.

◈ Reward
EXP 4809311 / Skill Points 700 / Gold 2362

◈ Type
1 Time Only

◈ NPC
Weapon Trader Hemaka / Finance Officer Maneto

◈ Monster
N/A

◈ Scenario
Okay, the chest is done. I hope Officer Maneto will accept this chest full of weapons as payment for my taxes. I'm sorry, but may I ask you another favor? Please deliver this weapon chest to Officer Maneto. I know it'll be more appropriate for me to go speak to him in person, but I want to be here at my shop in case my clients come to pay me back. Thank you for your help.

◈ Task
Speak with Outpost Commander Tsai Bao

◈ Reward
Skill Points 3


◈ Format
One-time quest

◈ NPC
Exorcist Miaoryeong / Outpost Commander Tsai Bao

◈ Monster
None

◈ Scenario
Now that we know these talismans control those demons, I suppose you want to know who is behind this? A while ago, when I was out in the forest for a personal business, I happened to see a group of bandits. They were carrying talismans that looked an awful lot like these ones. Tell Tsai Bao that you will be able to find clues if you beat the living snot out of them.

desc1.notice: Speak with Outpost Commander Tsai Bao

Collect 100 Royal Officer's Essence

EXP 45533747 / Skill Points 1245 /
GOLD 4850

Repeatable (unlimited)

Village Old Man Kerim

Abshad Force Royal Officer

◈ Scenario
In return for showing you the future of Baghdad, there is something I would like you to do for me. It is nothing difficult. Just collect the things I need for me.

Speak with the Goods Supplier in Europe, Samarkand, or Hotan.

◈Reward
5th Grade Seal Shield


◈ Format
One-time quest

◈ NPC
Goods Supplier in Europe, Samarkand, or Hotan

◈ Scenario
You have reached level 32! A treasure chest surfaced from deep within the ocean. I found an incredible shield in it. At the first glance, I knew it would go very well with you. I will give it to you as a gift so, please, come see me in town.

◈ Task

EXP 28,125 /
Soldier's Tokens 4

One-time quest

◈ NPC
Outpost Guard Ru Li Mao / Merchant Associate Leegeuk

◈ Monster
None

◈ Scenario
The specialty goods stolen by Hyeoncheon Guards have all been recovered. These goods were returned to the Merchant Association as soon as they were recovered, but there is one thing that was left out by mistake. The Merchant Association is pressing us for the goods and we are having a shortage of manpower. If you happen to be on your way to Donwhang, would you deliver these specialty goods for us?

◈ Task
Deliver Broken Fragments of Gold

◈ Reward
EXP 1,124,326 /
General's Tokens 5

◈ Format
One-time quest

◈ NPC
Outpost Guard Ru Li Mao / Merchant Associate Leegeuk

◈ Monster
None

◈ Scenario
Although fragments of gold were retrieved from hunting Gold-Silver Yachas, soldiers like us can't just take them for ourselves. It looks like the outpost has struck a deal with the Merchant Association instead. The gold fragments need to be delivered to the Merchant Association. Could you help us?

◈ Mission
Eliminate 1000 Aknish Lamas.

◈ Reward
EXP 9747665 / Skill Points 1250 / Gold 50750

◈ Type
Repeatable

◈ NPC
Palace Guard Mushari / Palace Guard Mushari

◈ Monster
Aknish Lama

◈ Scenario
Prove to me that you're capable of becoming a true Deity by hunting 1000 Aknish Lamas.

Collect 130 Temple Surveillant Body Armor

EXP 142,254,445 / Skill Points 5,226 /
Gold 315,000

◈ Format
One-time quest

◈ NPC
Lost Soldier Brandon

◈ Monsters
Temple Surveillant

◈ Scenario
Now that we have helmets, we need body armor. I hear that Temple Surveillants' body armor is so very sturdy. Would you be willing to acquire some for us?

◈ Task
Defeat 1 Mangyang

◈ Reward
EXP 71 / Skill Points 3


◈ Format
One-time quest

◈ NPC
General Sonhyeon / Outpost Commander Wang Pai

◈ Monster
MangYang

◈ Scenario
Since the Silkroad opened, we have seen a dramatic increase in the number of monsters. His Imperial Majesty's worries grow daily and the people are suffering indescribably. We are in desperate need of young warriors like yourself. Will you do something great in the service of your country?

◈ Task
Speak with Baal Deputy Leader Diva

◈ Reward
EXP 4,441,302 / Skill Points 5,488 /
Gold 100,000

◈ Format
One-time quest

◈ NPC
Lost Commander Dustun / Baal Deputy Leader Diva

◈ Monsters
None

◈ Scenario
Thank you for saving my life. You are here to slay Babilion, you say? Hmm… If you want to know how to get to him, the Baal cult's deputy leader, Diva, should know. I met her before I was captured. Why don't you go find her?

desc1.notice: Speak with Baal Deputy Leader Diva

desc.notice:
◈ Task
Collect Zielkiaxe's Heart

◈ Reward
EXP 803,397,045 / Skill Points 5,226 /
Gold 100,000

◈ Format
One-time quest

◈ NPC
Lost Soldier Bolt

◈ Monsters
Zielkiaxe

◈ Scenario
Ha… have you heard of Zielkiaxe? It's a b… beast created by Babilion. I'm told that it's much more powerful than an average demon from hell. The in… investigators would like to research Zielkiaxe, so they sent me here to obtain Zielkiaxe's Heart. A hun... hundred of me won't be enough to br... bring down Zielkiaxe. Wou... would you slay Zielkiaxe on my be... behalf and bring me its heart?

◈ Mission
Collect 50 Marks of Strength (Hunter).

◈ Reward
EXP 1082584 / Skill Points 700 / Gold 4900 / AP 100

◈ Type
Repeatable

◈ NPC
Trader/Hunter Union Representative Kapado / Trader/Hunter Union Representative Kapado

◈ Monster
All Monsters in the Shrine

◈ Scenario
To consolidate our dominance of the Shrine, we must eliminate monsters and collect 50 Marks of Strength. Please do your best to get more kills than the Thief Union so that the Trader Union can keep the Shrine under their control.

◈ Task
Speak with the Goods Supplier in Europe, Samarkand, or Hotan.

◈ Reward
2nd Grade Seal Weapon (Select One)


◈ Format
One-time quest

◈ NPC
Goods Supplier in Europe, Samarkand, or Hotan

◈ Scenario
Congratulations! You have reached level 8!
To keep up with your rapid development, I have prepared gifts.
Please come see me in town. I will be waiting for you there.

◈ Task
Collect 164 Golem Fragments

◈ Reward
EXP 299958 /
Soldier's Tokens 5

◈ Format
One-time quest

◈ NPC
Outpost Guard Caleb

◈ Monster
Stone Golem

◈ Scenario
I can't put up with the fuss of fierce monsters like Stone Golem. Would you add your power to defeat them?

◈ Task
Defeat 76 Chakji Workers and 71 Chakjis

◈ Reward
EXP 70,765 / Skill Points 91


◈ Format
One-time quest

◈ NPC
Outpost Commander Guo Mu Hu

◈ Monster
Chakji Worker, Chakji

◈ Scenario
You may have seen the fish that are walking about near our outpost. They are neither fish nor human. These strange creatures are very violent. They form groups and ruthlessly attack those who would access the ferry, causing great damage. Please, slay these monsters and restore the peace.

◈ Task
Defeat 61 Bandit bowmen and 68 Bandits

◈ Reward
EXP 18,852 /
Monk's Tokens 5

◈ Format
One-time quest

◈ NPC
Outpost Guard Wei Mao

◈ Monster
Bandit bowman, Bandit

◈ Scenario
We fight Bandits and vicious beasts deep inside this forest to protect Jangan. I'm proud of that, too. I'm sure the same goes for the comrades who have departed from this world. But, just because we are noble does not mean we don't want revenge. We will make Bandits pay the price for the blood they shed when they brutally slew our comrades.

◈ Task
Collect 145 Ultra Blood Devil's Roots

◈ Reward
EXP 345850 /
General's Tokens 10

◈ Format
Repeatable (x2)

◈ NPC
Outpost Guard Yang Yen

◈ Monster
Ultra Blood Devil

◈ Scenario
We are getting nagged at everyday because of the Ultra Blood Devils that have put their roots down on the Grassland Road. I wish someone would remove them, roots and all. Oh, yes! You could help us. Right?

◈ Task
Collect 320 Penon Cores

◈ Reward
EXP 1511068 /
General's Tokens 10

◈ Format
Repeatable (x3)

◈ NPC
Outpost Guard Chahamma

◈ Monster
Penon Fighter, Penon Warrior

◈ Scenario
Hup! Hup! Slay Penon Fighters and Penon Warriors for me. It is supposed to be my work, but I'm not so crazy as to fight demons in this frighteningly cold weather. Oh! But I don't mean that you are crazy. Anyway, please slay some Penon Fighters and Penon Warriors.

◈ Task
Defeat 490 Agile Diubuns

◈ Reward
EXP 135250958 / Skill Points 2887 /
GOLD 232260

◈ Format
2

◈ NPC
Expeditionary Force Commander Pakrun

◈ Monster
Agile Diubun

◈ Scenario
This region is riddled with hyenas called Agile Diubun. Although we are armed with swords and armor, they attack us again and again without fear. They are hindering our investigation. You seem like a competent fellow. Can you defeat Agile Diubuns for us?

◈ Mission
Eliminate 10 Osirises in the Intermediate Pharaoh's Tomb.

◈ Reward
EXP 3765035 / Skill Points 1250 / Gold 15356

◈ Type
Repeatable

◈ NPC
Egyptian Soldier Turian / Egyptian Soldier Turian

◈ Monster
Osiris (Tomb Intermediate)

◈ Scenario
Alright, let's start the Deity training. Now it's time for you to hunt 10 Osirises in the Intermediate Pharaoh's Tomb.

◈ Task
Deliver Scorpion's Stingers

◈ Reward
EXP 42466 /
Soldier's Tokens 4

◈ Format
One-time quest

◈ NPC
Outpost Guard Dao Lian Hong / Herbalist Bori

◈ Monster
None

◈ Scenario
Herbalist Bori of Donwhang wants us to send in a shipment of Scorpion's Stingers. Who knows what he wants to use them for? We didn't want to keep it in our warehouse for too long anyway. They are far too venomous. If you will take them away from us, that's a load off of our shoulders. Would you deliver those Scorpion's Stingers?

◈ Task
Deliver Devil's Eyes

◈ Reward
EXP 7080672 /
General's Tokens 5

◈ Format
One-time quest

◈ NPC
Outpost Guard Sao Ma / Guild Manager Musai

◈ Monster
None

◈ Scenario
Guild Manager Musai in Hotan wants the Devil's Eyes. Our plates are quite full here... I am not sure we can deliver the goods on time. I'm sorry to bother you with this, but could you help us?

◈ Mission
Deliver Item To Ahjin & bring confirmation
/hunt 20 white tigers

◈ Reward
5 Arabian Camels

◈ Form
Available once

◈ NPC
Specialty Trader Seopok
/Jangan Gisaeng Ahjin

◈ Monster
white tiger

◈ Scenario
Looks like your surprised by the fact that there is a Trade Market here. You should have seen the look on your face hahaha.You might laugh at us bandits for trading what we have stolen but this is how we make a living hahaha.
Seems to me that you are a merchant, would you like to trade anything with us? The goods we sell aren't available at normal Specialty Shops, so it would be an advantage for you to trade with us. However, if you want to trade with us, you must do me 2 favors.
I got a request from Gisaeng Ahjin of Jangan to get her a Magnificent Head Decoration, which I managed to find. Take this box which contains the decoration and bring me Ahjin's delivery confirmation.
Additionaly, the merchants trading with us complained about being attacked by White Tigers, not only the merchants but us bandits are also suffering from the attacks of the white tigers. So, go hunt 20 White Tiger.

desc1.notice: Deliver item to Ahjin and bring confirmation

desc.notice:
◈ Mission
Option 1: Kill the Captain of amry
Option 2: Survive from the fight with captain of army

◈ Reward
None

◈ Form
Available once.

◈ NPC
General Sonhyeonbr>
◈ Monster
Captain of army / Surgeon of army.

◈ Scenario

Welcome.
By the mandate of Imperial Majesty, the imperial army is seeking people with the power to fight against transcendental beings that threaten this world.
For thoes who have passed the test, we are telling them the way to make the drug stronger.
This test also need to pass the test hold by the imperial army. Would you be interested?
I think you would be able to pass the test.
At the fighting place, there should be one captain and a soldier who tries to bother you. If you use the Terminate Trap, it would help you a lot.
Good luck then.

desc1.notice: Kill Army Chieftain or Survive for 10 Mins

desc.notice:
◈ Task
Defeat 400 Wild Temple Lions

◈ Reward
EXP 1,985,813 / Skill Points 838 /
Gold 35,280

◈ Format
Unlimited Repeats

◈ NPC
Lost Soldier Chrom

◈ Monsters
Wild Temple Lion

◈ Scenario
How have you been, friend? Now that you're here, give me a hand, would you? Lately, large and aggressive lions have appeared. They tear to shreds anyone who would dare stand in their way. Those huge claws… If you could slay some of them, it would be of tremendous help to us. What do you say?

◈ Mission
Deliver Piece of Spirit to General Ratchel

◈ Reward
None

◈ Form
Available once

◈ NPC
Constantinople General Ratchel / Sunset Witch

◈ Monster
None

◈ Scenario
There is nothing I can do for you now.
You have the Piece of Spirit. Now take it to General Rachel.
I hope this would worth all your hard work.
May the blessings of the light be with you always.

desc1.notice: Deliver Piece of Spirit to Ratchel

desc.notice:
◈ Task
Deliver Lake Jewels

◈ Reward
EXP 41456232 / Skill Points 806 /
GOLD 47050

◈ Format
One-time quest

◈ NPC
Farm Keeper Jyamilrun / Fruit Trader Syukri

◈ Monster
None

◈ Scenario
Thank you for collecting the Lake Jewels for me before. But, could I be so bold as to ask you for one more favor? Please deliver the Lake Jewels to Fruit Trader Syukri in Baghdad.

◈ Task
Collect 38 Hunter Accessories

◈ Reward
EXP 30,756 /
Soldier's Tokens 5

◈ Format
One-time quest

◈ NPC
Outpost Guard Juana

◈ Monster
Evil Order Hunter

◈ Scenario
Evil Order Hunters are terrible murderers. The number of those who were brutally murdered by them cannot even be counted. On the likes of them, accessories are excessive luxury. Before they make themselves look pretty, they must first learn what fear is. Please, help me.

◈ Objective
Deliver Specialty Goods Level 15 (China)

◈ Reward
24,300 Job EXP (-50% in Safe Mode)

◈ Format
One-time Quest

◈ NPC
Trader Yusun / Trader Sunwha

◈ Monster
None

◈ Scenario
We have an order for specialty goods to be delivered. You need to deliver specialty goods to Trader Sunwha in Donwhang. Specialty goods delivery assignments are worth more Job EXP than trade goods collection assignments. It would do you well to undertake some of these.

◈ Task
Hunt 100 Flame Masters

◈ Rewards
EXP 150,000 / Skill EXP 12,500

◈ Format
One-time quest

◈ NPC
Hunter Associate Ahmok

◈ Monsters
Flame Master (The Burning Abyss level 81~90)

◈ How to Teleport
You can teleport to the Forgotten World by using a Dimension Hole.
You can obtain Dimension Holes from the monster that appears from the Dimension Pillars.

◈ Scenario
Our next target is the Flame Masters. These are monsters apt at handling fire. If we take them out, we will have significantly reduced the military strength at the Flame Mountain. We're counting on you this time, too.

◈ Task
Visit a Guild Manager

◈ Reward
10 Soldier's Tokens

◈ Format
One-time task

◈ NPC
Potion Merchants / Guild Manager from each town

◈ Scenario
Congratulations on reaching level 30.
Be informed about guilds, complete the task and be rewarded.
A guild refers to a player-to-player systematic group community. With all the perils on the Silk Road which pose challenge to survival, it is more advantageous to join a guild.
You can either join a guild established by someone else or create your own.
You can establish a guild when you have reached level 20 and paid the fee to a Guild Manager.
Visit a Guild Manager, be informed about guilds, and then visit Potion Merchants in each town.
There is one Guild Manager in each town. You may visit any one of them.

◈ Mission
Eliminate 20 Thieves at Level 105 and higher in the Shrine.

◈ Reward
EXP 1082584 / Skill Points 700 / Gold 4900 / AP 500

◈ Type

Did you see Homeless Genie around here? He has been locked in the lamp for long dreaming for freedom. Something absurd happens to him. Genie was stolen lamp while he granted anyone's wishes. The lamp is like life to Genie.. If you're not too busy, will you search for the lamp for Genie?

Something must be happening at the Temple of Jupiter. We took note of the fact that statues are situated with Jupiter at the center and that those statues are similar to those at the Temple of Jupiter. Since then, we have dispatched a team of investigators. Not one of them has yet to return. Please investigate the Temple of Jupiter on my behalf. Once you arrive at the Temple, you will see a soldier waiting for you. He will assist you.

The last batch of samples has proved me that those monsters are definitely being controlled by force. I will need more samples, however, to locate Mentuhotep. Please bring me 50 Aknish Samples, 50 Sand Sting Samples, and 50 Evil Bug Samples.

A member of the Hunter Union brought me this ring from a mission to subjugate Cruel Raiders in Delta. I found that the words "Potion Trader Titi" were engraved on the ring. I assume that she must be the ring's owner. If you are heading to the shop district, would you deliver this to Ms. Titi?

QNO_SD_RE_002.quest_name: Memory of Love with My Husband (1)

desc.notice:
◈ Mission
Eliminate 50 Unegs and 50 Sand Raiders.

◈ Reward
EXP 18676935 / Skill Points 2100 / Gold 4681

◈ Type
1 Time Only

◈ NPC
Finance Officer Maneto / Finance Officer Maneto

◈ Monster
Uneg / Sand Raider

◈ Scenario
If I can't change my father's mind, there's only one thing I can do: I have to stop the ritual. Will you help me? Please hunt 50 Unegs and 50 Sand Raiders in Delta. If they aren't around, my father won't be able to arrange the tools he needs for the ritual.

◈ Mission
Collect 100 Melit's Boxes.

◈ Reward
EXP 9907180 / Skill Points 1300 / Gold 4768

◈ Type
1 Time Only

◈ NPC
Grocery Trader Melit / Grocery Trader Melit

◈ Monster
Tenen / Wind Spider / Dark Scout

◈ Scenario
A while ago, a trading company was ambushed by an army of monsters in the desert while transporting their goods. They've been robbed most of their goods, including my supplies. I'm afraid Ms. Snefru's novels are among the goods that were stolen. If you don't mind my asking, would you retrieve 100 boxes from Tenens, Wind Spiders, and Dark Scouts?

◈ Task
Defeat 326 Death Karras

◈ Reward
EXP 5504990 / Skill Points 721


◈ Format
Repeatable (x3)

◈ NPC
Outpost Commander Ru Long Hu

◈ Monster
Death Karra

◈ Scenario
Rumor has it that Death Karras of the Anahita River were once the guardians of the ancient Tree of Eternity. These guardians have now become monsters and are threatening human life. How ironic. Still, no matter what the past may hold, human life is threatened in the present. We must stop Death Karras. Slay these ancient guardians for us.

QNO_N_KT_067.quest_name: Things that should have disappeared in the ancient.

desc.notice:
◈ Task
Speak with the Goods Supplier in China, Donwhang, or Hotan.

◈ Reward
5th Grade Seal Armor Set (Select One Set)


◈ Format
One-time quest

◈ NPC
Goods Supplier in China, Donwhang, or Hotan.

◈ Scenario
You have reached level 32 already! I have prepared new armor for you so, please, come see me in town.

◈ Task
Collect 185 Mujigi's Teeth

◈ Reward
EXP 496379 /
General's Tokens 10

◈ Format
Repeatable (x2)

◈ NPC
Outpost Guard Rabbath

◈ Monster
Mujigi

◈ Scenario
The leaders of the monkey monsters, Mujigis, are becoming more violent everyday. We will need to teach them a harsh lesson. Please, rip out their teeth for us.

◈ Mission
Making a normal stone tablet

◈ Reward
Experience 4173000 / Skill Exp 24000

◈ Form
Available Once

◈ NPC
Exorcist Miaoryeong

◈ Monster
General Hyun/ General Bi/ General Ho/ General Jin

◈ Scenario
Demonic power has deeply penetrated the tablets you brought me. Each tablet has a small demonic power but putting them together amplified it. That's probably why the tablets lost their original power and the writing became invisible..
To make the writing visible again, more powerful energy must be instilled into it, but that's not that easy.
The power strong enough to dissipate the demonic power tainting the stone tablets you brought me belongs to the golem generals in the Qin-Shi Tomb. Defeating Tomb generals Hyun, Bi, Ho, and Jin, and absorbing their powers into the tablets should do the trick. They might still contain some impure energies, though. So bring them to me afterwards and I will get rid of them for you.
Tomb generals wander all over the Qin-Shi Tomb, so it will take you a long time to track them down. Your best bet is to lure them out.
All of the Tomb generals are missing their heads. Why? Because some spellcasters took their heads to supply their weaker abilities. So the Tomb generals wander all over the Tomb looking for their heads. I'll make you a fake head of Hyun. Take it and use it near the statue in the middle of the 1st basement-level.
I've heard that General Hyun wanders around the 1st level of the Tomb so he should show up thinking that this is his own head.
Also, the four generals have their energies bound to one another, so when you defeat General Hyun, General Bi will notice that something has occurred to Hyun and show up to you. Don’t be surprised and just defeat him. You should be able to summon General Ho and Jin in the same way. Once you defeat all four of them, the tablets should have turned normal. Here, I'll give you the tablets and the fake head of Hyun, now go. Be careful down there.

1) Can only be performed in a party with Exp. Auto Share/Item Auto Share
2) Teleport allowed with players performing, or have completed, the Secret Martial Arts Book 4 quest
3) Only the party leader may use Fake Head of Hyun
4) Even after the player’s death, defeating General Hyun, General Bi, General Ho and General Jin completes quest objectives
5) Cannot teleport Once trade transportation has been summoned

◈ Objective
Collect 500 units of Blue Porcelain

◈ Reward
8,320 Job EXP / item (10% bonus when quota filled) -50% in Safe Mode

◈ Format
Unlimited Repeatable

◈ NPC
Smuggler Isutade

◈ Monster
Monsters Lv 90-99

◈ Scenario
You need to work ceaselessly to increase your Job level. If you are ready, bring me 500 units of Blue Porcelain. You should be able to find Blue Porcelain as you hunt monsters at level 90-99. If you run out of time and don't find enough Blue Porcelain, don't worry. Even if you don't have all 500 units, I will pay you for what you have. But don't forget that you have to bring all 500 units to gain greater Job EXP.

◈ Task
Obtain 40 Spell Dust

◈ Rewards
EXP 37,600 / Skill EXP 2,000

◈ Format
Repeatable quest (Restricted to once per day)

◈ NPC
Potion Merchant Manina

◈ Monsters
Togui Sorcerer (The Phantom of the Crimson Blood level 35~50)

◈ How to Teleport
You can teleport to the Forgotten World by using a Dimension Hole.
You can obtain Dimension Holes from the monster that appears from the Dimension Pillars.

◈ Scenario
Togui Sorcerers use dust for their spells. If we can but analyze the dust, we might be able to create herbs that can withstand their spells. The town will become peaceful and I will become renowned. This is a win-win situation. Now, hurry on and bring me Spell Dust from Togui Sorcerers.

◈ Task
Collect 14 Water Ghost Claws

◈ Reward
EXP 1,763 /
Monk's Tokens 5

◈ Format
One-time quest

◈ NPC
Outpost Guard Wei Yen

◈ Monster
Water Ghost Slave, Water Ghost

◈ Scenario
Water Ghost Slaves and Water Ghosts at the swamp are very ferocious creatures. It gives me the creeps just thinking about their ugly faces. Ugh! I would fear them a whole lot less, too, if only someone were to remove their sharp claws.

◈ Task
Deliver Confined Souls to Miaoryeong

◈ Rewards
EXP 8,420 / Skill EXP 500

◈ Format
One-time quest

◈ NPC
Hunter Associate Ahmok / Exorcist Miaoryeong

◈ Monsters
None

◈ Scenario
It looks like we will need Miaoryeong's assistance once more. Bring the Confined Souls to her and ask for her advice. She, of all people, should know how to liberate these souls.

◈ Mission
Collect 100 Sharp Tentacles

◈ Reward
Experience 5533400

◈ Form
Available 3 times

◈ NPC
Arch-General Sonhyeon

◈ Monster
Tomb Snake Worker / Tomb Snake Master

◈ Scenario
According to Kushan the Monk, the people have turned insane because they could not prevail against the dark powers of some demon in the Qin-Shi Tomb. In order to cure it, a medicine has to be made by taking sharp tentacles and making it absorb the power of Buddha by lighting the incense.
We need to find sharp tentacles to cure the people affected by the dark energy of the Qin-Shi Tomb and find out what is the source of this dark power. Will you help us?
It seems that you can obtain Sharp Tentacles from Tomb Snake Worker or Tomb Snake Master on the 4th level of the Qin-Shi Tomb. Now, please bring me 100 Sharp Tentacles.

◈ Mission
Speak to Weapon Trader Chunmoo.

◈ Reward
EXP 6275059 / Skill Points 1600 / Gold 2559

◈ Type
1 Time Only

◈ NPC
Potion Trader Thiara / Weapon Trader Chunmoo

◈ Monster
N/A

◈ Scenario
Something's fishy... Something's not right about my boyfriend. Oh, I'm talking about Weapon Trader Chunmoo. He's been acting strange lately. I get the feeling that maybe he's cheating on me. I hope I'm wrong. Would you go find out what he's been doing? Don't hesitate to tell me if you learn something strange about him. Okay?

◈ Task
Obtain 100 Proof of Hunting Toguis

◈ Rewards
EXP 250,000 / Skill EXP 15,000

◈ Format
Repeatable quest (Restricted to once per day)

◈ NPC
Soldier Tuolan

◈ Monsters
Monsters from the Phantom of the Crimson Blood level 61~70 dungeon (Except Envy and Treasure Box)

◈ How to Teleport
You can teleport to the Forgotten World by using a Dimension Hole.
You can obtain Dimension Holes from the monster that appears from the Dimension Pillars.

◈ Scenario
We seek those who will hunt the Toguis that have emerged from the Forgotten World. If you count yourself worthy, give it a try!

◈ Task
Speak with Outpost Commander Bai Qi Long

◈ Reward
Skill Points 11


◈ Format
One-time quest

◈ NPC
Outpost Commander Guo Mu Hu / Outpost Commander Bai Qi Long

◈ Monster
None

◈ Scenario
Earth Ghosts are the most dominant force in this region by far. Of these monsters, Earth Taoists pose a great threat. They possess intelligence and, because of that, they can use highly dangerous magic. It is possible that the tree-controlling talismans in Jangan is one of their device. What drove these wicked demons to form an alliance with Bandits? It just may be time for you to move on from here and face new enemies.

desc1.notice: Speak with Outpost Commander Bai Qi Long

Thank you for getting me the Serpent's Venom last time. But there has been an increase in the number of casualties again. Everyone says it's the doing of Hell Enchantresses. Many couldn't bring themselves to even swing their sword at them. What kind of creatures are these? Warrior, won't you take care of them for us?

Outpost Guard Ji He Long

Blind Mole

◈ Scenario
Blind Moles in Donwhang are tunnel-creating monsters. I'm told that Earth Ghosts have enslaved these creatures. I would give my arm to be able to see them in action in person, but, if I ever set my foot in the Donwhang Stone Cave, I will just be murdered before I get to see the Blind Moles. So, I was thinking... Would you mind slaying these Blind Moles and bring me their tunnel-making claws for me?

Sopdu / Blood Khepri

I'll help any union to consolidate their dominance of the Shrine, but only if they complete my mission: eliminate 100 Sopdus and 100 Blood Khepris.

QNO_SD_GU_023.quest_name: Hunting in the Middle of the Temple Dispute 4 (Trader)

desc.notice:

Eliminate 2 Togui Generals

◈ Rewards
EXP 42,000 / Skill EXP 2,500

◈ Format
Repeatable quest (Restricted to once per day)

◈ NPC
Soldier Wulan

◈ Monsters
Togui General (The Phantom of the Crimson Blood level 61~70)

◈ How to Teleport
You can teleport to the Forgotten World by using a Dimension Hole.
You can obtain Dimension Holes from the monster that appears from the Dimension Pillars.

◈ Scenario
Togui Generals lead Toguis. Towns ruined. I want to kill all. I sick. Very sick. No sick, Toguis dead by me.

QNO_FW_RB2_010.quest_name: If It Weren't for This Sickness…

desc.notice:
◈ Mission
Collect 100 Devil Worm Powders.

◈ Reward
EXP 12550119 / Skill Points 2100 / Gold 5118

◈ Type
1 Time Only

◈ NPC
Potion Trader Thiara / Potion Trader Thiara

◈ Monster
Devil Worm

◈ Scenario
Oh, my god! What have I done to my beloved Chunmoo?! It was just a simple delivery mistake! No, this is not the time to blame myself. I need to gather the ingredients for the antidote! Please go bring me 100 Devil Worm Powders from the Storm and Cloud Desert. Now!

◈ Task
Defeat 21 Bartises and 25 Misos Barois

◈ Reward
EXP 7,473 / Skill Points 8


◈ Format
One-time quest

◈ NPC
Outpost Commander Amanda

◈ Monster
Bartis, Misos Baroi

◈ Scenario
When I first came here, I didn't think that I would be fighting so fiercely against the Barbaroi. If only we hadn't invaded their territory, nothing would have happened. Then, one day, they began a crazed rampage, and we ended up fighting these nasty madmen. I don't know how long we will last, though... Will you lend us a helping hand?

◈ Mission
Talk to Sunset Witch

◈ Reward
None

◈ Form
Available once

◈ NPC
Constantinople General Rachel / Sunset Witch

◈ Monster
None

◈ Scenario
Since the imperial army learned the formula for the Ultra-Berserk pills from the evil band, we began researching Ultra-Berserk under the command of His Imperial Majesty.
The research was no easy task so we cooperated with other nations. Finally we discovered the formula for the pill that would increase the Ultra-Berserk powers.
We have decided that such difficult times as these is the right time to disclose about these pills and increase our military might. So, those who have gained the Ultra-Berserk ability would be allowed to take the test hold by imperial army, and we would make the pills to those who pass the test.
You have passed the test and are certainly qualified.
The formula for the pill is managed strictly within the army. If you want to get one, you will have to bring us the ingredients.
What we need is the Nether Piece of Spirit. Go ask Sunset Witch how to get one and she will help you.

◈ Task
Deliver Rotten Tree Bark

◈ Reward
EXP 940 /
Monk's Tokens 4

◈ Format
One-time quest

◈ NPC
Outpost Guard Dan Xie / Storage-Keeper Wangu

◈ Monster
None

◈ Scenario
Storage-Keeper Wangu in Jangan is asking for the Rotten Tree Bark. I can't see where he would use such ominous things that fell off of demons' bodies. Oh, well... I was going to burn them, anyway, so I could see how it would be better to give them away if someone needs it. If you have some time to spare, could I ask you to deliver it for me?

◈ Mission
Hunt 100 Tomb Snake Workers / 100 Tomb Snake Masters / 200 Tomb Snake Lords

◈ Reward
Experience 5863400

◈ Form
Available 3 times

◈ NPC
Arch-General Sonhyeon

◈ Monster
Tomb Snake Worker / Tomb Snake Master / Tomb Snake Lord

◈ Scenario
We continue to receive reports from the imperial military that innocent citizens are getting hurt by those who are affected by the dark energy on the travel to the Qin-Shi Tomb. It seems that distributing medicines to the affected will not be sufficient to solve the problem, so we are trying to get rid of the root.
When we are curing the affected and inquiring them from the source of the dark energy, we have found out that those who fail to resist the powerful energy exuded by Tomb Snake Worker, Tomb Snake Master, and Tomb Snake Lord, become disturbed in their hearts, eventually getting affected by the darkness without even realizing it. Now, we seek to annihilate the Tomb Snakes so that this will not happen anymore. We need lots of help. Will join us against the Tomb Snakes?
Go hunt down 100 Tomb Snake Worker's, 100 Tomb Snake Master's, and 200 Tomb Snake Lord's. Then come and see me.

◈ Mission
Speak with Kushan

◈ Reward
Experience 4016100

◈ Form
Available Once

◈ NPC
Arch-General Sonhyeon / Kushan the Indian Monk

◈ Monster
None

◈ Scenario
Because of the rumors of hidden treasure in the Qin-Shi Tomb, many people go deep into the Tomb blinded by greed, only to return insane. They don't stop at simply going insane but attack civilians and do other kinds of violent acts. This is becoming a big problem nowadays. So, I am trying to turn them back to normal and find out what drove them insane.
The imperial military is busy enough to eliminate monsters so there isn't anyone in particular who can be trusted with this task. Would you like to help us out?
I asked Yangyun the herbalist what drove these travelers insane. He said he doesn't know and recommended me to ask Kushan, a monk with the great power, for help.
Go speak to Kushan and find out a way to turn these insane people back to normal.

◈ Objective
Deliver Specialty Goods Level 15 (Europe)

◈ Reward
24,300 Job EXP (-50% in Safe Mode)

◈ Format
One-time Quest

◈ NPC
Trader Anna / Trader Samanda

◈ Monster
None

◈ Scenario
We have an order for specialty goods to be delivered. You need to deliver specialty goods to Trader Samanda in Samarkand. Specialty goods delivery assignments are worth more Job EXP than trade goods collection assignments. It would do you well to undertake some of these.

◈ Task
Collect 40 Bandit's Arrows

◈ Reward
EXP 8,611 /
Monk's Tokens 5

◈ Format
One-time quest

◈ NPC
Outpost Guard Qin Jia Qong

◈ Monster
Bandit subordinate, Bandit archer

◈ Scenario
Have you heard? They say everyone is having a financial crisis. The Hunter Association in Jangan is also penny-pinching and can't even supply weapons. So, I started thinking... What if we seized the weapons of the Bandits? We benefit from the decreasing number of Bandits, and merchants benefit from the supply of weapons. It's a win-win situation, you see. Of course..., that does require slaying plenty of Bandits...

◈ Mission
Deliver Leebaek's Letter to Mamoje

◈ Reward
Experience 4660100

◈ Form
Available Once

◈ NPC
Leebaek the Guild Manager of Jangan
/Mamoje the Jeweler

◈ Monster
None

◈ Scenario
ShinMoo is someone I used to know. I will get him to cooperate with you so that you can meet the white viper.
But there is one problem.
In order to open the secret door, we need a gem called the Tear of Tomb Snake, but I used the last one when I opened the door for you last time.
We need more Tears of Tomb Snake. Won't you grab me some Ashen Gems from Mamoje in Hotan so that we can make more of those Tears? Show him my letter and he'll give you the gems.

desc1.notice: Deliver Leebaek’s Letter to Ma Mu Di

desc.notice:

Gold 32,165

◈ Format
Unlimited Repeats

◈ NPC
Lost Soldier Fernando

◈ Monsters
Mutant Baal's Guides

◈ Scenario
Mutant Baal's Guides are still pestering me. Where are they coming from? They just keep pestering me and I can't handle all of them. Will you lend me a hand?

Soldier's Tokens 5

One-time quest

◈ NPC

Small Red Scorpion

◈ Scenario
Look at my leg! See this wound here? I couldn't bear the commander's nagging anymore, so I went out to hunt Small Red Scorpions and got wounded. If I hadn't treated it right away with an antidote, the poison would have spread throughout my body and I would have died. Those cursed monsters... I've had it! I can't just let this one go. Please, help me out.

GOLD 4850

Repeatable (unlimited)

◈ NPC

In return for showing you the future of Baghdad, there is something I would like you to do for me. It is nothing difficult. Just collect the things I need for me.

One-time quest

◈ NPC
Outpost Commander Amanda

◈ Monster
Brontes, Polipemos

◈ Scenario
Something is odd about the giants. Unless the Barbaroi are absolutely crazy, how could they dare attack us all by themselves? There must be something or someone behind it all. If the giants are using the Barbaroi to some unknown end, it leaves us with two choices: we either figure out what their schemes are, or we kill them all.

◈ NPC
Outpost Commander Mu Qi Yong

◈ Scenario
On this frigid snowfield, there live elephant-like demons called Yetis and Evil Yetis. They hate invaders in their territory more than anything, and we must be like a thorn in their side. We must destroy them before they begin attacking our outpost. Please, give us a hand.

You know that everyone is on alert because of the Black Robbers, right? So I thought of a great idea. If we can slay Black Robber Bowmen and seize their bows, their number will be reduced significantly. What? Who's going to seize the bows? Ha ha! There's no way I can do it. You have to help us.

If you manage to slay Babilion, please bring me the Source of Evil. He lusted after Baal's powers, and we need to research it. It has not been absorbed into Babilion's body completely just yet, so you should be able to acquire it if you slay Babilion. Will you bring us the Source of Evil?

If you run out of time and don't find enough Wine, don't worry. Even if you don't have all 150 units, I will pay you for what you have. But don't forget that you have to bring all 150 units to gain greater Job EXP.

◈ Reward

Soldier's Tokens 4

◈ Format

My friend and comrade, Manho, asked me a while ago if I could spare some of the teeth we got from defeating the Earth Ghosts. I couldn't say no to a friend's request, so I did put some aside secretly. But I'm too busy with my duties and have no time to travel to Donwhang. Will you deliver Earth Ghost Teeth to Manho in my place?

The Ghost Wrecks at the Shipwreck in the Forgotten World are monsters created when various vindictive spirits merged together. Of the soul fragments on their body, I hear that there is a piece that contains a powerful curse. The power of the curse is so potent that it has the ability to neutralize other curses. Will you bring me the Souls of Curses?

2

Mysterious cacti live in this desert. I don't know how the thieves managed to train them, but they were trained to defeat intruders in the desert. If we waste time slaying these monsters, it will interfere with our work. Would you help me?

Have you heard of the Ghost Beasts of the Forgotten World? I have heard that they look like very small children. But don't let their looks fool you - contrary to their small size, they are extremely vicious.

Specialty Trader Jodaesan in Jangan is interested in the Stone Ghost Fragments. People like us wouldn't even know what to do with them, but I suppose traders have eyes for such things. If you happen to be on your way to Jangan, would you take these Stone Ghost Fragments to Specialty Trader Jodaesan in Jangan? He will compensate you for your effort.

◈ Task
Obtain 50 Fragments of Togui's Knife

◈ Rewards
EXP 113,000 / Skill EXP 7,000

◈ Format
Repeatable quest (Restricted to once per day)

◈ NPC
Soldier Duyun

◈ Monsters
Togui (The Phantom of the Crimson Blood level 35~50)

◈ How to Teleport
You can teleport to the Forgotten World by using a Dimension Hole.
You can obtain Dimension Holes from the monster that appears from the Dimension Pillars.

◈ Scenario
I'm in trouble. My fellow soldiers were teasing me saying that I have no guts. In the heat of the moment, I told them that I would hunt Toguis of the Forgotten World. My stupid mouth… I have to bring them Fragments of Togui's Knife as the proof of hunting them, but I have yet to get one. Oh, how did I come to make such a wager? I really need some help.

◈ Mission
Collect 125 Tomb Beetle Wings

◈ Reward
Experience 5133400 / GOLD 130000 / Skill Exp 12,500

◈ Form
Available 3 times

◈ NPC
Yangyun, the herbalist of Jangan

◈ Monster
Tomb Beetle

◈ Scenario
With the Tomb Bug Legs you have gathered for me, I was able to get the powers of lightning. But now I ran into another problem.
The power of lightning extracted from the Tomb Bug Legs is too powerful to be used in my medicine. It is just one trouble after another. I was not expecting this sort of a problem. I researched again and sought a way to weaken the power of lightning. I heard that the Tomb Beetles Wings contain elements that would weaken the lightning power. Would you gather those wings for me?
Please go hunt down monsters called Tomb Beetles deep inside the Qin-Shi Tomb and bring me 125 of those Tomb Beetle Wings.

◈ Scenario
Congratulations! You have reached level 52!
I've been hearing about your accomplishments in town lately. I have prepared a gift for you so, please, come see me in town.

◈ Mission

◈ Reward
5 Potions of Recovery

◈ Form
Unlimited attempts

◈ NPC
Villager Salrihan.

◈ Monster
None

◈ Scenario
It has been a long time since we are under the Roc clan's rule.
But because of people like you who seek to defeat Roc, we are not giving up the hope of freedom
We prepared some supplies for your battles to thank all your hard work.
Although we can't fight on the frontline with you, we would like to help in your battles by providing some things that you would need.
If you bring us 7 Marks of Alliance(Recovery), I will exchange those into the Potions of Recovery which allows you to instally recover 100% of your HP and MP.
If you would like different rewards, you can go visit Anashya or the Chief of village Bukhra in the Wind Town.
Just so you know, you will need 10 Marks of Alliance(Will) for Anachya, or 15 marks of Alliance(Resurrection) for Bukhra to receive your reward.

The influence from a powerful being may be behind the havoc wreaked by the evil spirits. This is just my hypothesis, though… I should be able to find out if we gather some data. Will you bring me the Fragments of the Vindictive Spirit carried by the rampaging monsters?

Do you know of Karakoram? It is a frightening place of everlasting winter, ruled by Isyutaru. We have received reports of suspicious movements among the demons there. Hotan Outpost 3 is requesting reinforcements, but, as you can see, we have our plates full just by dealing with the demonic creatures around the kingdom. Would you care to assist Hotan Outpost 3?

◈ Scenario
The Bandits are a blight upon this forest. Not only do they rob and pillage, they are now using shoddy talismans to control tree demons. However, we have no conclusive proof that they are the ones behind the tree demons. If they really are controlling these tree demons, they are sure to have the talismans in their possession. Will you retrieve them for us?

Available once

◈ Scenario
Now since all the ingredients are gathered, we are ready to summon a soul.
Do you want to summon one?
To obtain fragments from the summoned soul, you have to be in the Berserk mode.
When the powers of the souls collide, you can damage the soul and get the fragment at that time.
Don't forget this
Take this charm because you would need this to see the soul.

Uneg

◈ Scenario
A Deity is a warrior who transcends the limits of an ordinary human. If you're interested in becoming a Deity, then we can provide you with some Spartan training. Let's warm up first, shall we? Now go hunt 300 Unegs.

Available Once

Feather Mask

◈ Scenario
Oh, it is you. Thanks to you for getting the sacks back for us last time. We were able to live the past year without any worries.
But it seems that the Feathers suffered a great loss when you retrieved the sacks.
Now the angry Feathers frequently cause havoc near the town.
Would you strike the Feathers first? I believe you are strong enough for the job.
Hunt 500 Feather Masks for us. Feather Cloaks don’t bother us, so it doesn't matter if you hunt them or not.

Soldier's Tokens 4

One-time quest

◈ NPC

None

◈ Scenario
We recently received a request from the Hunter Association for the swords we have seized from Hyungno Ghosts before. I have heard that they are struggling with a financial crisis, but I find it difficult to believe that they would want such old weapons. That concerns me. Well, I suppose I should keep my nose out of the client's situation. Will you take on this task?

◈ Mission

◈ Reward
EXP 9463753 / Skill Points 1150 / Gold 50312

◈ Type
Repeatable

◈ NPC

Sylaken

◈ Scenario
Prove to me that you're capable of becoming a true Deity by hunting 1000 Sylakens.

◈ Form

◈ NPC
