◈ Monster
None

◈ Scenario
I have completely purified the normal stone tablets that have absorbed the powers of the Tomb generals. Now there should be no more vanishing of the writings. Bring to Gwakwi now, would you?
Be careful with those. You don't want to break them or anything after all that hard work.

desc1.notice: Deliver the Purified Stone Tablet to Gwakwi

desc.notice:
◈ Mission
Conversation with Exorcist Miaoryeong

◈ Reward
Experience 2594000

◈ Form
Available Once

◈ NPC
Jangan Merchant Associate Hwajung/ Exorcist Miaoryeong

◈ Monster
None

◈ Scenario
What shall I do!!
A thief broke into the Merchants Guild. I would not be this desperate if it had been expensive goods or money that the thief had stolen. What the thief stole is the ledger that contains all of the merchants information.
If that document is circulated among the bandits, merchants will fall into a great peril and they will eventually stop coming to Jangan to trade. I have called for help from the Hunters Association, but this is so urgent that I will have to hire extra hands to retrieve that ledger. You seem pretty strong yourself. Could you help me? I will give you a great reward if you bring back the ledger to me.
First, we need to discover the whereabouts of the thief. The Hunters Association is already tracking him within Jangan. Since the Jangan is covered, go speak to Miaoryeong outside of town and ask her if she has seen any suspicious characters.

desc1.notice: Speak with Miaoryeong  the Witch Dancer

EXP 4809311 / Skill Points 700 / Gold 2362

1 Time Only

◈ NPC

◈ Monster
N/A

◈ Scenario
The accessory chest is done. I guess this chest full of Gold Article should be enough to pay my taxes, but I'm afraid it's too heavy for me to carry to Officer Maneto.
I'm sorry to ask you again, but would you deliver this accessory chest to Finance Officer Maneto?

◈ Mission

◈ Reward

◈ Type
1 Time Only

◈ NPC
Doctor Renenutet / Doctor Renenutet

◈ Monster
Lightning Khepri / Demon Bug

◈ Scenario
Our ancestors were more knowledgeable than I thought when it came to methods of spirit sealing. We can attain greater power if we find a higher method for sealing the dead. Please bring me 100 High Insect Ostracons from the High Pharaoh's Tomb. You can get them by hunting Lightning Khepris and Demon Bugs.

◈ Mission
Collect 3 Roc's Claws

◈ Reward
1 Alchemy Stone of Sharp (10th grade)

◈ Form
Unlimited attempts

◈ NPC
Hotan blacksmith Soboy

◈ Monster
Roc the Monster Bird

◈ Scenario
Wow! Isn't it the Roc's Claw that you are holding there?
I did hear about a group will leave to hunt Roc the Monster bird on the Roc Mountain a while ago, but I never thought I would run into someone with Roc's loot like this.
Moreover, I can't believe that I am seeing the Roc's claw with so many Blood of Life.
I've never seen such a sharp and strong claw before.
Hey, Do you want to give this to me? I think I can make very strong weapon with this claw.
Of course I will pay you good enough to make you not worry.
But a single claw probably won't be enough to make the weapons. I will need at least 3 of them to make proper weapons.
If you bring me 3 Roc's Claws and I will give you the reward as I promised.

1 Time Only

We have received terrible news. The Barbaroi are planning to attack this outpost with Dow Genemas and Kikopeses. I don't know what these war-crazy barbarians are thinking, but we must stop them from carrying out the plan. We need your help.

This time, we need Neith's heart. Please bring this Seal Crystal and defeat Neith in the Shrine.

EXP 18,852 /
Monk's Tokens 5

◈ Format
One-time quest

◈ NPC
Outpost Guard Chase

◈ Monster
Aduna Ladon, Simos Ladon

◈ Scenario
Do you know of the Aduna Ladons and Simos Ladons that lurk in the Forest of Dusk? It used to be such a beautiful forest. Now, it's a place of terror because of them. What's even worse are the sounds of their wings, flapping on and on. Whenever we hear that terrible noise, it makes my heart jump. You look like a competent fellow. How about you go and silence those wings?

◈ Mission
Talk to Sunset Witch

◈ Reward
None

◈ Form
Available once

◈ NPC
Constantinople General Ratchel/ Sunset Witch

◈ Monster
None

◈ Scenario
To respond to the threat of transcendental beings, the army has signed a close alliance treaty with the Chinese imperial army.
As a result, we have received the formula for a certain pill that contains incredible powers to boost the Berserk ability.
The army has decided to select those who are not controlled by private greed and disclose the existence of such pills.
Since we know the formula, if you bring the ingrediets of the pill, we will make it for you.
The ingredient needed for the pills is Piece of Spirits.
Since it is impossible for an ordinary human to come in contact with a soul, you should go to the Sunset Witch, who has extraordinary abilities, and ask her for help.

◈ Task
Speak with Outpost Commander Albert

◈ Reward
Skill Points 2


◈ Format
One-time quest

◈ NPC
Sunset Witch / Outpost Commander Albert

◈ Monster
None

◈ Scenario
Many letters are badly damaged and the document cannot be deciphered perfectly, but, seeing from what can be deciphered, I see that this is an order for the Barbaroi. It says some kind of an experiment will take place in Eastern Europe. Who could possibly order around those untamable Barbaroi? The word "experiment" is unnerving, and so is the hidden identity of those who are behind the Barbaroi.

◈ Task
Deliver Kristen's Report to Lost Investigator Captain Aaliyah

◈ Reward
EXP 2,734,354 / Skill Points 5,488 /
Gold 100,000

◈ Format
One-time quest

◈ NPC
Lost Investigator Kristen / Lost Investigator Captain Aaliyah

◈ Monsters
None

◈ Scenario
Adventurer, will you deliver this report to Captain Aaliyah? It is filled with my outstanding observation and analysis skills. I have no doubt that it will shed some light on the cause of the phenomena in this Temple. The Captain must be somewhere in this Temple. I'm sure she will be so pleased when she sees the report. Tee hee! Do this for me, would you?

◈ Mission
Collect 100 Dark Khepri Grass.

EXP 9618622 / Skill Points 1200 / Gold 4725

◈ Type
1 Time Only

◈ NPC
Stable Master Nefret / Stable Master Nefret

◈ Monster
Dark Khepri

◈ Scenario
I've been worried lately since my horses look so sad and weak. I think I can cheer them up by feeding them something delicious. Speaking of which, would you help me find feed for my horses? These guys love the grasses that Dark Khepris live on. You can find them while hunting Dark Khepris. I won't need more than 100 of those grasses.

◈ Format

Outpost Commander Dao Zhi Fong

Earth Taoist, Earth Magician

◈ Scenario
It is now time to do a full, frontal assault against Earth Ghosts. In order to annihilate them, we have no other way but to target Earth Taoists and Earth Magicians, their de facto leaders. If we can take this opportunity to strike them down, we can frustrate their plans of dominating West China.

7th Grade Seal Armor Set (Select One Set)

Goods Supplier in China, Donwhang, or Hotan.

You have reached level 52 already! I am proud of you for your consistent advancement.
I have prepared powerful armor for you so, please, come see me in town.

◈ Scenario
I can't help it. My father and Mentuhotep are trying to do something so unethical... I couldn't stay engaged with Mentuhotep's daughter. It's against my beliefs. So I told her. Poor Berenice, as soon as I broke off our engagement, she ran outside, bursting into tears. I couldn't stop her, even though I knew dreadful monsters like Tathens would be waiting for her outside the village. Please, I beg you, bring her back safely!

Do you wish to become a Deity? I can help you with that. Please go hunt 800 Blood Hyenas.

EXP 10510528 / Skill Points 1500 / Gold 4856

1 Time Only

◈ NPC
Potion Trader Titi / Potion Trader Titi

Blood Hyena

◈ Scenario
Judging by the symptoms, her horses must be suffering from a rare epidemic that only circulates in the desert. I'm sorry, but I currently have no cure for the disease. Perhaps you can help me to obtain the bodily fluid of Blood Hyenas in the Valley of the Kings. I might be able to use that create a vaccine for the horses. Please bring me 70 Hyena's Bodily Fluids.

General's Tokens 5

None

We were wondering how we were going to ever dispose of the White Spider Silk stored in the warehouse. But Jewel Lapidary Mamoje of Hotan happens to be in need of it. Will you deliver the goods on our behalf?

You can teleport to the Forgotten World by using a Dimension Hole.

◈ Scenario
There are treasures being discovered in the Forgotten World called talismans, and it's got some tongues wagging. I hear anyone who's anyone has set out to find the treasure. Why don't you test your luck at it? Bring me the complete Phantom of the Crimson Blood collection, and I will give you a nice gift.

desc1.notice: Complete the Phantom of the Crimson Blood collection

QNO_FW_RB1_001.quest_name: The Phantom of the Crimson Blood Collection

desc.notice:
◈ Task
Obtain 15 Hairpins of the Witch

◈ Rewards
EXP 575,000 / Skill EXP 1,500

◈ Format
Repeatable quest (Restricted to once per day)

◈ NPC
Merchant Associate Asaman

◈ Monsters
Flame Witch (The Burning Abyss level 71~80)

◈ How to Teleport
You can teleport to the Forgotten World by using a Dimension Hole.
You can obtain Dimension Holes from the monster that appears from the Dimension Pillars.

◈ Scenario
The Flame Witches on the Flame Mountain are notorious for seducing men and then burning them to crisp. From what I hear, this mysterious ability comes from the hairpins they carry. If I have that hairpin, I, too, will be able to hoard all the attention of men. So, will you bring me some of those hairpins?

◈ Task
Deliver Bear Claws

◈ Reward
EXP 2,213 /
Monk's Tokens 4

◈ Format
One-time quest

◈ NPC
Outpost Guard Marcel / Specialty Trader Tina

◈ Monster
None

◈ Scenario
Remember when Lily asked you to get her bear claws before? She's been trying to find accessories that look like those of the Barbaroi. She was reprimanded by the commander, though. Of course, it's unacceptable. We are at war with the Barbaroi. How can she copy the way the enemy dresses? Anyway, we've been having trouble getting rid of the bear claws, but Specialty Trader Tina just happens to be in need of some. I don't know what she'll use them for, but we want to get rid of them soon. Will you help us?

QNO_N_EU_028.quest_name: If product is valuable, it is OK

If you run out of time and don't find enough Western Paintings, don't worry. Even if you don't have all 500 units, I will pay you for what you have. But don't forget that you have to bring all 500 units to gain greater Job EXP.

None

Hmm, yes. I have heard already. We are delivering Ong's Bodily Fluid to Buddhist Priest Bupgong to remove the wicked energy, is that right? All we have to do now is to deliver this Ong's Bodily Fluid to Bupgoing.

EXP 81,848 /
Soldier's Tokens 5

One-time quest

◈ NPC
Outpost Guard Duadi

◈ Monster
Dark Wolf, Evil Wolf

◈ Scenario
Have you heard the news that the Evil Order has unleashed their Dark Wolves and Evil Wolves? They are giving us a lot of grief. We get chased by them everyday. They are no ordinary wolves, either. They have been trained by barbarians, so they are as docile as wild beasts. One of these days, we will be torn to pieces by them. Please, help!

◈ Task

Gold 448,500

◈ Format
One-time quest

You are more skilled than I thought you were. Then let's see if you can pass this next test, shall we? Eliminate Immortal Protection, Immortal Guards, and Immortal Surveillants.

◈ Reward
EXP 1764486 /
General's Tokens 10

◈ Format
Repeatable (x3)

◈ NPC
Outpost Guard Rabbath

◈ Monster
Edimmu

◈ Scenario
I hear that Edimmus are full of sand inside. It is because they devour sand along with humans. Just how many humans have they devoured to be so full of sand like that? We cannot forgive demons that treat humans like their feed. Please, lend us a hand in eradicating them.

GOLD 239000

1

◈ Scenario
Have you seen monsters called Canyon Iblises? They are bug monsters that wander around the canyon. Because of the bugs, our loss is tremendous. Our investigation is also being hindered. We need your help. Would you defeat these Iblises?

GOLD 352450

The kingdom is planning to continuously send troops to return the Arabia Coast to normal. We are defeating the monsters to pave a way for the troops but we are not making progress. If you have the time, can you help us?

1 Time Only

◈ NPC
Potion Trader Thiara / Weapon Trader Chunmoo

◈ Monster
N/A

◈ Scenario
It's done. Now, bring this bracelet to Chunmoo. I hope you'll enjoy what you're about to see.

◈ Reward
EXP 9338467 / Skill Points 1100 / Gold 2340

◈ Type
1 Time Only

◈ NPC
Finance Officer Maneto / Egypt Governor Senmute

◈ Monster
N/A

◈ Scenario
My father and Renetutet are wrong. No ancient god can revitalize Egypt! That's nonsense! I'm not saying that I don't believe in God. I just don't understand why they think something from the past can change the present. We're the only ones that can change the present and future. Please send my letter to my father, Governor Senmute.

GOLD 352450

Mashuudun of Darkness, Kahin of Darkness

◈ Scenario
The kingdom is planning to continuously send troops to return the Arabia Coast to normal. We are defeating the monsters to pave a way for the troops but we are not making progress. If you have the time, can you help us?

Speak with the Goods Supplier in Europe, Samarkand, or Hotan.

1st Grade Seal Armor Set (Select One Set)


◈ Format
One-time quest

◈ NPC
Goods Supplier in Europe, Samarkand, or Hotan

To celebrate your arrival in the world of Silk Road, I have prepared armor that will suit you.
Please come see me in town. I will be waiting for you there.

◈ Task
Defeat 220 Black Scorpions and 240 Scorpions

◈ Reward
EXP 478847 / Skill Points 600


◈ Format
One-time quest

◈ NPC
Outpost Commander Raman

◈ Monster
Black Scorpion, Scorpion

◈ Scenario
The recent rampage of demons and the increase in their numbers must be a prelude to something terrible. I don't know what wicked power is behind all of this... But, at this point, our priority is to prevent the wave of demons from entering the town. Do us a favor and slay Black Scorpions and Scorpions that appear in this region.

◈ Objective
Collect 50 units of Duck Eggs (Europe)

◈ Reward
380 Job EXP / item (10% bonus when quota filled) -50% in Safe Mode

◈ Format
Unlimited Repeatable

◈ NPC
Smuggler Raul

Monsters Lv 10-19

◈ Scenario
You need to work ceaselessly to increase your Job level. If you are ready, bring me 50 units of Duck Eggs. You should be able to find Duck Eggs as you hunt monsters at level 10-19. If you run out of time and don't find enough Duck Eggs, don't worry. Even if you don't have all 50 units, I will pay you for what you have. But don't forget that you have to bring all 50 units to gain greater Job EXP.

◈ Task
Defeat 316 Golden Spiders and 343 White Spiders

◈ Reward
EXP 1661199 / Skill Points 998


◈ Format
Repeatable (x2)

◈ NPC
Outpost Commander Ru Long Hu

◈ Monster
Golden Spider, White Spider

◈ Scenario
Golden Spiders and White Spiders were once common creatures around Hotan. Then, one day, they were affected by some wicked energy and became giant demons, a threat to human life. I suppose along with their general size, their head got big, too. Teach them a harsh lesson, will you?

QNO_N_KT_052.quest_name: Big Blind Moles with no fear

desc.notice:
◈ Task
Deliver Closier's Axes

◈ Reward
EXP 32751 /
Soldier's Tokens 4

◈ Format
One-time quest

◈ NPC
Outpost Volunteer Gemma / Specialty Trader Toson

◈ Monster
None

◈ Scenario
I am Gemma. I am working hard while waiting for the day that I am officially assigned. Today, I am more tired than usual because I have so many chores to do. Traveler! If you don't mind, could I ask you to deliver it for me?

◈ Mission
Collect 50 Fine Sands.

◈ Reward
EXP 11485137 / Skill Points 1800 / Gold 4987

◈ Type
1 Time Only

◈ NPC
Potion Trader Titi / Potion Trader Titi

◈ Monster
Sylakenth

◈ Scenario
This isn't the first time there was a dispute like this between that father and daughter. I'm sure everyone in Alexandria already knows about their history. I'd love to help her, but I'm too busy right now with my own problems. I'm running short on bottles for potions that will have to be shipped out soon. Say, why don't you help me? Please bring me 50 Fine Sands from Sylakenths in the Storm and Cloud Desert. That should help me save some time, and then I'll be able to help Khamererne.

◈ Mission
Speak to Store Keeper Khamererne.

◈ Reward
EXP 5742568 / Skill Points 1300 / Gold2493

◈ Type
1 Time Only

◈ NPC
Weapon Trader Hemaka / Store Keeper Khamererne

◈ Monster
N/A

◈ Scenario
Store Keeper Khamererne is my daughter. She used to be a troublemaker, but I thought she grew out of it ever since she started working as a store keeper. Lately, I've heard a rumor about one of the store keepers in town stealing items from his clients. I'm worried that my daughter might be the culprit. Would you talk to Khamererne and make sure that she's innocent?

◈ Task
Deliver Beads of Cold Energy

◈ Reward
EXP 663493 /
General's Tokens 5

◈ Format
One-time quest

◈ NPC
Outpost Guard Hu Ma Long / Stable-Keeper Salihap

◈ Monster
None

◈ Scenario
We have received an order for the Beads of Cold Energy stored in the warehouse. It's by the Stable-Keeper Salihap in Hotan. If you happen to be on your way, why don't you get this done for us, too?

Collect 200 Big White Spider's Blood

◈ Reward
EXP 1068898 /
General's Tokens 10

◈ Format
Repeatable (x3)

◈ NPC
Outpost Guard Shaha

◈ Monster
Big White Spider

◈ Scenario
Have you seen Big White Spiders? Just hearing the name alone makes me sick to the stomach, but their blood is apparently precious. Such large spiders are as good as mystical creatures and their blood can be used as a cure-all, I hear. That piques my interest. I just may be able to concoct the highest-quality potions. So, I ask of you. Could you get me some Big White Spider's Blood?

◈ Task
Obtain 35 Seiren's Harps

◈ Rewards
EXP 921,000 / SP 100

◈ Format
Repeatable quest (Restricted to once per day)

◈ NPC
Hunter Union President Narmer

◈ Monsters
Seiren (The Sea of Resentment level 101~110)

◈ How to Teleport
You can teleport to the Forgotten World by using a Dimension Hole.
You can obtain Dimension Holes from the monster that appears from the Dimension Pillars.

◈ Scenario
You know about the Forgotten World, don't you? What I want to talk about today is nothing about those boring evil spirits. Seiren's Harp - that's what I want to talk to you about. I hear that the tone of the harp is so beautiful as to enchant people. If I have it, I just might be able to win over Melit. So, bring me some of those, will you? Hmm...? What do you mean 'why'? Did you not hear what I said?

◈ Task
Defeat 30 Barpolles and 37 Dow Genetoses

◈ Reward
EXP 13279 / Skill Points 8


◈ Format
One-time quest

◈ NPC
Outpost Commander Amanda

◈ Monster
Barpolle, Dow Genetos

◈ Scenario
The core of the Barbaroi's military are Barpolles and Dow Genetoses. This means we can strike a serious blow just by taking care of these ones. We will need your strength here. Go and teach them who the real masters of this forest are.

QNO_N_EU_019.quest_name: The real owner of the Forest

desc.notice:
◈ Task
Obtain 40 Wood Chips of the Togui Doll

◈ Rewards
EXP 37,600 / Skill EXP 2,000

◈ Format
Repeatable quest (Restricted to once per day)

◈ NPC
Protector Trader Gonishya

◈ Monsters
Togui Doll (The Phantom of the Crimson Blood level 35~50)

◈ How to Teleport
You can teleport to the Forgotten World by using a Dimension Hole.
You can obtain Dimension Holes from the monster that appears from the Dimension Pillars.

◈ Scenario
They say that the Togui Dolls created by Togui Sorcerers contain the bitter resentment of the souls confined within them. What does it mean that their bitter resentment remains in them? My curiosity just might get satisfied if I can examine the fragments of those monsters...

desc1.notice: Collect 40 Wood Chips of the Togui Doll (%d)

desc.notice:
◈ Task
Deliver Adonis' Ears

◈ Reward
EXP 41456232 / Skill Points 806 /
GOLD 47050

◈ Format
One-time quest

◈ NPC
Farm Owner Mujariun / Grocery Trader Warda

◈ Monster
None

◈ Scenario
Baghdad Grocery Trader Warda would like us to deliver the Violent Adonis' Ears that you collected previously. You cut them off for the symbolic meaning of it all, so we have no practical use for it. We might as well send them to her. But I have no time to go to Baghdad. I'm sorry but, if you happen to be on your way to Baghdad, would you deliver the Adonis' Ears to Grocery Trader Warda?

◈ Mission
Collect 5 Magical Finishing Materials.

◈ Reward
EXP 10204396 / Skill Points 1400 / Gold 4812

◈ Type
1 Time Only

◈ NPC
Weapon Trader Chunmoo / Weapon Trader Chunmoo

◈ Monster
Dark Sandman / Blood Sandman

◈ Scenario
Take a look at this weapon. It looks like new, but its teeth are worn out. If I re-sharpen and coat it, I can sell it at a regular price. Would you help me find an effective finishing coat for this weapon? Ah, right, I've heard the Sandmen in the Valley of the Kings carry something like that with them. Would you bring me 50 Magical Finishing Materials from them?

◈ Task
Speak with Guide Riise through Guide Raffy.
Speak with Guide Riise through Guide Lipria.

◈ Reward
None


◈ Format
One-time quest

◈ NPC
Guide Raffy / Guide Riise

◈ Monster
None

◈ Scenario
Welcome.
My name is Raffy. I've been commissioned by the royal palace to guide new visitors to the palace.
First, I will tell you how to teleport.
There are 3 guides in Constantinople.
Guide Lipria at the [Gate of Charisius],
Guide Raffy at the [Gate of Pegae] and Guide Riise at the [Statue of Atlas].
The guides provide basic information regarding Silkroad and help visitors quickly move to another guide.
Guide Riise at the [Statue of Atlas] is waiting to provide you with assistance.
Please use the Guide Teleport to go visit Guide Riise at the [Statue of Atlas].

◈ Mission
Collect Underworld Spirit

◈ Reward
None

◈ Form
Available once

◈ NPC
Exorcist Miaoryeong

◈ Monster
Underworld Spirit

◈ Scenario
Now we have all the ingredients gathered, we are ready to summon a Spirit of Underworld.
Do you want to summon one?
You have to be in the Berserk mode in order to get the fragments fromt the summoned soul.
When the powers of the souls collide, you can damage the soul and get the fragment.
Don't forget about this.
In order to see the soul, you will need my talisman, so take it with you.

desc1.notice: Collect Piece of Spirit of underworld.(%d)

Eliminate 40 Flame Gigantes

EXP 333,000 / Skill EXP 2,000
