You can obtain Dimension Holes from the monster that appears from the Dimension Pillars.

◈ Scenario
Have you heard of the name 'Flame Gigante'? It's a fearsome monsters that you can only find on the Flame Mountain. That also means that, as you defeat it, it will strengthen you greatly. How about it? Will you stand up to the challenge?

◈ Task
Collect 90 Devil Ghost Fragments

◈ Reward
EXP 843,245 /
General's Tokens 10

◈ Format
Repeatable (x4)

◈ NPC
Outpost Guard Ji He Long

◈ Monster
Devil Ghost Nachal

◈ Scenario
Devil Ghost Nachals in the Donwhang Stone Cave are flying monsters. I am well aware that Nachals are terribly powerful beings, but how are these lumps of stone able to fly around? I am curious to know the source of such wicked power. We just might be able to uncover the mystery if we have some Devil Ghost Fragments. Will you help me?

◈ Task
Deliver Mysterious Pots

◈ Reward
EXP 1,235,898 /
General's Tokens 5

◈ Format
One-time quest

◈ NPC
Outpost Guard Ru Li Mao / Specialty Shop Elder Leegak

◈ Monster
None

◈ Scenario
Diamond Yachas increase their own wicked energy by absorbing evil spirits with their pots, but these pots are impotent outside of the Stone Cave. They are nothing more than ominous-looking pots here. But it looks like Specialty Shop Elder Leegak is interested in them, perhaps because they were once owned by demons. We need to deliver them to him... Will you do it for us?

◈ Task
Collect 69 Ominous Amulets

◈ Reward
EXP 52,153 / Skill Points 71


◈ Format
One-time quest

◈ NPC
Outpost Commander Dick

◈ Monster
Nemea's Lion, Selene's Lion

◈ Scenario
A message has arrived from a guard at the Temple of Jupiter. He says that the lion statues have come alive. I know it's nonsense but we need to verify it as a report. Go to the Temple of Jupiter. If what that guard says is true, destroy Nemea's Lions and Selene's Lions before they do something terrible, and bring me the whatever caused them to come alive.

◈ Mission
Collect 1 Isis Heart.

◈ Reward
EXP 75300714 / Skill Points 4100 / Gold 15356

◈ Type
1 Time Only

◈ NPC
Egypt Governor Senmute / Egypt Governor Senmute

◈ Monster
Isis

◈ Scenario
This time, we need Isis's heart. Please bring this Seal Crystal and defeat Isis in the Shrine to get her heart.

◈ Task
Speak with the Goods Supplier in China, Donwhang, or Hotan.

◈ Reward
2nd Grade Seal Weapon (Select One)


◈ Format
One-time quest

◈ NPC
Goods Supplier in China, Donwhang, or Hotan.

◈ Scenario
Congratulations! You have reached level 8!
To keep up with your rapid development, I have prepared gifts.
Please come see me in town. I will be waiting for you there.

◈ Task
Defeat 320 Earth Ghosts

◈ Reward
EXP 267,398 / Skill Points 343


◈ Format
One-time quest

◈ NPC
Outpost Commander Bai Qi Long

◈ Monster
Earth Ghost, Meek Gun Powder, Meek Earth Ghost, Gun Powder

◈ Scenario
Earth Ghosts are becoming more powerful by the day, yet it is far too dangerous to do a full, frontal assault against them. First, we need to cut off their hands and feet. If we can reduce the number of Earth Ghosts and Meek Earth Ghosts, eradicating them just may become reality one day.

QNO_N_WC_013.quest_name: Savage tribes wandering in the stone cave

desc.notice:
◈ Mission
Collect 125 Tomb Warrior Armors

◈ Reward
Experience 3545000 / GOLD 120000

◈ Form
Available 3 times

◈ NPC
Jangan Armor Trader Mrs. Jang

◈ Monster
Tomb Warrior

◈ Scenario
Welcome back. I was hoping that you would stop by again. I have been crafting a replica armor that looks like the Tomb Soldier armor you have given me. As the rumors mentioned the Tomb Soldier armors are exquisite in design and effectiveness so the replica's are also advanced.
However, I heard a story from a tourist who came from the Qin Shi tomb that he spotted a new armor. It is an armor worn by the Tomb Warrior golems which has carefully crafted seams with even greater effectiveness to the previous armors.
This made me think that if I combined the tomb soldiers exquisite designs with the careful craftmanship of the tomb warrior golems armor this would create the ultimate armor. Would you mind hunting the Tomb Warriors and collecting their armor? You have collected the armor of the Tomb Solider before. I am sure you can handle this one as well.

◈ Task
Learn how to play the game by speaking with Jingyo. Obtain HP Recovery Potions then go to the outpost.

◈ Reward
Monk's Token x2

◈ Format
One-time quest

◈ NPC
Soldier Jingyo / Outpost Commander Wang Pai

◈ Monster
None

◈ Scenario
Now that you have learned the basic movements, I will teach you how to acquire the items necessary for hunting next.
You can acquire potions from the Medicine Supplier Dae-Pyeong. Dae-Pyeong will always give you plenty of potions so that you will be amply prepared for your hunts.
When you consumed all of your potions, it will be given again when you speak with the Medicine Supplier.
Acquire Standard Issue HP Recovery Potions from the Medicine Supplier then go to Outpost Commander Wang Pai located at the Eastern Europe Outpost.

desc1.notice: Obtain Standard Issue HP Recovery Potion and speak with the Outpost Commander Wang Pai

desc.notice:
◈ Task
Speak with Outpost Commander Bai Qi Long

◈ Reward
Skill Points 17


◈ Format
One-time quest

◈ NPC
Outpost Commander Bai Qi Long / Outpost Commander Dao Zhi Fong

◈ Monster
None

◈ Scenario
It is now time for us to make the move, before the Earth Ghosts recuperate. Go farther west and you will find Donwhang Outpost 3, the frontline where battle rages against Earth Ghosts. Speak with Commander Dao Zhi Fong. He will show you what you need to do.

desc1.notice: Speak with Outpost Commander Dao Zhi Fong

desc.notice:
◈ Task
Deliver Jupiter Report to General Ratchel

◈ Reward
EXP 3,735,706 / Skill Points 5,488 /
Gold 100,000

◈ Format
One-time quest

◈ NPC
Lost Investigator Avrill / General Ratchel

◈ Monsters
None

◈ Scenario
This is not good. The Life Seed itself has been tainted by the wicked energy of Baal worship. What is worse, the Seed is filled with wicked energy that is much more powerful than that of Baal worship. As far as I know, the energy of the Devil's Realm is the only one that is so powerful. This is not the doing of Baal worshippers. They wouldn't do something that would ruin the pure energy of Baal worship. It is highly probable that an outsider is manipulating the powers of Baal. Hurry to General Ratchel in Constantinople and tell her the news.

◈ Mission
Collect 100 High Warrior Ostracons.

◈ Reward
EXP 12550119 / Skill Points 2100 / Gold 5118

◈ Type
1 Time Only

◈ NPC
Doctor Renenutet / Doctor Renenutet

◈ Monster
Mont / Keisas

◈ Scenario
This time, please bring me 100 High Warrior Ostracons from the High Pharaoh's Tomb. You can get them by hunting Monts and Keisases.

◈ Task
Speak with the Goods Supplier in China, Donwhang, or Hotan.

◈ Reward
2nd Grade Seal Accessory Set


◈ Format
One-time quest

◈ NPC
Goods Supplier in China, Donwhang, or Hotan.

◈ Scenario
Congratulations! I will give you a suitable accessory as a gift. Please come see me in town.

◈ Mission
Eliminate 300 Sand Raiders.

◈ Reward
EXP 2801540 / Skill Points 250 / Gold 14043

◈ Type
Repeatable

◈ NPC
Egyptian Soldier Turian / Egyptian Soldier Turian

◈ Monster
Sand Raider

◈ Scenario
Don't be too proud of yourself just yet. 300 Unegs are just a simple test of your strength. This time, I want you to hunt 300 Sand Raiders.

◈ Task
Deliver Devil Horse Tendons

◈ Reward
EXP 17,395 /
Soldier's Tokens 4

◈ Format
One-time quest

◈ NPC
Outpost Guard Shao Mu Dai / Specialty Shop Elder Leegak

◈ Monster
None

◈ Scenario
I was wondering how I was going to dispose of the tendons we retrieved from Devil Horses, but it seems that Specialty Shop Elder Leegak is interested in them. Would you mind delivering these tendons to Leegak?

◈ Task
Collect 73 Sealed Scripts

◈ Reward
EXP 70,765 / Skill Points 92


◈ Format
One-time quest

◈ NPC
Outpost Commander Dick

◈ Monster
Seirenes, Seiren

◈ Scenario
We have received a report that speaks of strange demons appearing at the Shore of Dawn. Whatever could have happened to such a beautiful shore? Take care of the demons at the shore and investigate the cause. I look forward to your success.

◈ Task
Collect 170 White Spider's Silk

◈ Reward
EXP 440288 /
General's Tokens 10

◈ Format
Repeatable (x2)

◈ NPC
Outpost Guard Rabbath

◈ Monster
White Spider

◈ Scenario
White Spiders hunt for humans with their sticky silk. We can't let this savagery continue. Slay them and rip out their silk.

◈ Task
Defeat 3 Movois

◈ Reward
EXP 113 / Skill Points 2


◈ Format
One-time quest

◈ NPC
Outpost Commander Albert

◈ Monster
Movoi

◈ Scenario
You want to join in the campaign against demons, do you? Well, then. Let me see your skills. Let's start with pesky monsters around here. Slay Movias and Movois that wander around nearby this outpost. That should be good for a simple warm-up.

◈ Mission
Speak to Specialty Trader Wasdi.

◈ Reward
EXP 5742568 / Skill Points 1300 / GOLD 2493

◈ Type
1 Time Only

◈ NPC
Store Keeper Khamererne / Specialty Trader Wasdi

◈ Monster
N/A

◈ Scenario
I've done my share of trouble, but I'm not the girl I used to be. I'm working hard at making an honest living now. This is so like my father. He never gives me a chance to prove myself. I'd better do something to show him that I've changed. Would you please go receive Specialty Trader Wasdi's signature for me? It'll help prove my honesty to my father.

◈ Task
Defeat 76 Evil Order Warriors and 169 Evil Order Soldiers

◈ Reward
EXP 205,887 / Skill Points 259


◈ Format
One-time quest

◈ NPC
Outpost Commander Haviel

◈ Monster
Evil Order Soldier, Evil Order Warrior

◈ Scenario
We don't know where they got their help, but the Evil Order has opened a pathway that leads to the Netherworld. Demons have been summoned, and it seems that the savages plan to bring them into their fold so as to dominate the entire Asia Minor with their help.

◈ Task
Deliver Elemental's Roots

◈ Reward
EXP 19 /
Monk's Tokens 4

◈ Format
One-time quest

◈ NPC
Outpost Guard Bob / Nun Retaldi

◈ Monster
None

◈ Scenario
An order came in for the Elemental's Roots stored in the warehouse. It's for Sister Retaldi in Constantinople. Will you accept this delivery task?

QNO_N_EU_013.quest_name: Elemental Root is a good source of  protein

desc.notice:
◈ Task
Eliminate 1 Flame Cow King

◈ Rewards
EXP 37,840,200 / Skill EXP 300,000

◈ Format
One-time quest

◈ NPC
Hunter Associate Ahmok

◈ Monsters
Flame Cow King (The Burning Abyss level 81~90)

◈ How to Teleport
You can teleport to the Forgotten World by using a Dimension Hole.
You can obtain Dimension Holes from the monster that appears from the Dimension Pillars.

◈ Scenario
The Flame Cow King may have become weakened, but we don't know when he will recover his lost strength. If we are going to strike him, we must do it now. Defeat the Flame Cow King and save the Hotan Kingdom.

◈ Mission
Deliver the Garland.

◈ Reward
EXP 11829691 / Skill Points 1900 / Gold 2515

◈ Type
1 Time Only

◈ NPC
Finance Officer Maneto / Berenice

◈ Monster
N/A

◈ Scenario
Everything is all my fault. How foolish of me! I sacrificed Berenice for my beliefs. Now my memories of her won't leave me alone and I'll have to repent my sins for the rest of my life. I'm sorry, but would you leave this Garland next to her body? I feel too guilty to even look at what's left of her...

◈ Task
Defeat 430 Starving Biyatuns

◈ Reward
EXP 223583508 / Skill Points 5653 /
GOLD 207045

◈ Format
2

◈ NPC
Secret Agent Tahatdi

◈ Monster
Starving Biyatun

◈ Scenario
Biyatuns around here were released by the thieves. Because they have been starved, so the hunger has driven them insane. They will charge at anyone except the thieves, and it is interfering with our work, too. Please, give us a hand and slay them.

◈ Task
Eliminate 120 Flame Gigantes

◈ Rewards
EXP 205,000 / Skill EXP 17,500

◈ Format
One-time quest

◈ NPC
Hunter Associate Ahmok

◈ Monsters
Flame Gigante (The Burning Abyss level 81~90)

◈ How to Teleport
You can teleport to the Forgotten World by using a Dimension Hole.
You can obtain Dimension Holes from the monster that appears from the Dimension Pillars.

◈ Scenario
I have some bad news. We are told that Honghaea, whom we defeated before, was actually the son of the Flame Cow King on the Flame Mountain. Angered by his son's death, the Flame Cow King is apparently assembling all of his forces. At this rate, we'll have a big war on our hands. We have no choice but to cut down their military strength before the Flame Cow King begins to move. We need your strength.

◈ Task
Deliver Enchanted Talismans

◈ Reward
Skill Points 3


◈ Format
One-time quest

◈ NPC
Outpost Commander Tsai Bao / Exorcist Miaoryeong

◈ Monster
None

◈ Scenario
It is clear that these talismans are behind the rising of the tree demons in the forest. But we do not know who is behind such a wicked thing. Go and speak with Exorcist Miaoryeong. Once you show her the talismans, we will be able to find out what is going on out there.

◈ Mission
Eliminate 10 Horuses in the Beginner Pharaoh's Tomb.

◈ Reward
EXP 3548907 / Skill Points 1050 / Gold 15093

◈ Type
Repeatable

◈ NPC
Egyptian Soldier Turian / Egyptian Soldier Turian

◈ Monster
Horus (Tomb Beginner)

◈ Scenario
Alright, let's start the Deity training. Now it's time for you to hunt 10 Horuses in the Beginner Pharaoh's Tomb.

◈ Task
Speak with Outpost Commander Haviel

◈ Reward
Skill Points 17


◈ Format
One-time quest

◈ NPC
Outpost Commander Austin / Outpost Commander Haviel

◈ Monster
None

◈ Scenario
I was hoping that the rumors weren't true, but if the Evil Order really has made a pact with the devils to control the monsters, this is no small matter. We must stop them before they do anything more terrible. Go to Asia Minor Outpost 3. Speak with their commander, Haviel, and you should be able to figure something out.

◈ Mission
Ask the slaves about Rahid

◈ Reward
Experience 2684000

◈ Form
Available Once

◈ NPC
Village Chief Bukra
/Slave Jabur / Slave Shifle / Slave Shapeur

◈ Monster
None

◈ Scenario
What? Rahid came back here after the First Great Roc War?
At that time, everyone would have escaped to other places and only corpses would have filled the town.
Isan was taking a refuge, too, so he could not have met Isan. Where could he have gone then?
Let's see, who was here at the time…?
Oh, the slaves who work on the Roc Mountain might know.
Go speak with the slaves. What happened then, only they would know.

desc1.notice: Find Trace of Rahid from Slaves

desc.notice:
◈ Task
Deliver Monkey Bones

◈ Reward
EXP 181071 /
General's Tokens 5

◈ Format
One-time quest

◈ NPC
Outpost Guard Hadaz / Potion Merchant Manina

◈ Monster
None

◈ Scenario
Since we defeated those Small Bunwangs, we have been storing their bones in the warehouse. Potion Merchant Manina in Hotan is showing interest in them. Maybe he wants to use them for concocting new potions? No matter. All I need to do is send in the goods. Will you help us with our monkey bone delivery?

◈ Task
Collect 102 Hooves of Punisher's Horse

◈ Reward
EXP 98,252 /
Soldier's Tokens 5

◈ Format
One-time quest

◈ NPC
Outpost Guard Ramina

◈ Monster
Punisher

◈ Scenario
Punishers are strange creatures that are half-human and half-horse. What are they supposed to be, anyway? Is their lower half really that of a horse? I know this sort of curiosity has no place when there is a battle going on daily. Still, I am so curious. Will you help me resolve my curiosity?

QNO_N_EU_067.quest_name: Neither a Man nor a Horse

desc.notice:
◈Mission
Collect 1 Dirty Lamp

◈ Reward

Genie's Lamp

◈ Format
Quests can be taken once per day via Daily Quest Manager.

◈ NPC
All Daily Quest Manager

◈Monster
Monsters at level 111-120 level

◈ Scenario
Did you see Homeless Genie around here? He has been locked in the lamp for long dreaming for freedom. Something absurd happens to him. Genie was stolen lamp while he granted anyone's wishes. The lamp is like life to Genie.. If you're not too busy, will you search for the lamp for Genie?

◈ Task
Defeat 10 Tomb Stone Ghosts and 12 Tomb Stones

◈ Reward
EXP 3,737 / Skill Points 4


◈ Format
One-time quest

◈ NPC
Outpost Commander Wang Pai

◈ Monster
Tomb Stone Ghost, Tomb Stone

◈ Scenario
Have you heard of tombstones moving about at the cemetery recently? Now I have seen everything! A tomb is the place of rest for the dead. Before the dead themselves take the matters into their own hands, you go and destroy those tombstones.

QNO_N_CH_005.quest_name: Monsters that did not return to grave

desc.notice:
◈ Objective
Collect 100 units of Elixir Plants (Europe)

◈ Reward
670 Job EXP / item (10% bonus when quota filled) -50% in Safe Mode

◈ Format
Unlimited Repeatable

◈ NPC
Smuggler Raul

◈ Monster
Monsters Lv 20-29

◈ Scenario
You need to work ceaselessly to increase your Job level. If you are ready, bring me 100 units of Elixir Plants. You should be able to find Elixir Plants as you hunt monsters at level 20-29. If you run out of time and don't find enough Elixir Plants, don't worry. Even if you don't have all 100 units, I will pay you for what you have. But don't forget that you have to bring all 100 units to gain greater Job EXP.

◈ Task
Obtain 100 Souls of Togui

◈ Rewards
EXP 19,200 / Skill EXP 7,000 / Select 1 7th grade Seal of Star weapon

◈ Format
One-time quest

◈ NPC
Exorcist Miaoryeong

◈ Monsters
Togui Soldier (The Phantom of the Crimson Blood level 51~60)

◈ How to Teleport
You can teleport to the Forgotten World by using a Dimension Hole.
You can obtain Dimension Holes from the monster that appears from the Dimension Pillars.

◈ Scenario
Once we have the souls of Toguis, we can liberate these souls. The stronger the souls the better - Togui Soldiers should do. Defeat Togui Soldiers and bring me their souls.

◈ Task
Collect 75 Black Snake Scale

◈ Reward
EXP 92890 /
Soldier's Tokens 5

◈ Format
One-time quest

◈ NPC
Outpost Guard Asoho

◈ Monster
Black Yeowa

◈ Scenario
Oh, dear me... I thought I would be able to live it up as an outpost guard, but I had no idea that would post me in boondocks like this where all I see everyday are monsters. To make things worse, the commander is yelling at us to go out and slay these snake demons called Black Yeowas, but I'm no good at that sort of thing. You seem like a competent person. Will you help me?

◈ Mission
Eliminate 1000 Hykes.

◈ Reward
EXP 8920495 / Skill Points 950 / Gold 49437

◈ Type
Repeatable

◈ NPC
Palace Guard Mushari / Palace Guard Mushari

◈ Monster
Hyke

◈ Scenario
Prove to me that you're capable of becoming a true Deity by hunting 1000 Hykes.

◈ Task
Collect 110 Magic Wands

◈ Reward
EXP 188823885 / Skill Points 5226 /
Gold 397760

◈ Format
One-time quest

◈ NPC
Medic Footco

◈ Monsters
Baal Zealot, Cruel Zealot, Wild Zealot

◈ Scenario
It's good to see you again. I am still very grateful for the pure water you obtained for me. Now, if we are to use the pure water of magic, we will need the Magic Wand carried by the zealots. Will you slay the zealots and bring me their Magic Wands?

◈ Mission
Collect 250 Salihap's Horseshoes

◈ Reward
Experience 9231000

◈ Form
Available 3 times

◈ NPC
Salihap a stable keeper of Hotan

◈ Monster
Niya Royal Guard/ Niya General

◈ Scenario
Hi, how are you? I have a favor to ask you. Do you have time?
Well, as we were passing Taklamakan, we were attacked by skeletons. We were on our way home carrying hooves that we imported from other countries. All of our men ran away when attacked and all the hooves were stolen.
These lost goods belong to not only me, but Makgo of Donwhang and Machun of Jangan.
Wanting to take back our goods, I inquired here and there, but everybody is afraid of the skeletons and won't go there. I believe a strong fighter like you will surely be able to comply with my request. Can you?
The skeletons who appear in the Niya ruins of Taklamakan using a long sword and a big shield took our goods. Kill them and return our hooves to the other stable keepers and me.

◈ Task
Collect 8 Mysterious Orders

◈ Reward
EXP 2,172 / Skill Points 2


◈ Format
One-time quest

◈ NPC
Outpost Commander Albert

◈ Monster
Logos Baroi

◈ Scenario
Lately, the movement of the Barbaroi are disquieting. The Logos Baroi, in particular, are showing some subtle moves. We will need to find out what they are scheming. I will leave this task to you.

◈ Mission
Collect 50 Dark Khepri Samples and 50 Desert Bug Samples.

◈ Reward
EXP 19814361 / Skill Points 2300 / Gold 4768

◈ Type
1 Time Only

◈ NPC
Doctor Renenutet / Doctor Renenutet

◈ Monster
Dark Khepri / Desert Bug

◈ Scenario
Like I told you earlier, I need something to investigate and verify the presence of the unknown monsters. Please bring me 50 Dark Khepri Samples and 50 Desert Bug Samples.

QNO_SD_MA_012.quest_name: The Truth of the Strange Rumor (1)

desc.notice:
◈ Task
Collect 270 Chunks of Ice

◈ Reward
EXP 1363731 /
General's Tokens 10

◈ Format
Repeatable (x3)

◈ NPC
Outpost Guard Chahamma

◈ Monster
Planar, Sona

◈ Scenario
Hup! Hup! Planars and Sonas may be moving creatures, but they are nothing more than pieces of ice. I have no strength left to deal with lumps of ice in this frigid weather. So, why don't you slay them for me, hmm?

QNO_N_KT_088.quest_name: Chunks of Ice in the End

desc.notice:
◈ Mission
Collect 80 Tomb Soldier Armor.

◈ Reward
Experience 2970000 / GOLD 90000

◈ Form
Available 3 times

◈ NPC
Jangan Armor Trader Mrs. Jang.

◈ Monster
Tomb Soldier

◈ Scenario
With rumors of the hidden treasure in the Qin-Shi Tomb, many leave on a treasure hunt. Due to this sudden search, many people with interest in defensive tools started to come here to share information.
Then, a couple of days ago, I heard about a special armor worn by the guards of the Qin-Shi Tomb. Because this is an armor made in the ancient times, it looks old but if you look closely the basic shape is not that different to the new armors and it has elaborate details.
After hearing this story, I wanted to have an armor that was just like the armor the tomb soldiers wore. Could you get me this tomb soldier armor for me?

◈ Mission
Collect branch of life

◈ Reward
None

◈ Form
Available once

◈ NPC
Exorcist Miaoryeong

◈ Monster
Shaur/ Goat/ Decayed Yeoha/ Yeoha

◈ Scenario
The Nether Piece of Spirit, uh?
Again, you want something that is hard to get.
To summon a Spirit of underworld, you have to open the gates to the nether world and draw one out into this world with the Living Flame.
Since I can open the gates to the nether world. If you bring me the ingredients to build the Living Flame, I will help you summon a Spirit of underworld.
The ingredients for the Living Flame are the Branch of Life and the Relic of Sun God.
First, bring me the Branch of Life.
If you purify the tree monster with the Energy of Mountain, you would be able to get the Branch of life.
On the Roc Mountain where the monstrous bird of tremendous power is said to rule, there are monsters called Goat and Shaur. Those monsters have lived on the mountain for a long time. Get the Energy of mountain from them.
And if you use the Energy of Mountain to tree monster, Yeoha, you would be able to get the Branch of Life.

◈ Task
Defeat 200 Evilbeasts of Despair and 200 Evilbeasts of Grief

◈ Reward
EXP 7,793,765 / Skill Points 578 /
Gold 32,655

◈ Format
Unlimited Repeats

◈ NPC
Baal Worshipper Maadu

◈ Monsters
Evilbeast of Despair, Evilbeast of Grief

◈ Scenario
Those devilish beasts continue to target me. I didn't know so many of them were still around. I beg of you again. Please slay Evilbeasts of Despair and Evilbeasts of Grief before I get eaten up. Please…

QNO_JUPITER_SUB_087.quest_name: It's Even Worse out There! (Unlimited Repeats)

desc.notice:
◈ Task
Defeat 6 Old Weasels and 7 Weasels

◈ Reward
EXP 1,156 / Skill Points 3


◈ Format
One-time quest

◈ NPC
Outpost Commander Wang Pai

◈ Monster
Old Weasel, Weasel

◈ Scenario
Confounded Weasels! They are extremely pesky, young and old. They are not all that great of monsters, but they pose enough threat to regular merchants. So, go on! Wipe out those cursed Weasels!

◈ Mission
Eliminate 800 Desert Bugs.

◈ Reward
EXP 7925744 / Skill Points 550 / Gold 38150

◈ Type
Repeatable

◈ NPC
Egyptian Soldier Kamori / Egyptian Soldier Kamori

◈ Monster
Desert Bug

◈ Scenario
Do you wish to become a Deity? I can help you with that. Please go hunt 800 Desert Bugs.

◈ Mission
Collect 3 Essence of Gnome

◈ Reward
1 Alchemy Stone of Powerful Heart (10th grade)

◈ Form
Unlimited attempts

◈ NPC
Hotan Nephrite Rephrite Refinery Chief Pajab

◈ Monster
Gnome

◈ Scenario
Hey, isn't it the Essence of Gnome?
Haha.. I was right!
Do you want to give me the Essence of Gnome? Oh, You don't need to look like you are so surprised. kk..
The various energies within the nephrite cause so many problems when you are refining them.
The essence from Gonme which contains the power of earth can remove the impure energies surrounding the nephrite. If you give me the Essence of Gnome, I will pay you. kkk
A single Essence of Gnome will not be enough to remove the impuruties properly, so you will have to bring me 3 of them. kk

◈ Objective
Deliver Smuggled Goods Level 110

◈ Reward
1,011,151,900 Job EXP (-50% in Safe Mode)

◈ Format
One-time Quest

◈ NPC
Smuggler Isutade / Smuggler Raul

◈ Monster
None

◈ Scenario
We have an order for smuggled goods to be delivered. You need to deliver Smuggled goods to Smuggler Raul in Constantinople. Smuggled goods delivery assignments are worth more Job EXP than trade goods collection assignments. It would do you well to undertake some of these.

◈ Task
Collect 69 Lion Fragments

◈ Reward
EXP 26,076 /
Monk's Tokens 5

◈ Format
One-time quest

◈ NPC
Outpost Guard Chase

◈ Monster
Nemea's Lion, Selene's Lion

◈ Scenario
Have you heard the news from the Temple of Jupiter? They say crazed lion statues have come alive, wreaking havoc. The Temple was built with the precious tax money. What manner of disaster is this? We need your help. Slay Nemea's Lions and Simos Lions. Bring me their fragments. Why the fragments, you ask? To alleviate the financial loss, of course!

◈ Mission
Capture Slow Antinokes

◈ Reward
Experience 2863000 exp
/3 Enduring Fruits [Movement speed 75% increase, 3 hour duration]

◈ Form
Available Once

◈ NPC
Aircraft Ticket Seller Ajati

◈ Monster
Slow Antinokes

◈ Scenario
I went to see Sayun with those claws, but the whole trip was in vain.
I'd forgotten one critical item.
Thankfully, she didn't figure out that I know of her conspiracy, but it was still a very close call.
What is it that I forgot to bring, you ask?
The Slow Antinoke. We need to hunt them down and put their blood on the claws in order to destroy the crystals.
Ha ha ha! Speaking of which, would you mind catching them for me?
I have the bait ready, but I'm too busy to go myself.
Please bring this Goat baits and use them on the Slow Antinoke. He'll smell it and follow you. Just lure him here and speak to me – that's all there is to do.
Really simple. The only problem is that he is very slow.
You should go look to the southeast of the Snow Peak to find the Slow Antinoke.
Good luck, then!!

◈ Task
Collect 120 Periton's Feathers

◈ Reward
EXP 127397 /
Soldier's Tokens 5

◈ Format
One-time quest

◈ NPC
Hunter Associate Shahad

◈ Monster
Periton

◈ Scenario
If you are going to defeat Peritons, I want to assign one more task to you. Please bring me Periton's Feathers.

◈ Task
Deliver Hyeongcheon Talismans

◈ Reward
EXP 10,917 /
Soldier's Tokens 4

◈ Format
One-time quest

◈ NPC
Outpost Guard Ru Li Mao / Protector Trader Yeolah

◈ Monster
None

◈ Scenario
A while ago, we were able to defeat Hyeoncheons and seize their talismans. These protective talismans harden your body when carried, they say. It looks like our commander wishes to craft new armor with these. I will give you a Hyeongcheon Talisman. Please take this to Protector Trader Yeolah in Donwhang.

◈ Mission
Collect 100 Ure'uth Scales.

◈ Reward
EXP 10510528 / Skill Points 1500 / Gold 4856

◈ Type
1 Time Only

◈ NPC
Potion Trader Titi / Potion Trader Titi

◈ Monster
Ure'uth

◈ Scenario
We have most of the ingredients for Doctor Renenutet's prescription except for Ure'uth Scales. Until we restock, the best solution would be hunting for them, but… I'm just a regular trader, I can't do that sort of thing. Kind adventurer, would you help me out? Please bring me 100 scales from Ure'uth in the Valley of the Kings.

◈ Task
Speak with the Goods Supplier in China, Donwhang, or Hotan.

◈ Reward
6th Grade Seal Weapon (Select One)


◈ Format
One-time quest

◈ NPC
Goods Supplier in China, Donwhang, or Hotan.

◈ Scenario
Congratulations! You have reached level 42!
It just so happens that I have managed to acquire a rare weapon that is hard to get anywhere. I will give you this rare weapon as a gift.
Please come see me in town.

◈ Task
Speak with Hunter Associate Ahmok

◈ Rewards
EXP 157,700 / Skill EXP 500

◈ Format
One-time quest

◈ NPC
General Sonhyeon / Hunter Associate Ahmok

◈ Monsters
None

◈ Scenario
The Cult and the necromancers opened the door to the Forgotten World in order to obtain talismans of great power. Because of that, many are suffering. It seemed that rumors of ghosts were floating about in Hotan… I suspect that this might also be related to the Forgotten World. Will you go speak with the Hunter Associate, Ahmok, and find out what is happening?

◈ Task
Collect 120 Devil's Bodily Fluid

◈ Reward
EXP 110472983 / Skill Points 2575 /
GOLD 239000

◈ Format
1

◈ NPC
Scout Force Soldier Hadiun

◈ Monster
Canyon Iblis

◈ Scenario
*sigh* Have you seen demons called Canyon Iblises? I am sick and tired of those bug monsters. I would love to cut them all up, but I am too busy with the investigation project. I would appreciate it if you could help.

◈ Objective
Collect 100 units of Spice (Europe)

◈ Reward
670 Job EXP / item (10% bonus when quota filled) -50% in Safe Mode

◈ Format
Unlimited Repeatable

◈ NPC
Trader Anna

◈ Monster
Monsters Lv 20-29

◈ Scenario
You need to work ceaselessly to increase your Job level. If you are ready, bring me 100 units of Spice. You should be able to find Spice as you hunt monsters at level 20-29. If you run out of time and don't find enough Spice, don't worry. Even if you don't have all 100 units, I will pay you for what you have. But don't forget that you have to bring all 100 units to gain greater Job EXP.

◈ Task
Collect 140 Ong's Wings

◈ Reward
EXP 164049 /
Soldier's Tokens 5

◈ Format
One-time quest

◈ NPC
Hunter Associate Shahad

◈ Monster
Ong

◈ Scenario
If you are going to defeat Ongs, I want to assign one more task to you. Please bring me Ong's Wings.

◈ Task
Speak with Lost Investigator Avrill

◈ Reward
EXP 6,696,778 / Skill Points 5,488 /
Gold 100,000

◈ Format
One-time quest

◈ NPC
Baal Worshipper Cieta / Lost Investigator Avrill

◈ Monsters
None

◈ Scenario
Thank to your assistance, we were able to defeat Babilion who had gained Baal's powers. This puts an end to Babilion's schemes. Not to mention alleviating my guilt… Although many followers was had by Babilion, at least some are still safe… I suppose it is my duty to escort them out of the Mirror Dimension to the end... Thank you ever so much. Hurry back to Avrill who sent you here and tell her the news, too.

◈ Task
Collect 107 Nether Documents

◈ Reward
EXP 165,881 / Skill Points 237


◈ Format
One-time quest

◈ NPC
Outpost Commander Austin

◈ Monster
Evil Order Archer, Evil Order Hunter

◈ Scenario
It is clear that the Evil Order is scheming something. Some say that they have made a pact with ancient devils, while others say that they have gained the ability to control monsters. If they are planning something terrible, we must foil that plan. It is time for you to step in.

◈ Task
Collect 240 Diubun's Teeth

◈ Reward
EXP 135250958 / Skill Points 2887 /
GOLD 232260

◈ Format
2

◈ NPC
Expeditionary Force Soldier Alamatun

◈ Monster
Agile Diubun

◈ Scenario
Agile Diubuns around here are aggressive demons. Even skilled soldiers like ourselves are afraid of them. We want to teach them a lesson. Would you help us?

◈ Task
Defeat 10 Anatu's Lions, and 30 Asherah's Lions

◈ Reward
EXP 253,158,332 / Skill Points 7,321 /
Gold 444,500

◈ Format
One-time quest

◈ NPC
Lost Soldier Rion

◈ Monsters
Anatu's Lion, Asherah's Lion

◈ Scenario
You destroyed The Earth? Hmm… You don't look that strong to me. But Yuno is on a whole different level than The Earth. Over a long period of time, statues take on the mind of their owners. We cannot be sure, but those statues are probably deity-class. It's not something mere mortals can easily do something about. If you still insist on going, then you will have to prove yourself first.

◈ Mission
Deliver the Bottle with Blood to Yangyun

◈ Reward
Experience 4016100

◈ Form
Available Once

◈ NPC
Yangyun the herbalist / WalYoung

◈ Monster
None

◈ Scenario
Oh, no. Someone else has been poisoned like me….
But… I have no antidote either.
I am only alive thanks to the blood that someone leaves for me every month.
I will give you a little bit of this blood. And you can take it to Yangyun the herbalist and ask him what manner of creature this blood belongs to.
If we know what kind of blood that is and can find the blood, we will be able to save the poor child.
Will you bring this to him now?
I pray that the poor child will be released from the pain soon.

desc1.notice: Deliver the Bottle with Blood to Yang Yizhi

desc.notice:
◈ Task
Collect 100 Earth Ghost Warrior's Combat Outfits

◈ Reward
EXP 831,868 /
General's Tokens 10

◈ Format
Repeatable (x4)

◈ NPC
Outpost Guard Ji He Long

◈ Monster
Earth Ghost Warrior

◈ Scenario
If you've been to the Donwhang Stone Cave already, did you have a chance to see Earth Ghost Warriors? They may be primitive, but their armor is not too shabby, from what I hear. I doubt their armor will be anything ground-breaking, but I can't help my curiosity. I want to see one in person. Will you help me?

◈ Mission
Collect one of each the White Tablet, Black Tablet, Blue Tablet, and Red Tablet

◈ Reward
Experience 7060600 / GOLD 102000

◈ Form
Available Once

◈ NPC
Jangan Hunter Associate Gwakwi

◈ Monster
Royal Warrior

◈ Scenario
What? One of the martial secrets of Bicheonmun!? It is so pitiful that they gave up getting such tremendous thing back!
Even though I came out from Bicheonmun it doesn't mean I closed my connection with them completely. So I want to find those Stone Tablets that were stolen and bring them back to Bicheonmun. But I don't think I can do it by myself so would you be willing to help me?
I asked the thief who had the stone tablet where he got it from and he said he got the tablet when he hunted the Royal Warrior in the Qin-Shi Tomb. I think the Royal Warrior took the Stone Tablet when a thief who stole the martial secret went in the Qin-Shi Tomb to hide from the tracker and got attacked by him.
Now I have one Stone Tablet if we hunt down the Royal Warrior, we would be able to get the rest of them.
You can find the Royal Warrior on the second floor of Qin-Shi tomb.

◈ Task
Deliver Shiny Hairpins

◈ Reward
EXP 117 /
Monk's Tokens 4

◈ Format
One-time quest

◈ NPC
Outpost Guard Bob / Specialty Trader Tina

◈ Monster
None

◈ Scenario
I have heard from Dave already. He said you found Tina's hairpin. He wants me to send it out right away, but, as you can see, I can't leave the outpost. Could you help me with this?

◈ Task
Deliver Investigations Report to Hunter Associate Ahmok

◈ Rewards
EXP 2,600 / Skill EXP 500

◈ Format
One-time quest

◈ NPC
Jewel Lapidary Mamoje / Hunter Associate Ahmok

◈ Monsters
None

◈ Scenario
While you were out collecting Demon Crystals, I completed the analysis report on the Red Jewel. You can hear the details from Ahmok after you deliver the report to him.

◈ Mission
Eliminate 100 Keisas Berserkers.

◈ Reward
EXP 1082584 / Skill Points 700 / Gold 4900 / AP 100

◈ Type
Repeatable

◈ NPC
Thief Union Representative Mohaira / Thief Union Representative Mohaira

◈ Monster
Keisas Berserker

◈ Scenario
The best way to keep the Shrine for ourselves is to eliminate monsters. Go hunt 100 Keisas Berserkers, will you? Don't let the Trader and Hunter Unions take care of them before you do.

QNO_SD_GU_016.quest_name: Hunting in the Middle of the Temple Dispute 1 (Thief)

desc.notice:
◈ Task
Obtain 100 Spell Documents

◈ Rewards
EXP 27,500 / Skill EXP 12,500

◈ Format
One-time quest

◈ NPC
Exorcist Miaoryeong

◈ Monsters
Togui Sorcerer (The Phantom of the Crimson Blood level 51~60)

◈ How to Teleport
You can teleport to the Forgotten World by using a Dimension Hole.
You can obtain Dimension Holes from the monster that appears from the Dimension Pillars.

◈ Scenario
Hmph! You may ask for this kind of a favor that easily, but this spell is very advanced. I can't just release them at will. Besides, if we force it, the Confined Souls themselves may get disintegrated. So, how do we go about it? The best way is to find out how this spell works and find a way to annule it. If we are to do that, we will need the original copy of the spell. Do you think you could find it?

◈ Mission
Speak to Grocery Trader Melit.

◈ Reward
EXP 4953590 / Skill Points 800 / Gold 2384

◈ Type
1 Time Only

◈ NPC
Lighthouse Keeper Snefru / Grocery Trader Melit

◈ Monster
N/A

◈ Scenario
My newest hobby is reading foreign novels. Their stories make me feel like I'm in those countries, doing all sorts of new things. I recently placed an order for some foreign novels, but they haven't been delivered yet. It's been quite a while already... I'd love to go check on their delivery status, but I'm on duty right now. Would you be so kind as to ask Grocery Trader Melit about my new novels?

◈ Task
Defeat 227 Maongs

◈ Reward
EXP 481133 / Skill Points 377


◈ Format
Repeatable (x2)

◈ NPC
Outpost Commander Hao Hung

◈ Monster
Maong

◈ Scenario
The ferry near the outpost is an important means of transportation. Everyone uses it - travelers, traders... However, with the rapid increase in monster activities recently, no one is using the ferry. People are afraid of ambush by Devil Ongs and refuse to travel outside. Will you lend us your strength?

◈ Task
Defeat 260 Blood Ongs and 281 Ongs

◈ Reward
EXP 617136 / Skill Points 800


◈ Format
One-time quest

◈ NPC
Hunter Associate Shahad

◈ Monster
Blood Ong, Ong

◈ Scenario
Blood Ongs and Ongs appearing around Ong Habitat are very fussy existences to our Hunter Association. I wonder whether you can defeat them properly. Are you ready for test?

◈ Mission
Collect 50 Strange Decor.

◈ Reward
EXP 18676935 / Skill Points 2100 / Gold 4681

◈ Type
1 Time Only

◈ NPC
Doctor Renenutet / Doctor Renenutet

◈ Monster
Sand Raider

◈ Scenario
The Governor and I are preparing a special ritual to revitalize Egypt. If our plan goes well, then something very interesting will take place. If you're not busy, why don't you help us? Please bring me 50 Strange Decor from Sand Raiders in Delta. They will be quite useful for our ritual.

◈ Task
Collect 220 Earth Ghost Soldier's Badges

◈ Reward
EXP 1,856,443 /
General's Tokens 10

◈ Format
Repeatable (x4)

◈ NPC
Outpost Guard Ji He Long

◈ Monster
Earth Ghost Soldier

◈ Scenario
Earth Ghost Soldiers are the one who lead Earth Ghosts in the Donwhang Stone Cave. They may be barbaric, but they are rather powerful. I hear that they award badges to their kinsmen who slay many humans. This is terrible news! We will have to steal their badges just to give them a hard time, but I am not nearly strong enough to do something like that. Would you mind helping me?

◈ Mission
Deliver the Gold Sack for Ahha.

◈ Reward
EXP 4953590 / Skill Points 800 / Gold 2384

◈ Type
1 Time Only

◈ NPC
Librarian Ahha / Store Keeper Khamererne

◈ Monster
N/A

◈ Scenario
This sack contains some gold coins for the additional storage service fee. Please deliver it to Ms. Khamererne along with my deepest apologies.

◈ Task
Collect 65 Red Yeowa's Claws

◈ Reward
EXP 104960 /
Soldier's Tokens 5

◈ Format
One-time quest

◈ NPC
Outpost Guard Asoho

◈ Monster
Red Yeowa

◈ Scenario
Hmph! Red Yeowas... Those stupid demons. Their claws are far too sharp. I approached one once and it almost tore my armor to shreds like rags. The commander is breathing down on our necks to have us slay those demons as soon as possible. But, then, when I actually try to head out, I get too scared to fight these monsters... I'm sorry to be asking you this, but... Would you mind slaying Red Yeowas on my behalf?

◈ Task
Collect 120 Serpent's Venom

◈ Reward
EXP 287,027,172 / Skill Points 5,226 /
Gold 441,120

◈ Format
One-time quest

◈ NPC
Medic Footco

◈ Monsters
Hell Serpent

◈ Scenario
As of late, we are seeing an increasing number of casualties who come back from the Forest of Sorrow poisoned with powerful venom. If we are to neutralize this venom, it looks like we will need Serpent's Venom. Would you acquire some Serpent's Venom from Hell Serpents?

◈ Objective
Deliver Specialty Goods Level 55 (China)

◈ Reward
4,112,700 Job EXP (-50% in Safe Mode)

◈ Format
One-time Quest

◈ NPC
Trader Sunwha / Trader Yusun

◈ Monster
None

◈ Scenario
We have an order for specialty goods to be delivered. You need to deliver specialty goods to Trader Yusun in Jangan. Specialty goods delivery assignments are worth more Job EXP than trade goods collection assignments. It would do you well to undertake some of these.

◈ Mission
Eliminate 1000 Mhont Killers.

◈ Reward
EXP 8920495 / Skill Points 950 / Gold 49437

◈ Type
Repeatable

◈ NPC
Palace Guard Mushari / Palace Guard Mushari

◈ Monster
Mhont Killer

◈ Scenario
Prove to me that you're capable of becoming a true Deity by hunting 1000 Mhont Killers.

◈ Task
Collect 73 Spears of the Huns

◈ Reward
EXP 118350 /
Soldier's Tokens 5

◈ Format
One-time quest

◈ NPC
Outpost Guard Dexter

◈ Monster
Hun Assault Lancer

◈ Scenario
Have you ever seen Hun Assault Lancers? Their spears are so powerful that we can't fight against them. Ten soldiers like us are no match for them. We heard that you are very powerful, will you lend us your strength for us?

◈ Objective
Deliver Specialty Goods Level 60

◈ Reward
5,940,300 Job EXP (-50% in Safe Mode)

◈ Format
One-time Quest

◈ NPC
Trader Sabonue / Trader Yusun

◈ Monster
None

◈ Scenario
We have an order for specialty goods to be delivered. You need to deliver specialty goods to Trader Yusun in Jangan. Specialty goods delivery assignments are worth more Job EXP than trade goods collection assignments. It would do you well to undertake some of these.

◈ Task
Collect 63 Crab Shells

◈ Reward
EXP 36,517 /
Soldier's Tokens 5

◈ Format
One-time quest

◈ NPC
Outpost Guard Duadi

◈ Monster
Megalopa, Crab

◈ Scenario
Have you ever fought a Megalopa or a Crab? The claws of these giant demon crabs swing around are simply too overwhelming. Had I known that these are the monsters I would be fighting, I would never have volunteered for this outpost. It's too much for us. Would you slay them for us, please?

◈ Mission
Speak to Leebaek

◈ Reward
None

◈ Form
Available once

◈ NPC
Leebeak the Guild manager of Jangan

◈ Monster
None

◈ Scenario
You are safe! I'm so glad. I have done a terrible thing to you. I am truly sorry. I would like to give you a gift to apologize. Will you accept it?

◈ Mission
Ask Hunter Associate Ahmok about news of Rahid

◈ Reward
Experience 2826000

◈ Form
Available 3 times

◈ NPC
Village Chief Bukra / Hotan Hunter Associate Ahmok

◈ Monster
None

◈ Scenario
Isan's son was known to be a prodigy since his childhood and he went to Islam to learn magic on the recommendation of others.
I would sometimes deliver his letters to Isan.
Isan looked ever so happy to receive letters from him.
But then the letters abruptly stopped coming and we did not hear from him again.
I only delivered those letters so I do not know precisely what has happened to him.
Hmm. Ahmok from Hotan always delivered the letters to me so he might know something.
Travel to Hotan, find Ahmok at the Hunter Guild and tell him that you are there to find out about Rahid.
Well, I hope you hear about Isan's son. Good luck.

desc1.notice: Receive Information of Rahid from Ahmok

desc.notice:
◈ Task
Defeat 450 Baal's Prophets

◈ Reward
EXP 2,287,907 / Skill Points 578 /
Gold 31,885

◈ Format
Unlimited Repeats

◈ NPC
Lost Soldier Fernando

◈ Monsters
Baal's Prophets

◈ Scenario
There are still idiots walking around. Baal's Prophets must be still around leading others astray. So, how about you slay Baal's Prophets again?

◈ Mission
Collect 1 Seth Heart.

◈ Reward
EXP 75300714 / Skill Points 4100 / Gold 15356

◈ Type
1 Time Only

◈ NPC
Egypt Governor Senmute / Egypt Governor Senmute

◈ Monster
Seth

◈ Scenario
Thanks to you, Seth no longer has any of his soldier gods working for him. We can't relax yet, though. Seth is stronger than all of his soldier gods combined. This will be your last mission: defeat Seth and correct what Mentuhotep has caused. The future of Egypt is on your shoulders. Now, please take this Seal Crystal.

◈ Mission
Eliminate 1000 Akerus.

◈ Reward
EXP 9747665 / Skill Points 1250 / Gold 50750

◈ Type
Repeatable

◈ NPC
Palace Guard Mushari / Palace Guard Mushari

◈ Monster
Akeru

◈ Scenario
Prove to me that you're capable of becoming a true Deity by hunting 1000 Akerus.

◈ Task
Deliver Weapons Chest

◈ Reward
EXP 41456232 / Skill Points 806 /
GOLD 47050

◈ Format
One-time quest

◈ NPC
Guard Patah / Farm Keeper Jyamilrun

◈ Monster
None

◈ Scenario
Wait a minute. Are you on your way to the Kak Farm? If so, would you please deliver this weapon chest to the farm keeper, Jyamilrun. He has been asking for the weapon to fight the robbers attacking his farm, but I have had no time to take it to him. Would you help me?

◈ Task
Talk to Event So-Ok

◈ Reward
Beginner Scroll of Experience (10%) x3

◈ Format
Can be performed once every Friday, Saturday and Sunday

◈ NPC
Potion Merchant

◈ Scenario
The golden weekend for beginners! The 19:00 Happy Hour is here.
Visit Event So-Ok to receive your gift.

QEV_ALL_BASIC3_19.quest_name: The Golden Weekend for Beginners (19 o'clock)

desc.notice:
◈ Task
Speak with Outpost Commander Galia

◈ Reward
Skill Points 4


◈ Format
One-time quest

◈ NPC
Outpost Commander Dick / Outpost Commander Galia

◈ Monster
None

◈ Scenario
To understand the phenomena occurring in this country, it will be best to gather information on the other side of the sea. I would like to appoint you for the task. I think you will be able to manage yourself no matter what hardship may come upon you. Get on a ship and head to Asia Minor. Speak with Commander Galia of Asia Minor Outpost 1. I have no doubt you will be useful there.

◈ Task
Collect 23 Old Gold Coins

◈ Reward
EXP 3,736 /
Monk's Tokens 5

◈ Format
One-time quest

◈ NPC
Outpost Volunteer Lily

◈ Monster
Bartis, Misos Baroi

◈ Scenario
Have you fought the Barbaroi before? I haven't been officially assigned to a military post yet, so I've only heard stories from my seniors, but they seems to be a tribe of amazing hunters. What is even more astonishing, from what I hear, are the gold coins that they carry. Apparently, they carry these gold coins from the tribal golden age like charms. Gold coins of the Barbaroi... I would like to see one in person. Would you help me?

◈ Task
Deliver Lion Fragments

◈ Reward
EXP 8,692 /
Monk's Tokens 4

◈ Format
One-time quest

◈ NPC
Outpost Guard Augustin / Grocery Trader Bajel

◈ Monster
None

◈ Scenario
What a great weather! Don't you just wanna run a delivery to Constantinople on a day like this? Might as well get some exercise rather than waste time, don't you think?

◈ Task
Defeat 50 Vampire Enchantresses and 50 Evil Enchantresses

◈ Reward
EXP 287,027,172 / Skill Points 5,226 /
Gold 441,120

◈ Format
One-time quest

◈ NPC
Baal Worshipper Nana

◈ Monsters
Vampire Enchantress, Evil Enchantress

◈ Scenario
Listen to me. Some time before I came here, I joined the Baal cult because of my lover, Bob. When we came here, though, he was seduced by one of the witches summoned by Babilion. I was right there with him. It's so infuriating! How could he just abandon me like that?! Kill those witches, would you? You'll help me, right?

◈ Task
Defeat 69 Black Tigers and 69 White Tigers

◈ Reward
EXP 52,153 / Skill Points 68


◈ Format
One-time quest

◈ NPC
Outpost Commander Tan Wei

◈ Monster
Black Tiger, White Tiger

◈ Scenario
There are ferocious beasts deep inside the forest. They are highly territorial and will attack any invaders without fail. Many caravans and travelers heading to the ferries lost their lives in this forest. However, we can't always let beasts have their way with human life. It is time for us to show them who the real master of this forest is.

◈ Task
Collect 90 Lake Jewels

◈ Reward
EXP 82912465 / Skill Points 1611 /
GOLD 185848

◈ Format
2

◈ NPC
Farm Keeper Jyamilrun

◈ Monster
Wadi Uneg

◈ Scenario
If you are on your way to hunt Wadi Unegs, would you collect Lake Jewels for me? If you defeat Wadi Unegs, you can get transparent jewels. They are clear and transparent like the lake, hence the name. It probably explains why Wadi Unegs are living in the lake. If you are interested, please collect the jewels for me.

◈ Task
Defeat 235 Edimmus

◈ Reward
EXP 3528972 / Skill Points 412


◈ Format
Repeatable (x3)

◈ NPC
Outpost Commander Ru Long Hu

◈ Monster
Edimmu

◈ Scenario
We are seeing casualty everywhere because Edimmus, demons hiding in the Mysterious Death Desert, are laying ambush. If we don't take care of these demons hiding under the sand, we will not be able to travel to Taklamakan ever again. We need your strength. Will you help us?

QNO_N_KT_065.quest_name: Time to pull out devil from sand

desc.notice:
◈ Mission
Eliminate 800 Dark Sandmen.

◈ Reward
EXP 8163517 / Skill Points 650 / Gold 38500

◈ Type
Repeatable

◈ NPC
Egyptian Soldier Kamori / Egyptian Soldier Kamori

◈ Monster
Dark Sandman

◈ Scenario
Do you wish to become a Deity? I can help you with that. Please go hunt 800 Dark Sandmen.

◈ Mission
Deliver the Necklace to Khamererne.

◈ Reward
EXP 5742568 / Skill Points 1300 / Gold 2493

◈ Type
1 Time Only

◈ NPC
Trader Union President Naunakt / Store Keeper Khamererne

◈ Monster
N/A

◈ Scenario
I've made a couple of necklaces using your materials. I really hope these necklaces will help those two reconnect. Would you please deliver this one to my daughter Khamererne?

◈ Mission
Collect 100 Niya witch's bracelets

◈ Reward
Experience 8731000

◈ Form
Available 3 times

◈ NPC
Hotan Potion Trader Manina

◈ Monster
Niya Mage/ Niya Shaman

◈ Scenario
The current Taklamakan is just a desert as you know, but there once existed a civilization called Niya in ancient times. At that time there was a river flowing through the area.
The natives built a great city and evolved into a great civilization thanks to the abundant water. It was their god's blessing, but people become complacent because the growth was so swift. They began to seek all kinds of pleasures and then wasted water carelessly, forgeting its importance in their lives.
This incurred their god's wrath so the water was contaminated and the civilization of Niya was ruined.
This isn't really that importnant to us. However, what is important is that the advanced magic associated with the civilization was also lost with not a single book of magic being preserved. It's a real pity.
But recently I heard that the skeletons of the Niya kingdom appeared in Taklamakan and are tormenting the people. There are magician skeletons among them using the strong magic of the Niya civilization.
These skeleton magicians were wearing bracelets and it seemed that these bracelets had a function of reinforcing their magical power.
iIll be very satisfied if i can get a bracelet to analyse it and find out the secret of niya magic skills. This will help me make better liquid medicine.
Can you help me? Get me 100 bracelets.

◈ Mission
Collect 70 Aknish Thighs.

◈ Reward
EXP 11485137 / Skill Points 1800 / Gold 4987

◈ Type
1 Time Only

◈ NPC
Weapon Trader Chunmoo / Weapon Trader Chunmoo

◈ Monster
Aknish

◈ Scenario
Was I affected by Khamererne's stealing? Hell, yes! I can't count how many weapons she's stolen from me or how many clients of mine she's made unhappy. If you want my signature, go bring me 70 tibias from Aknishes. I'll think about it after I see those tibias. Aknishes are found in the Storm and Cloud Desert.

◈ Task
Defeat 130 Temple Warriors, 130 Temple Surveillants, and 130 Temple Guards

◈ Reward
EXP 2,534,373 / Skill Points 838 /
Gold 31,750

◈ Format
Unlimited Repeats

◈ NPC
Lost Soldier Chrom

◈ Monsters
Temple Warrior, Temple Surveillant, Temple Guard

◈ Scenario
I'm so busy that I can't even find the time to breathe! I'm glad you're here. Would you take on the statues while I take a breather? I will pay you handsomely for it.

◈ Objective
Collect 50 units of Old Ginseng (China)

◈ Reward
380 Job EXP / item (10% bonus when quota filled) -50% in Safe Mode

◈ Format
Unlimited Repeatable

◈ NPC
Trader Yusun

◈ Monster
Monsters Lv 10-19

◈ Scenario
You need to work ceaselessly to increase your Job level. If you are ready, bring me 50 units of Old Ginseng. You should be able to find Old Ginseng as you hunt monsters at level 10-19. If you run out of time and don't find enough Old Ginseng, don't worry. Even if you don't have all 50 units, I will pay you for what you have. But don't forget that you have to bring all 50 units to gain greater Job EXP.

◈ Task
Speak with Baal Worshipper Nana

◈ Reward
EXP 6,696,778 / Skill Points 5,488 /
Gold 100,000

◈ Format
One-time quest

◈ NPC
Lost Soldier Neon / Baal Worshipper Nana

◈ Monsters
None

◈ Scenario
Are you here to save me? Thank you. I volunteered for military duty here to find my sister who joined the Baal cult. Before I could find her, though, I was imprisoned like this. I think I'm too afraid to move on from here. Please, won't you go find my sister and tell her, on my behalf, to come back?

◈ Task
Collect 500 Thieves' Treasure Chests

◈ Reward
EXP 220945965 / Skill Points 5151 /
GOLD 478000

◈ Format
1

◈ NPC
Secret Agent Parun

◈ Monster
Desert Thief Swordsman, Desert Thief Archer

◈ Scenario
Wait a minute. If you are on your way to slay thieves, I have something that I would like you to do. I hear that these wicked thieves store their plunders. These goods all have their rightful owner. Thieves have no right to them. Would you help us recover them?

◈ Mission
Deliver the Overdue Tax Warning to Wasdi.

◈ Reward
EXP 4809311 / Skill Points 700 / Gold 2362

◈ Type
1 Time Only

◈ NPC
Finance Officer Maneto / Specialty Trader Wasdi

◈ Monster
N/A

◈ Scenario
The tax report period is over, but some people still haven't paid their taxes yet. Please deliver this Overdue Tax Warning to Specialty Trader Wasdi, and tell her to pay her taxes soon.

◈ Task
Obtain 200 Proof of Hunting Evil Spirits

◈ Rewards
EXP 5,260,000 / SP 100

◈ Format
Repeatable quest (Restricted to once per day)

◈ NPC
Governor Senmut

◈ Monsters
Monsters in the Sea of Resentment level 101~110 dungeon (Except Envy and Treasure Box)

◈ How to Teleport
You can teleport to the Forgotten World by using a Dimension Hole.
You can obtain Dimension Holes from the monster that appears from the Dimension Pillars.

◈ Scenario
The evil spirits that poured out from the Forgotten World since it opened up are causing much damage. We want to reduce the damage at all cost… How about it? Would you be interested?

desc1.notice: Collect 200 Proof of Hunting Evil Spirits (%d)

desc.notice:
◈ Mission
Talk to Exorcist Miaoryeong

◈ Reward
None

◈ Form
Available once

◈ NPC
General Sonhyeon /Exorcist Miaoryeong

◈ Monster
None

◈ Scenario
Since the imperial army learned the formula for the Ultra-Berserk pills from the evil band, we began researching Ultra-Berserk under the command of His Imperial Majesty.
The research was no easy task so we cooperated with other nations. Finally we discovered the formula for the pill that would increase the Ultra-Berserk powers.
We have decided that such difficult times as these is the right time to disclose about these pills and increase our military might. So, those who have gained the Ultra-Berserk ability would be allowed to take the test hold by imperial army, and we would make the pills to those who pass the test.
You have passed the test and are certainly qualified.
The formula for the pill is managed strictly within the army. If you want to get one, you will have to bring us the ingredients.
What we need is the Nether Piece of Spirit. Go ask Miaoryeong the Exorcist how to get one and she will help you.

◈ Mission
Eliminate 10 Osirises in the Beginner Pharaoh's Tomb.

◈ Reward
EXP 3655374 / Skill Points 1150 / Gold 15225

◈ Type
Repeatable

◈ NPC
Egyptian Soldier Turian / Egyptian Soldier Turian

◈ Monster
Osiris (Tomb Beginner)

◈ Scenario
Alright, let's start the Deity training. Now it's time for you to hunt 10 Osirises in the Beginner Pharaoh's Tomb.

◈ Task
Collect 260 Devil's Eyes

◈ Reward
EXP 7080672 /
General's Tokens 10

◈ Format
Repeatable (x3)

◈ NPC
Outpost Guard Rabbath

◈ Monster
Demon Eye, Devil Eye

◈ Scenario
Demon Eyes and Devil Eyes have attacked caravans again. Those cursed critters! This is an unforgivable act. We need to teach them a harsh lesson. Will you help us?

◈ Objective
Deliver Smuggled Goods Level 15 (China)

◈ Reward
24,300 Job EXP (-50% in Safe Mode)

◈ Format
One-time Quest

◈ NPC
Smuggler Chao / Smuggler Chungho

◈ Monster
None

◈ Scenario
We have an order for smuggled goods to be delivered. You need to deliver smuggled goods to Smuggler Chungho in Donwhang. Smuggled goods delivery assignments are worth more Job EXP than trade goods collection assignments. It would do you well to undertake some of these.

◈ Mission
Collect 250 Mountain Goat Horns

◈ Reward
Experience 8156000

◈ Form
Available 3 times

◈ NPC
Slave Shifle

◈ Monster
Shaur

◈ Scenario
I don't remember how long I've been here for…
I can't even remember the faces of my family in the town… I wonder if they still remember me.
If there is one thing that comforts me in this terrible affliction, it's making flutes with the horns of mountain goats.
The flutes I made all broke.
Would you please gather some of those horns for me?
I may go crazy with loneliness if I don't play the flute. Please don't turn down this poor slave's request.
I will need 250 Mountain Goat Horns.
You can collect them from Shaurs.

◈ Task
Eliminate 25 Flame Giants

◈ Rewards
EXP 479,000 / Skill EXP 1,300

◈ Format
Repeatable quest (Restricted to once per day)

◈ NPC
Blacksmith Soboi

◈ Monsters
Flame Giant (The Burning Abyss level 71~80)

◈ How to Teleport
You can teleport to the Forgotten World by using a Dimension Hole.
You can obtain Dimension Holes from the monster that appears from the Dimension Pillars.

◈ Scenario
Monsters called Flame Giants are said to live on the Flame Mountain in the Forgotten World. They say that they are monsters of fire with immense strength. Many have fallen because of them already. You had best keep your curiosity in check and keep yourself from picking a fight with them.

◈ Task
Defeat 490 Brown Mane Kulds

◈ Reward
EXP 135250958 / Skill Points 2887 /
GOLD 232260

◈ Format
2

◈ NPC
Scout Commander Syujaatun

◈ Monster
Brown Mane Kuld

◈ Scenario
We are dispatched here to investigate the intelligence that suspicious people are found in the forest. However, demons called Brown Mane Kulds are blocking the forest, impeding our advances into the forest. There used to be no demons in the forest... It makes me wonder whether someone released them intentionally.
If their numbers decrease, it will be helpful... Can you help us?

◈ Task
Collect 160 Yeti Ivory

◈ Reward
EXP 881837 /
General's Tokens 10

◈ Format
Repeatable (x4)

◈ NPC
Outpost Guard Shaha

◈ Monster
Yeti

◈ Scenario
Have you seen the elephant demon of Karakoram, the Yetis? They immense strength is astounding, but what is really astonishing is their ivory. If they would just surrender their ivory, we wouldn't have to shed any blood, but that will never happen. We will have to slay them to get it. Could you help us?

◈ Mission
Speak to Egypt Governor Senmute.

◈ Reward
EXP 5412921 / Skill Points 1100 / Gold 2450

◈ Type
1 Time Only

◈ NPC
General Ratchel / Egypt Governor Senmute

◈ Monster
N/A

◈ Scenario
We can now employ the power of Berserk by using the pills that are made with Spirit Fragments. Would you believe me if I tell you that we can intensify the power of Berserk? Yes, it's true. The secret is hidden in a Pharaoh's tomb that was recently discovered in Alexandria, Egypt. Intensifying the power of Berserk will definitely strengthen our military power. I want you to visit Egypt Governor Senmute immediately to gather more information.

◈ Task
Speak with Lost Investigator Avrill

◈ Reward
EXP 2,734,354 / Skill Points 5,488 /
Gold 100,000

◈ Format
One-time quest

◈ NPC
General Ratchel / Lost Investigator Avrill

◈ Monsters
None

◈ Scenario
It seems that something unusual is taking place at the Temple of Jupiter. Since the discovery of the Crown of the Sun, we have seen a great increase in the number of investigative teams that would go down to the Temple. Yet, not one has returned. We have yet to hear from the soldiers, even, who went to the Temple in search of the investigators. Will you go and investigate the Temple on our behalf?

QNO_JUPITER_MAIN_001.quest_name: Lost in the Temple of Jupiter

desc.notice:
◈ Task
Deliver Devil Bug Wings

◈ Reward
EXP 9,002 /
Soldier's Tokens 4

◈ Format
One-time quest

◈ NPC
Outpost Guard He Shi Hu / Herbalist Bori

◈ Monster
None

◈ Scenario
With the rumor of defeating Devil Bugs spreading, Herbalist Bori in Donwhang is asking for the Devil Bug Wings. What could he possibly use such ugly monster wings for? I feel somewhat uneasy about it, but then, he has already provided us with high-quality potions. I cannot refuse his request. Would you please deliver the Devil Bug Wings to Bori?

◈ Mission
Speak with Adventurer Flora

◈ Reward
Experience 2583500

◈ Form
Available Once

◈ NPC
Gisaeng Juyeong / Adventurer Flora

◈ Monster
None

◈ Scenario
I have a childhood friend I grew up with. Even when I became a Gisaeng, she has treated me no differently. She was like family to me but currently she has gone missing.
Since the day that her fiance left to the Qin shi tomb and failed to return, she left to go look for him and hasn't returned yet and it's worrying me. Please help me find her.
Before she left, she told me that she would leave for the Qin-Shi Tomb with several adventurers from the Adventurer Flora's band. Perhaps you should go ask Flora about the whereabouts of her.
Please help me find my troubled friend.

◈ Task
Collect 45 Devil Bug Wings

◈ Reward
EXP 27007 /
Soldier's Tokens 5

◈ Format
One-time quest

◈ NPC
Outpost Guard Dao Hu

◈ Monster
Devil Bug

◈ Scenario
Have you heard? Devil Bugs are flying over to the outskirts of Donwhang itself laying ambush upon the townsfolk. How dare these mere bugs attack human beings? We cannot just sit and watch. We need to tear off their wings immediately!

◈ Mission
Collect 50 Ure'uth Wing Bones.

◈ Reward
EXP 10510528 / Skill Points 1500 / Gold 4856

◈ Type
1 Time Only

◈ NPC
Specialty Trader Kaella / Specialty Trader Kaella

◈ Monster
Ure'uth

◈ Scenario
Women love to powder their faces with the extra fine dust that's created from crushing Ure'uth's wing bones. While you're here in the Valley of the Kings, how'd you like to help me collect those bones? It'll be great if you bring me 50 Ure'uth Wing Bones.

◈ Task
Defeat 135 Hun Shooters and 146 Hun Assault Lancers

◈ Reward
EXP 446619 / Skill Points 250


◈ Format
One-time quest

◈ NPC
Outpost Commander Gavin

◈ Monster
Hun Shooter, Hun Assault Lancer

◈ Scenario
In order to prevent the Huns from increasing their power in this land, we have to destroy main forces and break their will to fight. I will leave this task to you. Defeat Hun Shooters and Hun Assault Lancers, the elite Hun soldiers. Go and show off your strength to your heart's content.

◈ Task
Eliminate 40 Togui Fighters

◈ Rewards
EXP 37,600 / Skill EXP 2,000

◈ Format
Repeatable quest (Restricted to once per day)

◈ NPC
Hunter Associate Ahmok

◈ Monsters
Togui Fighter (The Phantom of the Crimson Blood level 35~50)

◈ How to Teleport
You can teleport to the Forgotten World by using a Dimension Hole.
You can obtain Dimension Holes from the monster that appears from the Dimension Pillars.

◈ Scenario
Toguis Fighters from the Forgotten World are said to be bigger and stronger compared to average Toguis. I want to know how great their strength is. Won't you fight them and satisfy my curiosity?

◈ Reward
347,200 Job EXP (-50% in Safe Mode)

One-time Quest

◈ NPC
Trader Samanda / Trader Anna

None

◈ Scenario
We have an order for specialty goods to be delivered. You need to deliver specialty goods to Trader Anna in Constantinople. Specialty goods delivery assignments are worth more Job EXP than trade goods collection assignments. It would do you well to undertake some of these.

◈ Task
Collect 260 Mole's Red Fur

◈ Reward
EXP 2,288,469 /
General's Tokens 10

◈ Format
Repeatable (x4)

◈ NPC
Outpost Guard Ji He Long

◈ Monster
Mole

◈ Scenario
The monster Moles are highly violent, I hear. A number of my comrades have lost their lives to their claws. I would like to avenge their deaths, but I am not strong enough to do something like that. Please, I beg of you. Will you avenge their deaths on my behalf?

◈ Task
Speak with the Goods Supplier in Europe, Samarkand, or Hotan.

◈ Reward
3rd Grade Seal Accessory Set


◈ Format
One-time quest

◈ NPC
Goods Supplier in Europe, Samarkand, or Hotan

◈ Scenario
Congratulations! I have prepared for you accessories that will make you even more powerful. Please come see me in town.

◈ Mission
Speak to Egypt Governor Senmute.

◈ Reward
EXP 9618622 / Skill Points 1200 / Gold 2362

◈ Type
1 Time Only

◈ NPC
Finance Officer Maneto / Egypt Governor Senmute

◈ Monster
N/A

◈ Scenario
Mentuhotep practices medicine for his living, but he's actually a high priest of Osiris who possesses an immense magical power. I'm afraid that he might try to curse this land out of the rage and grief he feels over the death of his beloved daughter. I'd better warn my father as soon as possible. Please report her death to Governor Senmute.

◈ Task
Deliver Soil Ghost Bug Shells

◈ Reward
EXP 711,538 /
General's Tokens 5

◈ Format
One-time quest

◈ NPC
Outpost Guard Ru Li Mao / Protector Trader Yeolah

◈ Monster
None

◈ Scenario
The shells we have gained from Soil Ghost Bugs are safely stored in the warehouse of the outpost. I hear that they are incredibly strong. Perhaps this is why Protector Trader Yeolah is interested in them. So, we need someone to deliver the goods. Would you be interested in the task?

◈ Mission
Speak to Egypt Governor Senmute.

◈ Reward
EXP 10204396 / Skill Points 1400 / Gold 2406

◈ Type
1 Time Only

◈ NPC
Doctor Renenutet / Egypt Governor Senmute

◈ Monster
N/A

◈ Scenario
I really didn't want to believe this, but these monsters are believed to have been extinct since ancient times. I'm convinced that Mentuhotep has initiated the resurrection ritual. That means he's resurrected the ancient gods of Egypt. What if he's trying to avenge his daughter's death with their powers? Please report this to Governor Senmute right away.

◈ Task
Eliminate 160 Togui Sorcerers

◈ Rewards
EXP 17,500 / Skill EXP 14,000

◈ Format
One-time quest

◈ NPC
Hunter Associate Ahmok

◈ Monsters
Togui Sorcerer (The Phantom of the Crimson Blood level 61~70)

◈ How to Teleport
You can teleport to the Forgotten World by using a Dimension Hole.
You can obtain Dimension Holes from the monster that appears from the Dimension Pillars.

◈ Scenario
The first we must strike among the core Togui forces is, of course, the Togui Sorcerers. Their intelligence is quite high, and they take on the leadership roles among the Toguis. If they are destroyed, the military strength of Toguis will be cut down to less than half. I ask that you go and slay them.

◈ Task
Collect 150 Evergrasses of Qarum Batun

◈ Reward
EXP 234173558 / Skill Points 6404 /
GOLD 281300

◈ Format
1

◈ NPC
Secret Agent Sirun

◈ Monster
Unidentified Qarum Batun

◈ Scenario
If you are on your way to hunt Unidentified Qarum Batuns, I want to ask something of you. Have you heard of a thing called the Evergrass? It is the fruit of the cacti. I hear that Qarum Batuns also bear such fruit. I can make high quality potions with the fruit as the material. While you are at it slaying Unidentified Qarum Batuns, please also collect the Evergrass.

◈ Task
Deliver Demonic Petals

◈ Reward
EXP 51429 /
Soldier's Tokens 4

◈ Format
One-time quest

◈ NPC
Outpost Guard Dao Lian Hong / Protector Trader Yeolah

◈ Monster
None

◈ Scenario
Ha. I don't know what happened but I saw some beautiful flower petals in the outpost warehouse. Seeing those petals made me thought of Yeolah. Ah, Yeolah... How she makes my heart race. I haven't had a chance to confess my love to her yet. Sending her these flower petals will be a fine idea, I think. Will you take the petals to her in the name of love?

◈ Task
Deliver Earth Ghost Warrior's Combat Outfits

◈ Reward
EXP 1,109,158 /
General's Tokens 5

◈ Format
One-time quest

◈ NPC
Outpost Guard Ru Li Mao / Protector Trader Yeolah

◈ Monster
None

◈ Scenario
The combat outfit we seized from Earth Ghost Warriors are better than what we have expected. I was shocked to know these savages would possess such craftsmanship. It seems that this has also triggered the curiosity of Protector Trader Yeolah. We need to deliver Earth Ghost's Combat Outfit. Can you help us?

◈ Task
Deliver Chunks of Ice

◈ Reward
EXP 1121220 /
General's Tokens 5

◈ Format
One-time quest

◈ NPC
Outpost Guard Hu Ma Long / Hunter Associate Ahmok

◈ Monster
None

◈ Scenario
The Hunter Association is asking for Chunks of Ice from Planars and Sonas. What could they want these Chunks of Ice for? I am curious, but I can't just leave my post when I am on the guard duty. Could you help us with the delivery task?

◈ Task
Collect 200 Hell Hound's Fur

◈ Reward
EXP 4,475,663 / Skill Points 838 /
Gold 38,260

◈ Format
Unlimited Repeats

◈ NPC
Supply Assistant Titi

◈ Monsters
Hell Guard, Hell Defender

◈ Scenario
It is difficult to deliver supplies to the safe zone. Because of that, we are always hurting for the fabric needed to supply clothes. Would you be willing to slay some Hell Guards and Hell Defenders and bring us Hell Hound's Fur?

◈ Task
Speak with the Goods Supplier in China, Donwhang, or Hotan.

◈ Reward
3rd Grade Seal Accessory Set


◈ Format
One-time quest

◈ NPC
Goods Supplier in China, Donwhang, or Hotan.

◈ Scenario
Congratulations! I have prepared for you accessories that will make you even more powerful. Please come see me in town.

◈ Task
Eliminate 25 Flame Evils

◈ Rewards
EXP 208,000 / Skill EXP 1,250

◈ Format
Repeatable quest (Restricted to once per day)

◈ NPC
Storage-Keeper Auisan

◈ Monsters
Flame Evil (The Burning Abyss level 81~90)

◈ How to Teleport
You can teleport to the Forgotten World by using a Dimension Hole.
You can obtain Dimension Holes from the monster that appears from the Dimension Pillars.

◈ Scenario
Please slay Flame Evils. Why? No reason. I just hate the fact that there are monsters that harass the townsfolk.

◈ Task
Eliminate 180 Togui Boomers

◈ Rewards
EXP 19,800 / Skill EXP 16,000

◈ Format
One-time quest

◈ NPC
Hunter Associate Ahmok

◈ Monsters
Togui Boomer (The Phantom of the Crimson Blood level 61~70)

◈ How to Teleport
You can teleport to the Forgotten World by using a Dimension Hole.
You can obtain Dimension Holes from the monster that appears from the Dimension Pillars.

◈ Scenario
It looks like Toguis aren't ready to give up yet. We have reports that they are trying to mobilize a great army altogether. We can't just sit here, either. Before they can organize themselves, we must take them out one by one. Will you help us?

◈ Task
Speak with Outpost Commander Dick

◈ Reward
Skill Points 4


◈ Format
One-time quest

◈ NPC
Outpost Commander Amanda / Outpost Commander Dick

◈ Monster
None

◈ Scenario
I'm curious to know what the Barbaroi and the giants are up to, but we have priorities. Eastern Europe Outpost 3 to the south of here is asking for reinforcements. By the sounds of it, things are not going well with their fight against the nearby monsters. The way I see it, you are exactly the kind of a fellow they would need. What do you think?

◈ Task
Deliver Odd Eggs

◈ Reward
EXP 11,795 /
Monk's Tokens 4

◈ Format
One-time quest

◈ NPC
Outpost Guard Augustin / Sunset Witch

◈ Monster
None

◈ Scenario
Ah, what a beautiful day. It's like this day was made just for deliveries. On a day like this, even the uphill climb to the Witch's Lighthouse would feel like a downhill stroll. Speaking of which, there is something that needs to be delivered to the Witch's Lighthouse. Could you take it there?

◈ Task
Defeat 400 Temple Lions

◈ Reward
EXP 158,885,480 / Skill Points 5,226 /
Gold 352,800

◈ Format
One-time quest

◈ NPC
Lost Soldier Chrom

◈ Monsters
Temple Lion

◈ Scenario
We have a problem. The oppression of Temple Lions is getting worse with each passing day. The investigators and the soldiers can't do a thing about it. They may be statues, but their nature is like that of wild lions - very aggressive. Would you take care of those Temple Lions?

◈ Objective
Deliver Smuggled Goods Level 25 (Europe)

◈ Reward
176,900 Job EXP (-50% in Safe Mode)

◈ Format
One-time Quest

◈ NPC
Smuggler Raul / Smuggler Barus

◈ Monster
None

◈ Scenario
We have an order for smuggled goods to be delivered. You need to deliver Smuggled goods to Smuggler Barus in Samarkand. Smuggled goods delivery assignments are worth more Job EXP than trade goods collection assignments. It would do you well to undertake some of these.

◈ Task
Speak with Lost Soldier Neon

◈ Reward
EXP 6,696,778 / Skill Points 5,488 /
Gold 100,000

◈ Format
One-time quest

◈ NPC
Lost Soldier Will / Lost Soldier Neon

◈ Monsters
None

◈ Scenario
We've run into trouble during our investigation. While we have the greatest chance of discovering the truth, we can't go on with our small forces. I think you should be able to handle the Zealots Hideout Advanced… Would you be willing? Go to the Zealots Hideout Advanced and help Neon who's in there by himself.

◈ Task
Deliver Fragments of Buddhist Scripture

◈ Reward
EXP 623 /
Monk's Tokens 4

◈ Format
One-time quest

◈ NPC
Outpost Guard Iz / Buddhist Priest Kushyan

◈ Monster
None

◈ Scenario
Wei Yen told me that you have finished collecting the Fragments of Buddhist Scripture. You don't look it, but you must be strong. While you are at it, would you be willing to deliver them to Buddhist Priest Kushyan? Of course, once you bring them to him, he will compensate you as well.

◈ Task
Speak with the Goods Supplier in China, Donwhang, or Hotan.

◈ Reward
1st Grade Seal Weapon (Select One)


◈ Format
One-time quest

◈ NPC
Goods Supplier in China, Donwhang, or Hotan.

◈ Scenario
Pleased to meet you.
As you are a first-timer in the world of Silk Road, I have prepared a weapon that will prove useful when hunting monsters. Please come see me.

◈ Mission
Eliminate 1000 Sylakenths.

EXP 9188110 / Skill Points 1050 / Gold 49875

◈ Type
Repeatable

◈ NPC
Palace Guard Mushari / Palace Guard Mushari

◈ Monster
Sylakenth

◈ Scenario
Prove to me that you're capable of becoming a true Deity by hunting 1000 Sylakenths.

◈ Task
Collect 120 Scorpion's Stingers

◈ Reward
EXP 127397 /
Soldier's Tokens 5

◈ Format
One-time quest

◈ NPC
Outpost Guard Ramadin

◈ Monster
Scorpion

◈ Scenario
Scorpions that roam the Tarim Basin use highly threatening stingers as their main weapon. If we leave them be, many will suffer casualty. We can't let mere monsters threaten human life. Will you help?

◈ Task
Defeat 250 Ruin Watchers and 250 Ruin Cutters

◈ Reward
EXP 5,444,555 / Skill Points 838 /
Gold 45,950

◈ Format
Unlimited Repeats

◈ NPC
Lost Soldier Brandon

◈ Monsters
Ruin Watcher, Ruin Cutter

◈ Scenario
We have trouble. Ruin Watchers and Ruin Cutters are amassing greatly in the Forest of Sorrow. Perhaps they are out to annihilate us… Won't you help me get rid of them? I will be sure to pay you handsomely for it.

◈ Mission
Eliminate 500 Tenens.

◈ Reward
EXP 4953590 / Skill Points 500 / Gold 23843

◈ Type
Repeatable

◈ NPC
Egyptian Soldier Turian / Egyptian Soldier Turian

◈ Monster
Tenen

◈ Scenario
Alright, let's start the Deity training. Now it's time for you to hunt 500 Tenens.

◈ Task
Speak with the Goods Supplier in China, Donwhang, or Hotan.

◈ Reward
3rd Grade Seal Armor Set (Select One Set)


◈ Format
One-time quest

◈ NPC
Goods Supplier in China, Donwhang, or Hotan.

◈ Scenario
You have reached level 16 already!
Finally, it's time to replace your armor. I will prepare armor that fits you perfectly so, please, come see me in town.

◈ Mission
Teleport to Flame Sprite

◈ Reward
Experience 4000100

◈ Form
Available Once

◈ NPC
Leebaek the Guild Manager of Jangan

◈ Monster
None

◈ Scenario
I will help you so you can meet white viper as I promised. But do not forget this.
The White viper is so strong that you can't even imagine how strong he is...
Be prepared and keep yourself tight.

None

The protector trader in Donwhang, Yeolah, needs some hard material, apparently. She has asked our outpost for help, but all we have are these Ghost Bug Shells. Would take these to her? If she likes them, she will certainly pay you for them.

Goods Supplier in Europe, Samarkand, or Hotan

You have reached level 16 already!
Finally, it's time to replace your armor. I will prepare armor that fits you perfectly so, please, come see me in town.

EXP 13,090 /
Monk's Tokens 5

◈ Format
One-time quest

◈ NPC
Outpost Volunteer Lily

◈ Monster
Brontes, Polipemos

◈ Scenario
I have seen my seniors fight Bronteses and Polipemoses. They barely managed to slay them, but I can't forget their frightening eyes. I can't even sleep soundly at night. Please, help me.

1 Time Only

Sand Bug
