Huh? I don't have any white horses. Well, we could dye a horse to change its color to white. Sand Bugs in the Storm and Cloud Desert produce this bodily fluid that I can use to dye one of my horses. Please bring me 100 Bodily Fluid of Sand Monster from Sand Bugs.

desc1.notice: Collecting 100 Bodily Fluids of Sand Monter (%d)

desc.notice:
◈ Mission
Collect 100 Tomb Guard Armor

◈ Reward
Experience 3995000 / GOLD 150000

◈ Form
Available 3 times

◈ NPC
Jangan Armor Trader Mrs. Jang.

◈ Monster
Tomb Guard

◈ Scenario
Welcome back. I was hoping that you would stop by again. I have been crafting finer armor pieces with the Tomb Solider and Tomb Warrior Armor. And I heard another interesting story.
There are Tomb Guards in the Qin-Shi Tomb. They say that these golems, unlike others, have special ornaments on their armor which have the power to repel evil spirits. I would like to use those ornaments on the armor that I am crafting right now.
It may turn out to be a mere rumor but, I would like to craft an armor that could protect the wearer as much as possible. Would you mind hunting the Tomb Guards to collect their armors?
Since you have already hunted the armor of the Tomb Solider and the Tomb Warriors before, I'm sure you can handle this one, too.
Please collect 100 pieces of Tomb Guard Armor.

◈ Task
Collect 200 Ujigi's Brown Manes

◈ Reward
EXP 557949 /
General's Tokens 10

◈ Format
Repeatable (x2)

◈ NPC
Outpost Guard Rabbath

◈ Monster
Ujigi

◈ Scenario
I can't stand the rampage of Ujigis any longer. Rather than simply slaying them, we must do something symbolic to instill fear in their hearts. Yes, how about slaying Ujigis and then pulling out their hair?

◈ Mission
Speak to Potion Trader Thiara.

◈ Reward
EXP 4953590 / Skill Points 800 / Gold 2384

◈ Type
1 Time Only

◈ NPC
Hunter Union President Narmer / Potion Trader Thiara

◈ Monster
N/A

◈ Scenario
This is a secret, but I'm in love with Ms. Melit at the accessory shop. For me, it was love at first sight. Sadly, I'm way too timid to confess my feelings to her. So, I was thinking… I heard that Potion Trader Thiara developed a Love Potion. Do you mind bringing it to me? I don't want anyone else to know that it's for me.

◈ Task

◈ Reward
EXP 54683 /
Soldier's Tokens 4

◈ Format
One-time quest

◈ NPC
Hunter Associate Shahad / Grocery Trader Saha

◈ Monster
None

◈ Scenario
There is someone who wants Ong's Wings you retrieved before. If you don't mind, will you deliver them for us?

QNO_N_CA_016.quest_name: Let's make a gorgeous wing dress

desc.notice:
◈ Task
Defeat 274 Ishades and 133 Hashades

◈ Reward
EXP 1616587 / Skill Points 636


◈ Format
Repeatable (x3)

◈ NPC
Outpost Commander Hu Ru Lang

◈ Monster
Ishade, Hashade

◈ Scenario
There is something you can help us with. Have you seen demons called Isahdes and Hashades around this outpost? These are ice demons that wander around Karakoram. Some call them Ice Goddesses because of their beautiful looks, but they are nothing more than human-eating demons that must be eradicated. Will you help us eradicate them?

◈ Task
Eliminate 1 Ghost Glutton

◈ Rewards
EXP 1,316,770 / SP 100

◈ Format
Repeatable quest (Restricted to once per day)

◈ NPC
Doctor Renenutet

◈ Monsters
Ghost Glutton (The Sea of Resentment level 101~110)

◈ How to Teleport
You can teleport to the Forgotten World by using a Dimension Hole.
You can obtain Dimension Holes from the monster that appears from the Dimension Pillars.

◈ Scenario
The Ghost Glutton from the Forgotten World is no evil spirit, per se, but it is still a horrible monster that eats humans. The door to the Forgotten World is already open and we can't close it, so we will have to make plans to eradicate those monsters. Will you put your martial skills to use and defeat Ghost Gluttons for us?

◈ Task
Collect 210 Spider Shells

◈ Reward
EXP 934673 /
General's Tokens 10

◈ Format
Repeatable (x3)

◈ NPC
Outpost Guard Chahamma

◈ Monster
Blue-Face Spider, White-Face Spider

◈ Scenario
Hup! Hup! This cold weather is driving me nuts. To beat this weather, I will at least need some food in my stomach. Slay Blue-Face Spiders and White-Face Spiders around here. I will have to use their shell as bowls or something.

◈ Task
Collect 70 Ong's Bodily Fluid

◈ Reward
EXP 82025 /
Soldier's Tokens 5

◈ Format
One-time quest

◈ NPC
Outpost Guard Ramadin

◈ Monster
Ong

◈ Scenario
Buddhist Priest Bupgong of Donwhang knows how to purify wicked energy. He says that he can erase the wicked energy of a demon with its bodily fluid. Insects called Ongs happen to be rampaging right now. Please bring me their bodily fluid.

◈ Task
Speak with the Goods Supplier in China, Donwhang, or Hotan.

◈ Reward
4th Grade Seal Shield


◈ Format
One-time quest

◈ NPC
Goods Supplier in China, Donwhang, or Hotan.

◈ Scenario
You have reached level 24! A new shield came in and I think it will fit you perfectly. I will give it to you as a gift so, please, come see me in town.

◈ Mission
Collect 20 Tears of Tomb Snake Soul

◈ Reward
Experience 5040200

◈ Form
Available Once

◈ NPC
Leebaek the Guild Manager of Jangan

◈ Monster
Tomb Snake Soul

◈ Scenario
So, you said you need to know where the white viper because you need its blood to save Sochil's friend?
Ha! What a teary story if it is a true.
If you are trying to ask me for a favor using a poor beggar child, you've found the wrong person.
How dare you to come and ask me for information that I've worked so hard to find out for myself. I can maybe share that information with you for a favor, but I won't give it for free.
Are you interested in doing a favor for me in exchange?
There is a monster in the Qin-Shi Tomb called the Tomb Snake Soul. It sheds a single tear when it dies. That tear has bright red luminance so it is used as accessories for women.
Bring me 20 of those tears.

desc1.notice: Collect 20 Tears of Tomb Snake Soul (%d)

Repeatable

Job Union Representative Mansuana / Job Union Representative Mansuana

All Monsters in the Shrine

I'll award Region Points to the first union that brings me 300 Marks of the Warrior before the others. Enjoy the hunt!

None

Whew... I have so much to do today as always. A delivery order was issued a little while ago. I don't know why they drive me like a slave like this. It's not like they supply Return Scrolls. I'm sorry to bother you, but could you help me with my delivery duty?

Gold 459,500

One-time quest

Baal Worshipper Million

◈ Scenario
Have you seen Vampire Witches or Evil Witches on your way here? They are demons from hell who seduce people to drink their blood and gain strength. This is unforgivable, don't you think? Would you slay them and bring me their bracelets as proof?

Genie's Lamp

◈ Form
Unlimited Repeats

◈ NPC
All Daily Quest Manager

◈ Monster
Monsters at level 126~130

◈ Scenario
Did you see Homeless Genie around here? He has been locked in the lamp for long dreaming for freedom. Something absurd happens to him. Genie was stolen lamp while he granted anyone's wishes. The lamp is like life to Genie.. If you're not too busy, will you search for the lamp for Genie?

Imhotep / Priest of Punishment

I'll help any union to consolidate their dominance of the Shrine, but only if they complete my mission: eliminate 100 Imhotep and 100 Priests of Punishment.

EXP 11829691 / Skill Points 1900 / Gold 5031

◈ Type
1 Time Only

◈ NPC
Hunter Union President Narmer / Hunter Union President Narmer

◈ Monster
Sylaken / Sand Worm

◈ Scenario
We Hunters wear heavy armor when we escort the travelling members of trading companies. Our armor is already unbearable because of the weight, but wearing it gets even worse in the desert... It's unbearably hot in the day and cold at night. I wish we could use some magical ingredients to keep our armor at a nice, comfortable temperature... Would you bring me Cold and Hot Powders from Sylakens and Sand Worms in the Storm and Cloud Desert? I'd really appreciate it.

2nd Grade Seal Shield

One-time quest

You have reached level 8! I have prepared a shield just for you so, please, come see me.

We have an order for smuggled goods to be delivered. You need to deliver Smuggled goods to Smuggler Chao in Jangan. Smuggled goods delivery assignments are worth more Job EXP than trade goods collection assignments. It would do you well to undertake some of these.

1 Time Only

Sylakenth / Aknish

◈ Scenario
They're always fighting. Everyone in this entire city knows about it. Did Mr. Hemaka misunderstand her again? I used to be worried about them, but not so much anymore. Alright, I'll give you my signature if you bring me some rare accessory materials: I need 50 Sylakenth Crystals and 50 Aknish Crystals from the Storm and Cloud Desert. It's not too difficult for you, is it?

◈ Task
Obtain 25 Demon Jade

◈ Rewards
EXP 208,000 / Skill EXP 1,250

◈ Format
Repeatable quest (Restricted to once per day)

◈ NPC
Nephrite Refiner Pahap

◈ Monsters
Flame Evil (The Burning Abyss level 81~90)

◈ How to Teleport
You can teleport to the Forgotten World by using a Dimension Hole.
You can obtain Dimension Holes from the monster that appears from the Dimension Pillars.

◈ Scenario
This whole thing with the Forgotten World has got everyone's tongue wagging. In particular, the Demon Jade carried by Flame Evils is said to be quite beautiful. They say it's as beautiful as nephrite. Hmph! I have no interest in such senseless rumors, but I am a little curious. So, could you get me some Demon Jade? *chuckle*

◈ Reward
EXP 10825843 / Skill Points 1600 / Gold 4900

◈ Type
1 Time Only

◈ NPC

Mehen

◈ Scenario
Oh, I'm in trouble! Some of my export goods were robbed by monsters in the desert. Losing them will completely bankrupt me, and I don't know what to do. Do you think you can help? Please retrieve my goods from Mehens near the Chaos Maze in the Valley of the Kings. 60 of them will be enough to save my business.

◈ Task
Defeat 450 Mutant Baal's Guides

◈ Reward
EXP 233,366,492 / Skill Points 5,226 /
Gold 364,400

◈ Format
One-time quest

◈ NPC
Lost Soldier Fernando

◈ Monsters
Mutant Baal's Guide

◈ Scenario
Could you please take care of Mutant Baal's Guides wandering about? They not only look ugly, but they attack me just relentlessly. I could use your help.

Collect 80 Earth Ghost Teeth

◈ Reward
EXP 61,512 /
Soldier's Tokens 5

◈ Format
One-time quest

◈ NPC
Outpost Guard Liao Xiao Jun

◈ Monster
Earth Ghost, Meek Earth Ghost

◈ Scenario
Earth Ghosts are terrible demons that dominate this whole region. In reality, though, Earth Taoists and Earth Magicians are the really dangerous ones. Most ordinary Earth Ghosts are just your average barbaric demons. Even we can take on Earth Ghosts and Meek Earth Ghosts. Don't believe me? Then, go and see for yourself.

◈ Objective
Collect 50 units of Duck Eggs (China)

◈ Reward
380 Job EXP / item (10% bonus when quota filled) -50% in Safe Mode

◈ Format
Unlimited Repeatable

◈ NPC
Smuggler Chao

◈ Monster
Monsters Lv 10-19

◈ Scenario
You need to work ceaselessly to increase your Job level. If you are ready, bring me 50 units of Duck Eggs. You should be able to find Duck Eggs as you hunt monsters at level 10-19. If you run out of time and don't find enough Duck Eggs, don't worry. Even if you don't have all 50 units, I will pay you for what you have. But don't forget that you have to bring all 50 units to gain greater Job EXP.

◈ Task
Obtain 40 Togui Tendons

◈ Rewards
EXP 91,000 / Skill EXP 2,000

◈ Format
Repeatable quest (Restricted to once per day)

◈ NPC
Hunter Associate Ahmok

◈ Monsters
Togui Fighter (The Phantom of the Crimson Blood level 51~60)

◈ How to Teleport
You can teleport to the Forgotten World by using a Dimension Hole.
You can obtain Dimension Holes from the monster that appears from the Dimension Pillars.

◈ Scenario
Since the Forgotten World appeared, the pillaging of the Toguis has caused immense damage. If we don't throw a bucket of cold water on their spirit now, they might become even rowdier. So, we are recruiting those who will deal with them. If you are interested, you should apply.

◈ Task
Speak with Doctor Renenutet

◈ Rewards
EXP 212000 / SP 100

◈ Format
One-time quest

◈ NPC
Governor Senmut / Doctor Renenutet

◈ Monsters
None

◈ Scenario
Lately, we are receiving frequent reports of evil spirits appearing in Alexandria. It's no trouble if they just appear and then vanish. The problem is that the citizens are suffering for it. I know I have heard the rumor that evil spirits are coming into our world since the door to the Forgotten World opened, but... could that really cause all of this? Please go see Doctor Renenutet and see what is going on here.

◈ Mission
Deliver Shifle's Key

◈ Reward
Experience 2609000

◈ Form
Available Once

◈ NPC
Slave Jabur / Slave Shifle

◈ Monster
None

◈ Scenario
Thanks to your efforts our escape plan is progressing smoothly.
Not only that, I had good fortune yesterday and found a key that can release Shifle.
If we can find my key and Shifle's key now, we will be free men.
So, will you take this key to Shifle?

◈ Task
Speak with the Goods Supplier in China, Donwhang, or Hotan.

◈ Reward
3rd Grade Seal Shield


◈ Format
One-time quest

◈ NPC
Goods Supplier in China, Donwhang, or Hotan.

◈ Scenario
You have reached level 16! I have prepared a shield fitting for someone at level 16.
Please come see me in town. I will be waiting for you there.

◈ Mission
Collect 10 Marks of Alliance (Will)

◈ Reward
3 Potions of Will

◈ Form
Unlimited attempts

◈ NPC
Villager Anashya

◈ Monster
None

◈ Scenario
It has been a long time since we are under the Roc clan's rule.
But because of people like you who seek to defeat Roc, we are not giving up the hope of freedom
We prepared some supplies for your battles to thank all your hard work.
Although we can't fight on the frontline with you, we would like to help in your battles by providing some things that you would need.
If you bring us 10 Marks of Alliance(Will), I will exchange those into the Potions of Will which increases your attack ratio and parry ratio.
If you would like different rewards, you can go visit Salihan who lives in Shepherd town or the Chief of village Bukhra in the Wind Town.
Just so you know, you will need 7Marks of Alliance(Recovery) for Salihan, or 15 marks of Alliance(Resurrection) for Bukhra to receive your reward.

◈ Task
Deliver Yeti Ivory

◈ Reward
EXP 1175783 /
General's Tokens 5

◈ Format
One-time quest

◈ NPC
Outpost Guard Chi Hu Dai / Specialty Trader Sanmok

◈ Monster
None

◈ Scenario
The word of having retrieved Yeti Ivory got out, and we are overwhelmed with orders coming in. The next delivery is going to Specialty Trader Sanmok, but we are so busy that it will be difficult for us to send it to him. Could you give us a hand?

QNO_N_KT_104.quest_name: Extra fine goods for making a fortune

desc.notice:

EXP 803,397,045 / Skill Points 5,226 /
Gold 100,000

◈ Format
One-time quest

◈ NPC
Lost Soldier Nice

◈ Monsters
Yuno

◈ Scenario
Hey, friend. I think very highly of you, but my friend thinks otherwise. He says you seem too young and brash to be trusted. So, we made a bet. We want to see if you are someone who could be a match for Jupiter himself. Since you seek to face Jupiter, I'm sure Yuno would be nothing to you. All you have to do is slay Yuno and bring Yuno's Tear. How about it? Easy, huh?

◈ Objective

70,500 Job EXP (-50% in Safe Mode)

One-time Quest

Smuggler Chao / Smuggler Chungho

None

We have an order for smuggled goods to be delivered. You need to deliver Smuggled goods to Smuggler Chungho in Donwhang. Smuggled goods delivery assignments are worth more Job EXP than trade goods collection assignments. It would do you well to undertake some of these.

EXP 10825843 / Skill Points 1600 / Gold 4900

◈ Type
1 Time Only

◈ NPC
Doctor Renenutet / Doctor Renenutet

◈ Monster
Mhont / Keisas

◈ Scenario
This time, I need 100 Warrior Ostracons (Intermediate) from the Intermediate Pharaoh's Tomb. You can get them by hunting Mhonts and Keisases.

1 Time Only

◈ Scenario
I'm doing my best, but I must tell you that this is harder than I thought. I'm sorry, but I'm going to need more samples. Please bring me 50 Aknish Lama Samples, 50 Sylaken Samples, and 50 Sand Worm Samples from the Storm and Cloud Desert.

◈ Task
Hunt 650 Coastal Sand Snakes

◈ Reward
Experience 184806947 / Skill Exp 6998 /
GOLD 325000

◈ Form
Available once

◈ NPC
Royal Investigator Mahlipatun

◈ Monster
Coastal Sand Snake

◈ Scenario
The Arabia Coast was the starting point of the overseas trade in the past. However, because of the coastal sand snakes, the overseas trade is impossible now. Therefore, Baghdad is lacking supplies. Please defeat the sand snakes to solve this problem.

◈ Mission
Collect 100 Torn Book Fragments.

◈ Reward
EXP 11150619 / Skill Points 1700 / Gold 4943

◈ Type
1 Time Only

◈ NPC
Guild Manager Elia / Guild Manager Elia

◈ Monster
Sand Bug

◈ Scenario
No, I didn't forget to return the book to the library. Sand Bugs stole it from me while I was taking a walk in the desert! I didn't know what to do because I had no way of getting it back, and I was afraid that Ahha would be angry with me for losing it. The book's due date has passed, but I still don't know what to do. Please help to retrieve the book from Sand Bugs in the Storm and Cloud Desert. I'd even appreciate it if you could bring that book back in pieces. Please help me.

◈ Task
Collect 100 Serpent Fluid

◈ Reward
EXP 431,359,607 / Skill Points 7,321 /
Gold 459,500

◈ Format
One-time quest

◈ NPC
Lost Investigator Avrill

◈ Monsters
Hell Serpent

◈ Scenario
I have examined the fragments of the Crown of the Sun that you retrieved for us. I am told that the fragments can be put back together only with Serpent Fluid. Hunt Hell Serpents inhabiting the Forest of Sorrow and retrieve Serpent Fluid for us.

◈ Mission
Kill the Captain of army or survive 10 minutes of that fight.

◈ Reward
None

◈ Form
Available once

◈ NPC
General Sonhyeon

◈ Monster
Captain of army/ Commander of army.

◈ Scenario
By the mandate of Imperial Majesty, the imperial army is seeking people with the power to fight against transcendental beings that threaten this world.
Would you be willing to take the test hold by imperial army? We are going to tell the way to be stronger to thoes who pass the test.
I think you should be able to pass the test easily.
Okay, I will explain what kind of test you would take.
When you enter the test center, you will fight with the captain of army . You should kill him under 10 minutes or survive from the fight during the 10 minutes.
You can choose what you want to do according to your ability. Before you enter the test center, remember that if you die, the test will be finished.
If you are ready to take the test, come and talk to me.
I will transfer you to the test center.
Often time during the test, there should be some soldier who would disturb you and you should defeat them as well.
Good luck then.

desc1.notice: Kill Army Captain or Survive for 10 Mins

I've received reports of suspicious tents inside the forest. As you know, only the soldiers of Baghdad Kingdom have been dispatched around here. It is not easy to investigate the inside of the forest due to some serious resistance. We need your hand.

None

Weapon Trader Balbardo seems interested in the Baroi's Bolts we have. He says he wants to study the bolts crafted by the Barbaroi. He offered to repair our equipment for free if we would do that for him. Not a bad trade, don't you think? Would you please deliver the bolts to him?

Lately, the forest has been disquieting. Rotting trees have arisen, wreaking havoc in the forest. Is this merely a natural disaster? I think not. I think something wicked is involved in this series of events. Destroy the tree demons and verify if they contain something artificial inside them.

Collect Relic of Sun God

◈ Reward
None

◈ Form
Available once.

◈ NPC
Exorcist Miaoryeong

◈ Monster
Ishade / Hashade

◈ Scenario
Now that you have the Branch of Life, we need the Relic of Sun God which will help us to build the fire as it collects the heat of the sun.
This was used in the ritual to appease the Sun God but, as people began to forsake the god, it disappeared as well.
There is a place where the worshippers of the Sun God had their last ceremony. It's far away from here in the land of Minor Asia, near the Gate of Cleopatra.
You should be able to find the Relic of Sun God there.
If you are willing to do this, I will tell you how to find it.
The Relic of Sun God has the kind of power that attracts light. So if you give you out the light, you sould be able to find it.
Therefore, you need the tool that gives out the light, why don't you use the Resplendent Crystal? You should be able to find them from monsters called Ishade and Hashade that live on icy roads.
You can only use Resplendent Crystals once, so get about 20 of them before you go to find the Relic of Sun God.

This is agonizing. If I can last here a little longer and find out the truth, I will be a hero in my hometown, Constantinople. But surviving here is no easy task with those lions attacking me. Look at this. I got this wound fighting those lions. How dare they inflict a wound on my beautiful face...? I can't continue to do my investigation sustaining wounds like this. It would make me feel so much better if you would slay those Battle Lions and Roaring Battle Lions. Would you be up for it?

◈ Scenario
Planars and Sonas are ice fairies created by Isyutaru, although the term "demons" would better describe them. They use the cold energy to seduce people and then drive them insane. If demons such as they continue to appear, we won't last. Will you slay those demons for us?

Gold 433500

Those barbaric Earth Ghosts dominate the West China region. Earth Taoists and Earth Magicians reign as they subdue nearby demons with mysterious spells. And, now, they are attempting to form an alliance with Hyungnos who are back from the dead in order to increase their sphere of influence further. We cannot let these pesky demons to form alliances. We must slay Hyungno's to prevent the alliance from taking place.

Do you see the large tree over there far away? In the past, the tree was not that big. However, some time ago, the tree started getting bigger and is chewing away at the life of the Arabia Coast. Therefore, there is an agent that is investigating the tree over there. Can you go find him and help him?

I was wandering around the entertainer house one day looking for something to eat. And I overheard the Gisengs talking about a white viper.

You might be able to find some informations of a white viper from the Gisaengs. Will you help me?
I want to save my friend. Please help.
Please go find some informations about the white viper from the Gisaengs and let me know.

desc.notice:

Unlimited repeats

All Daily Quest Managers

Monster level 41~50

◈ Scenario
Monsters are gradually growing stronger these days. Human resources have been gathered to start research on monsters to stop them. The royal palaces of Eastern Europe and China are offering their support so the weaknesses of monsters are expected to be revealed soon. However, there are some difficulties with research because of a lack of monster samples. If you gather monster samples, we will have a peaceful world sooner, right? If you have some time to spare, please slay monsters and bring me 25 Crude Essence of Strength. I think monsters that are about as strong as you will do. Oh, I have a sufficient reward ready, so don't worry.

Unlimited Repeats

Did you see Homeless Genie around here? He has been locked in the lamp for long dreaming for freedom. Something absurd happens to him. Genie was stolen lamp while he granted anyone's wishes. The lamp is like life to Genie.. If you're not too busy, will you search for the lamp for Genie?

My friend, you've come. Thank you for your help last time. Are you curious as to how it all turned out? We drew.
Someone helped him make EXACTLY the same item I made. So it was declared a draw.
So we bet against each other one more time. I must win this time. Will you help me one more time?
This time the winner will be whoever makes better equipment from the soldiers that haunt the ruins of Niya. So I have selected the necklaces that the soldiers wear.
Help me collect 100 Niya soldier necklaces. 100 Niya necklaces should be enough.I must win this time. Muhahaha.

◈ How to Teleport
You can teleport to the Forgotten World by using a Dimension Hole.
You can obtain Dimension Holes from the monster that appears from the Dimension Pillars.

◈ Scenario
Togui Boomers use bombs unlike other Toguis. Whenever they invade the town, they throw those bombs around causing great damage. I had to pour in a lot of money to fix up my store, too. I just need to get back at them. Won't you teach those Togui Boomers a lesson for me?

Have you seen the spiders lurking around the kingdom? They are disgusting! How can we just sit here and watch them crawl about? Please, go and defeat those nasty things and break their legs for us.

◈ Monster

◈ Scenario
The number of patients who fail to overcome the power of darkness and fall ill from unknown diseases are quickly rising. I am curing them by casting a spell directly on them, but I can only do so much. It might be a better idea to prevent the people from these diseases before it happens.
I want to distribute charms with spells cast on it, but, in order to cast a powerful spell, I need some Ashen Mist Powder.
You can get Ashen Mist Powders from the Tomb Ghosts who live deep down in the Qin-Shi Tomb. Get me 125 Ashen Mist Powders.

EXP 353 /
Monk's Tokens 5

One-time quest

◈ NPC
Outpost Guard Dave

◈ Monster
Graesp, Edenp

◈ Scenario
How could this be? Look at the brutality of Graesps and Edenps, those nasty demons. These cursed things steal things from people. Not only that, they have even stolen the hairpin of my love, Tina the Specialty Trader! These wicked, wicked beings must not be forgiven. Please, help me.

◈ Rewards
EXP 125,000 / Skill EXP 10,000

◈ Format
One-time quest

◈ NPC
Hunter Associate Ahmok

◈ Monsters
Flame Witch (The Burning Abyss level 81~90)

◈ How to Teleport
You can teleport to the Forgotten World by using a Dimension Hole.
You can obtain Dimension Holes from the monster that appears from the Dimension Pillars.

◈ Scenario
If we are to avoid the battle with the Flame Mountain, we have no choice but to bring down the Flame Cow King who rules them all. But the Flame Cow King is so powerful that even you would have a hard time facing him. So, we must weaken him first. It will certainly help us if we seize the two flame sources said to be the source of his powers.

Collect 100 Mysterious Pots

◈ Reward
EXP 926,923 /
General's Tokens 10

◈ Format
Repeatable (x4)

◈ NPC
Outpost Guard Ji He Long

◈ Monster
Diamond Yacha

◈ Scenario
Diamond Yachas in the lower levels of the Donwhang Stone Cave are said to carry pots that contain evil spirits. They increase their power by absorbing wicked energy with those pots. I don't even want to think about what manner of terrible things will take place if they began abusing something as terrible as those pots. The good news is, it hasn't been that long since they awoke. That means we have time before they absorb enough energy. Will you stop them before terrible things happen?

General's Tokens 10

Repeatable (x4)

If you have seen Evil Yetis, you probably saw the clubs they carry. I don't know how they manage to swing something so huge. But, more to my point, I wonder if it's possible to be struck by something like that and stand up again? While we are on this topic, why don't we get some of those clubs? Will you help me?

Hmph! I knew it! I knew it the moment I got assigned to this place. What kind of a forest is infested with so many tree demons, anyway? We don't even have an outhouse here, so we have to go into the forest to do our business, you know. It scares the crap out of me. Could you take care of them for me somehow?

The Metal of the Abyss carried by Ghost Specters are very rare. It's sold at a very high price. I would like to trade that metal through the trading company as well, but I have no way of procuring it. If you have the time for it, will you bring me some Metal of the Abyss?

One day, a customer stopped by and immediately recognized that the spears belonged to Royal Soldiers! Then he asked me if there were spears that belonged to Royal Guards. I told him no and he said that he would come back next time. He asked me to save one just for him if I got some in. So I'd like to ask of you? would you get some Royal Guard Spears for me?
It was a strong request from the customer and I would like to be able to meet his request.
Please bring me 40 Royal Guard Spears. You would understand if you were in this business yourself.
You can find Royal Guards on the 2nd level of the Qin-Shi Tomb.

There is obviously no way that a young kid like him could find such a thing but, still, tell him the truth.

This is terrible! I don't think we'll get out of this recession any time soon. No one wants to join a guild, which makes my job even harder. I need something that'll help me popularize guilds… How about throwing an event with the weapons of the desert monsters? Yes, it'll be great! Okay then, I'll plan the event. You go ahead and secure the merchandise. Yes, I'll need Desert Monster Sword. You can find them from Akerus in the Storm and Cloud Desert. 100 will be enough for a one-time event.

◈ Scenario
After the pharaoh tomb and Shrine were discovered, many trading companies are flocking to Egypt to win over potential customers like tourists and adventurers. As president of the Trader Union, I can't let them take away our customers. As part of our efforts to consolidate our market dominance, I want to reclaim the Storm and Cloud Desert from monsters. If you'd like to help me, please hunt 50 Sand Stings and 50 Sand Worms in the area.

◈ Reward
EXP 10204396 / Skill Points 1400 / Gold 4812

◈ Type
1 Time Only

◈ NPC
Potion Trader Thiara / Potion Trader Thiara

◈ Monster
Dark Sandman

◈ Scenario
Man, this is so inefficient! Huh? What am I talking about, you asked? I'm talking about high raw costs and low profits. Potion ingredients cost so much that I can barely make any money from the finished products. So, I was thinking… Maybe I want to water the potions down. Well, it's not a good idea to use regular water, but I think I can use Magic Spring Water from the Dark Sandmen in the Valley of the Kings. Say, isn't that brilliant idea? If you agree, please bring me 100 Magic Spring Water from Dark Sandmen. Won't you help me out?

desc.notice:
◈ Mission
Deliver Stone Beast's Bell to Buddhist Priest Jeonghye

◈ Reward
None

◈ Form
Available once

◈ NPC
Exorcist Miaoryeong and Buddhist Priest Jeonghye

◈ Monster
Stone Ghost / Tombe Ghost / Tome Spirit

◈ Scenario
You need the Piece of Spirits.
We need to call the spirit in order to get the Piece of Spirit but is is impossible to contact with the Spirit as a human.
But we can use some ingredients to do a ceremony to call the spirits
If you bring me a Spirit's Shell and an Normal Spirit, I will help you to summon a soul.
First, get me a Spirit's Shell.
You can get one from an Old Tombstone Ghost.
But it might be rather difficult to find Old Tombstone Ghosts because they sleep inside a tombstone.
They will be awake if they hear the sound of a Spirit's Bell, so you will have to first obtain a Spirit's Bell.
The Lion Statue monsters in the Qin-Shi Tomb wear a bell around their necks. Originally, these were enchanted and put on the statues to prevent souls from approaching the Tomb.
Get one of those bells and bring it to Zheng Hui the Monk of the Temple of Mercy and Grace to have the bell purified through the power of Buddha.
Then, use it in the cemetery to bring out an Old Tombstone Ghost. Defeat it and obtain the Spirit's Shell.
First, find a bell and bring it to the monk at the temple.

◈ Scenario
Hey, Can you show me that feather you are holding right now?
I've never seen a feather with such mysterious powers before...
What did you say? It is Roc's Red Feather?
I did think that this feather is no ordinary feather but I had no idea it would exude this sort of mysteious power.
Dude, Will you give this to me? I would like to take this mysterious power and imbue gems with it so that the gems take on more beaufiful colors.
Instead, I will pay you good amount.
Just one Red Feather won't do any good to my gem I need at least 3 of them.
If you bring me 3 Roc's Red feathers, I will reward you as I promised.

◈ Scenario
The Merchant Association wants the teeth we gained from hunting Mujigis. It's probably because of the belief that carrying some kind of a body part of a powerful demon will keep them from being ambushed. Superstition, if you ask me. Anyway, a shipment order is a shipment order, and we should send the teeth to them, but we are lacking manpower. Will you please help us?

◈ Scenario
This one is rather special, but it won't be too difficult to take it apart and examine it. But, I'm taking time out of my precious schedule, so you will have to do me a favor. First, get me some Arrows of Flame Archers in the Forgotten World. I've heard a rumor that these arrows are aflame on their own. I've always wanted to see one with my own eyes. I'm counting on you.

QNO_FW_BA1_005.quest_name: Bring Me the Arrows of Flame Archers!

Temple Warrior, Temple Guard, Temple Surveillant

◈ Scenario
In our investigation of the Temple of Jupiter in relation to the Crown of the Sun, we happened upon the portal and came here. While returning was important to us, we believed that it was more important to investigate this region which looks just like Eastern Europe. So, we established a safe base and have been investigating this area from our base. However, innumerable statues are threatening us from all around us. Please, defeat Temple Warriors, Temple Guards, and Temple Surveillants so that we can concentrate on our investigation.

◈ Objective
Deliver Smuggled Goods Level 85

◈ Reward
51,731,300 Job EXP (-50% in Safe Mode)

◈ Format
One-time Quest

◈ NPC
Smuggler Isutade / Smuggler Chungho

◈ Monster
None

◈ Scenario
We have an order for smuggled goods to be delivered. You need to deliver Smuggled goods to Smuggler Chungho in Donwhang. Smuggled goods delivery assignments are worth more Job EXP than trade goods collection assignments. It would do you well to undertake some of these.

◈ Mission
Deliver Stone Beast's Bell to Buddhist Priest Jeonghye

◈ Reward
None

◈ Form
Available once

◈ NPC
Exorcist Miaoryeong and Buddhist Priest Jeonghye

◈ Monster
Stone Ghost/Tombe Ghost/ Tome Spirit

◈ Scenario
Piece of Spirits, huh?
He sure asked you to get something that's hard to get. You can only gain fragments if you have summoned a soul. Summoning a soul, though, is pretty annoying.
In order to summon a soul, an incantation ritual must be performed with an Normal Spirit put in the Spirit's Shell.
If you bring me a Spirit's Shell and an Normal Spirit, I will help you to summon a soul.
First, get me a Spirit's Shell.
You can get one from an Old Tombstone Ghost.
But it might be rather difficult to find Old Tombstone Ghosts because they sleep inside a tombstone.
They will be awake if they hear the sound of a Spirit's Bell, so you will have to first obtain a Spirit's Bell.
The Lion Statue monsters in the Qin-Shi Tomb wear a bell around their necks. Originally, these were enchanted and put on the statues to prevent souls from approaching the Tomb.
Get one of those bells and bring it to Zheng Hui the Monk of the Temple of Mercy and Grace to have the bell purified through the power of Buddha.
Then, use it in the cemetery to bring out an Old Tombstone Ghost. Defeat it and obtain the Spirit's Shell.
First, find a bell and bring it to the monk at the temple.

◈ Task
Eliminate 150 Togui Dolls

◈ Rewards
EXP 3,200 / Skill EXP 3,500 / Select 1 6th grade Seal of Moon weapon

◈ Format
One-time quest

◈ NPC
Hunter Associate Ahmok

◈ Monsters
Togui Doll (The Phantom of the Crimson Blood level 35~50)

◈ How to Teleport
You can teleport to the Forgotten World by using a Dimension Hole.
You can obtain Dimension Holes from the monster that appears from the Dimension Pillars.

◈ Scenario
Oh, no… These documents contain the instructions on how to collect human souls to create Togui voodoo dolls. The Toguis have been trying to use the kidnapped people as tools to move their dolls. Such cruelty… Something must be done. Before they become the tools of those wicked monsters, you will have to destroy them. Destroy 150 Togui Dolls.

◈ Mission
Hunt JeonUk The Black Tortoise / YumJae The Blue Hawk/ TaeHo The Blue Dragon/ SoHaow The White Tiger

◈ Reward
Experience 6200100 / Skill Exp 80000 / 5 Reinforcement Elixir (Weapon)

◈ Form
Available Once

◈ NPC
Arch-General Sonhyeon

◈ Monster
JeonUk The Black Tortoise / YumJae The Blue Hawk/ TaeHo The Blue Dragon/ SoHaow The White Tiger.

◈ Scenario
By eliminating the Tomb Snakes in the Qin-Shi Tomb, we have bought the wrath of those that are deeper down in the Tomb. We are now faced with JeonUk The Black Tortoise, YumJae The Blue Hawk, TaeHo The Blue Dragon, and SoHaow The White Tiger, the guardian beasts of the Qin-Shi Tomb. Now that we have angered them, we will need to eliminate them and stop the problem before it occurs.
In our campaign against the Tomb Snakes, we have found a secret passageway that leads to where JeonUk The Black Tortoise is. I know where that secret passageway is, so just ask me to open the way and I will send you there.
If you meet and defeat JeonUk The Black Tortoise, his fellow beasts will sense the invasion and show up. Defeat YumJae The Blue Hawk, TaeHo The Blue Dragon, and SoHaow The White Tiger as they appear and then come back to me.

1) Can only be performed in a party with Exp. Auto Share/Item Auto Share
2) Teleport allowed with players performing, or have completed, the Eliminate the Threat quest
3) Only the party leader may speak to General Sonhyeon for teleport
4) Even after the player's death, defeating JeonUk The Black Tortoise, YumJae The Blue Hawk, TaeHo The Blue Dragon, and SoHaow The White Tiger completes quest objectives
5) Cannot teleport Once trade transportation has been summoned.

◈ Mission
Collect 100 Antinoke's Claws

◈ Reward
Experience 11917400 / GOLD 467000 / Skill Exp 100000

◈ Form
Available Once

◈ NPC
Aircraft Ticket Seller Ajati

◈ Monster
Antinoke

◈ Scenario
How awful!
Something seemed fishy about the Aircraft Ticket Seller Sayun recently, so I investigated her activities. She's up to no good.
I hear you collected some items for her a while ago, and it seems that she is trying to summon an evil being with those items.
We have to stop her and bring her to senses before she summons that evil being. She was a nice girl. I don't know why she's looking to do something so terrible.
From what I've found out, in order to destroy Sayun's Guardian Crystals and Spirit Crystals, you must use a weapon that carries power that is the opposite of the Guardian's power.
My understanding is that Antinokes have souls that are opposite to the souls of the Roc clan. So, Please bring me 100 Antinoke's Claws.

◈ Mission
Deliver the Stored Item and Additional Service Invoice to Ahha.

◈ Reward
EXP 4953590 / Skill Points 800 / Gold 2384

◈ Type
1 Time Only

◈ NPC
Store Keeper Khamererne / Librarian Ahha

◈ Monster
N/A

◈ Scenario
God, what are they thinking? My storage is for temporary purposes, not permanent! Thanks to my lazy customers, my storage is completely full. I'd better do something: I should return the overdue items to their owners and charge them an extra service fee. Would you help me with this?

◈ Task
Deliver Black Scorpion's Shells

◈ Reward
EXP 37342 /
Soldier's Tokens 4

◈ Format
One-time quest

◈ NPC
Outpost Guard Dao Lian Hong / Soldier Moho

◈ Monster
None

◈ Scenario
With the emergence of monsters, all kinds of trouble took place in the area. No thanks to the incidents, our supply is also cut off. No more new weapons or armor. That's why it's popular nowadays to increase the strength of the armor by reinforcing it with hard fragments retrieved from monsters. I was about to send out a shipment of Black Scorpion's Shells to Soldier Moho in Donwhang. Would you care to help?

◈ Reward
EXP 72,188 /
Soldier's Tokens 5

◈ Format
One-time quest

◈ NPC
Outpost Guard Ramina

◈ Monster
Evil Order Soldier

◈ Scenario
The shields carried by Evil Order Soldiers are quite crude, but they are said to provide outstanding protection. They may be savages, but war is their life, after all. They seem to have a lot of talent in that area. We shouldn't be just sitting here admiring their protective gear, though. Would you help me and seize their shields?

◈ Task

◈ Reward
EXP 365,253 / Skill Points 397

One-time quest

Unfortunately, the Evil Order has successfully summoned the demons. The pathway to the Netherworld closed before long, but a great number of demons are now walking on this land. We should have struck them sooner... But, now is not the time for regrets. Our priority is to slay these demons and drive them out of our world. Please, help us.

In return for showing you the future of Baghdad, there is something I would like you to do for me. It is nothing difficult. Just collect the things I need for me.

Did you see Homeless Genie around here? He has been locked in the lamp for long dreaming for freedom. Something absurd happens to him. Genie was stolen lamp while he granted anyone's wishes. The lamp is like life to Genie.. If you're not too busy, will you search for the lamp for Genie?

◈ Mission
Collect 120 Essence of the Cold

◈ Reward
Experience 11200200 / GOLD 190000 /Skill Exp 35000

◈ Form
Available Once

◈ NPC
Choipyoung the Imperial Guard of Jangan

◈ Monster
Cold Tomb Snake Soul Demon

◈ Scenario
Last night, my mother, who is the only family I have, suffered from a great fever. So I brought her some medicine prescribed by Yangyun the herbalist, but my mother doesn't seem to be getting any better. When I went back to Yangyun, he said that, if the medicine that he gave showed no improvement, the Essence of the Cold should do the trick.
I hear that you can get this Essence of the Cold from a monster in the Qin-Shi Tomb called the Cold Tomb Snake Soul Demon. I would go get the Essence of the Cold myself and lower my mother's fever but, as you can see, I am an imperial guard and I can't leave my post at will. Would you mind getting this Essence of the Cold in my place? I will be sure to compensate for your troubles. Please bring me 120 Essence of the Cold.
I hear that you can find Cold Tomb Snake Soul Demons on the 3rd floor of the Qin-Shi Tomb. Please hurry. I need to have the Essence of the Cold before my mother's illness takes a turn for the worse.

◈ Mission
Collect 20 Hard Scales of Tomb Snakeman

◈ Reward
Experience 5333400 / GOLD 130000 / Skill Exp 40000

◈ Form
Available 3 times.

◈ NPC
Ishak the Muslim Trader in Jangan

◈ Monster
Tomb Snakeman

◈ Scenario
Hello, again. I have carefully packed the Tomb Snake Slave Scales that you got for me last time. It makes me happy to imagine the faces that I will see when I give out the gift.
One day, though, I was talking to another merchant about the Tomb Snake Slave Scales. I told him that I had just got Tomb Snake Slave Scales and I would give them to my friends and family as gifts because they are thick and sturdy. The man was shocked. He said there was even better scales and asked me if I really did not know about them.
These ‘Hard Scales of Tomb Snakeman’, he said, was not only stronger than the Tomb Snake Slave Scales but also, had more beautiful colors. Although I am happy with the Tomb Snake Slave Scales I have, hearing about better scales made me wish to have them as well.
Please bring me 20 Hard Scales of Tomb Snakeman. They say that you can find Tomb Snakemans on the 3rd level of the Qin-Shi Tomb.

Now, it's time to confront Horus, the hero of the gods. Even the evil god Seth is rumored to be afraid of his power. Horus's power might be incomplete, but he could still ruin the entire world with his might. Please defeat Horus in the Beginner Pharaoh's Tomb, and bring me his heart.

None

◈ Scenario
You must be the one Avrill requested the investigation to. Well met. We are currently investigating many dimensions created at the Temple of Jupiter. The Hall of Worship Novice is suitable for solo investigation. I wish you luck. To get to the Hall of Worship Novice, take the portal next to me.

◈ How to Teleport
You can teleport to the Forgotten World by using a Dimension Hole.
You can obtain Dimension Holes from the monster that appears from the Dimension Pillars.

◈ Scenario
Since the door to the Forgotten World opened, the pillaging by Toguis knows no bounds. We cannot just sit here and watch them go on. The Hotan Kingdom is seeking worthy warriors for a Togui annihilation operation. If you count yourself competent, will you join in the challenge?

◈ Task
Defeat 250 Mutant Baal's Prophets and 250 Gorgons

◈ Reward
EXP 286,709,212 / Skill Points 5,226 /
Gold 459,000

◈ Format
One-time quest

◈ NPC
Baal Worshipper Walter

◈ Monsters
Mutant Baal's Prophet, Gorgon

◈ Scenario
I only watched those believers turn into monsters. But I can't do this any longer. The only way to atone for my sins is to give the morphed believers the eternal rest. It is probably nigh impossible to bring them back to their human form. The eternal rest must be the best gift they can receive. Please bring eternal rest to Mutant Baal's Prophets and Gorgons.

Experience 12075300/ Skill Exp 90000

◈ Form
Available Once

◈ NPC

◈ Monster
Demon Eye/ Devil Eye

◈ Scenario
Oh~ nice to see you again. Thanks to you I won the previous bet. Ha, ha, ha.
But my friend didn't acknowlege his defeat and has made another bet. It is obvious that he'll lose again anyhow.
You will help me again, won't you? This time I'll make him accept his defeat.
I heard from an adventurer that hunting the big eyed monsters found in Taklamakan earns you their eyes sometimes. If i can get them, I think I can make something good enough to win the bet.
Get me 100 eyes of the monsters.

Have you seen demons called Red-Eye Ghosts and Dark-Eye Ghosts? Those big, bulging eyes... Ugh... Just thinking about them gives me the chills down my spine. This time, the commander is hounding on us to have us slay those monsters. How does he expect me to kill such monsters?

I have several accessories that will help you survive in this world. Why don't you come and pick one up? You will find me near the fountain in town.

◈ Mission
Deliver the Escape plan

◈ Reward
Experience 2693000

◈ Form
Available Once

◈ NPC
Slave Jabur / Slave Shifle / Slave Shapeur

◈ Monster
None

◈ Scenario
Seeing as you've helped me out, it seems that you're on our side. So I'll ask you an important favor.
Currently us three slaves are planning an escape. But it's difficult to communicate because we're far apart.
It would be wonderful if you could deliver the Escape Plan to other slaves and run their suggestions by me too. Would you be up for that?
Every day is a living nightmare because of the Roc clan's monitoring and harassment. Please help us poor slaves.
Please take this plan to the others, Shapeur and Shifle, and they will give you another plan with their own suggestions.
Please bring those to me.

Deliver Pirate's Medals

◈ Reward
EXP 15,097 /
Soldier's Tokens 4

◈ Format
One-time quest

◈ NPC
Outpost Guard Anet / General Ratchel

◈ Monster
None

◈ Scenario
This is unfair. I have tons of duties to handle already. Cooking, office duties, on and on. Yet, they want me on delivery duties, too! Besides, the commander always complains about the scrambled eggs that I make. It's unbearable! Please, could you give me a hand with a delivery task?

◈ Type
1 Time Only

N/A

◈ Scenario
She might be my daughter, but I can't let her steal things from her clients. I don't want to do this, but she needs to be taught a lesson. I'm going to collect signatures from her victims and bring her to court. Please get Weapon Trader Chunmoo's signature for me.

◈ Reward
EXP 72,188 /
Soldier's Tokens 5

◈ Format
One-time quest

◈ NPC
Outpost Guard Liao Xiao Jun

◈ Monster
Meek Gun Powder, Gun Powder

◈ Scenario
Earth Ghosts and Meek Earth Ghosts aren't that threatening, despite the notoriety of Earth Ghosts in general. Still, they can be trained to make things and throw them - including explosives. These dull-witted creatures are carelessly creating and throwing bombs, causing great damage. Then, what shall we do? What shall we do in a situation like this? Of course, competent fellows like yourself should go out there and teach them a lesson or two!

EXP 6275059 / Skill Points 1600 / Gold 2559

◈ Type
1 Time Only

◈ NPC
Egypt Governor Senmute / Hunter Union President Narmer

◈ Monster
N/A

◈ Scenario
The gift is ready. Please bring this to Narmer. Oh, I'm excited for him. I always thought he was too shy to even approach to a woman, much less confess her feelings like that.

GOLD 366990

2

◈ Monster

◈ Scenario
No matter how hard I work to cultivate the farmland and raise crops, I always have to fight marauders during the harvest season. We worked so hard all year around, yet the marauders seek to devour only the fruit of our labor. I doubt there are those more calloused than they are. Please do me a favor. Drive out the marauders from this farm.

1 Time Only

I'm not the owner of this stable. I'm just managing it for my grandfather who is travelling the world one last time before he passes away. I don't want to do this, but I have to be prepared when the time comes. Would you help me make a coffin and some ornaments for my grandfather? Please bring me 30 Hard Metal Fragment and 50 Cold Accessories from Akerus in the Storm and Cloud Desert.

In one corner of the Mysterious Death Desert, monsters called Demon Eyes and Devil Eyes live. They are the watchers of the desert. Many caravans and passers-by lost their lives to these demons. Because of that, they have become the mortal enemies of this outpost. We must eradicate them before they crawl out of the desert and ambush people. Will you lend us a helping hand?

Collect 250 Marks of the Warrior (Thief).

◈ Reward

Repeatable

All Monsters in the Shrine

◈ Scenario
I'll award Region Points to the first union that brings me 300 Marks of the Warrior before the others. Enjoy the hunt!

◈ Mission
Collect 100 Tomb Bug Legs

◈ Reward
Experience 3300000 / GOLD 102000 / Skill Exp 10,000

◈ Form
Available 3 times.

◈ NPC
Yangyun the herbalist of Jangan

◈ Monster
Tomb Bug

◈ Scenario
For a long time as a herbalist, I have cured many patients. But there were also many whom I failed to cure. Whenever I saw people writhing in pain because I could not get the medicine, I was haunted by the guilt I could not shake. So I made a decision that someday, I would make the kind of medicine that could cure everything.
It has been over ten years since I have begun my research for it. I thought I was so close to finishing the ultimate medicine that I have been working so hard to create, but now I ran into a great problem.
What I am trying to do is to imbue the medicine with the powers of lightning to make the medicinal effect spread quickly throughout the entire body. But getting that medicinal ingredient with the power of lightning is difficult. There is no way I can get it, but you should be able to get it without much problem…
What do you think? Would you mind getting those ingredients instead of me?
Hunt down those Tomb Bugs deep inside the Qin-Shi Tomb and bring me 100 legs.

◈ Task
Collect 140 Black Robber Talismans

◈ Reward
EXP 197849 /
Soldier's Tokens 5

◈ Format
One-time quest

◈ NPC
Outpost Guard Asoho

◈ Monster
Black Robber Follower, Black Robber Archer

◈ Scenario
Have you heard? The rumor has it that the Black Robbers are carrying expensive talismans. I suppose even those villains are afraid of dying. But, then, so am I. If such talismans exist, I would like to have some, too. Will you help me?

Do you see the giant statue soldier over there? They are killing machines with no emotions whatsoever. They only know to attack all who enter the Temple of Jupiter. And look at those weapons! We can't go forward because of them. Please eliminate them for us.

Rocky

Isan's son? Hmm…
It's just at the tip of my tongue.
Hmm………
I'm not sure about Isan's son but all I can remember is what I need…… Hmm…
I really think I might be able to remember everything if you go find these items for me.
I have been suffering from insomnia lately, and I hear that a pillow made of Rocky Feathers is very sleep-inducing.
I have yet to have a good night's sleep since the Roc clan occupied the Roc Mountain.
We need to defeat the Roc clan and restore the former peace so that the townsfolk may return and turn this into a lively town once again.
Hmm. Anyway, please bring me 100 Rocky Feathers.
In the meantime, I will think about Isan's son's whereabouts.
Or Wait a couple of months. I think I will be able to remember by then.

It's not just one or two people talking about this, so it doesn't seem to be some sort of a prank. Perhaps this is connected to the Flame Mountain in the Forgotten World. Would you do some investigation for us?

Now is the time to strike them proper. Will you lend us a hand?

She is deeply in despair and I came to the Temple of Jupiter - in search of Minotaur's Powdered Horn. I was told that mixing the powdered horn with water and drinking it will help her conceive. One-time quest

◈ Scenario
Congratulations on reaching level 60.
Be informed about establishing an Academy, complete the quest and be rewarded.
From level 60, you can open an Academy.
An Academy can be opened by speaking with a Storage NPC. Once you pay the fee and open the Academy, you will be listed as a sponsor.
A sponsor is entitled to only one Academy, and can have up to five apprentices (level 39 and below) and two assistants (level 40-59).
Open an Academy yourself and visit Potion Merchants in each town.

Did you also come after hearing th rumors? I'm sorry but I don't trade with anyone.
There are frauds and malicious people trying to take over this market, so I only trade with those I can trust. To earn my trust, you need to do me 2 favors.
Will you do me the favors? Not to worry, they won't be hard.
Just deliver an item to Hotan, and hunt a monster called Shakram, that's all you need to do.
I managed to lay my hands on an item Hotan's Specialty Trader Sanmok asked for, which is a clear glass box. Take this item and give it to Sanmok, and bring me a Delivery Confirmation.
And on your way hunt 20 Shakrams, they're ruining my relationship with other merchants.

◈ Format
One-time quest

◈ Scenario
Congratulations on reaching level 2.
Be informed about Academy, complete the task and be rewarded.
An Academy is a community in which advanced players recruit new players to teach them information and how-to's of the game.
As advanced players assist new players, advanced players receive honor and rewards accordingly, and new players can adapt to the game more quickly with the information learned.
View the Academy Matching window and see if there is an Academy available for you.
Press 'L' to view Academy.
Click 'Match' to the bottom right corner of the Apprentice Hall window to search for Workshops, and then visit Potion Merchants from each town.

Available once

Underworld Spirit

Now we have all the ingredients gathered, we are ready to summon a Spirit of Underworld.
Do you want to summon one?

When the powers of the souls collide, you can damage the soul and get the fragment.
Don't forget about this.
In order to see the soul, you will need my Orb of Light, so take it with you.

Hmm… It's been a while since Librarian Ahha ordered his self-defense weapon, but he didn't pick it up yet. He seems pretty busy, so I'd better deliver it before he completely forgets. Would you help me by delivering this Self-Defense Dagger to Mr. Ahha? Ah, and don't worry about the money, he already paid.

Collect 30 Ure'uth Chunks of Flesh.

EXP 10825843 / Skill Points 1600 / Gold 4900

1 Time Only

Weapon Trader Hemaka / Weapon Trader Hemaka

I'm developing a new product. I need to make and test a sample for now, but it's difficult to find the ingredients. Would you bring me some lumps of flesh from Ure'uth in the Valley of the Kings? I wouldn't need more than 30.

Collect 150 units of Wine (Europe)

◈ Reward
1,680 Job EXP / item (10% bonus when quota filled) -50% in Safe Mode

◈ Format
Unlimited Repeatable

◈ NPC
Trader Samanda

◈ Monster
Monsters Lv 40-49

◈ Scenario
You need to work ceaselessly to increase your Job level. If you are ready, bring me 150 units of Wine. You should be able to find Wine as you hunt monsters at level 40-49. If you run out of time and don't find enough Wine, don't worry. Even if you don't have all 150 units, I will pay you for what you have. But don't forget that you have to bring all 150 units to gain greater Job EXP.

Collect 50 Hyungno Ghost Soldier's Bones

◈ Reward
EXP 31,787 /
Soldier's Tokens 5

◈ Format
One-time quest

◈ NPC
Outpost Guard Liao Xiao Jun

◈ Monster
Hyungno Ghost soldier

◈ Scenario
Hyungno Ghost Soldiers are demons that live in the homeland of the Hyungnos. These half-dead monsters are very ferocious. Every fight takes a great toll on our bodies. Oh, the aches... I would appreciate a competent fellow like you to take care of those Hyungno Ghost Soldiers, not a wimpy grunt like me.

◈ Task
Collect 100 Hardened Lion Hearts

◈ Reward
EXP 158,885,480 / Skill Points 5,226 /
Gold 352,800

◈ Format
One-time quest

◈ NPC
Lost Soldier Chrom

◈ Monsters
Temple Lion

◈ Scenario
This is so infuriating! I may not look it, but I've never lost to anyone in my life. What kind of a lion is so strong, anyway? I ended up getting wounded. I need to do something about this… Oh, I know! You can avenge me. Slay those Temple Lions and bring me their hearts as the proof. You would do this for me, wouldn't you?

Obtain 14 Hook Arms

◈ Rewards
EXP 368,000 / SP 100

◈ Format
Repeatable quest (Restricted to once per day)

◈ NPC
Weapon Trader Chunmoo

◈ Monsters
Ghost Pirate (The Sea of Resentment level 101~110)

◈ How to Teleport
You can teleport to the Forgotten World by using a Dimension Hole.
You can obtain Dimension Holes from the monster that appears from the Dimension Pillars.

◈ Scenario
Ghost Pirates are said to have Hook Arms. Apparently the tips are so sharp that they can pierce steel armor. Will you bring me some of those Hook Arms? Well, of course I'm not saying that I will just polish them a little and sell them as they are to the customers. Never. Ahem...

◈ Objective
Deliver Smuggled Goods Level 55 (Europe)

◈ Reward
4,112,700 Job EXP (-50% in Safe Mode)

◈ Format
One-time Quest

◈ NPC
Smuggler Barus / Smuggler Raul

◈ Monster
None

◈ Scenario
We have an order for smuggled goods to be delivered. You need to deliver Smuggled goods to Smuggler Raul in Constantinople. Smuggled goods delivery assignments are worth more Job EXP than trade goods collection assignments. It would do you well to undertake some of these.

◈ Mission
Collect 1 Osiris Heart.

◈ Reward
EXP 73107492 / Skill Points 4000 / Gold 15225

◈ Type
1 Time Only

◈ NPC
Egypt Governor Senmute / Egypt Governor Senmute

◈ Monster
Osiris (Tomb Beginner)

◈ Scenario
There's only one left, Osiris, the king of the dead and the regions of Hell. He enjoyed absolute power before he was killed by Seth. I hope that the Pharaoh's Tomb will find peace after you defeat Osiris. Please bring me the heart of Osiris in the Beginner Pharaoh's Tomb.

◈ Mission
Collect 50 Venom of Tomb Snake Lady

◈ Reward
Experience 8200100 / GOLD 66000

◈ Form
Available Once

◈ NPC
JinJin the General Store Employee of Jangan

◈ Monster
Tomb Snake Lady

◈ Scenario
Have you heard? They say that there is a gemstone called Bi Young deep inside the Qin-Shi Tomb. It sparkles so brightly so that those who Once lay their eyes on it won't even consider other gemstones. I thought that I could makes accessories with it and sell them at a high price. So I've been asking people to get me some Bi Young, but I get turned down every time I ask.
I don't blame them though. Bi Young is notoriously difficult to obtain. So, if you're interested, won't you get some Bi Young for me? I'll be sure to pay you a hefty sum for it.
What I need is a large lump of Bi Young. Small lumps of Bi Young can't be crafted into the shapes that I want, so it has to be a large lump of Bi Young.
You can find large lumps of Bi Young on the 3rd level of the Qin-Shi Tomb in the Southern Snake Cave, Western Snake Cave, Eastern Snake Cave, and the Northern Snake Cave. But Bi Young contains the demonic energy of the Tomb Snakes so you can't get them with a normal pickaxe. If you put the venom of the Tomb Snake Lady on the pickaxe, the poison suppresses the demonic energy and you can get Bi Young. I have plenty of pickaxes, so first, bring me 50 Venom of Tomb Snake Lady.

desc1.notice: Collect 50 Venom of Tomb Snake Lady (%d)

One-time quest

◈ Scenario
Do you remember the kidnapping incident from before? According to our sources, Toguis have restored the Togui Dolls you destroyed last time. It looks like there will be no end to this until we liberate the souls of the dead. Will you help us?

I was able to bind the pages, but I feel too guilty to face Ahha in person. I'm sorry, but would you return this book to Ahha for me?

None

◈ Scenario
Grocery Trader Yeosun in Donwhang wants me to send her the Chakji's Gills. I don't know what she wants them for, but I don't know what to do with them anyway. If she has a use for them, she can be my guest. If you happen to be on your way to Donwhang, could I possibly ask you to deliver these gills?

QNO_N_WC_007.quest_name: Chakji Gill as a good accessory

Gold 358,800

One-time quest

◈ Monsters
Anatu's Lion, Immortal Guard, Immortal Surveillant, Immortal Protection, Asherah's Lion, Minotaur Despair

◈ Scenario
They were once the guardians of the Temple, yet they have been manipulated. I will make the necessary preparation so that they can rest in peace. Would you go slay them and bring me their souls? The soul of the statue is etched into a section on it.

Gold 346,800

One-time quest

◈ Monsters
Temple Defend Knight

◈ Scenario
If you have some time, would you help me get out of here? You see, I have no guts. When I entered the Mirror Dimension, I was too afraid of battles. Now, I heard that, if I were to join in the investigation of the dimension at the Temple of Jupiter, I would only have to guard the investigators. I thought I wouldn't get myself involved in any battles or anything... But there were horrific battles raging inside the dimension. I'm so scared that I can't go anywhere else. Would you slay some Temple Defend Knights for me?

These pieces of paper are illegible because of all these stains. Maybe some bleach made from Weneg Powder can help remove the stains from the paper. If you don't mind, would you help me again? Please bring me 50 powders from Wenegs in Delta. Don't worry, I'll pay you back for your help.

/Donwhang Storage-Keeper Paedo

◈ Scenario
Although people doubted the low possibility of a trade market to form in such a small corner, now many come to this Trade Market due to its extraordinary items that are sold in this market.
You look like a merchant, did you come to trade with us? To trade, you need to do me 2 favors. It won't be a big favor so it will be easy to complete.
Donwhang's Storage-Keeper Paedo asked for a Silk Belt which I managed to get. Give this to Paedo.
And at the same time, hunt 20 Hyeongcheons.

Option 2: Survive from the fight with captain of army

None

Available once.

Constantinople General Rachel

◈ Monster
Captain of army / Surgeon of army.

◈ Scenario
By the mandate of Imperial Majesty, the imperial army is seeking people with the power to fight against transcendental beings that threaten this world.
For thoes who have passed the test, we are telling them the way to make the drug stronger.
This test also need to pass the test hold by the imperial army. Would you be interested?
I think you would be able to pass the test.
At the fighting place, there should be one captain and a soldier who tries to bother you. If you use the Terminate Trap, it would help you a lot.
Good luck then.

EXP 2,734,354 / Skill Points 5,488 /
Gold 100,000

One-time quest

◈ NPC
Lost Soldier Will / Lost Investigator Natal

◈ Monsters
None

◈ Scenario
The Hall of Worship Intermediate is a dimension where The Earth, one of the gods under Jupiter, resides. The Earth was once one of the deities under Jupiter, he has now degraded into a ruthless monster that slays every enemy standing in its way. Once he is slain, we should be able to find a lead, but no one dares approach him because of his immense power. To make things worse, Natal, who was sent out to investigate the place, has gone missing a while ago and no one has heard from her yet. Will you go to the Hall of Worship Intermediate and find Lost Investigator Natal?

EXP 24,063 /
Soldier's Tokens 4

◈ Format
One-time quest

◈ NPC
Outpost Guard Shao Mu Dai / Baekako

◈ Monster
None

◈ Scenario
Having seized the bombs from the Earth Ghosts has significantly reduced their military strength, I think. What's even better - we can use these bombs on them now. I think Baekako would greatly appreciate receiving the bombs. Would you take on this task?

Collecting 30 strong spider webs

Hotan's Jewel Lapidary Mamoje says he will expand additional inventory if user at Lv. 70 or lower bring him 30 Strong Spider Webs, two General's Tokens and 30 Strong Spider Webs, 10,000Gold in case of Lv. 71 or more by hunting Big White Spiders.

1 Time Only

Wind Spider / Desert Bug

◈ Scenario
Storage… Excuse me, but what did you say? I'm sorry, but I've got too much on my mind right now. I'm developing a new product: it's a small accessory with a Desert Bug shell. I want to embroider it with Wind Spider's non-sticky and shiny spider webs, and then paint it with a clear coat. Hmm, but I'll need someone who can help me gather all the materials. If you're not busy, would you assist me? Please bring me 30 Hardened Insect Shells from Desert Bugs and 50 Shiny Spider Webs from Wind Spiders.

1 Time Only

Tel Basta / Bastet / Bast

◈ Scenario
Okay, now please bring me 100 Beholder Ostracons (Intermediate) from the Intermediate Pharaoh's Tomb. You can get them by hunting Tel Bastas, Bastets, and Basts.

Collect 33 Bear Claws

◈ Reward
EXP 6,639 /
Monk's Tokens 5

One-time quest

◈ NPC
Outpost Volunteer Lily

◈ Monster
Barpolle, Dow Genetos

◈ Scenario
The accessories worn by the Barbaroi are wild. I am most interested in the necklaces made of bear claws. But, if I were to have one, I would either have to seize the bear claws from the Barbaroi or from real bears. Who would do such a big favor for me?

Learn how to play the game by speaking with Riise. Obtain HP Recovery Potions then go to the utpost.

◈ Reward
Monk's Token x2

◈ Format
One-time quest

◈ NPC
Guide Riise / Outpost Commander Albert

None

◈ Scenario
Now that you have learned the basic movements, I will teach you how to acquire the items necessary for hunting next.
You can acquire potions from the Medicine Supplier Shadi. Shadi will always give you plenty of potions so that you will be amply prepared for your hunts.
When you consumed all of your potions, it will be given again when you speak with the Medicine Supplier.
Acquire Standard Issue HP Recovery Potions from the Medicine Supplier then go to Outpost Commander Albert located at the Eastern Europe Outpost.

GOLD 207045

2

Starving Washer Men

◈ Scenario
Although I am on a mission, it is hard to put up with hunger while hiding in the desert for a long time. We are out of our food supplies... We will have to hunt for our food. Would you help us?

◈ Reward
EXP 5412921 / Skill Points 1100 / Gold 2450

◈ Type
1 Time Only

◈ NPC
Doctor Renenutet / General Ratchel

N/A

Thank you for waiting. I've finally combined all of the ostracons from the Pharaoh's Tomb, and extracted this information. Please deliver this document to General Ratchel in Constantinople. He'll be pleased to read it.

1 Time Only

Doctor Renenutet / Doctor Renenutet

◈ Monster
Mummy of Wrath / Mummy of Arrogance

◈ Scenario
Now, please bring me 100 Dead Ostracons (Intermediate) from the Intermediate Pharaoh's Tomb. You can get them by hunting Mummy of Wrath and Mummy of Arrogance.

Obtain 30 Gemstones of Flame

◈ Rewards
EXP 575,000 / Skill EXP 1,500

◈ Format
Repeatable quest (Restricted to once per day)

◈ NPC
Blacksmith Soboi

◈ Monsters
Flame Master (The Burning Abyss level 71~80)

◈ How to Teleport
You can teleport to the Forgotten World by using a Dimension Hole.
You can obtain Dimension Holes from the monster that appears from the Dimension Pillars.

◈ Scenario
Will you help me? I hear that monsters on the Flame Mountain called Flame Masters carry what are called Gemstones of Flame. These mysterious stones put out heat continuously. I have a feeling that I will be able to make good equipment with them. If you happen to be on your way to the Flame Mountain, will you get me those Gemstones of Flame?

◈ Reward
Skill Points 21


◈ Format
One-time quest

◈ NPC
Hunter Associate Shahad / Outpost Commander Gavin

◈ Monster
None

◈ Scenario
Hunter Association assumes that the current phenomena such as overflowing monsters and opening a pathway to the Netherworld are related with Hun. It is because recently, they have contacted quite a lot with Evil Orders who also use evil power to control monsters. If you face them yourself, you will find out who really are responsible for the problems.

QNO_N_CA_002.quest_name: The power to control savage tribe

desc.notice:
◈ Mission
Collect 100 Tomb Snake Devil Shells

◈ Reward
Experience 5403400 / GOLD 140000 / Skill Exp 25,000

◈ Form
Available 3 times

◈ NPC
Buddhist Priest Jeonghye of Jaeunsa in Jangan

◈ Monster
Tomb Snake Devil

◈ Scenario
Many people are coming to our temple after succumbing to the demonic energy during their travel to the Qin-Shi Tomb. I would like to imbue a fan with the powers of Buddha and drive out the demonic energy from the patients' bodies, but my powers are too weak to be able to help them.
I have heard that a monster called Tomb Snake Devil has a skin with powerful wind energy. I think making the fan with that skin and imbuing it with my powers will cause the wind to carry my powers, making it powerful enough to drive out the demonic powers.
Please bring me 100 Skin of Tomb Snake Devil.
I hear you can find Tomb Snake Devils on the 4th level of the Qin-Shi Tomb. Please be careful. Amitabul…

◈ Task
Defeat 500 Temple Keepers

◈ Reward
EXP 140,390,485 / Skill Points 5,226 /
Gold 350,000

◈ Format
One-time quest

◈ NPC
Lost Soldier Charles

◈ Monsters
Temple Keeper

◈ Scenario
If you go deep into the Temple, you will see monsters called Temple Keepers. They stop any intruder in the Temple from getting to the sanctuary. I recently received an order to slay the Temple Keepers and advance to the passageway that leads to the sanctuary. The trouble is, I can't even scratch Temple Keepers with my attacks. Would you mind slaying Temple Keepers on my behalf?

◈ Mission
Deliver the Silver Crescent Necklace to Isan

◈ Reward
Experience 3513000 / Skill Exp 12000
/Mother's loving hand [HP 20% increase, MP 20% increase, 3 Hour duration]

◈ Form
Available Once

◈ NPC
Slave Shifle/ Towner Isan

◈ Monster
None

◈ Scenario
Please take this necklace and return to Isan.
I would like for us to grant his final request.
But please don't tell her that he is dead.
If she hears that her son is dead, she may lose her will to live.
I'm counting on you.

desc1.notice: Deliver Silver Crescent Necklace to Isan

◈ NPC
Goods Supplier in Europe, Samarkand, or Hotan

Congratulations! You have reached level 32 at last! I have prepared accessories with special powers for you to be able to take on monsters that are even more powerful.
Please come see me in town. I will be waiting for you there.

◈ How to Teleport
You can teleport to the Forgotten World by using a Dimension Hole.
You can obtain Dimension Holes from the monster that appears from the Dimension Pillars.

◈ Scenario
I hear this year will see a famine. They say it will be a terrible year because the Flame Masters ruined the farmlands. Common folks like us are busy trying to feed ourselves. Why should we worry about monsters like them? Would you go on our behalf and teach them a lesson?

EXP 90,580 / Skill Points 166

One-time quest

Outpost Commander Galia

◈ Monster
Pilot Log, Pirate Brigand

◈ Scenario
There are two most useless things in the world. Do you know what they are? One is a cook that can't even make scrambled eggs, and the other are pirates that have come up onto the land. We will need to teach these robbing pieces of garbage that it was an act of suicide to have come up onto the land.

QNO_N_EU_044.quest_name: Pirate coming up to the land

*sigh* The commander is at it again. "The Black Robbers are wreaking havoc around here and all you are doing is waste food down your throats," he yells. Eradicating robbers are easier said than done, you know? How are we expected to eradicate such powerful foes? We are lucky if we come out with our throat intact. Yet, we can't just sit here and have the commander breathe down on our necks all the time. Would you care to help us out a little?

Wing Tribe Attackers

◈ Scenario
Before it was the Black Eagles. Now it's the Wing Tribe Attackers that are attacking and killing my sheep.
I can't live with this Roc clan anymore.
Why do they relentlessly trouble us?
We pay our tribute without delay and don't even directly oppose them.
I've had it now!
Please eliminate 500 Wing Tribe Attackers.

EXP 40,183,208 / Skill Points 4,068 /
Gold 100,000
