None

◈ Scenario
The battle within the Mirror Dimension is becoming more and more fierce. With the supplies we have been receiving until now, things will become tough for us. Will you help us supplement our supplies? My assistant, Titi, will give you the details.

◈ Task
Deliver Ujigi's Brown Manes

◈ Reward
EXP 371966 /
General's Tokens 5

◈ Format
One-time quest

◈ NPC
Outpost Guard Sao Ma / Protector Trader Gonishya

◈ Monster
None

◈ Scenario
Do you remember Ujigi's Brown Fur you got for us before? We were storing them in our warehouse and didn't know what to do with it. But Protector Trader Gonishya has heard about it and she wants the fur. We can't leave our post, though. Would you mind helping us?

◈ Task
Deliver Pot of Oil

◈ Reward
EXP 41456232 / Skill Points 806 /
GOLD 47050

◈ Format
One-time quest

◈ NPC
Oil Trader Khaled / Farm Owner Mujariun

◈ Monster
None

◈ Scenario
Hey, traveler! May I ask a favor of you? I have a pot of oil that needs to be delivered to the Kak Farm but I have too many orders backed up. If you are going to the Kak Farm, could you please deliver it for me. I would really appreciate it.

◈ Task
Collect 65 Earth Magician's Crystal Balls

◈ Reward
EXP 32,751 /
Soldier's Tokens 5

◈ Format
One-time quest

◈ NPC
Outpost Guard Ji He Long

◈ Monster
Earth Taoist

◈ Scenario
I hear that Earth Magicians carry crystal balls to use powerful magic. Crystal balls make magicians, they say. I'm curious to know just how powerful these crystal balls are. If you have an opportunity to face Earth Magicians, would you get me some crystal balls?

QNO_N_WC_034.quest_name: Crystal Balls Make or Break a Magician

desc.notice:
◈ Task
Defeat 1 Movias

◈ Reward
EXP 71 / Skill Points 3


◈ Format
One-time quest

◈ NPC
General Ratchel / Outpost Commander Albert

◈ Monster
Movia

◈ Scenario
Since the Silkroad opened, we have seen a dramatic increase in the number of monsters. His Imperial Majesty's worries grow daily and the people are suffering indescribably. We are in desperate need of young warriors like yourself. Will you do something great in the service of your country?

◈ Task
Speak with the Goods Supplier in Europe, Samarkand, or Hotan.

◈ Reward
6th Grade Seal Shield


◈ Format
One-time quest

◈ NPC
Goods Supplier in Europe, Samarkand, or Hotan

◈ Scenario
You have reached level 42! You are powerful enough without a shield, but this shield I will give to you as a gift will make you even stronger. Please come see me in town. I will be waiting for you there.

◈ Task
Speak with Guard Basit

◈ Reward
EXP 34546860 / Skill Points 671 /
GOLD 47050

◈ Format
One-time quest

◈ NPC
Minister Mahmud / Guard Basit

◈ Monster
None

◈ Scenario
I am controlling the king through Sheherazade? Is that what that crafty fox told you? Ha! What nonsense! There may be no hard evidence yet, everyone knows that he is seeking rebellion. To rebel, he needs many men and the funds for the war. The trouble is, we know not where he is hiding them. Recently, we have managed to discover a suspicious place and are gathering information. But, this is no easy task.
Would you lend a hand?

◈ Mission
Collect Normal Spirit

◈ Reward
None

◈ Form
Available once

◈ NPC
Sunset Witch
/Constantinople Hunter Associate Adria

◈ Monster
Niya General

◈ Scenario
Since I got so much help from the Sunset Witch, I should help you.
Place the trap on the ground and bring the desired monster near it.
It's not easy to get the spirit out of the monster so be careful.

◈ Mission
Collect 5 Monstrous Tendons.

◈ Reward
EXP 12184582 / Skill Points 2000 / Gold 5075

◈ Type
1 Time Only

◈ NPC
Lighthouse Keeper Snefru / Lighthouse Keeper Snefru

◈ Monster
Akeru

◈ Scenario
I don't know who my parents are. The former lighthouse keeper found me as a baby and raised me. When he passed away, I was left alone with his only keepsake Katara. I used to play it whenever I missed him, but its strings have snapped. Now, I heard Akeru's tendon is a good substitute for musical strings… Would you bring me 5 Monstrous Tendons from Akerus? They're in the Storm and Cloud Desert.

◈ Task
Speak with the Goods Supplier in Europe, Samarkand, or Hotan.

◈ Reward
8th Grade Seal Accessory Set


◈ Format
One-time quest

◈ NPC
Goods Supplier in Europe, Samarkand, or Hotan

◈ Scenario
Congratulations! Now, you no longer require my assistance to survive in this world. I have prepared one last gift in eager anticipation of your continued success. Please come see me in town.

◈ Task
Deliver Monkey Nails

◈ Reward
EXP 204438 /
General's Tokens 5

◈ Format
One-time quest

◈ NPC
Outpost Guard Hadaz / Blacksmith Soboi

◈ Monster
None

◈ Scenario
Someone wants Bunwang's claws. It's Blacksmith Soboi of Hotan. It seems that he is intrigued by the unusual sharpness of the claws. Will you help us deliver the Monkey Claws?

◈ Task
Collect 72 Pirate's Medals

◈ Reward
EXP 45,291 /
Soldier's Tokens 5

◈ Format
One-time quest

◈ NPC
Outpost Guard Duadi

◈ Monster
Pilot Log, Pirate Brigand

◈ Scenario
A pirate ship has been shipwrecked recently, and the surviving pirates have come up on land and begun robbing. Well, without a ship, I suppose they are simple and plain robbers now, but they still call themselves pirates. They are still too powerful for us to handle, though. Could you lend us a hand?

◈ Mission
Speak to Egyptian Soldier Turian.

◈ Reward
EXP 466923 / Skill Points 150 / Gold 2340

◈ Type
1 Time Only

◈ NPC
Egypt Governor Senmute / Egyptian Soldier Turian

◈ Monster
N/A

◈ Scenario
Let me ask you this: how far will you go to attain power? In order to find the answer, our soldiers in Alexandria have developed an ultimate training program called "Deity Training!" If you're interested, why don't you consult with Soldier Turian?

◈ Objective
Deliver Smuggled Goods Level 80

◈ Reward
36,850,040 Job EXP (-50% in Safe Mode)

◈ Format
One-time Quest

◈ NPC
Smuggler Isutade / Smuggler Chao

◈ Monster
None

◈ Scenario
We have an order for smuggled goods to be delivered. You need to deliver Smuggled goods to Smuggler Chao in Jangan. Smuggled goods delivery assignments are worth more Job EXP than trade goods collection assignments. It would do you well to undertake some of these.

◈ Task
Collect 11 Fragments of Buddhist Scripture

◈ Reward
EXP 1,868 /
Monk's Tokens 5

◈ Format
One-time quest

◈ NPC
Outpost Guard Wei Yen

◈ Monster
Tomb Stone Ghost, Tomb Stone

◈ Scenario
Have you heard the news that the tombstones at the cemetery have gone mad? They are not only mad, but they also stole fragments of Buddhist Scriptures! *sigh* The world must be declining to have these sorts of unimaginable things happen. The commander yells his orders at us to have the tombstones obliterated and retrieve the Scripture fragments, but I have little courage for such things. I... err... If you are okay with it, would you help out this poor coward?

◈ Mission
Collect the White Viper's Blood

◈ Reward
Experience 6740100 / 10th grace Class C ring

◈ Form
Available Once

◈ NPC
WalYoung

◈ Monster
ShinMoo / SoSo the Black Viper / BeakYung the White Viper

◈ Scenario
Will you get the white viper's blood and save the life of a child?
ShinMoo has told me about the secret passageway that leads to him. Go to the passageway and speak to ShinMoo.
ShinMoo told me that, he had to stop anybody who wants to meet the white viper because he made an agreement with BeakYung the white viper. But, he also said, if you could fight and defeat ShinMoo, he would open the way to BeakYung.
If you go through that passageway, you should see a black viper named SoSo who is the white viper's guardian. He said that defeating her would create a rift in the dimensions which would then lead you to BeakYung the White Viper.
Go through that rift, defeat BeakYung and get her blood.
Come talk to me again. In the meantime, I will prepare the way that leads to Flame Sprite.
1) Can only be performed in a party with Exp. Auto Share/Item Auto Share
2) Teleport allowed with players performing, or have completed, the White Viper's Blood quest
3) Only the party leader may speak to WalYoung for teleport
4) Even after the player's death, defeating ShinMoo, SoSo the Black Viper, and BeakYung the White Viper completes mission
5) Cannot teleport Once trade transportation has been summoned

QNO_TQ_BAEKRYOUNG_17.quest_name: The Blood of the White Viper

desc.notice:
◈ Mission
Eliminate 10 Horuses in the Intermediate Pharaoh's Tomb.

◈ Reward
EXP 3765035 / Skill Points 1250 / Gold 15356

◈ Type
Repeatable

◈ NPC
Egyptian Soldier Turian / Egyptian Soldier Turian

Horus (Tomb Intermediate)

◈ Scenario
Alright, let's start the Deity training. Now it's time for you to hunt 10 Horuses in the Intermediate Pharaoh's Tomb.

EXP 6275059 / Skill Points 1600 / Gold 2559

1 Time Only

◈ NPC

N/A

◈ Scenario
Would you do me a favor? It's simple: deliver this ring to the address written on this paper. Please keep this between you and me! No one else should know about this, especially Thiara. This is important: don't let Thiara know about this. Okay?

◈ Task
Defeat 390 Adonis Hamals and 390 Violent Adonises

◈ Reward
EXP 165824929 / Skill Points 3222 /
GOLD 366990

◈ Format
2

◈ NPC
Farm Owner Mujariun

◈ Monster
Adonis Hamal, Violent Adonis

◈ Scenario
Humans or wolves, they are all targeting my farm. Especially, wolves like Adonis Hamals wearing the sheep mask or Violent Adonis are really difficult to deal with. You seem to be a competent person, traveler. Would you slay them for me?

◈ Objective
Deliver Specialty Goods Level 80

◈ Reward
36,850,040 Job EXP (-50% in Safe Mode)

◈ Format
One-time Quest

◈ NPC
Trader Sabonue / Trader Yusun

◈ Monster
None

◈ Scenario
We have an order for specialty goods to be delivered. You need to deliver specialty goods to Trader Yusun in Jangan. Specialty goods delivery assignments are worth more Job EXP than trade goods collection assignments. It would do you well to undertake some of these.

Speak with the Goods Supplier in Europe, Samarkand, or Hotan.

◈ Reward
4th Grade Seal Armor Set (Select One Set)


◈ Format
One-time quest

◈ NPC
Goods Supplier in Europe, Samarkand, or Hotan

◈ Scenario
You have reached level 24 already!
I have prepared armor for you to be able to take on monsters that are even more powerful. Please come see me in town.
I will be waiting for you there.

◈ Mission
Collect 25 Tomb Snake Slave Scale

◈ Reward
Experience 5133400 / GOLD 130000 / Skill Exp 12500

◈ Form
Available 3 times.

◈ NPC
Ishak the Muslim Trader in Jangan

◈ Monster
Tomb Snake Slave

◈ Scenario
My business here is almost done. The trade has been a success and I have enjoyed Jangan enough. Now I wish to head back to my hometown.
I hope to prepare some gifts for my family and friends, but I couldn't really find anything adequate so I asked around for help. When I asked for something precious and rare, I was advised to take Tomb Snake Slave Scales home as gifts. Not only are the Tomb Snake Slave Scales thick and sturdy, their color is also splendid. Because of that, they can be used for a variety of purposes. This would be a perfect gift.
Please bring me 25 Tomb Snake Slave Scales. I will handsomely pay you for it.
They say that you can find Tomb Snake Slaves on the 3rd level of the Qin-Shi Tomb.

◈ Mission
Speak to Librarian Ahha.

◈ Reward
EXP 5914845 / Skill Points 1400 / Gold 2515

◈ Type
1 Time Only

◈ NPC
Hunter Union President Narmer / Librarian Ahha

◈ Monster
N/A

◈ Scenario
I'm almost ready: I've got the finest suit, a white horse, and a love potion… Although that potion smells a little awful. Still, I feel like something is missing. Perhaps I need a romantic message of love that will move the heart of its listener. Ah! I know the person who can write me the perfect message: I need Librarian Ahha's help. She practically lives in the library, so she must know at least a few lines for love confessions. Would you go ask her for me?

◈ Mission
Speak to Egypt Governor Senmute.

◈ Reward
EXP 5412921 / Skill Points 1100 / Gold 2450

◈ Type
1 Time Only

◈ NPC
General Sonhyeon / Egypt Governor Senmute

◈ Monster
N/A

◈ Scenario
Although we've learned that we can use the secret document to intensify the power of Berserk, that power's full potential has yet to be revealed. According to recent news, the people of Alexandria have made some progress in studying the latent power of Berserk. Please speak to Egypt Governor Senmute for more information.

◈ Objective
Collect 300 units of Royal Dresses

◈ Reward
3,530 Job EXP / item (10% bonus when quota filled) -50% in Safe Mode

◈ Format
Unlimited Repeatable

◈ NPC
Trader Sabonue

◈ Monster
Monsters Lv 60-69

◈ Scenario
You need to work ceaselessly to increase your Job level. If you are ready, bring me 300 units of Royal Dresses. You should be able to find Royal Dresses as you hunt monsters at level 60-69. If you run out of time and don't find enough Royal Dresses, don't worry. Even if you don't have all 300 units, I will pay you for what you have. But don't forget that you have to bring all 300 units to gain greater Job EXP.

◈ Mission
Eliminate 100 Unegs and 100 Wenegs.

◈ Reward
EXP 28015403 / Skill Points 1600 / Gold 9362

◈ Type
1 Time Only

◈ NPC
Harbor Manager Marwa / Harbor Manager Marwa

◈ Monster
Uneg / Weneg

◈ Scenario
I try so hard to keep the harbor clean, but the others don't help. Every time I clean the harbor, the waves suddenly bring feces from Unegs and Wenegs from the ocean. Oh God, they stink so badly! If you don't mind me asking, would you get rid of 100 Unegs and 100 Wenegs? I'll repay you if you can do this favor for me.

◈ Objective
Deliver Smuggled Goods Level 25 (China)

◈ Reward
176,900 Job EXP (-50% in Safe Mode)

◈ Format
One-time Quest

◈ NPC
Smuggler Chao / Smuggler Chungho

◈ Monster
None

◈ Scenario
We have an order for smuggled goods to be delivered. You need to deliver Smuggled goods to Smuggler Chungho in Donwhang. Smuggled goods delivery assignments are worth more Job EXP than trade goods collection assignments. It would do you well to undertake some of these.

◈Mission
Collect 1 Dirty Lamp

◈ Reward

Genie's Lamp

◈ Format
Quests can be taken once per day via Daily Quest Manager.

◈ NPC
All Daily Quest Manager

◈Monster
Monsters at level 71-80 level

◈ Scenario
Did you see Homeless Genie around here? He has been locked in the lamp for long dreaming for freedom. Something absurd happens to him. Genie was stolen lamp while he granted anyone's wishes. The lamp is like life to Genie.. If you're not too busy, will you search for the lamp for Genie?

◈ Task
Hunt 600 Mysterious Sabras

◈ Reward
Experience 231196843 / Skill Exp 6941 /
GOLD 293400

◈ Form
Available once

◈ NPC
Scout Nadamun

◈ Monster
Mysterious Sabra

◈ Scenario
This coast has cannibal cactuses that eat people. They usually look like normal cactuses but when travelers pass by, they catch and eat them. Can you defeat the mysterious sabras for the kingdom? I am just a normal Scout hm hm.

◈ Mission
Collect 100 Hazy Poison.

◈ Reward
EXP 11485137 / Skill Points 1800 / Gold 4987

◈ Type
1 Time Only

◈ NPC
Potion Trader Thiara / Potion Trader Thiara

◈ Monster
Aknish

◈ Scenario
I don't even want to talk about it. That store keeper has done enough damage to my business. Even now, I'm running short of ingredients, but I've got to do something to fulfill all my orders... Hmm... Maybe I can add a mild poison to make up for what I'm missing… I mean, drinking a potion has that kind of intoxicating effect, you know? Just adding a dollop of Aknish's Hazy Poison should do the trick. Will you bring me 100 Hazy Poison from Aknishes in the Storm and Cloud Desert?

◈ Task
Teleport to [South Gate] through Soldier Hogang and speak with Soldier Jingyo

◈ Reward
None


◈ Format
One-time quest

◈ NPC
General Sonheyon / Soldier Jingyo

◈ Monster
None

◈ Scenario
Welcome to Jangan of China.
The Military Camp is providing assistance necessary to survive in the hostile world of Silkroad. Follow the instructions and you will be able to adapt to Silkroad quickly.
First, I will tell you how to move around Jangan quickly.
We have placed soldiers at the [Imperial Palace], [East Gate], [West Gate] and [South Gate] who will help people teleport. You can speak with them to move around in Jangan quickly.
I must take my leave now. I have to provide assistance to other travelers as well.
Speak with Soldier Hogang at the [West Gate] and go to Soldier Jingyo at the [South Gate]. He will help you further.

◈ Task
Talk to Secret Agent Tanahatun

◈ Reward
Experience 57799210 / Skill Exp 1735 /
GOLD 48900

◈ Form
Available once

◈ NPC
Scout Nadamun / Secret Agent Tanahatun

◈ Monster
None

◈ Scenario
There are soldiers positioned here and there in the Arabia Coast. As the Devil's Garden began to be surrounded by a weird force, these things started happening in the Arabia Coast. That is why many agents are positioned here to investigate. Go and find Secret Agent Tanahatun. There is something you can help him with.

◈ Task
Obtain 30 Commander's Swords

◈ Rewards
EXP 790,000 / SP 100

◈ Format
Repeatable quest (Restricted to once per day)

◈ NPC
Weapon Trader Hemaka

◈ Monsters
Ghost Commander (The Sea of Resentment level 101~110)

◈ How to Teleport
You can teleport to the Forgotten World by using a Dimension Hole.
You can obtain Dimension Holes from the monster that appears from the Dimension Pillars.

◈ Scenario
The rumor has it that the Ghost Commanders are collecting swords, even though they use bows and arrows. Something about their romance or some such thing. When I heard it, I became rather curious about what kinds of swords they are collecting. Will you give me a hand for a while here?

◈ Task
Speak with the Goods Supplier in China, Donwhang, or Hotan.

◈ Reward
4th Grade Seal Armor Set (Select One Set)


◈ Format
One-time quest

◈ NPC
Goods Supplier in China, Donwhang, or Hotan.

◈ Scenario
You have reached level 24 already! I have prepared armor for you to be able to take on monsters that are even more powerful.
Please come see me in town. I will be waiting for you there.

◈ Objective
Collect 200 units of Full Dresses (China)

◈ Reward
2,500 Job EXP / item (10% bonus when quota filled) -50% in Safe Mode

◈ Format
Unlimited Repeatable

◈ NPC
Smuggler Chungho

◈ Monster
Monsters Lv 50-59

◈ Scenario
You need to work ceaselessly to increase your Job level. If you are ready, bring me 200 units of Full Dresses. You should be able to find Full Dresses as you hunt monsters at level 50-59. If you run out of time and don't find enough Full Dresses, don't worry. Even if you don't have all 200 units, I will pay you for what you have. But don't forget that you have to bring all 200 units to gain greater Job EXP.

◈ Mission
Go to Flame Sprite with WalYoung

◈ Reward
Experience 4000100 / 5 Secret Medicine of Instant Recovery

◈ Form
Available Once

◈ NPC
WalYoung

◈ Monster
Tomb Snake Lord

◈ Scenario
Now that we know where ShinMoo is, I would like to meet him.
I want to know how he came to kill my brother and why he left me… I would like to ask him all of it.

desc1.notice: Go to Flame Sprite  with WalYoung

desc.notice:
◈ Task
Dismantle Alchemy ingredients (monster by-products)

◈ Reward
10 General's Tokens

◈ Format
One-time quest

◈ NPC
Potion Merchants from each town

◈ Scenario
Congratulations on reaching level 40.
Be informed about Alchemy, complete the task and be rewarded.
With Alchemy, you can reinforce your equipment or imbue it with new attributes.
In order to perform the desired Alchemy on a piece of equipment, ingredients such as the four elements and tablets.
The easiest way to gain the ingredients is to dismantle equipment or monster by-products.
Dismantle monster by-products yourself and visit Potion Merchants in each town.
To dismantle monster by-products, you require a Void Rondo.
Void Rondos can be purchased at a Grocery Store.

◈ Mission
Speak to Egypt Governor Senmute.

◈ Reward
EXP 6275059 / Skill Points 1600 / Gold 2559

◈ Type
1 Time Only

◈ NPC
Hunter Union President Narmer / Egypt Governor Senmute

◈ Monster
N/A

◈ Scenario
I've got a love potion, the finest suit, white horse, and a romantic message, but I still feel like something is missing! Oh, right… I have no present to give! I can't confess my love without a nice gift. What would be good? Would you ask Governor Senmute for his advice?

◈ Task
Deliver Devil Ong Beads

◈ Reward
EXP 160377 /
General's Tokens 5

◈ Format
One-time quest

◈ NPC
Outpost Guard Hadaz / Specialty Trader Sanmok

◈ Monster
None

◈ Scenario
The Devil Ong Beads are rare medicine that are highly sought after. We are receiving orders relentlessly from citizens of Hotan who have heard the news that we have acquired some Devil Ong Beads. Today, we need to send in a shipment to Specialty Trader Sanmok. Will you help us with our deliveries?

◈ Task
Speak with the Goods Supplier in China, Donwhang, or Hotan.

◈ Reward
6th Grade Seal Accessory Set


◈ Format
One-time quest

◈ NPC
Goods Supplier in China, Donwhang, or Hotan.

◈ Scenario
Congratulations! Your advancement is splendid! I will have accessories ready for you that are just as splendid. Please come see me in town.

◈ Mission
Collect Spirit's Shell

◈ Reward
None

◈ Form
Available once

◈ NPC
Exorcist Miaoryeong / Buddhist Priest Jeonghye

◈ Monster
Old Tombstone Ghost

◈ Scenario
The bell has been purified. It should not emit evil energy any longer.
Now, take this bell and summon an Old Tombstone Ghost at the cemetery as Miaoryeong told you.
Deep in the cemetery located to the southeast of Jangan, there is a fork in the path where it splits into three. There is an old tombstone that fell over under the tree towards the west. Some says that they saw the Old Tombstone Ghost there. Use your bell there.
Please, always be careful not to be tainted by demonic energy.

◈ Mission
Speak to Doctor Renenutet.

◈ Reward
EXP 9618622 / Skill Points 1200 / GOLD 2362

◈ Type
1 Time Only

◈ NPC
Egypt Governor Senmute / Doctor Renenutet

◈ Monster
N/A

◈ Scenario
A strange rumor is going around the Valley of Kings about the emergence of an unknown army of monsters. It might not be true, but something tells me that Mentuhotep might be involved. Would you talk to Renetutet about this?

◈ Task
Speak with the Goods Supplier in China, Donwhang, or Hotan.

◈ Reward
1st Grade Seal Accessory Set


◈ Format
One-time quest

◈ NPC
Goods Supplier in China, Donwhang, or Hotan.

◈ Scenario
I have several accessories that will help you survive in this world. Why don't you come and pick one up? You will find me near the fountain in town.

◈ Task
Defeat 244 Blind Moles and 526 Moles

◈ Reward
EXP 6,641,309 / Skill Points 1,375


◈ Format
Repeatable (x4)

◈ NPC
Outpost Commander Dao Zhi Fong

◈ Monster
Blind Mole, Mole

◈ Scenario
According to the report from our men who were fighting Earth Ghosts in the Donwhang Stone Cave, the Earth Ghosts summoned giant mole-like creatures to counter-attack. These are Blind Moles and Moles, demons once sealed in the Stone Cave in the past. Earth Ghosts gaining friends is not a good thing for us. We must eradicate them immediately, before it is too late.

◈ Mission
Collect 100 Fairy Ostracons.(Intermediate)

◈ Reward
EXP 10825843 / Skill Points 1600 / Gold 4900

◈ Type
1 Time Only

◈ NPC
Doctor Renenutet / Doctor Renenutet

◈ Monster
Heron

◈ Scenario
Now, please bring me 100 Fairy Ostracons (Intermediate) from the Intermediate Pharaoh's Tomb. You can get them by hunting Herons.

◈ Task
Deliver Deciphered Document to Ahmok

◈ Rewards
EXP 1,100 / Skill EXP 500

◈ Format
One-time quest

◈ NPC
Exorcist Miaoryeong / Hunter Associate Ahmok

◈ Monsters
None

◈ Scenario
Here you go. What does it say, you ask? Hmph! It's boring stuff as you might expect from wicked demons. You can hear the rest from Ahmok when you give this to him.

◈ Mission
Eliminate 100 Priest of Terror.

◈ Reward
EXP 1082584 / Skill Points 700 / Gold 4900 / AP 100

◈ Type
Repeatable

◈ NPC
Trader/Hunter Union Representative Kapado / Trader/Hunter Union Representative Kapado

◈ Monster
Fear Priest

◈ Scenario
We've got to eliminate as many monsters as possible to consolidate our dominance of the Shrine. Your mission is to defeat 100 Priest of Terror. Please do your best to get more kills than the Thief Union so that we can keep the Shrine under our control.

QNO_SD_GU_005.quest_name: Hunting in the Middle of the Temple Dispute 2 (Trader)

desc.notice:
◈ Task
Obtain 30 Creepy Eyes

◈ Rewards
EXP 37,500 / Skill EXP 1,500

◈ Format
Repeatable quest (Restricted to once per day)

◈ NPC
Stable-Keeper Salihap

◈ Monsters
Togui Boomer (The Phantom of the Crimson Blood level 61~70)

◈ How to Teleport
You can teleport to the Forgotten World by using a Dimension Hole.
You can obtain Dimension Holes from the monster that appears from the Dimension Pillars.

◈ Scenario
When Toguis appeared to pillage a while ago, I saw Togui Boomers eating creepy-looking eyes. How could they enjoy eating something so disgusting? Or… perhaps they are really tasty? I'm curious. I'm so curious, in fact, that I would like to try one myself.

◈ Mission
Collect 100 spears of Niya soldiers

◈ Reward
Experience 17367600 / Skill Exp 96000

◈ Form
Available Once

◈ NPC
Soboi the blacksmith of Hotan

◈ Monster
Niya Soldiers/ Niya Guards

◈ Scenario
Ah. you've come. Thank you for your help before. I bet you wondering who won the bet. Hmm.... well it's a draw.
My friend also used the same material. It may be a coincidence or the information may have leaked out to him.
So we made this last bet. This time I must win the bet. This is all about my pride. Will you help me again?
We agreed that whoever makes better items using the equipment of soldier monsters found the Ruins of Niya will be the winner. So I've chosen the spear of a Niya soldier.
Please get me 100 spears of Niya soldiers. I believe I can make good spears with them.

◈ Task
Collect 270 Adonis' Ears

◈ Reward
EXP 82912465 / Skill Points 1611 /
GOLD 185848

◈ Format
2

◈ NPC
Farm Owner Mujariun

◈ Monster
Violent Adonis

There is a group of indigenous people who have been living on Roc Mountain for a long, long time.
Known as the Feathers, they are mask-wearing Roc worshippers. They were originally docile but became quite violent since the war broke out between Rocs and the humans. They even attack humans occasionally.
Anyway, a while ago, 150 Food Sacks and 100 Life Essentials Sacks inbound from Hotan were stolen by the Feathers.
These were food and life essentials for the few Roc Mountain residents.
Listen, friend – would you be willing to retrieve the sacks?
I hear the sacks have been divided among the Feather Cloaks. You should be able to retrieve the sacks from them.
But the Feather Masks who are much more violent than the Feather Cloaks, will probably be around them. Be cautious.

I've done my share of trouble, but I'm not the girl I used to be. I'm working hard at making an honest living now. This is so like my father. He never gives me a chance to prove myself. ◈ Mission
Collect 7 different kinds of rainbow plant using the essence of Rok Mountain

◈ Reward
Experience 4773000/ Skill Exp 320000

◈ Form
Available Once

◈ NPC
Slave Shifle

◈ Monster
Rocky giant

◈ Scenario
Rahid is the famous Islamic wizard.
The guardian who protects Roc now, Demon Shaitan, is him. Didn't you know?
That's right. I could never forget what happened.
At the time, Rahid ran into me while he was searching for his mother at the end of the First Great Roc War.
When I first met him, he had this sadness about him as he searched for his mother. When I met him the second time, though, he had turned into a completely different person.
As though he was possessed by the devil, you know?
He found it very difficult even to converse with me, but he managed to spit out a few words to me. He went up to the top of thr Roc Mountain after saying that he had to fight Roc and avenge his mother's death.
As great a wizard as he was, it was a ridiculous thing to face Roc all alone.
I heard that he was eventually defeated and the Roc, regarding his skills highly, controlled his mind and turned him into the Demon Shaitan that he is now.
Oh, he said to call him if I ever happened to come upon his mother and he told me how to summon him.
He said that, in order to summon him, I needed to gather the Rainbow Grass that grows on the seven, small peaks on the Roc Mountain and incant…
Huh? I can't spit out the words. I can remember it clearly in my head… What's wrong with me?
Eh… Ah… Hmm, strange. The words just won't come out.
Well, I suppose it doesn't really matter since I know the incantation.
Please bring me the Rainbow Grass and I'll summon Demon Shaitan for you.
Seven Guardian Rockys protect each of the seven peaks where the Rainbow Grass grows, so it won't be a simple task to get them.
And you need something called the Essence of the Roc Mountain to obtain the grass. They are crystals that were originally only found in the woods on the Roc Mountain, but Rocky Giants carry them now.
Hunt down some Rocky Giants and retrieve some of that Essence of the Roc Mountain, and then take them to the seven peaks and use them there to obtain the grass.
Using the essence doesn't guarantee success in gathering the grass, so you will need sufficient essence. It is said that the grass loses its color depending on the order you gather them in. So, in order to obtain grass that is intact, you have to visit the peaks in this order: the Brain Peak, the Eye Peak, the Heart Peak, the Wing Peak, the Claw Peak, the Beak Peak, and finally the Tail Peak.
First, go to the Brain Peak and gather the Red Rainbow Grass.
The seven peaks are guarded by Guardian Rockies, so be careful.

I'm sorry, but I can't afford to pay my taxes since my clients still haven't paid me yet. I'll have to speak to Officer Maneto and see if I can pay this month's taxes with some of my weapons instead. Could you help me out? I need 30 Hard Shells from Tatans and 50 Soft Green Leathers from Wenegs.

◈ Task
Defeat 250 Baal's Followers and 250 Baal's Guides

◈ Reward
EXP 187,924,785 / Skill Points 5,226 /
Gold 452,000

◈ Format
One-time quest

◈ NPC
Lost Soldier Fernando

◈ Monsters
Baal's Follower, Baal's Guide

◈ Scenario
Hey, friend. Do you know where we are? I have no idea where I am. Those that are walking about just say random things or even attack me. There is not one person in his right mind. Won't you help me bring the Baal's Followers and the Baal's Guides to their senses?

◈ Task
Defeat 500 Minotaurs of Distress

◈ Reward
EXP 187,924,785 / Skill Points 5,226 /
Gold 361,600

◈ Format
One-time quest

◈ NPC
Lost Soldier Rice

◈ Monsters
Minotaur of Distress

◈ Scenario
Greetings. This is a marvelous place. I saw Minotaurs - alive and moving - with my own eyes. This is God's blessing, perhaps? Ha ha ha! What? Those Minotaur's are not supposed to be moving? They are moving because of some evil energy? This can't be! Evil energy in this holy Temple? Slay those Minotaurs of Distress. Don't allow the evil energy a foothold in the Temple of Jupiter.

◈ Task
Collect 1 High General's Essence

◈ Reward
EXP 45533747 / Skill Points 1245 /
GOLD 24250

◈ Format
Repeatable (unlimited)

◈ NPC
Village Old Man Kerim

◈ Monster
Abshad Force High General

◈ Scenario
In return for showing you the future of Baghdad, there is something I would like you to do for me. It is nothing difficult. Just collect the things I need for me.

◈ Mission
Deliver the Infectious Disease Remedy.

◈ Reward
EXP 5255264 / Skill Points 1000 / Gold 2428

◈ Type
1 Time Only

◈ NPC
Potion Trader Titi / Stable Master Nefret

◈ Monster
N/A

◈ Scenario
Here, the vaccine is ready. This will cure the horses. Please deliver it to Nefret, and don't forget to send my regards.

◈ Task
Eliminate 20 Ghost Specters

◈ Rewards
EXP 515,000 / Skill EXP 1,000

◈ Format
Repeatable quest (Restricted to once per day)

◈ NPC
Hunter Associate Ahmok

◈ Monsters
Ghost Specter (The Green Abyss level 91~100)

◈ How to Teleport
You can teleport to the Forgotten World by using a Dimension Hole.
You can obtain Dimension Holes from the monster that appears from the Dimension Pillars.

◈ Scenario
You know that lots of trouble is happening because of the evil spirits from the Forgotten World, don't you? Because of that, the Hunter Union is receiving lots of requests to eradicate them. We have a request to eradicate Ghost Specters… How about it? Will you give it a try?

◈ Objective
Deliver Specialty Goods Level 25 (China)

◈ Reward
176,900 Job EXP (-50% in Safe Mode)

◈ Format
One-time Quest

◈ NPC
Trader Yusun / Trader Sunwha

◈ Monster
None

◈ Scenario
We have an order for specialty goods to be delivered. You need to deliver specialty goods to Trader Sunwha in Donwhang. Specialty goods delivery assignments are worth more Job EXP than trade goods collection assignments. It would do you well to undertake some of these.

◈ Mission
Speak to Trader/Hunter Union Representative Kapado.

◈ Reward
EXP 5412921 / Skill Points 1100 / Gold 2340

◈ Type
1 Time Only

◈ NPC
Trader Union President Naunakt / Trader/Hunter Union Representative Kapado

◈ Monster
N/A

◈ Scenario
The Shrine that was discovered recently is filled with the forgotten artifacts of the ancients. We at the Trader Union invested a great amount of money for the exclusive rights to excavate the artifacts, but the members of the Thief Union are violating our rights and causing great damage. Putting it simply, they're robbing our artifacts from us. For more information, please go speak to our representative Kapado at the Shrine.

desc1.notice: Conversing with Trader/Hunter Union Representative Kapado

QNO_SD_GU_001.quest_name: The Beginning of the Temple Dispute (Trader)

desc.notice:
◈ Mission
Eliminate 10 Sphinxes in the Beginner Pharaoh's Tomb.

◈ Reward
EXP 3247753 / Skill Points 750 / Gold 14700

◈ Type
Repeatable

◈ NPC
Egyptian Soldier Turian / Egyptian Soldier Turian

◈ Monster
Sphinx (Tomb Beginner)

◈ Scenario
Alright, let's start the Deity training. Now it's time for you to hunt 10 Sphinxes in the Beginner Pharaoh's Tomb.

◈ Mission
Speak to Grocery Trader Kapra.

◈ Reward
EXP 5255264 / Skill Points 1000 / Gold 2428

◈ Type
1 Time Only

◈ NPC
Hunter Union President Narmer / Grocery Trader Kapra

◈ Monster
N/A

◈ Scenario
Thank you for bringing me that Love Potion last time, but it was too smelly to use on anyone. In any case, I finally decided that love must be earned and won, not gained through drugs or medication. So I finally decided to ask her out and confess my love. That said, I need a nice suit to wear tonight. Grocery Trader Kapra is known for his exquisite tailoring. Would you please ask him to make me a nice suit?

◈ Task
Deliver Royal Coat of Arms

◈ Reward
EXP 71602859 / Skill Points 1169 /
GOLD 47800

◈ Format
One-time quest

◈ NPC
Scout Soldier Amanun / Minister Mahmud

◈ Monster
None

◈ Scenario
Last time, we discovered that the unidentified enemy has the Royal Coat of Arms. We have to inform Baghdad of this news. Would you accept the delivery task?

◈ Task
Collect 110 Maong Beads

◈ Reward
EXP 240566 /
General's Tokens 10

◈ Format
Repeatable (x2)

◈ NPC
Outpost Guard Yang Yen

◈ Monster
Maong

◈ Scenario
Devil Ongs are so ugly that they make you cringe just at the sight of them. Now, I hear that they absorb the essence of the land and form beads with it inside their body. We call them Devil Ong Beads. The rumor has it that it is potent enough to bring the dead back to life. Will you get some of those beads for me?

◈ Task
Defeat 188 Big Blue Spiders and 400 Big White Spiders

◈ Reward
EXP 3107842 / Skill Points 830


◈ Format
Repeatable (x3)

◈ NPC
Outpost Commander Mu Qi Yong

◈ Monster
Big Blue Spider, Big White Spider

◈ Scenario
Have you seen Blue-Face Spiders and White-Face Spiders before you came here? Some of them drank in intensely wicked energy and became large and strong. These are Big Blue Spiders and Big White Spiders. They reproduced at a frightening rate and spread their influence, so much so that now we can't do anything about them on our own. Late as we are, if we don't hurry and slay them now, they will become a greater threat. Please, stop them for us.

◈ Mission
Eliminate 100 Harmeth.

◈ Reward
EXP 1082584 / Skill Points 700 / Gold 4900 / AP 100

◈ Type
Repeatable

◈ NPC
Job Union Representative Mansuana / Job Union Representative Mansuana

◈ Monster
Harmeth

◈ Scenario
I'll help any union to consolidate their dominance of the Shrine, but only if they complete my mission: eliminate 100 Harsmeses.

QNO_SD_GU_025.quest_name: Hunting in the Middle of the Temple Dispute 6 (Trader)

desc.notice:
◈ Mission
Deliver Titi's Signature.

◈ Reward
EXP 5742568 / Skill Points 1300 / Gold 2493

◈ Type
1 Time Only

◈ NPC
Potion Trader Titi / Store Keeper Khamererne

◈ Monster
N/A

◈ Scenario
You said you need my signature, right? There you go. I hope this will help Khamererne reconnect with her father.

◈ Task
Collect 90 Fragments of Earth Ghost Bug's Nipper

◈ Reward
EXP 661,682 /
General's Tokens 10

◈ Format
Repeatable (x4)

◈ NPC
Outpost Guard Ji He Long

◈ Monster
Earth Ghost Bug

◈ Scenario
The rumor has it that the nipper of an Earth Ghost Bug is powerful enough to cut through steel. If that rumor is true, we should be able to create fine weapons out of such nippers, don't you think? But we can't get the real thing from here, so all I can do is just daydream about it. Do you think you could help me?

desc1.notice: Collect 90 Fragments of Earth Ghost Bug's Nipper(%d)

desc.notice:
◈ Task
Deliver Red Scorpion's Venom Sacks

◈ Reward
EXP 112240 /
Soldier's Tokens 4

◈ Format
One-time quest

◈ NPC
Outpost Guard Asoho / Herbalist Bori

◈ Monster
None

◈ Scenario
We have once slain Red Scorpion's and acquired their venom sacks. We were worrying about their disposal, but, now, Herbalist Bori is requesting a shipment of Red Scorpion's Venom Sacks. We are just thankful to be rid of them. Will you accept this delivery task?

QNO_N_KT_036.quest_name: Medicinal material that can't be acquired easily

desc.notice:
◈ Mission
Collect 100 Guardian Crystals

◈ Reward
Experience 18537600 / Skill Exp 100000

◈ Form
Available Once

◈ NPC
Aircraft Ticket Seller Sayun

◈ Monster
Qing Tribe Guardian

◈ Scenario
Hi, my name is Sayun.
You seem like a pretty capable person, so I have a favor to ask of you.
A while ago I learned something important about the Roc.
We might be able to save many people who are being harassed by the Roc clan, if what I learnt by chance is true.
So I would like to find out whether this is true or not…
Would you give me a hand? You will need to hunt Wing Tribe Guardians.
According to the information I have gathered, you can collect Guardian Crystals from Wing Tribe Guardians which carries their energy.
Please bring me 100 of those crystals.
When you bring them to me, I'll tell you about the next task.

◈ Task
Collect 94 Big Blue Spider's Teeth

◈ Reward
EXP 485023 /
General's Tokens 10

◈ Format
Repeatable (x3)

◈ NPC
Outpost Guard Shaha

◈ Monster
Big Blue Spider

◈ Scenario
*sigh* Spider hunts never end! I can't even begin to count how many spiders I have fought. I am sick and tired of spiders now. Please, could you do me a favor and slay Big Blue spiders for me?

◈ Mission
Speak to Leebaek

◈ Reward
Experience 4016100

◈ Form
Available Once

◈ NPC
Yangyun the herbalist of Jangan / Leebaek the Guild Manager of Jangan

◈ Monster
None

◈ Scenario
The Gisaengs said that Leebaek would know about the white viper, so we should be able to find out where the white viper is if we go ask him.
Please, go speak to Leebaek, get the information on the white viper and then bring me its blood.
I really want to save my friend's life. Please help.

◈ Mission
Eliminate 50 Unegs

◈ Reward
EXP 9338467 / Skill Points 1100 / Gold 2340

◈ Type
1 Time Only

◈ NPC
Egypt Governor Senmute / Egypt Governor Senmute

◈ Monster
Uneg

◈ Scenario
I'll give you a simple mission so that you can prove to me that you're reliable. Take care of the pesky Unegs that frequently appear in the Delta area. If you do that for us, I'll trust you a bit more. Eliminate 50 Unegs, will you? They appear in the Delta area.

◈ Objective
Deliver Specialty Goods Level 35 (China)

◈ Reward
651,300 Job EXP (-50% in Safe Mode)

◈ Format
One-time Quest

◈ NPC
Trader Sunwha / Trader Yusun

◈ Monster
None

◈ Scenario
We have an order for specialty goods to be delivered. You need to deliver specialty goods to Trader Yusun in Jangan. Specialty goods delivery assignments are worth more Job EXP than trade goods collection assignments. It would do you well to undertake some of these.

◈ Task
Defeat 130 Bonecrushers, 130 Starved Bonecrushers, and 130 Gorgons of Oblivion

◈ Reward
EXP 7,793,765 / Skill Points 578 /
Gold 32,655

◈ Format
Unlimited Repeats

◈ NPC
Baal Worshipper Maadu

◈ Monsters
Bonecrusher, Starved Bonecrusher, Gorgon of Oblivion

◈ Scenario
They are still around, Bonecrushers, Starved Bonecrushers, and Gorgons of Oblivion! I want to escape this scary place now. I can't stand it anymore. Please, do this again for me. Please!

◈ Task
Collect 200 Crown of the Sun Fragments

◈ Reward
EXP 431,359,607 / Skill Points 7,321 /
Gold 459,500

◈ Format
One-time quest

◈ NPC
Lost Investigator Avrill

◈ Monsters
Baal Zealot, Cruel Zealot, Wild Zealot, Ruin Watch, Ruin Cutter, Hell Blood, Blood Watch, Hell Guard, Hell Defender, Hell Serpent, Cursed Baal Zealot, Cursed Baal Guard, Baal Zealot Modify, Baal Guard Modify, Hell Enchantress

◈ Scenario
According to this Dimensions Portal Production Guide, the only way to create a portal is to use the Crown of the Sun. But the Crown has already been used and now must be destroyed… One informant came to our base a while ago and told us that the Crown of the Sun was destroyed in the Forest of Sorrow. When it was destroyed, hordes of monsters gathered. These monsters may have the fragments. Go, hunt down those monsters in the Forest of Sorrow and bring me the Crown of the Sun Fragments.

desc1.notice: Collect 200 Crown of the Sun Fragments (%d)

desc.notice:
◈ Mission
Collect 100 Insect Ostracons.(Intermediate)

◈ Reward
EXP 10825843 / Skill Points 1600 / Gold 4900

◈ Type
1 Time Only

◈ NPC
Doctor Renenutet / Doctor Renenutet

◈ Monster
Lightning Khepri / Demon Bug

◈ Scenario
As far as I know, the ancients of Egypt manipulated the power of the dead by confining their souls in ostracons. My knowledge is incomplete right now, but I'll be able to figure out the rest of the information if I have more ostracons. Please bring me 100 Insect Ostracons (Intermediate) from the Intermediate Pharaoh's Tomb. You can find them from Lightning Khepris and Demon Bugs.

◈ Task
Defeat 150 Bonecrushers, 150 Starved Bonecrushers, and 150 Gorgons of Oblivion

◈ Reward
EXP 794,964,045 / Skill Points 5,226 /
Gold 419,850

◈ Format
One-time quest

◈ NPC
Baal Worshipper Maadu

◈ Monsters
Bonecrusher, Starved Bonecrusher, Gorgon of Oblivion

◈ Scenario
Deep inside the Hall of the Devil, there are incredibly fearsome monsters - Bonecrushers, Starved Bonecrushers, and Gorgons of Oblivion. They are absolutely scary. If we are to leave this place, we need to get rid of them. Could I possibly ask you to slay Bonecrushers, Starved Bonecrushers, and Gorgons of Oblivion?

◈ Task
Defeat 371 Mujigis and 401 Ujigis

◈ Reward
EXP 2108656 / Skill Points 1086


◈ Format
Repeatable (x2)

◈ NPC
Outpost Commander Ru Long Hu

◈ Monster
Mujigi, Ujigi

◈ Scenario
Have you had an encounter with monsters called Bunwangs and Sungsungs? They were both monkeys once. Among these monkey demons, Mujigi's and Ujigis are probably the most dominant ones. I don't know where they received such wicked energy, but, now with their evil powers, they are a great threat to the Kingdom of Hotan. Will you slay them for us?

◈ Mission
Deliver the Bitter Antidote.

◈ Reward
EXP 6275059 / Skill Points 1600 / Gold 2559

◈ Type
1 Time Only

◈ NPC
Potion Trader Thiara / Weapon Trader Chunmoo

◈ Monster
N/A

◈ Scenario
The antidote is ready! This will completely neutralize the Devil Worm's venom. Please deliver it to Chunmoo as soon as possible.

◈ Task
Collect 190 Heavy Picks

◈ Reward
EXP 1,485,350 /
General's Tokens 10

◈ Format
Repeatable (x4)

◈ NPC
Outpost Guard Ji He Long

◈ Monster
Power Earth Ghost

◈ Scenario
This is not good. I have plenty to do to maintain the outpost facilities, but I have no tools I can work with. I have requested Donwhang for supplies multiple times, but the way things are now, everything is being delayed. I do have a good idea, though, if you would be willing to help me?

◈ Mission
Collect 10 cursed hearts

◈ Reward
1 potion per 10 Cursed Hearts

◈ Form
Unlimited attempts

◈ Executable level
At least level 20

◈ NPC
Potion Merchants in the Villages

◈ Monster
All Monsters

◈ Scenario
if you drink a special potion called the resuscitation potion, you can redistribute the levels of your skill one level per one bottle. and you need money too.
To make the potion I need the cursed hearts of monsters
If you hunt monsters and get the cursed hearts from them, the village potion merchants will exchange 10 hearts for a bottle of potion.

◈ Task
Defeat 308 Penon Fighters and 330 Penon Warriors

◈ Reward
EXP 3022136 / Skill Points 988


◈ Format
Repeatable (x3)

◈ NPC
Outpost Commander Hu Ru Lang

◈ Monster
Penon Fighter, Penon Warrior

◈ Scenario
Have you seen monsters with arms made of ice swords? They wander around the ruins of Karakoram. They are demonic warriors created by a demon called Isyutaru. They are her hands and feet. With them, Isyutaru plans to bring down the Kingdom of Hotan in just a short period of time and extend her influence to the east and the west. There is no way we can just sit here and watch her do that. Go now and slay the demonic warriors, Penon Fighters and Penon Warriors.

◈ Task
Deliver Monkey Skulls

◈ Reward
EXP 39450 /
Soldier's Tokens 4

◈ Format
One-time quest

◈ NPC
Outpost Volunteer Masha / Grocery Trader Saha

◈ Monster
None

◈ Scenario
We have a delivery request. It is a quest to deliver Monkey Skulls to Grocery Trader Saha in Samarkand. If you happen to be on your way, will you deliver them for us?

◈ Objective
Deliver Specialty Goods Level 50 (Europe)

◈ Reward
2,714,400 Job EXP (-50% in Safe Mode)

◈ Format
One-time Quest

◈ NPC
Trader Samanda / Trader Anna

◈ Monster
None

◈ Scenario
We have an order for specialty goods to be delivered. You need to deliver specialty goods to Trader Anna in Constantinople. Specialty goods delivery assignments are worth more Job EXP than trade goods collection assignments. It would do you well to undertake some of these.

◈ Task
Talk to Hunter Associate Ahmok

◈ Rewards
EXP 2,600 / Skill EXP 500

◈ Format
One-time quest

◈ NPC
General Ratchel / Hunter Associate Ahmok

◈ Monsters
None

◈ Scenario
Since the necromancers and the Cult opened the door of the Forgotten World, monsters that have never seen before began to appear. We are having a lot of trouble taking care of this mess. We have received word a while ago that strange rumors are floating about in the Hotan Kingdom, our ally. I'm concerned that it might be connected to this incident. If you don't mind, would you like to lend us a hand?

◈ Mission
Speak to General Sonhyeon.

◈ Reward
EXP 5412921 / Skill Points 1100 / Gold 2450

◈ Type
1 Time Only

◈ NPC
Doctor Renenutet / General Sonhyeon

◈ Monster
N/A

◈ Scenario
Thank you for waiting. This document contains all the secrets of Berserk discovered from the Pharaoh's Tomb. Please deliver this document to General Sonhyeon in Jangan. He'll be pleased to read it.

◈ Task
Eliminate 25 Flame Salamanders

◈ Rewards
EXP 479,000 / Skill EXP 1,300

◈ Format
Repeatable quest (Restricted to once per day)

◈ NPC
Boat Ticket Seller Ahgon

◈ Monsters
Flame Salamander (The Burning Abyss level 71~80)

◈ How to Teleport
You can teleport to the Forgotten World by using a Dimension Hole.
You can obtain Dimension Holes from the monster that appears from the Dimension Pillars.

◈ Scenario
Will you listen to my story? When the door to the Forgotten World opened, a dragon of fire came out of it. When I saw it, I ended up wetting myself. Everyone was watching. I'm embarrassed and angry. Thankfully, I didn't get hurt, but, whenever I think back to that time, I can't sleep at night. I would appreciate if someone would get back at them for me.

◈ Mission
Speak to Stable Master Nefret.

◈ Reward
EXP 5575309 / Skill Points 1200 / Gold 2471

◈ Type
1 Time Only

◈ NPC
Hunter Union President Narmer / Stable Master Nefret

◈ Monster
N/A

◈ Scenario
I'm going to wear Kapra's suit for the dinner, but I feel like something is missing. Maybe riding in on a white horse would make things more romantic, not to mention that it'll complete my outfit. Would you bring me a nice white horse from Stable Master Nefret?

◈ Task
Speak with Outpost Commander Dao Zhi Fong

◈ Reward
Skill Points 178


◈ Format
One-time quest

◈ NPC
Outpost Commander Mu Qi Yong / Outpost Commander Dao Zhi Fong

◈ Monster
None

◈ Scenario
We have received an urgent message from Donwhang. It sounds like something happened in the Donwhang Stone Cave. They are requesting reinforcements but, as you can see, we can't leave Karakoram. You possess great skills. Would you go there and find out what is happening?

desc1.notice: Speak with Outpost Commander Dao Zhi Fong

QNO_N_KT_096.quest_name: Unusual phenomenon of Donwhang Stone Cave

desc.notice:
◈ Task
Defeat 12 Water Ghost slaves and 16 Water Ghosts

◈ Reward
EXP 3,526 / Skill Points 5


◈ Format
One-time quest

◈ NPC
Outpost Commander Wang Pai

◈ Monster
Water Ghost slave, Water Ghost

◈ Scenario
The swamp near Jangan is overrun by Water Ghosts. Those odorous things ruin everything around them along with their slaves. You see where I'm going with this? Yes, it is time to teach them a harsh lesson!

◈ Task
Defeat 400 Temple Keepers

◈ Reward
EXP 1,376,377 / Skill Points 578 /
Gold 22,225

◈ Format
One-time quest

◈ NPC
Lost Soldier Charles

◈ Monsters
Temple Keeper

◈ Scenario
Slaying the Temple Keepers for us helped us advance to the Sanctuary. But, on our way, more Temple Keepers appeared. Our movement is hindered. Would you slay Temple Keepers once again?

◈ Task
Find 300 Maeutu Crab meat

◈ Reward
Experience 184806947 / Skill Exp 6998 /
GOLD 150000

◈ Form
Available 5 times

◈ NPC
Royal Investigator Mahlipatun

◈ Monster
Maeutu Crab

◈ Scenario
Have you seen the Maeutu crab around here? They are hard to catch but their flesh is very delicious. Also, it is a good source of protein because the crabs are high-protein food. Can you please catch and bring us the flesh of the Maeutu crab to revive the troops?

◈ Mission
Deliver the Herb Sack to Melit.

◈ Reward
EXP 5412921 / Skill Points 1100 / GOLD 2450

◈ Type
1 Time Only

◈ NPC
Potion Trader Titi / Grocery Trader Melit

◈ Monster
N/A

◈ Scenario
It's been a while since Ms. Melit asked me for some herbs, but she didn't come back to pick them up. I'm afraid that she might have forgotten. If it's okay with you, would you drop by Ms. Melit's shop and give this Herb Sack to her?

◈ Task
Deliver Earth Ghost Soldier's Badges

◈ Reward
EXP 2,475,258 /
General's Tokens 5

◈ Format
One-time quest

◈ NPC
Outpost Guard Ru Li Mao / Hunter Associate Haraho

◈ Monster
None

◈ Scenario
Oh, just the person I was hoping to talk to. You are the one who retrieved those Earth Ghost Soldier's Badges by Ji He Long's request, are you not? Earth Ghost Soldiers were a thorn in the Hunter Association's side. When they heard that you slew Earth Ghost Soldiers, they began looking for you to reward you for your efforts. Take this Earth Ghost's Badge and go to the Hunter Association.

◈ Task
Collect 120 Mana Springs

◈ Reward
EXP 287,027,172 / Skill Points 5,226 /
Gold 441,120

◈ Format
One-time quest

◈ NPC
Medic Footco

◈ Monsters
Ruin Watcher, Ruin Cutter

◈ Scenario
How have you been? Those Magic Wands you picked up for me were very useful. On the other hand, I've been feeling lately that I have no talent as a medic. I'm painfully realizing that I lack the skills to treat others. I hear that this item called the Mana Spring carried by Ruin Watchers and Ruin Cutters exude mana endlessly. If only I had that, I wouldn't have to worry about my talent. Would you bring me some Mana Springs?

◈ Task
Deliver Blood Ong's Beads

◈ Reward
EXP 24087 /
Soldier's Tokens 4

◈ Format
One-time quest

◈ NPC
Outpost Guard Dao Lian Hong / Grocery Trader Yeosun

◈ Monster
None

◈ Scenario
Grocery Trader Yeosun wants a shipment of Blood Ong's Beads. I suppose she wants them for decorating purposes. I just don't understand kids nowadays. If it's pretty, they don't care whether it's from monsters or not, do they? Why should she want to work with such ominous things? Well, I suppose it's none of my business. If you have some time to spare, I would appreciate you helping me...

◈ Objective
Collect 300 units of Alligator Leather Belts

◈ Reward
4,600 Job EXP / item (10% bonus when quota filled) -50% in Safe Mode

◈ Format
Unlimited Repeatable

◈ NPC
Trader Sabonue

◈ Monster
Monsters Lv 70-79

◈ Scenario
You need to work ceaselessly to increase your Job level. If you are ready, bring me 300 units of Alligator Leather Belts. You should be able to find Alligator Leather Belts as you hunt monsters at level 70-79. If you run out of time and don't find enough Alligator Leather Belts, don't worry. Even if you don't have all 300 units, I will pay you for what you have. But don't forget that you have to bring all 300 units to gain greater Job EXP.

desc1.notice: Collect 300 units of Alligator Leather Belt (%d)

QNO_TRADE_HUNTER_A_008.quest_name: Collecting Trade Goods - Alligator Leather Belt! (Lvl 70-79)

desc.notice:
◈ Task
Defeat 250 Temple Observers and 250 Temple Keepers

◈ Reward
EXP 140,390,485 / Skill Points 5,226 /
Gold 437,500

◈ Format
One-time quest

◈ NPC
Lost Soldier Charles

◈ Monsters
Temple Observer, Temple Keeper

◈ Scenario
Have you ever seen Temple Observers and Temple Keepers? You know, those monsters with huge hammers. They look like a sword wouldn't even penetrate them, don't they? How can we be asked to fight monsters like them? This is ridiculous! I'm so scared that I can't even go near them. But, when I look at you... You look like you could handle them. Would you slay some Temple Observers and Temple Keepers for me?

◈ Task
Defeat 250 Ironclaws of Revenge and 250 Ironclaws of Warning

◈ Reward
EXP 167,475,863 / Skill Points 5,226 /
Gold 444,500

◈ Format
One-time quest

◈ NPC
Lost Soldier Rice

◈ Monsters
Ironclaw of Revenge, Ironclaw of Warning

◈ Scenario
The Temple of Jupiter has great historical value. I count it a privilege to have been sent here. Just being here makes me feel like I am breathing with the gods of old. But… look at those beasts! How could such beasts be flying around in such a holy place as this? Their presence here is unforgivable. I have no doubt that those are the creatures responsible for ruining the Temple of Jupiter. Still, they are no mere cockroaches. Would you slay them for me?

◈ Task
Collect 179 Golem Flowers

◈ Reward
EXP 336720 /
Soldier's Tokens 5

◈ Format
One-time quest

◈ NPC
Outpost Guard Caleb

◈ Monster
Rock Golem

◈ Scenario
I can't put up with the fuss of fierce monsters like Rock Golem. Would you add your power to defeat them?

◈ Mission
Eliminate 1 Apis.

◈ Reward
EXP 64955062 / Skill Points 3600 / Gold 14700

◈ Type
1 Time Only

◈ NPC
Egypt Governor Senmute / Egypt Governor Senmute

◈ Monster
Apis

◈ Scenario
Something terrible will happen soon since Mentuhotep has resurrected the gods from the Pharaoh tomb. We must stop them at all costs before they destroy our land. If you're brave enough to fight gods, then show me your strength by defeating Apis, the keeper of the Pharaoh tomb. It'd be foolhardy to fight ancient gods if you can't even beat Apis. If you can defeat Apis, though, you'll be able to handle them.

◈ Mission
Collect 25 Tomb Hunter's Bow

◈ Reward
Experience 8332400 / GOLD 150000 / Skill Exp 30000

◈ Form
Available Once

◈ NPC
Soldier Iyang the Eastern Gatekeeper

◈ Monster
Tomb Hunter

◈ Scenario
In my long service as the gatekeeper here, I've come to become friends with a few travelers who frequent visit Jangan.
A few days ago, a close acquaintance of mine showed me a bow that he said he acquired in the Qin-Shi Tomb. He apparently took it from a golem called Tomb Hunter. It seems to have an amazing power even in the hands of an amateur like himself, he said.
Of course, it's ludicrous to think that a bow, no matter how good it may be, could produce such power in the hands of someone who doesn't know how to handle it properly. But then, the human greed is taking the best of me. I, too, want one of those bows.
Would you mind getting me 25 of those bows?
I hear that you can find them on the 2nd level of the Qin-Shi Tomb.

One trouble after another, I tell you. This time, it's the griffins. Those scary beasts come in packs to kill and kidnap people. We need your help once again. Would you take care of the Fire Guardians, the Water Guardians, and the Soul Guardians?

As the battle is becoming frequent with the recent appearance of monsters, we are running low on scrap metal used to repair equipment. The shackles worn by Hell Bloods and Blood Watches should do just fine. Will you acquire some shackles for us?

If you are interested, try and complete the Sea of Resentment collection. If you accomplish that, I will give you a wonderful gift.

◈ Scenario
We are doing our best to keep the people safe from the Ghost Pirates that have appeared from the Forgotten World. But the commanders who lead them are by no means average and we miss them every time. Oh, if we could only do something about those Ghost Commanders...

Blood Devil Flowers and Blood Death Flowers may seem like ordinary plant monsters. Yet, the true terror of these monsters is in their capability to take on the appearance of humans. Monsters taking on the form of humans... This almost makes me wonder if the end of the world is nigh. Destroy Blood Devil Flowers and Blood Death Flowers. Show them the power of humans.

Truth be told, people are going missing mysteriously as of late. We don't know who the culprits are, but they come and go in the blink of an eye and leave hardly any traces. Thankfully, we found this fragment this time. However, we can't decipher it at all. What I would like to ask you to do is to investigate this fragment. How about it? Will you help?

Devil Horses may frightening creatures, but their strength in their endless running is truly awe-inspiring. I am curious to know the origin of such strength. Is it simply because they are monsters? Or is there some kind of strength developed within them that one can't find in other species? But, then, I can't risk my life just to satisfy my curiosity. So, I was thinking... How about you help me a bit?

◈ Form

◈ Scenario
The monster Shakram and the sand monster called Edimmu have lived in Taklamakan for hundreds of years.
These monsters hide themselves in the sand and burst out to attack humans and other living beings that pass by within reach.
The sand monster's teeth are said to be so strong that nobody can escape once bitten.
Well, the reason I'm telling you this story is because i want to ask you to kill the monsters. As the number of traders who travel in direction of Taklamakan on business is increasing so too are the number of the victims of this monster.
Can you hunt the sand monsters in Taklamakan? If you can kill 500 monsters, it'll be a great help to us.

◈ Scenario
Congratulations on reaching level 47.
Be informed about the Donwhang Stone Cave, complete the task and be rewarded.
A few more levels from now, you will reach level 50 and gain access to the Donwhang Stone Cave.
Giant Buddhist ruins, the Donwhang Stone Cave is now occupied by earth demons.
Use the Purification Flag to prevent the spread of the energy of the demons within the Donwhang Stone Cave. Then visit Potion Merchants in each town.
The Donwhang Stone Cave is to the northwest of Donwhang.

◈ Scenario
I've made some great profit off of the polished Royal Soldier and Royal Guard Spears. But we don't know how long this supply will last, so I would like to actually make a new spear this time.
I have enough orders in for spears and all I have to worry about now is how to make this spear.
Recently I heard an interesting news as I sold spears, I had a conversation with numerous people who had been to the Qin-Shi Tomb and heard about Royal Warriors.
I hear their spears are lighter by far than those of other golems weapons. Any spear should have just about the same weight. I don't know how the Royal Warriors spears were made, but I would like to acquire a few of them. Could you bring me 25 of them?
They say you can find Royal Warriors on the 2nd level of the Qin-Shi Tomb.

Do you know of the desert to the south? The place is called the Phantom Desert. It is where a group of thieves led by a female boss named Kalia has a stronghold. We have received intelligence of a potential deal between the rebels and these thieves, and investigation is under way. However, we have yet to find anything substantial. Would you go there and help my agents?

Because of these war-like monsters, many caravans and soldiers have suffered casualty. How dare these bugs attack humans! Will you put these bugs in their proper place for us?

Thanks to your accomplishments, the power of Toguis is cut down below half. Not only that, the numbers of those who would protect the Togui Elder are now reduced with the Togui Generals and the Togui Captains weakened. This is our best chance to slay the Togui Elder. Without the Elder, Toguis will lose their will to invade. This is my final request of you. Slay the Togui Elder for us!

At the Shipwreck in the Forgotten World, evil spirits called Ghost Pirates are said to roam about. I hear that they were pirates notorious for their evil deeds when they were still living. We have all the soul stones we need. The souls in the soul stones can be liberated by using the Soul Fragments. Only Ghost Wrecks carry Soul Fragments. Hunt down these Ghost Wrecks and bring me Soul Fragments.

◈ Reward
EXP 13,090 /
Monk's Tokens 5

◈ Format
One-time quest

◈ NPC

◈ Monster

◈ Scenario
Eeny, meeny, miny, moe. Catch the tiger by the... Oh, pardon me. The tigers in the area have become so ferocious that I'm frightened... *sigh* Just thinking about them gives me the chills. I would be a lot more at ease if only someone would pluck out their teeth for me...

◈ Task
Defeat 250 Battle Lions and 250 Roaring Battle Lions

◈ Reward
EXP 157,514,080 / Skill Points 5,226 /
Gold 441,000

◈ Format
One-time quest

◈ NPC
Lost Investigator Ruin

◈ Monsters
Battle Lion, Roaring Battle Lion

◈ Scenario
What's a fellow like you doing in a place like this? Could I perhaps interest you in lending me a hand? I am an archaeologist. I study the ancient faith which has been in existence since before birth. That is to say, I study our very roots. Mind you, I'm not an 'official' archaeologist yet, but I will soon be. Ha ha ha! Now, my research is being delayed because of some miserable sods who would interfere. I mean Battle Lions and Roaring Battle Lions. According to my research, they are very similar to the lions once raised by Apollo. I would like to research them, but I can't do that when they would attack me on sight. If I were just a few years younger, I would have no trouble beating them down. If you have some time on your hands, would you take care of them for me? That would make my research a whole lot easier.

Monk's Tokens 4

None

◈ Scenario
This urn contains the remains of my comrades who were killed by Bandits. Their death has been avenged, but that is not enough for them to enter Nirvana. Will you take this urn to Buddhist Priest Jeonghye? If he were to make an offering, I am sure my comrades will be able to enter Nirvana.

But there is a way around it - we can switch out the human souls with the Togui souls. To do that, we need the dishes to contain their souls. The more contact they have with Toguis the greater the effect. You just need to bring me some goods carried by Toguis.

desc.notice:
◈ Mission
Hunt 300 Qin-Tombstone's.

◈ Reward
Experience 2520000 / GOLD 70000

◈ Form
Available 5 times

◈ NPC
Jangan Arch-General Sonhyeon

◈ Monster
Qin-Tombstone

◈ Scenario
With rumors of hidden treasure in the Qin-Shi Tomb, many leave on a treasure hunt only to return wounded by the monsters in the Tomb or outright return dead. Despite this, people are blinded by the glory of treasure hunting and they keep risking their lives invading the Tomb. The monsters are becoming increasingly violent with the continued human invasion and the human casualty is on the rise of a bad cycle. This has come to His Imperial Majesty’s attention and he has given an imperial mandate to eliminate the monsters in the Qin-Shi Tomb. It is likely that His Imperial Majesty has heard that the monsters were angered by the human invasion and might start invading Jangan. The imperial force is currently carrying out the imperial mandate to eliminate monsters. But they are lacking manpower and resorting to hiring mercenaries. Now that you are participating in this campaign, too, go hunt down 300 Qin-Tombstone and then come back to me.

◈ Mission
Collect 3 Essence of Undine

◈ Reward
1 Alchemy Stone of the Abyss (10th grade)

◈ Form
Unlimited attempts

◈ NPC
Hotan Nephrite Refinery Chief Pahap

◈ Monster
Undine

◈ Scenario
Hey, isn't it the Essence of Undine?
Haha.. I was right!
Do you want to give me the Essence of Undine? You don't need to look like you are so surprised. kk..
The various energies within the nephrite cause so many problems when you are refining them.
The essence from Undine which contains the power of water can remove the impure energies surrounding the nephrite. If you give me the Essence of Undine, I will pay you. kkk
A single Essence of the Undine will not be enough to remove the impuruties properly, so you will have to bring me 3 of them. kk

Soldier's Tokens 5

◈ Scenario
Hmph! Those blasted Ghost Bugs! What is this world coming to when insects become monsters like that? I even lose sleep over the buzzing of their wings when they fly around. A fellow with your skills should be able to take care of them, I think... How about it? Would you slay some Ghost Bugs for me? I will be sure to pay you handsomely for it.

◈ Mission
Hunt Guardroky-brain/ Hunt Guardroky-eye/ Hunt Guardroky-heart/ Hunt Guardroky-wing/ Hunt Guardroky-claw/ Hunt Guardroky-beak/ Hunt Guardroky-tail

◈ Reward
Key for the gate Ruler/ Key of Bloodline / 1 Proof of Alliance (Combat)/ 1 Proof of Alliance (Revival)

◈ Form
Unlimited attempts
(After completing Preparation of material 2, may attempt from Test of Village Chief)

◈ NPC

◈ Monster
Guardroky-brain/ Guardroky-eye/ Guardroky-heart/ Guardroky-wing/ Guardroky-claw/ Guardroky-beak/ Guardroky-tail

◈ Scenario
Now that we have the Spirit Stone, we only need the last ingredient for us to obtain the key to the peak of the Roc Mountain
Roc gave parts of his soul to 7 of his most trustworthy children, the Rockies. They now each live in the seven small peaks of the Roc Mountain
If you kill the Guardroky, their souls will be sucked into the Crystallized spirit and turn into a Guardian's Spirit Stone. Also, if you cast a spell into the guardian spirit stone, then it can turn into a Key for the gate Ruler
Kill all 7 Rockies and bring me the guardian spirit stone. I will then cast a spell to turn it into a key.
Because it is too risky to hunt all 7 monsters alone, divide experience and items to hunt for the Rockies.
Please be aware that they are very powerful monsters.

[equally divide experience/ equally divide items. Quest available only when in a party]

◈ Mission
Talk to Village Chief Bukra

◈ Reward
Experience 2634000

◈ Form
Available Once

◈ NPC
Towner Isan / Village Chief Bukra

◈ Monster
None

◈ Scenario
Hey, you. Have you seen my son by any chance?
He's a tall and very handsome man– that's my son.
It's been a long, long time since he's left to study that… magic or something and there's been no news from him lately.
Maybe it's that darn chief hiding away all the letters from my son.
Can you do me a favor and find my son for me?
I would go myself but I don't know when he might be returning so I can't leave this place.
Go see the town chief.
It's darn Bukra who always delivered the letters to me, so he should know something.
Or, if you see a man with a silver crescent moon necklace on, drag him to me, would ya?
gave my son a silver crescent moon necklace as a gift and – I guess he liked it a lot – he always had it on him.
But asking Bukra will be quicker than finding a man wearing that necklace, so why don't you go see him instead.

◈ Mission
Collect 5 red spirit stones/ Collect 7 blue spirit stones

◈ Reward
None

◈ Form
Unlimited attempts
(After completing Preparation of material 2, may attempt from Test of Village Chief)

◈ NPC
Village Chief Bukra

◈ Monster
Wingtribe/ Wingtribe Chaser / Wingtribe Guardian/ Wingtribe Attacker

◈ Scenario
It hasn't been long since the huge war broke out between the people and Roc.
Many people went to the peak of the mountain in hopes to defear Roc but all have failed.
Even after these tragedies, many fighters who deeply believed in their powers attempted to kill Roc but were never seen again.
I believe it was since then that the entrance to the Rok Mountain has been blocked
People tried many ways to open the blocked gate but failed and started to leave the mountain. However we, who still remain on this mountain have not given up. We have secretly began to obtain information about the Roc in hope to defeat him. And now, we have found a way to reach the top of the Rok Mountain. But we can not tell anyone because if this news gets spread to the Roc himself he will block this alternative way in that we have found.
You have already proven your ability through accomplishing the test. Now you can meet the Roc if we tell you the new way in. Can you defeat the Roc?
In order to go to the peak of the Rok Mountain you must pass the Gate of the ruler located below the peak of the mountain. This door was made by Roc for their local purpose.
Through a long time of research we have figured out a way to replicate the key used in this gate. If the combined collected spirit stones is to be spread out to the 7 Guardian Rocky and the guardian seal combines then the key will be made.
First the spirit stones of the Rok tribe should be collected. In order to do so collect 5 red spirit stones from the wingtribe and wingtribe guardian. Also collect 7 blue spirit stones from the wingtrive chaser and attacker.

The Nether Piece of Spirit, uh?

Since I can open the gates to the nether world. If you bring me the ingredients to build the Living Flame, I will help you summon a Spirit of underworld.

First, bring me the Branch of Life.
If you purify the tree monster with the Energy of Mountain, you would be able to get the Branch of life.
On the Roc Mountain where the monstrous bird of tremendous power is said to rule, there are monsters called Goat and Shaur. Those monsters have lived on the mountain for a long time. Get the Energy of mountain from them.
And if you use the Energy of Mountain to tree monster, Yeoha, you would be able to get the Branch of Life.

The venom has been applied to the pickaxes and the preparations are all done to mine Bi Young. All you need to do now is go and dig them out. You've been helping me so far. You will go through with this for me, won't you?
I'll give you the Venom-Applied Pickaxe. Please go mine some Bi Youngs for me. You can easily find Bi Young on the 3rd and 4th floor of the Qin-Shi Tomb, but you will need to go to the Southern Viper Cave, the Western Viper Cave, the Eastern Viper Cave, or the Northern Viper Cave to find large lumps.
Oh! I almost forgot. Venom-Applied Pickaxes loses its durability drastically with a single use, so you will only get a single use out of each one. If you run out of pickaxes mining Bi Young, please come back to me and I'll give you spares. Now, please bring me 10 Bi Youngs. Be careful out there.
