Dark Sandman

◈ Scenario
I have a confession to make: I used some of my clients' items, and I need to replace them before they find out. Dark Sandmen carry treasure boxes that might contain goods that I can use to substitute the missing items. Do you think you can help me? Please bring me 100 treasure boxes from Dark Sandmen in the Valley of the Kings.

◈ Objective
Deliver Specialty Goods Level 45 (China)

◈ Reward
1,769,000 Job EXP (-50% in Safe Mode)

◈ Format
One-time Quest

◈ NPC
Trader Sunwha / Trader Yusun

◈ Monster
None

◈ Scenario
We have an order for specialty goods to be delivered. You need to deliver specialty goods to Trader Yusun in Jangan. Specialty goods delivery assignments are worth more Job EXP than trade goods collection assignments. It would do you well to undertake some of these.

◈ Task
Collect 111 Kokoru's Beaks

◈ Reward
EXP 112027 /
Soldier's Tokens 5

◈ Format
One-time quest

◈ NPC
Hunter Associate Shahad

◈ Monster
Kokoru

◈ Scenario
If you are going to defeat Kokorus, I want to assign one more task to you. Please bring me Kokoru's unshaped beaks.

◈ Task
Deliver Ultra Blood Devil's Roots

◈ Reward
EXP 230566 /
General's Tokens 5

◈ Format
One-time quest

◈ NPC
Outpost Guard Hadaz / Hunter Associate Ahmok

◈ Monster
None

◈ Scenario
For Hotan, Ultra Blood Devils have been a big thorn on the side. The Hunter Association, in particular, suffered a great hit to their ego when their job was to protect the merchant caravans form monsters. When the word got out that we have retrieved Ultra Devil Flower's Roots, Hunter Associate Ahmok immediately submitted his request for them. Will you deliver these Ultra Blood Devil's Roots?

QNO_N_KT_050.quest_name: Things to be burned and destroyed

desc.notice:
◈ Objective
Deliver Smuggled Goods Level 100

◈ Reward
351,509,000 Job EXP (-50% in Safe Mode)

◈ Format
One-time Quest

◈ NPC
Smuggler Isutade / Smuggler Chao

◈ Monster
None

◈ Scenario
We have an order for smuggled goods to be delivered. You need to deliver Smuggled goods to Smuggler Chao in Jangan. Smuggled goods delivery assignments are worth more Job EXP than trade goods collection assignments. It would do you well to undertake some of these.

◈ Task
Speak with Hunter Associate Ahmok

◈ Rewards
EXP 1,100 / Skill EXP 500

◈ Format
One-time quest

◈ NPC
Merchant Associate Asaman / Hunter Associate Ahmok

◈ Monsters
None

◈ Scenario
Is there anything else you would like to know more about? Hmm… Now, why would Ahmok want information on something like this? No matter. Ahmok must be waiting. You should be on your way now.

◈ Mission
Speak to Trader/Hunter Union Representative Kapado.

◈ Reward
EXP 5412921 / Skill Points 1100 / Gold 2340

◈ Type
1 Time Only

◈ NPC
Hunter Union President Narmer / Trader/Hunter Union Representative Kapado

◈ Monster
N/A

◈ Scenario
Since large quantities of artifacts were discovered in the Shrine, the Trader and Thief Unions are constantly disputing with each other. I'm feeling reluctant about this, but we at the Hunter Union are bound to act with the Trader Union for these kinds of matters. For more details, please go speak to our representative Kapado at the Shrine.

desc1.notice: Conversing with Hunter Union Representative Kapado

QNO_SD_GU_002.quest_name: The Beginning of the Temple Dispute (Hunter)

desc.notice:
◈ Task
Speak with Lost Soldier Bolt

◈ Reward
EXP 4,441,302 / Skill Points 5,488 /
Gold 100,000

◈ Format
One-time quest

◈ NPC
Lost Soldier Will / Lost Soldier Bolt

◈ Monsters
None

◈ Scenario
In the short amount of time you've spent here, your skills have grown incredibly. I think we can let you handle the Zealots Hideout Intermediate. Would you be willing to investigate the Zealots Hideout Intermediate? Go to the Zealots Hideout Intermediate and speak with Lost Soldier Bolt. He will help you with your investigations there.

◈ Task
Eliminate 40 Togui Dolls

◈ Rewards
EXP 33,300 / Skill EXP 2,000

◈ Format
Repeatable quest (Restricted to once per day)

◈ NPC
Specialty Trader Sanmok

◈ Monsters
Togui Doll (The Phantom of the Crimson Blood level 61~70)

◈ How to Teleport
You can teleport to the Forgotten World by using a Dimension Hole.
You can obtain Dimension Holes from the monster that appears from the Dimension Pillars.

◈ Scenario
Have you heard rumors lately of ominous dolls? I hear that hideous-looking dolls are walking about attacking people. When such hideous things are about, it ruins the business. Now, there must be a way to dispose of those confounded dolls…

◈ Task
Collect 65 Blood Ong's Beads

◈ Reward
EXP 72260 /
Soldier's Tokens 5

◈ Format
One-time quest

◈ NPC
Outpost Guard Ramadin

◈ Monster
Blood Ong

◈ Scenario
I am told that Blood Ongs concentrate their essence and form beautiful beads inside their bodies. It is laughable that such ugly monsters would produce something beautiful. These beads are nothing more than ominous gems created with the bitterness of those who were killed by these monsters. Slay Blood Ongs and bring me the beads. I will pay you for your work.

◈ Task
Defeat 222 Kokorus and 240 Peritons

◈ Reward
EXP 478847 / Skill Points 698


◈ Format
One-time quest

◈ NPC
Hunter Associate Shahad

◈ Monster
Kokoru, Periton

◈ Scenario
Kokorus and Peritons appearing around Samarkand are very annoying monsters. We need someone powerful to handle them. I'll give you a task of slaying monsters, so that you can prove yourself. Would you challenge it?

◈ Mission
Speak to Egypt Governor Senmute.

◈ Reward
EXP 5412921 / Skill Points 1100 / Gold 2450

◈ Type
1 Time Only

◈ NPC
General Ratchel / Egypt Governor Senmute

◈ Monster
N/A

◈ Scenario
Although we've learned that we can use the secret document to intensify the power of Berserk, that power's full potential has yet to be revealed. According to recent news, the people of Alexandria have made some progress in studying the latent power of Berserk. Please go speak to Egypt Governor Senmute for more information.

◈ Mission
Collect 50 Dark Sandman Samples, 50 Blood Sandman Samples, and 50 Blood Hyena Samples.

◈ Reward
EXP 63063169 / Skill Points 3500 / Gold 7284

◈ Type
1 Time Only

◈ NPC
Doctor Renenutet / Doctor Renenutet

◈ Monster
Dark Sandman / Blood Sandman / Blood Hyena

◈ Scenario
Thank you for your trouble, but unfortunately these won't be enough to produce the evidence I need. That said, I need even more samples. Please bring me 50 Dark Sandman Samples, 50 Blood Sandman Samples, and 50 Blood Hyena Samples.

QNO_SD_MA_013.quest_name: The Truth of the Strange Rumor (2)

desc.notice:
◈ Task
Defeat 188 Devil Ghost Nachals and 201 Devil Mask Nachals

◈ Reward
EXP 3,540,336 / Skill Points 756


◈ Format
Repeatable (x4)

◈ NPC
Outpost Commander Dao Zhi Fong

◈ Monster
Devil Ghost Nachal, Devil Mask Nachal

◈ Scenario
Earth Ghosts have really done it this time! They have awakened Devil Ghosts and Devil Masks, the demons that had been sealed inside the Donwhang Stone Cave for eons. Now, they have returned as Nachals and they will not relent until they slay all humans in West China. But not all is lost yet. Their resurrection is not complete, so they must have not yet regained their full power. We should be able to defeat Devil Ghosts and Devil Masks as they are now. Will you help us?

◈ Mission
Collect 30 Earthworm Venoms.

◈ Reward
EXP 12550119 / Skill Points 2100 / Gold 5118

◈ Type
1 Time Only

◈ NPC
Potion Trader Thiara / Potion Trader Thiara

◈ Monster
Devil Worm

◈ Scenario
I won't forgive him, ever! How could he be seeing another woman? I refuse to be insulted like this! Yes, I'm going to make him pay. Hey, bring me Earthworm Venom from Devil Worms in the Storm and Cloud Desert. I need exactly 30. Don't ask me why, but hurry up!

◈ Task
Defeat 490 Unidentified Infantries

◈ Reward
EXP 135250958 / Skill Points 2887 /
GOLD 232260

◈ Format
2

◈ NPC
Scout Commander Syujaatun

◈ Monster
Unidentified Infantries

◈ Scenario
According to the recent information, demons and unidentified soldiers are found in the forest. Strange, don't you think? All soldiers dispatched here belong to Baghdad. There is no reason to have other soldiers in the area. First, I have to uncover the identity of these mysterious soldiers. Please, lend us a hand.

◈ Task
Defeat 400 Temple Defend Knights

◈ Reward
EXP 1,116,158 / Skill Points 578 /
Gold 22,225

◈ Format
Unlimited Repeats

◈ NPC
Lost Soldier Charles

◈ Monsters
Temple Defend Knight

◈ Scenario
If you happen to be free, would you slay more Temple Defend Knights for me?

◈ Task
Collect 74 Odd Eggs

◈ Reward
EXP 35,383 /
Monk's Tokens 5

◈ Format
One-time quest

◈ NPC
Outpost Guard Chase

◈ Monster
Seirenes, Seiren

◈ Scenario
Horrible monsters have appeared on the Shore of Dawn, too. Because of those monsters, caravans traveling along the shore is suffering much casualty. From what I've heard, these monsters carry strange eggs with them. Would you go and collect those eggs for me? We'll need to sell those eggs to provide the funds to repair the damage. We are in luck that they have something of value.

◈ Mission
Eliminate 1000 Evil Bugs.

◈ Reward
EXP 9188110 / Skill Points 1050 / Gold 49875

◈ Type
Repeatable

◈ NPC
Palace Guard Mushari / Palace Guard Mushari

◈ Monster
Evil Bug

◈ Scenario
Prove to me that you're capable of becoming a true Deity by hunting 1000 Evil Bugs.

◈ Task
Defeat 303 Hun Archers and 135 Hun Defense Lancers

◈ Reward
EXP 581476 / Skill Points 691


◈ Format
One-time quest

◈ NPC
Outpost Commander Gavin

◈ Monster
Hun Archer, Hun Defense Lancer

◈ Scenario
Rather than anything, a face-to-face confrontation is the best way to grasp the skill of the Huns. If you want to know their power, it will be good for you to fight against Hun Archers and Hun Defense Lancers. Your task is to slay this useless, cunning savage tribe.

◈ Task
Defeat 150 Fire Guardians, 150 Water Guardians, and 150 Soul Guardians

◈ Reward
EXP 1,489,592 / Skill Points 838 /
Gold 40,360

◈ Format
Unlimited Repeats

◈ NPC
Lost Soldier Chrom

◈ Monsters
Fire Guardian, Water Guardian, Soul Guardian

◈ Scenario
Have you ever heard of the Guardians of the Air? I mean the griffins, the creatures that ancient Greek warriors had to fight for their test. These Guardians are mercilessly attacking us. Our soldiers are falling left, right and center at their aerial assault. Will you help us?

◈ Mission
Deliver the Stone Tablet with Vanished Writing to Exorcist Miaoryeong Dancer

◈Reward
Experience 2601000

◈ Form
Available Once

◈ NPC
Jangan Hunter Associate Gwakwi / Miaoryeong the Witch Dancer

◈ Monster
None

◈ Scenario
Not long after I delivered the stone tablets with the martial secrets on it, I was contacted for help.
It seems that, when the tablets were pieced together, the tablets lost its unique color and the writings on it was all vanished. The disappearing of the writing must mean that something has gone wrong with the tablets. But I cannot discern why, and it looks like we'll have to ask Miaoryeong for help since she is an expert in the magical arts.
I would like to solve the problem myself because, after all, I was the one that Bicheonmoon School contacted for help, but I have certain duties to fulfill right now at the Hunters Guild and cannot leave my place. Since you have retrieved the stone tablets, I would like to entrust the task to you. Would you be interested? Take these stone tablets to Miaoryeong the Witch Dancer and find out the cause of the writing vanishing.

desc1.notice: Deliver the Stone Tablet with Vanished Writing to Miaoryeong

desc.notice:
◈ Mission
Eliminate 100 Imhotep and 100 Priests of Punishment.

◈ Reward
EXP 3247753 / Skill Points 750 / Gold 9800 / AP 200

◈ Type
Repeatable

◈ NPC
Job Union Representative Mansuana / Job Union Representative Mansuana

◈ Monster
Imhotep / Priest of Punishment

◈ Scenario
I'll help any union to consolidate their dominance of the Shrine, but only if they complete my mission: eliminate 100 Imhotep and 100 Priests of Punishment.

QNO_SD_GU_034.quest_name: Hunting in the Middle of the Temple Dispute 3 (Thief)

desc.notice:
◈ Objective
Deliver Specialty Goods Level 35 (Europe)

◈ Reward
651,300 Job EXP (-50% in Safe Mode)

◈ Format
One-time Quest

◈ NPC
Trader Samanda / Trader Anna

◈ Monster
None

◈ Scenario
We have an order for specialty goods to be delivered. You need to deliver specialty goods to Trader Anna in Constantinople. Specialty goods delivery assignments are worth more Job EXP than trade goods collection assignments. It would do you well to undertake some of these.

◈ Mission
Deliver scroll to Adria

◈ Reward
None

◈ Form
Available once

◈ NPC
Sunset Witch / Constantinople Hunter Associate Adria

◈ Monster
None

◈ Scenario
There is a place called the Niya Remains where the blazing sun scorches everything.
The souls of soldiers who died there have turned into monsters and wander the place. The most powerful of these are the Niya General. You can get the spirit from him. To get the spirit, you will need a Trap to wrap the Spirit. Bring this spell scroll to Adria the Hunter Associate and ask her for the trap. She once asked me for the trap to eliminate a monster with a very nasty evil energy. I taught her how to make a trap then, so she should be able to make you one if you just deliver this spell scroll.
Once you have the trap, bring it to the Niya Remains, place it on the ground, and lure the soldiers in. Their souls will be caught in the trap and you should be able to get their spirit.
One thing, though, is that the harbors might have eaten away the spirits so you might end up with Flutter Spirits.
But it has to be an Normal Spirit. I will use Flutter Spirits to make Nostrum of Magic, so I will pay you a fair price if you bring them to me.
Now you got the spell scroll go give it to Hunter Associate Adria and recieve the Trap for Spirit.

◈ Mission
Eliminate 800 Dark Khepris.

◈ Reward
EXP 7694897 / Skill Points 450 / Gold 37800

◈ Type
Repeatable

◈ NPC
Egyptian Soldier Kamori / Egyptian Soldier Kamori

◈ Monster
Dark Khepri

◈ Scenario
Do you wish to become a Deity? I can help you with that. Please go hunt 800 Dark Khepris.

◈ Task
Collect 90 Caravan Specialty Goods

◈ Reward
EXP 84,375 /
Soldier's Tokens 5

◈ Format
One-time quest

◈ NPC
Outpost Guard Ji He Long

◈ Monster
Hyeongcheon guard

◈ Scenario
Have you heard of Hyeoncheon Guards, the decapitated warriors who have come back from the dead? In these days of prosperity upon the Silkroad, caravans that pass through West China are suffering heavy damage because of these monsters. We have received a report that a specialty goods caravan was attacked recently. The merchants somehow preserved their lives, but it looks like their goods were all stolen. Would you lend them a helping hand?

◈ Objective
Collect 100 units of Raspberries (Europe)

◈ Reward
1,200 Job EXP / item (10% bonus when quota filled) -50% in Safe Mode

◈ Format
Unlimited Repeatable

◈ NPC
Smuggler Barus

◈ Monster
Monsters Lv 30-39

◈ Scenario
You need to work ceaselessly to increase your Job level. If you are ready, bring me 100 units of Raspberries. You should be able to find Raspberries as you hunt monsters at level 30-39. If you run out of time and don't find enough Raspberries, don't worry. Even if you don't have all 100 units, I will pay you for what you have. But don't forget that you have to bring all 100 units to gain greater Job EXP.

◈ Mission
Eliminate 10 Sekhmets in the High Pharaoh's Tomb.

◈ Reward
EXP 3765035 / Skill Points 1250 / Gold 15356

◈ Type
Repeatable

◈ NPC
Egyptian Soldier Turian / Egyptian Soldier Turian

◈ Monster
Sekhmet (Tomb High)

◈ Scenario
Alright, let's start the Deity training. Now it's time for you to hunt 10 Sekhmets in the High Pharaoh's Tomb.

◈ Task
Speak with Lost Commander Dustun

◈ Reward
EXP 4,441,302 / Skill Points 5,488 /
Gold 100,000

◈ Format
One-time quest

◈ NPC
Lost Soldier Bolt / Lost Commander Dustun

◈ Monsters
None

◈ Scenario
H… help me. Co… commander is fighting the monsters alone inside. It's freaking me out and I… can't breathe properly. No sooner than our arrival underground, zealots poured out through this door. Commander ordered all of us out, and he is now facing them alone. *sob* I'm such a coward. Please, go inside, slay all the monsters and save my commander. *sob*

◈ Mission
Collect 15 Marks of Alliance (Resurrection)

◈ Reward
1 Weak Pation of Resurrection

◈ Form
Unlimited attempts

◈ NPC
Chief of Village Bukhra

◈ Monster
None

◈ Scenario
It has been a long time since we are under the Roc clan's rule.
But because of people like you who seek to defeat Roc, we are not giving up the hope of freedom
We prepared some supplies for your battles to thank all your hard work.
Although we can't fight on the frontline with you, we would like to help in your battles by providing some things that you would need.
If you bring us 15 Marks of Alliance(Resurrection), I will exchange those into 1 Weak Pation of Resurrection which restore 50% of your Exp. when you are dead.
If you would like different rewards, you can go visit Salihan who lives in Shepherd town or Anashya in the Wind Town.
Just so you know, you will beed 10 Marks of Alliance(Will) for Anachya, or 7 marks of Alliance(Recovery) for Salihan to receive your reward.

◈ Task
Deliver Evil Yeti's Clubs

◈ Reward
EXP 1291246 /
General's Tokens 5

◈ Format
One-time quest

◈ NPC
Outpost Guard Chi Hu Dai / Blacksmith Soboi

◈ Monster
None

◈ Scenario
Blacksmith Soboi wants Evil Yeti's Clubs that we seized after defeating Evil Yetis. We have no manpower available for the delivery. If you are not busy, could you help us a little?

QNO_N_KT_105.quest_name: A club for one lethal blow

desc.notice:
◈ Task
Obtain 80 Togui Documents

◈ Rewards
EXP 9,200 / Skill EXP 10,000

◈ Format
One-time quest

◈ NPC
Hunter Associate Ahmok

◈ Monsters
Togui Sorcerer (The Phantom of the Crimson Blood level 35~50)

◈ How to Teleport
You can teleport to the Forgotten World by using a Dimension Hole.
You can obtain Dimension Holes from the monster that appears from the Dimension Pillars.

◈ Scenario
There have often been instances of Toguis harming and eating humans, but this is the first time that they kidnapped anyone. Why would they do something so bothersome, like kidnapping? We will need further investigations. Will you help me once more?
